item.text: bam po nyer gsum pa// mdor na/ khye'u gnyis rgal
ba gsum pa dang// 'phrin pa dag dang dge 'dun zhing
phur ba dang// shing dang bya tshang rnam gnyis so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
'gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams
thar par byas pa ni/ rgyas par rnam par 'byed pa las ji skadu 'byung ba bzhin no// khyim
bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs
nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ga deg 'dun rnams ni byon gyi/ dge slong zhagi
gtsug lag khangan 'dug ste bsod snyems mnos so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med pa la zas sbyin
gyi khye'u rnams dze ta'i tshal na rtse ba las/ g.yon can dag gis brkus pa dge slong des mthong ste/ des
sngags bslabs nas ring bo ma lon par des 'di snyam du/ ma la bdag gis sngags 'dis sad do snyam du
bsamasanas/ des sngags de brjod pa dang/ g.yon can de dag dpung ga tshogs bzhis bskor bar
gyur nas/ de dag gis khye'u de rnams bor ta bros so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas/
bya// de la dge slong dag gis 'di ni phas phamapa'i nyis pa byung ngo zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong khyod kyis ji ltar bsams te khye'u rnams thar per byas zhes rmas pa dang/ sngags
sad par bsams so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngags brjod pa la nyes pa med do// ljongs
ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi chos gos bgos pa dang/ dge slong gzhi ba zhig grong gzhan du song ba dang/ de la lhan cig spyod pa gnyis/
shag yod de/ de gnyis kyis mkhan po'i gis so sor mnos so// de gnyis kyis mnos te dong ba dang/ gcig la gcig mkhan
po'i gos khyod kyis mnos sam zhes dris so// khyod kyis kyang mnos// khe bas kyang mnosan/ gang gis mi dbang bar mnos
@#pas phas pham pa byung bani mi shes so zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mnos pa la nyes pa med de/ 'on kyang gzhan shes par byos shig/
ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyis gos bgos pa dang/ dge slong gzhi ba zhicig grong gzhan du song nas/ dge slong de'i mdza' bo zhig yod de/ des de'i gos mnos nas/ des/
'ongs pa dang 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni khyod kyi gos yin te/ kho bos mnos nas 'ongs so zhes smras pa dang/ ngas khyod la nubacol lo zhes smras pa dang/ dge
slong de 'gyod pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsalar/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ ma bcol bar rnyed pa ma mnos shig/ mnos na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/
ljongs kos lar gos rnams bgos pa'i tshidage slong zhag na pa dang/ de'i nad g.yog sa gas mas nas/ de khyer te song ba dwang/ dge slong de'ang dus las 'das te/ dge slong des ji
ltar bya ba shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de sta snga sa 'das la/ phyis mnosanani de nyid du slar phul cig 'on te sngar mnos la/ phyis dus 'asan ni yo byad

gzhan ji lta ba de ltar byos shig/ dge slong zhig gas/ dge slong zhig la tshe dang ldan patshur shog/ chung chung dunas ma byani par blangs dang nyes par mi 'gyura'o zhes smras pa dang/ ngage slongadag/
gis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal ba// sbyor ba gcig gi rin thang brtsi bar bya'o// khyim bdag
ga dge 'dun gyi zhing rmod pa dang/ de dge slong gzhi ba 'be 'ongasanas 'di skad du/ khyim bdag yang shas phyin cig yang na zhing ma rmod cig ces smras kyang/ des mamanyan
ti rmos pa dang/ dge slong des bod pa'i rtse mor nyal lo// de nas khyim bdag des thong ba bor nas 'di skad du/ dge sbyong 'ad lta bu dang bral ba shog cig ces 'phya nang song ste/ mi
[E, ]snyan ngag zer ba dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med do/ phyin chad dge slong gis 'diltar lus mi sdug par ma byed ca// dge slong zhig
gis/ dge slong zhig la 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa tshurangashog/ mchod rten gyi nor brkus kyang bdag cag gnyis la nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//

tsaSh+Tha dge slong dag mchod rten gyi yo khyad srungs ma yod pa lasan/ de ste rin thang tshang na pas pham par 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhi ba go dge 'dun gyi zhing snod du bcug pa dang/ de nas shin tu mi ring ba
zhige na/ khyim bdag cag kyang zhang mod de/ khyim bdag de 'os nas/ btsun pas kho bo'i zhing sa rmo zhige ces smras pa dang/ 'di khyed kyis yin te/ dge 'dun gyi yang ngo// btsun pa kho bo'idapa du mi
ma yin bas bstan to zhes smras nas/ khyim bdag des sngon mtshams su phur ba btab pa de brkyes so/ de bskos nas bstan pa dang/ sa thengapa bor nas khyim bdag de song ba'i 'og tu/ sa de'i phur

banang du bsgyur te zhing rmos dung/ khyim bdag de slar 'ongasanas btsun pa gzodakyang kho ba rgyalan/ ci'i phyi'i da dung yang 'ang med ces smras pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalal/ de stod ngos bo tshangan pas pham par 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis khyim bdag gi me tog khareshing zhig ma byin par blangs pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste das po tshang na las pham par 'gyur// 'bras burigang yang de bzhin no// dge slong gi 'chal sa 4shing zhig skyes te/ la 'ol kha'i tshang bcas
nas des de dag 'chag ba la shing 'go zhing skad 'byin pa dang/ des de'i tshang bshig nas/ lab de skad 'byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' gol/ ga'ago'olagaci'i
phyir skad 'byin ces smras ba dang/ dge slong dag gis 'ol ba'i tshang bshig pa'i slad du'o// 'ol ba'i tshang bshig cig/ sus bshage pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong gis
'ol ba'i tshang bshig nas tshon bskol ba de yang rgyas par de bzhin no/// mdor na la thug sdong bu 'bras bu dang// 'dab ma me tog rnam gsum du// rta dngarta zhon brku ba dang
gru rgyal ba dang nor bu 'o/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cag la la phug gir bzhage yod de/ der dge slong zhig song nas 'di skad du/ lasdug bsu/
zhes smras pa dang/ btsun pa rin stsol cig/ rin med de// rin med par de ji ltar gsol/ chos kyi phyir ni med par byin cig/ btsun pa de ste 'di 'ongs so cog la rin med par byin n
po ba ci la zas dang gos cung zad kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ cung zad kyang ma sbyin nam/ cung zad kyang ma kho sol nas smras nas/ des la khug gir bde sngags kyis bsam
ba pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phas pham pa'i nyes pa nasod kyi/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// la phug gir pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sdong bu'ir pa dang/ la ma'i
ra ba dang/ 'bras bu'i re ba rnams kyang de bzhin ne// rtazhige za zhing 'dug pa dang/ dge slong zhig gis rtswa chang ba gang blangasanas/ rta'amadun du bsgrang bdang de'ang de'i phyi bzhin
du 'ong bar gyur nas/ dge slong des 'di ltar brku bar bya'o snyam ste/ lus rnam par bsgyur ba dang/ de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas
! bam pa 'anyis pa ni med kyi/ nyes ba sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig tshong pa 'gron po mang po dag tsami dang lhan cig ljongs kos lar dong nas/ mya ngam gyi lam zhig tu na ba dang/
0tshong pa de dag rta la zhon nas/ de dag gis btsun ba mya ngam gyi lam 'di ni 'jigs pa dang bcas kyis/ rta la bcibs lamyur du bzhud dobyas pa dang/ dge slong de dag gsarta la zhon te/dedug
gis der 'di ltar brku bar bya'o snyam nas/ lus rnam pa bsgyur bad/ dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni mid de/

nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig rin po ches gang ba'i glu dang lhan cig rgyal ba las/ des der 'di ltar brku bar bya'o snyam nas/ lus rnam par bsgyur ba dang/ dge slong de 'gyodang skyes nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pas pham pa'i nyis ba med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// tshong pa zhig ga gru rani bo ches gang ba chur bying ba dang/ de brel bsarin po che'i sgrom chus khyer
ti dge slong dag cag 'og na chu la 'khru zhing 'dug pa de dag gson po che'i sgrom mthong nas/ de dag gis de phyungab dang/ tshong pa des mthong ste/ btsun pa dag rin po che'i sgrom 'di ni bdag gi lag

so zhes smras pa dang/ 'di chus khyer ba las ded kyis red do// btsun pa dag badrag gi gu rin po ches gang bachur byang ste/ de nas kho'i bril ba dang/ rin po che'i sgrom 'di chus khyer te rin po che'i
sgrom 'di ni bdag gi lags so zhes smras pa dang/ de ste khyod kyi zhin khyer cig/ dge slong de dag 'gyod bskyasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhes pa med do//
dge slong gzhi ba nag gas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi yo byad brku sems kyis gnas nas gnas su spos pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas// bcom ldan du/
kyis bka' stsalal/ phas pham bltos pa med de/ nyis pa sbom por 'gyur/ kunum gcig gsab zhib khrid de dgenupa gnas asu 'dzegs nas/ dedag gis der btags te do
ba dang/ gnas der dge slong dag nyin bar spyod pa'i phyir dong ba dang/ de dag gisabo de mthong nas/ dedag gis snying rje sku btangab dang/ dengag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ sa pham pa'i nyis pa med de/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/// mngon rodong gsar gyi 'phreng ba dang// byanalag b rnam pa gnyis/ ra gus gsum dang kog
tshogs// rnyid bya rgyu bya tshang ngo// mnyan du yod pan gzhan dag la gsol ba 'debs khyim bdag des kyang dgos pa zhig gsol nas// de'i dgos pa de grub pa dang/
des de la 'asadakarapo zhig gas g.yogs te bzhag pa la/ dge slong nag po dga' zhes bya ba der song nas/ su de blangs pa dang/ la dge slong rnams kyis khyod la phas pham pa'inyis pa byung/
ngo das po gang gi phyir/ khyod kyis lo ris ma byin pa blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang/ de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phas pham pa sa
ba med de/ nyes pa sbom bor gyur ro// grong khyer yangs pa can n gser gyi phreng ba btags pa zhig 'asrung zhing 'dug go zhes// dge slonganag podagazhis bya ba des shes te/ der song
nas/ dela'athog pa lasa'odo ba dang/ dedapa' lanus bsan/ des gser gyi 'brong bu thogs te khyen pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyisasanas/ dayang de bzhin du rgyas par 'o//
bud med mang zhig chu a dzi'i pa ti'i gos su gso dang rgyan rnams bzhag sta khrus byed ngan/ sgru'u zhib pa dang las babasanasargyan rnams khyer te/ shing lasu 'dzegs pa dang/ dengag sur byung
nas gso rnams bgasatargyan rnams thogs nas byas na/ mu tig dogal mdanas/ gang gitshom dpa de 'tsho song do// de nas spru'u sa mu tig gi droshal de de nyid du slar bor ba dang/ dge slong
dgacagi dan tu mi ring ba zhagi na 'chag nyidi'akhod pa de dag gis mu tig gsha'ade mthong nas blangs te dam dedag la byin no// bud med dgan ni/ khyed kyis mu tig gi do shal 'barkus so zhes smras
ba dang/ di dacagagasamabarkus kyi/ khyedacag khrus byed pan/ spre'u zhig shalas babasanas mu khagoshal 'di blos tes shing la 'gasaso// gang tshidakyis btsal timado
nas dong ba de 'tshosar babs te de nyid du bzhag ga dge slongadi dag 'gyedapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalapa/ nyisapa medad// dge slong gis spyan lag gitshabashig sta sgong bas
gapa dang pyan lagade sgra 'byin te/ de bzhin rgyas par ro// dge slong mang zhige/khagatsug lob kha zhig na 'khod pa dang/ byi bdagag cig tu khung nas byung ste/ ro
dang kha bas brkus shing byi bung du slar song ba dang/ de dag 'di snyam du gyurati// bdag cad g la rkub de su zhig snyam du bsams te/ dge slong dag gis bsod snyoms las bskor nas//
gdugs tshod sdodacing 'dug pa dang/ bya ba de yang khung bu nas byung sta/ kha zas khyer nas de bzhin du bya khung du slar song ba dang/ dge slong de dag 'di snyam du bdag gcig la sku bani 'di yin no
snyam du bsams te/ de dag gis de bzung nas dge slong dag la bstan te/ bdag cag la sku ban 'di yin na nas smras pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la phas pham pa'inyis pa byung ngo/
das bogs/ khyed kyis byi ba las ma byin par blangs pas so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyes pa med kyis/ dge slong

t+ti nags kyi gang yin pa de long zhig/ byi ba'i gang yin bden mi blang bar bya'o/ byi bas bca' ba dang bza' ba rnams khyer te 'osangashing/ dge slong zhig gi mal stan gyi 'og tu bzhi g pa dang/ dge slong

des nang ba'i sngar songashing zas/ gdong bkrus nas byin len byas te/ de bres pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa khyod rtag par lag pa dang rkang b.legs par bkrus kyang bsod snyoms la grong dumi

'jugan/ de ci'i phyir zhes smras pa dang/ bdag ni phyi bas bca' ba dang bza' ba khyer te 'ongs shing mal stan gyi 'og tu 'jog ste/ bdag gis sngar byin len byas nas bros so zhes smras pa dang/ tshong ldan

pa khyod pan pas dam pa'i nyis pa byung ngo// dngos po gang bde phyir khyed kyis nga' bca' ba dang bza' pa ma byin par blangs pa'i phyira'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dan tshe snga ma la bya ba'i ba yin te/ de nga la byams pas na dge slong de la kha khras khyer te 'os shing phyin pas nyes pa med do// ri dgas shig
rngon pas bsnyags nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang/ ngon ba de dag gis bdag cag gi ri dgas de na bsnyags te gtsug lag khang du song gis/ slar byin cig ces smras so// de dgags gang
gi tshom thob pa de'i tsho bor te dang ba dang/ dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa med de// rngon pas ri dgas mas phog pa de'ang de bzhinadu rgyas
par bya'o// rjen bas ri dwags shig mda'adug can gyis pog pa gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang/ rten pa de dag gis bdag cag 'degs 'dimada' du gcan gyis phog ste gdon mi bra par 'chis/
sar byin cig ces smras pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis skar ma byon nas/ de dag gis kher te dong ngo// de dag dang ba'i 'og tu ra dgas de'ang dus 'das nas/ dge slong de dgagi ji ltar byamishesanas
bcom ldan s kyis bka' stsalal/ rten pa de dag lasur byin cage/ dge slong gis rdzunapa lagadopar bya ba'i phyi'i kegatshobacagan nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//
snying rje bas bcad na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// de bzhin du khya'i yang gnodopar bya ba'i phyir bcangan nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// snying rjeb bsams te bcad nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong
gis bya rgya gnod bya ba'i phyir bcad n nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// snying rje bar bsamasate btsan nyes byas su gyur ro// byatshang yang de bzhin// mdaban gsa'atshong ba
dang tshong dus dang/ bca'ab gru gsum thug pa dang// bodadadadas po tshos gos so/ dge slong zhig gsal sa'atshong bar rob 'gag risacage blangasanas khyer te song ba dang//
ges 'tsho ngas mthong nas/ des de las ma chu zhes smras pa dang/ bstananas khyer te 'od pozhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/
phas pham pa 'anyis pa med de/ nyesang sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gisatshong dus nga' skyen po'i mang la blangs pa dang/ sa skyin pa bdasan/ sa 'di snyam du 'di lami sbyin no snyam
dubasams pa dang/ de'agyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ pas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes ba spomadog 'gyur ro// dge slong zhage na ba dang/ de
'khur ba gru gsum dang thug pa 'dad nas/ des 'dasnyam du 'khur ba gru gsum dang phyug pa byas te/ ge 'dun la'ang gsol/ pas/kyadabab pa 'o snyam/ desand g.yog rnams
la dge 'dun lanang gsal/ kho bo yang babras/ 'khur ba gru gsum dang thug pa yang sbyor cig ces smras nas/ sade dag la ni byin pa dang/ de dag gis 'dasnyam du bdag cag 'a'abur/
bgru gsum dang thug pa cad gos kyis/ 'digatsage du la khur ba gru gsum dang thug pa byin la// rin dbage'o snyam bsamasanas/ de dag gas de'a'akhur ba gru gsum dang thug pa nate
rin bges pa dang/ dge slong de dag 'gyedapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalta stsal pa/ phas pham pa nyes pa med de/ zhes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// ngage slong nadapa zhig yod
de la zengamang du yodapas/ sa snyam du 'dug na bdag shi bdung/ dge 'dun gyisabages so snyam bsamasanas/ des nad g.yog rnams latshodang ldan pa dag khong la sran chud/
ba'i tshod ma theg byin cig ces smras nas/ dodag gse de la sran chung ga tshod ma zhig byas te byin pa dang/ nadagayog de dag brel bar gyur nas/ sa zo dang sran chung ga tshodamar bsres nas 'thus
ba dang de kha bas lci bas dus 'das taM/ dge slong de dag 'dus nas dur khrodadu bar 'o// dedag gsade ba'o nas nad g.yogapa la smras pa// dge slong de'i bong mang pobagekhor byas khyer te go
ces smras pa dang/ drag so drug gis btsal nas ma rnyed// de dag stan las langs te dong// dge slong de gcan gzan gyis lta dral te rgyu ma drangs so//
rgyu ma drangs pa dang bod rnams sa la bang zhing 'dug ge/ dge slong zhig dur khrod du ma'i lo rtog cusongab dang/ des bod de mthonas/ dengag khyer te dge 'dun phulapo dang/ dge slong
'gyo ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyes pa med do// dge slong nadapa 'geg yod/ de la shing gangs bo mang du yodapa dang/ des nang g.yog rnams la
tshodang ldan pa dag dge slong rnams nges shig/ dge 'dun 'bulal// mchod rten la dbul la// gang zag rnams la dbul lazhes smras pa dang/ nad g.yog rnams 'di snyam du dge
'dun dang mchod rten la phu'an/ bdag cag gis cung zad kyang mi thob bo snyam nas// dedagags dge slong ma bas// dge slong yang dus sunas/ dngaga'agyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ nyes pa med de nadapa dang mamathun par nd g.yog gsam byecig/ nadangs ji ltar bslob de bzhin du de dag gis bsgrub par bya'o// 'on te rnam grangs gzhan
zhig tu bdodapar gyur na yang/ ji ltar nad pasabasgo bdaltar byesashage/ dge slong nad pa zhig yod de/ del lhung bzidad tshos shes mang du yod pa dang/ des nang g.yog rnams la dge slong rnams
[4 ]bas 'ge mtshod rten la dbul lo// dge 'dun la dbul la// gang bag la dbu la la zhes smras pa dang/ de bzhin du rgyas pa brjod pa bya'o/ mdapon tsan dan lakra
so dAgi/ sbyar ma dang 'bar ba dang// sushi modang bzang sbyin dang// rang ga'i 'du shes lhung bzed blangasang dang// a ngatadang/ shi gub tadang// rag gso rnams brkus pa'o// mtshig
subacad pa 'di ni dziltar rnam par 'byed pa las 'byung ba bzhinano// mngon dge slong ma yang gnyis ldan dang// mo'u 'gal bu dwangagazhan yang gnyis// pa lani btsugs/
po dang// nye dga' ba dang spong ba po'o// 0/ dge slong ma gnyis dang ldan pa na ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin no// mnyan du yod pa'i tshong pa dag cig gru ba tshor zhugs nas rgya mtsho mchang gnam

rgal te/ de dag rgya mtsho mchingaganam bya nang nas dngob dang/ gru bo krus gzung nas lha brana rnams la gsol kyang ma btangab dang/ den tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal bu chen po grong du nyabar 'gro ba'i
dge bsnyan zhag yod de/ des 'di snyam du de sto 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos dgongasanan bkra shis par gyur cag cesabasams pa dang/ gnas brtan gyisakyang dgungosate/ jit+tarasaMs+sa

snyoms par zhugs pasakhya'i rgyal po nam mkha' ldang du gyur nas/ gru'adeng 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tinged 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ klu de dag skragasta gru batsho de btang nas tshong pa/
rnams bde bar mnyan du yod par phyin te/ thams can 'aphugs pa mo'u 'gal gyi nga 'a mthu'o zhes brjod nas/ dge slong dag gis 'di nga lta zhes dris pa dang/ ]

de ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras// de nas dge slong dag gis tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen la ni phas pham pa'i nyis pa byung ngo// dngos po gang ga phyi klus gru zani pam byin par btad do zhes
smras ba dang/ dge slong de 'gyedapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar bsaMms btang zhes smras pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul par
bsams so// mo'u 'gal gyi bus rdzu 'phrul gyis btadabalaninyis pa med de// mnyan du yodapa'i tshong pa dag zing khyer te ljongs rgyur song nas/ dengag mya ngam gyi nang du phyin pa dang/ 'gron pa

mang po de dag kun ngos bskos/ de dag gis lha rnams lagasol kyang ma btang bdang/ de dag nang na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po grong du nyebar 'gyo ba'itshong pa zhig yodapanges 'di snyam
k+ku du de sta gnas brtan gyis dgasanan bkra shis par gyuratsa ga cesabasams pa dang/ gnas brtanagyis kyang dgangasanas/ ji ltar sems snyoms par zhugs pas/ rkun po rnams dang/
gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pos bskor bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ rkun bodi dag skrag pas 'gran pa mang po dag btang ste bros pa dang/ tshong pa de dag bkra shis/

shing bde bar mnyan du yod pa'i phyin te/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par smras te snga ma bzhin no// palan da'i bu gnyis n rgyas par 'dul ba las ji skad 'byung babazhinano// shAkya'i

bu nyi dga'abodabar gyi zla ba tham 'bagangadudage slong ji snyed cage dbyar tshul du zhugs/ gang dudage 'dunagyi redapa janyid cagiredaces gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing spyodade/ de gnas gang dang gang du phyin pa'i
dge slong de dag gis tshig snyan pas bsub dang/ khyed bde bar gnasasam zhes dris te/ dge 'dun nas dge 'dun gyi rid pasu yodapacu yodapa 'on cigadang bgosal/ gang kho ba'agisakyi skal ba de nibakur
zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis khyer te 'ongs nas de'i mdun du bzhag pa dang/ des bgos nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gos kyi skal ba khyer te langs pa dang/ sa yang gnas brtand dang ma bzhud
par bzhugs shig ces smras pad/ nye dga' bo yang gtamasnyen pa gtam sna tshogs bde ba laspobs pa dang ldan te/ rigs pa dang grol ba laspobs pa na/ des ji ltar gnasabartan la dad pa
'gyur ba de ltabu'i chos bshad pa dang/ des bdag gi gsakyi skalabcu yodapatshodang ldan pa bzhes shig ces smras pa dang/ de bzhin du gnas brtan gnyis po dang/ gnas brtanagasum po dang/
dge slong de dag las mang zhig gis gos de la byin nas/ sa gas de dag khur du khyer te dzod 'tshol du zhugs pa dang/ dge slong dag gisatshodang ldan pa nye dga' bo gis 'di rig galas red cesadris nas/
des de dag la de lta bu gyur pa rgyas bar smras so// de lta bu 'byung yod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as kyisand dang bslab pa gnas ma bcas so// rgan zhugs ganyis
ni rgyas par ji ltar 'dul ba 'ga'abyung ba bzhin no// dge slong gas gzhan gyi dbyar gyi gos skal bam len cag/ sus blangs pa de nyis byas su 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan ng kun dga' bo'i lhan

spyod pa spong ba po zhes bya ba desab tshulo khrims dang ldan pa zhaces ste/ de khyim bdag gzhan zhig khrid kyi bar 'grob yin te/ dal ba gses shig yod de/ khyimabadag de 'ang nad kyisobatab bo// de da
la nad 'dra'i so bdang/ sad lano bzhin// gnyis posan ci'ang ma thob nas/ des tshe dang ldan ng gan dga' bo la malangs pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos spong ba pochadapasabacad pa dang/
de sngon slob ma 'a sarab tu byung bas na/ des slob ma lnga brgya tsam zhig gzengs bstod de/ bdag ga mkhan po la bsod pa gso' cagaces smras pa dang/ khyod kyi mkhan po la bzod pa ji ltar bya/ khyod
kyis khye'u rnams khrid la mikhan po'i drung dudas shig/ sa khyed cag la chos 'chadang ra 'gyur gyis/ gang gis tshe chos bshad ban pa gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyi dang bu mo rnams r la dengs shig dang/

dengag dus ngas bu mo dang khyab de dag 'dod do zhes zer ba dang/ dolade lta spong ba po la yang ba bodang mdzad dam zhes smos shig ces smras pa dang/ ded/gas ji ltar bsgob bzhin du gang gi tsho chos bshad

win pa de'i tshe/ khye cudang bu mo rnams bor te dong ba dang de dag rab tu dus nas/ tshodang ldan pa kunu dga' bas smras pa// khye'u dang bu mo 'di dag khrid la deng/ 'di dgaci'i phyi'i de zhes smras pa dang/
de dag gis deste spong ba de 'o yang bzodapa' mdzad dam zhes smras podang/ bzedapar byas nyis byas kyi nyis pa bshags par gyis shag/ mdor na phag dang
bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang// gnag dga' bo yi chos gos dang// mar bre gang dang akaru// gzig dang seng ge ltapa'o// phag dang bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang//
gnag dga' bo'i chos gos rnams n rgyas par ji ltar 'dul ba'as 'byung ba bzhin no// dge slong bsod nams che ba tshong pa rnams la grags pa de la tshong pa gzhan zhig gis de latsa ngegos pa
dang taci mkho ba rnams bdag gis dbul 'azhas bstabs pa dang/ dge slong de'i nad g.yog sa 'dra snyam du tshong pa de yang dang yang du stobasan/ de la bdag gis ji ltar snying
nus stobs sam/ kha mgunatsam du stobs bgam mo snyam du bsamasanas/ de'i drung du song ste 'di skad du mkhan po la mar zhig dgos so zhes smras pa dang/ del mar bre gang
byin nas yang btsun pa sun ma' khub 'amo/ sha khu ca degosang 'o nas stsoms shig ces smras pa dang/ daltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas dge slong des marade dge slong de'i sanama'i khu ba
dang/ sha khu rnams su cung zad byugs so// dzatsom 'gen tshong pa des dge slong de la 'phags pa khebs khyod la mar ni ster ba'o// de ste bdazhan ya sun/
ma' khu ba 'am sha bsu 'ong rung ste/ ci rigs pa de dag 'ang zhi gnyis sbrang bdang/ dge slong des nad g.yog de 'tshong 'dizhes bya ba 'a mar byas sam zhes dris nas/ blangs so zhes smras pa
dang/ 'on phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung// mkhan polatshong pa de yang dang yang du stobs nas brtag tsang bgam pa'i phye'i bdag gis blangs nas mkhan po'i bgyis so zhes smras pa dang/ dge
slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa med de/ de nas 'di nga 'di glang po zhes si tisong zhig// mdo'on bde ba ldan drang 'du
shas dang// chung ma gnyis dang sdig can lha// ma lan gnas pa bcur byas dang// dge slong ma yin gzhan yang bdu// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul bridzin thangashing
gi gnas nabazhugs te/ klungabade ldan gyi ngogs kyi dge slong rnams la bslab pa'i gnasam bcas pas 'as dang po pa rnams lanyes pa med par gyur pan/ dge slong dag the tshom dang/ yid
gnyis dang/ 'gyod pa rnams M skyes te/ bdag cagagasebaslabapa'i gnas mabacas par dge slong ma zhig la 'chi bsabastabasan/ bdagag lasadang po pa gang yin snyam pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ ngabade ldan gyi dung du dge slong dag 'baslabang ' gnas ma bcas pas na/ 'dus pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad du las dang po ste/ lasadang
ngob 'anyisapa medado// dge slong gisamol mi ma yan par 'du shes te/ 'tsho ba dang phral ba dang/ dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
ma la ma ma yazhi bar 'dushesan nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi ma yin pa lam ma yan par 'dushesana'ang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi ma yanang 'a the tsom brana'ang nyes pa sbom
por 'gyura'o// dge slong zhig kun rang tund kyis gaware nas/ des bdag 'du de gos snyam du bsamasanas/ dge slong des mdza' bo'i drung du song ste/ 'di skad du gri byin zhes smras=
dang/ khyod la gir dgos/ re zhib byin cig ces smras nas/ de byin pa dang/ de gnas khadadu zhugs te slobacad de gtan pa bcug la/ skyal mo krung bcas te 'dug nas bdeg nyid
kyis srol kong bcad do// de de ltar gyi lag nathogs bzhin du dus 'das pa dang/ dge slong des nyin ba nyis sam/ gsum no nas 'di snyam dudagoslong des khyer te song gis/ songal blta'o
snyam du bsamasanas/ dpogos khad du song ba dang/ dge slong de skyil mo krung bcas tasrol kangobacad de gri thogasakhazhand dus 'as par mthong nas/ dge slongade 'gyod pa skyes nas/
]gang cud zad 'di sa'as pa thams cad ni rgyu bdag las byu/ de sta bdags ma byin par gyur nan 'di yang bdag nyid kyis 'tsho ba dang phral bar mi 'gyur ro snyam/
ma dubs/mas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa medade/ phyin chadand pa la bab babatu gri ma sbyin cig/ dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhayig gi grong du nye bar song nas/
de grong du phyin pa dang/ de'i bu dmed des btsun pa tshur spyon mtshangs pa spyad dozhes smras pa dang/ dge slong gis/ khyod kyi khyaden bro'am sunan zhisasmras pa dang/ des btsun patsa nas/
lamisunanga' ma 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi 'o zhes smras nas/ sa de la dug byin pa dang khyim bdag de dus 'das so// dge slong de zhag gcig ga 'as padung/ khyim der song ba dang/ bud mangs/

btsun tshur spyonami tshangs par spyad de zhes smras pa dang/ sring mod skad ma zer cig/ kho bon tshos bar spyod pa yin no// des btsun pa gang gi kho mos khyo 'tshob dang bral ba de 'tshog dong tshang
'a spyod dam zhes smras pa dang/ khyod kyis khyo 'tshob dang srolagices kho bas skyasasam khyod kyi khyo 'di la mi sunang 'o zhes maskyasasam/ nibabs khyod kyi khyo 'ang khro la ma sun pa'o/
zhes ni rtsis kyis/ khyod kyi khyod 'tshob dang brolan pe cesan khobasamasmras so// dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa medado// dge
slong gi gzhan du bar song nas byed ba'as khyod kyi khyod na 'o zhes bya banargyas par// dge slong zhig gas gsad par bsams te/ brtsegs pa las dus 'das na bsam par 'gyur ro//
dus ma 'o sa na nyos nga sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis ma bsrung ba'i phyir mngal na gnas pa mnyes pa las mngal na gnas pa ngan pas pham par 'gyur ro// ma shin nyes pa sbom por
'gyur ro// gnyis ka ngag nas ngam par 'gyur ro// gnyis ka mngag na nyes pa sbom por 'gyudo// mngal na gnas pa ni mi rig pa byung na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// 'a song gi ma la/
na gnas babyungana'ang nyes ba sbom por 'gyur 'do/ de ltar dge slong masabyas n 'ang de bzhin ba ma po nyer bzhi pa// mdaron rtsab mo/
rnam pa lnga pa dang// las gar/ra dag dang rdo ba dang// ba glarudang wa mo dang// stanadad smyon par gyur pa 'o/ dge slong zhag gsadage 'dun la btung ba rtsub mo brims pa
dang/ der drag slong mang zhig dus 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal ba/ nyes pa med do// dge slong ma dza ba gnyis shig 'khod pa las/
gcige nad kyis btab sta 19pa nas/ sand ga yog la tshodang ldan po rtsa bamo zhig rnyed na ni lo ba bdebar 'gyur ro zhes smras te/ rgyas par na dul ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no// bram tha
zhig klog pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang/ de dge slong zhig ga drung du song ste 'di skad du/ btsunang gal tatsab mo zhige rnyidanani bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang khyed
bram ze log par lto rtsa ba bonari dgas/ btsun pa sngon bdag nad kyis btab na yang rtsa ba mo zhag 'khrungasaM pas bdagabade bar gyur to// dge slong des rtsub mo blud pa dang des dus 'das so//
dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// nyes pa med do// dge slong zhige du khyod dus la rtog cusong ba dang/ den mi zhig gsal shang gis btsugs
shang 'dug pa dang/ sa dge slongal btsun pa de sta kho po la rtsub mo zhig bludan ni bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong des de lartsub mo blud nas de dus 'das so// dge slong
de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa modado// rkun po lnga brgya zhig drage slong ma zhig gas rtsa ba mo dpa dang/ de dag kyang dus 'as te/rgyas
N+NaM par n 'du'o bAlas dza skad 'byung ba bzhin no// dgon pa gsar can zhes bya ba na gnas khongs pa/ zhagibatsug pa las/ dge slong zhig go lagapa nas pha gu zhig lhung bdang/ 'og
na las byed pa zhig 'dug pa de'i stod du lhung nas de dus 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med/ bag yod par
0 byas la grogs gyis shig/ dgen pa dge 'dun gyi gnas khangasar pa zhig brtsig pa na/ dge slong zhig bla gab med pa'i snying naso phag 'jog pa de ga pa nasastecu lhung ste/ 'og na
rnagi gu mkhan las byed pa'i stong du lhung nas des 'dus so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ bag yod par byos la grogs/
gyis shig/ draganang ra dge 'dun gyi dogs padu byab khang pa zhig brtsig ste/ dge slong dag gdung ma steng du 'drenang las/ dwage so us khur che zhing lci bas de dag gis btang ba dang/ 'og na
shing makhanang shing 'jog pa'i stong du lhung nasad dus 'dus so// dge slong dadag kyang 'gyod paskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ nyud du mas khur lci ba
mgadeg cig/ skas gdeg pa'i ng bzhinAno//dgon par dugs bya ba'i khang pa zhig brtsig ste/ nganadage slong zhig sel po'i nang du 'ju ba stong du skyod pa na thag pa nate chadapas/ 'og na
rtsa ga gu mkhan las byed pa stong du 'jiba'i silapo lhung nas dus 'das so// dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pamed kyis/ bag yod
par byas la grogs gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban bzhugs so// dge slong zhig ra'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang/ dge slong zhig gis ni'i
rtse mo nas rje skyilab dge slong de'i stong du lhung nas/ dge slong de dus 'das/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
shin tu rtogs la bag yod par byas te rdopa'obar bya'o// dge slong zhig bgrang gnang du song ba dang/ glang ma srunapa zhig gis brdungs nas khye'u zhig gi steng du 'gyel ba dang/ khye'u dus
'dasaso// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// bag yodapar byos lab glang gnad du song zhig/ dge slong zhig nad yun ring pos sgyur por gyur
pa dang/ de 'dusnyam du bdag gson tan rung gsasong 'a bdag nyang gaangasanas mtshong ngo snyam du bsams te/ des bdag nyidagayang sanasa mtshongs pa dang/ drung na wa mo zhig ma rol za
bde 'i stod du dge slong lhung nas/ wa modon dus 'das// dge slong de ni drang por gyur pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med
de de ltar lus kyis ga par 'gyur bar ma byed cig/ dge slonganadung zhig stan gyi stangan 'dug pa la/ nadagayog gsatshe dang ldan pa lengs zhes smras pa dang/ sakyang kho bos bslang
zhig ga 'ong ngo zhes smras kyang/ tshodang ldan pa las zhis smras nas de las pa dang/ sa 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ sa
pham pa'i nyis pa med de/ zhes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong gis smyon pa zhig lagasod somasakyis brdegasate/ de dus 'dasanan pas pham par 'gyur ro// dusam 'dasan ni nyes
pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mde don/ yo byadaang dang ma zhudang// phol mag kha gnyis dang bsam yin// smonudang zas bzang spyod lam dang// nyes pa med de gzhan yang
sbyar// dge slong ni gnad yun ring pos gzigs nas/ de nid gra gaskyo ste/ de la khyed myur du 'chi bar 'gyur gyis nadag.yog mibya'o zhes smras te/ des nang g.yog ma byas
pas de dus 'dus so// dge slong de 'gyedapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsalab/ phaso pham pa'inyis pa med de/ zhes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong snod spyad dang
yo byadamang po zhigenab de la khyod kyi nadag.yog m bya'o// shin yang dge 'dun gyi 'gabamang por 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ de'i nad g.yogam byas pa dang de dusa'adas so// dge slong de dag
'gyod skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyisabaka' stsal pa// phas pham pa'i nyis pa yod de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig bsam zhu bar 'dug pa dang/ nad g.yog
gis re zhig rgyongs shig ces smras pa dang/ ngasand g.yog la bshar 'ongagis sa brgyang zhuge ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gyongs shage ces smras nas// sa brgyangs pa dang/ des dus
'das so// dge slongad 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sa pa'inyis ba med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur// dge slong
gis pho'amag ma sminapar brtol// de dus 'dasan nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// sminapa brtolananyes pa med de// dge slong mas yol mag ma smin par brtol te/ dus 'das na/
nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// sminapa ba'on nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig nang dang/ dadang 'phrod pa'i phasan me reng nas/ de'i nad g.yog gis mi'aphrodapa'ib+basashig byin nas/
[% ]tshe dang ldan pa 'das nu yog pa bo zhagi/ des bris te dus 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dedung 'phrod pa'i srasangashage byin pa 'asadu 'dasan rkyes pa med do// dge slong zhagi na ba dang

dedang 'phrod pa'ismon ma rnyed na de khrind g.yog kyang de bzhin no// dge slong nadapa zhag gsand g.yog latshodang ldan pa nad g.yog kho bgo gnas khang nas phyi'i byung zhige/ phyisashig/ khrus kho bo
N+NaM nang du khrid cig/ 'dug tu chug cigacesas nas/ 'dug tuyang bdug/ bsnyes su yang bcug pa'i sadus 'dasan/ thams cad la'ang nyes pa med do// mdoran/ 'khar
ba sho le chu rnams dang// dgen pa gnyis dang bla ba/tun dang// khros pa thal mo brnangs pa'o// dge slong zhig 'dug pan yur te/ dge slong gis de la 'khar bas bskyod pa dang/
de dus 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'apa/ nyis pa mad de/ de'i tshonade la mtshon lta bu zhes kyang 'drud byung ngo// gzhan yang po
langogs phog ste dus 'das pa dang/ gzhan yang chus phog ste dus 'dus pa 'di dag kyang de bzhin rgyas par bshad do// bcu bdun sde rnams kyang rgyas par na/ rnam par 'byed pa
las ji skad 'byung ba bzhAneno// khyim bdag gzhan zhig gsar du dod de/ des dus sar pa'i 'bru sar pa dang/ 'bras busar pa de dang dedag dge 'dun la phul tebadag nyid phyis tha'o//
dgon pa ba gzhan 'geg khyim der song bdang/ khyim bdag des 'disnyam du phyin chad dge 'dun lam dbul bar/ dganang pa 'di ladabul 'a snyam bsams nas des de la byon no// dge
slong grags khyim bdag desngon chad na dus sad pa' 'bru sar pa dang/ 'bras bu sar padodang de dag dge 'dun la phul nas phyis bdag nyid ban/ dan des ma byan pas na dge slong dgon pa pa
zhagi khyaider song ba des bkag par gyur gyisi/ song la de bas shig ces smasapa dang/ de dag gis bsanas/ danapa pa khyim bdag de ni dusasar pa'i 'brus pa dang/ 'bras bu sa/
bde dang de dag dge 'dun 'tshathog mar srolanas phyis bdag nyid can/ khyod de'i khyim du song nas khyed kyis bkag par gyur to zhes smras pa dang/ btsun pam bkag gi/ ma bsgo zhes smras/
nas/ de dag gis 'di smaram btub kyis khrid la dod du chug ca ces smras te/ de dag gas de deng du bcug pas de dus 'as so// dge slong de dag 'gyedapa skyes nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsal pa// phas pham pa'i nyes pa mdade/ nyesang sbom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gzhan zhig dge slong gi dge 'dunadabyar gnas pa rnams la chos gos 'bul ba
las dge slong dgon pa zhig gi khyim de 'ongasanas/ khyim padag de 'di snyam du da phyin chad dge 'dun lam dbul bar/ dgon pa pa 'di la dbul 'phosnyam du bsams nas/ des dgon pa/
pa de la byin pa dang/ dge slong de dag 'di snyam du khyim bdag de dge slong gdage 'dunadabyar gnasapa rnams la gos 'bul na/ dge slong dgon pa pa gi der song bas bkag par gyur pasnyam gyis/
song la debs shig ces smras pa dang/ de dag gses de bas nas/ dgen pa pa khyim bdag dan dege slong gi dge 'dun dbyar gnas pa rnams la gos 'bul ba las/ dam 'bul bani khyod de'i khyim
dusong bas/khyod kyis bkag par ma gyur tam zhes drisan/ btsun pa bdag gis ni ma bkagag go/ ma bsgo'i zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis 'dasmarami btub kyis khrid la sgo leb kyi bar du brtsi
cig ces smras nas/ de dag gis sgo leb kyi bar du btsir ba dang/ de dus 'das so// dge slong dedag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsalapa/ phas pham pa'i
nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig bsod snyoms spyod dang/ sgo dog pa nasin bla bdatun zhig sgrung zhing 'dug pa las// de'i ches nges kyi gus bsngos pas/
khye'u'i stod du 'gyel nas khyedu dus 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pas pham pa 'anyes pa med de/ bag yodapar byas la bso/
snyoms sbyodatsag/ bram ze zhig gsanang ngasnga bkra shis dang ltas byas nas khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa dang/ dge slong zhig khyim der bsod snyoms spyod pa la de khros nas 'badang/ dge slong de
khye'u zhig gi stong du 'gyel nas khye'u shi bar gyur te// dge slong de'agyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa med do// dge slong thal mo'i rig sngags 'debs
gang des 'ag pas byugs te thal mo gcig bsnun pa dang/ de dus 'dasaso// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// nyes pa med de/ bag yodapa/
byas la thal mos snyan tsage/ dge slong 'gebanangos tesha la thug pa dang/ de la dge slong shag las khu tshur cig bsnun nas banangs pa de khrag dang bcas te byung nas/ dge slong de dus 'das so//
dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ phas phamapa 'a nyes pa med// tse nis kyang bag yod par byas te/ brnangs pa yang byung bar gyurol/ dus kyang
'dasapar ma 'gyur ba de ltar bsnun par bya'o/// mdapon/ stanaganyis pa dang phaganyisadang/ gzhan yang btang bganyis pa dang// 'dra ba
gyur pa'i ny+dzi budang/ rkun po rnams la bsngags pa'o// tshodang ldan pa 'tshan banag pos ma brtags par stan 'dug ngan/ rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad du rgyas par 'byung ba
bzhinano// sbom mo dga' ldan mo yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// dge slong zhig gis pha lam du phul nas dus 'das pa yang/ rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no// dge slongarganaM
zhugs dganyisangashagi lhan tsagi tudzer 'tshadu dod pa las/gtsug lag khang gi grid du byin pa dang/ phas bu la 'di'i gzag rnams kyis 'jigs bar 'gyur gyis nang du 'khod do zhes smras
pa dang/ bus de la rgan zhugs dang khyimipa dang lhan cig tu 'khodon/ dedag dang bdag cag tubye brag ci yod ces smras pa dang/ bu khyodan malatshe byos shig kho bo nyal 'apo zhes smras so//
ny+tsA denas rgan zhugs de nyal ba dang/ dge slong de'anyal la// rgan zhugs de sdurapa can zhig ste/ de'asgres gabragi 'ongs nas/ des de mgo banas bzung ba dang/ des sgra phyung nas
gzig gas btang ste bros so// dge slong des me mar blangs te brtags na dus 'dos te/ de 'di snyam dudes nang du 'khod dazhis thar na yang bdag gis de'i tshig ma nyan pas/ gang khyod bad
'di dus rwangs par gyur pa de thams cad na bdag gis nyesasosnyam ste/ dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med de/ mel tshe byisangashag/
duge slong zhig gis gsod sems kyis dge slong zhig 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i gnas subatang ba dang/ de dus 'asan pas pham par 'gyur/ dusam 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur
no bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na bzhugs te/ dge slong dag nags chen por nyin par spyod du dong ngo// so de la spre'u zhagi bsad pa dang/ dge slong zhig gis
khyod lan nges pam pa'i nyos pa byung ngo// dngos po gang gi phyir/ mi'i 'tshob dang phral ba dang mdeng 'dra ba 'di gnyis la bye brag tu yod ces smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas// bcom
ldan 'das kyisabaka' 'apa/ pas phum pa'i nyis pamedade/ ltung bar 'gyur ro// rkun po bsdigs pa yang rgyas par 'dul las jiskad 'byung ba bzhin no// mdongon
mgo ldan sngon gyi smanub dang// bgegs teg bar gyur pa dang/ dgonobal yang wa gnas dang// 'ge thag chad dang brgyugs pa'o// mnyan du yod pan khyim badrag gzhan
zhig les bu khyo bzhi ge btsas te/ de chen por gyur pa dang/ mgo yis so phag bsregs pa chogs pas de'i ming mgodzin du btags so// de ji tsaman rab tuphyung nas/ de don cig la grong
du zhugs pa dang/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi chung ma zhig kyang khye'u zhig khrid de/ rjes bzhin du 'osanas de dang glo g.yas g.yon du lta zhing song ngo// de la lug thug
gcagags sogs pa dang/ dge slong dus kyang mgo btud desadabal/ des kyang bdag 'a brdung bar shes nas/ lu@#/thug dus de la brdungs pa dang/ dge slong de khye'u'i steng du 'gyelanas
khye'u dedus 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyasebaka' stsa 'khor// nyes pa med de/ dge slong gis spyod lam de lta bur ma 'gro bganyatAshange srid du ltos
shig/ sngon smanabasarab tubyung ba gzhan zhib gas dge slong nad pa zhig gi drung du 'ongs pa dang/ des de la gtar ka thob cig ces smras nas/ des kyang de la gtsags bu zhig btabasta/ gtsug
bu de slar phyung ba dang dge slong de dus 'das so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa med do/ phyin chad dge slong dag mabaslabs par sman dpyad ma
byed cig/ dge slong nad pa gzhan zhiganadam sos nas/ de 'di snyam du ngag 'tshosta ru rung gas/ bdag nyid 'cha'o snyam du bsams te/ dge slong desand g.yog la 'di skad du/ tshadad
ldan ng thag pa zhig byin cig ces smras so// des de 'byin nas de 'gogs pa dang dus 'das so// ngage slong de 'gyedapo skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa
med de/ dge slong gis bab brtand pa la thag pa ma sbyin cig/ dge slobazhi'i bsod snyomasaspyod pan/ grong khyer yangs pa can na gnas pa dag kyang mda'adang gzhu lag na thegs te 'ongs nas// dge
slong des bzhun bzangs kho dem gsad par 'dal 'phongs shig ces smras pa dang/ samada' 'phangs nas der bsadad// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'asakyisabaka'
stsalapa/ nyes pa med de/ dge slong bas de skadam sgo zhig/ dge slong nad pa gzhan 'geg kyang rgyas par n snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du thag pa khyer nas nagaso chen por songabadang/ sa der shing la
sati sa skegam zhags mag tu btsugs dus mtshongs pa dang/ thagang chad nas de'a'og na khyi bu byung pa zhi'i 'dug ste/ de'i steng du dge slong lhung ba dang/
khyedi bu dang bcas te dus 'dusaso// dge slong dag gsi thes nas rgyus par bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsalapa/ ga slong snga ma ninyis par 'gyur gyi/
phyimalanyes pa med do// dge slong las kyis 'di ltar brtsal ban mi byed cig/ byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur// dge slong gzhan zhib grong du don cig yod de/ des dge slong nang sog nas rang por

mngon pa zhig khrid de song ba dang/ lam du rkun pos skra gnas des de latshodang ldan skyonapar 'dang zhes smras pa dang/ des ma nus so zhes smras nas/ dge slong gsatshur shog bcomamare zhes smras nas
nubya// des de ltar khrid de de 'dagred du khrid pa dang dus 'das so// de 'di snyam du de sta bdagags dge slong de khrid de ma 'ongasan ni sha bar ma 'gyur ro snyam dubasams nas/ dge slong de
'gyodapa skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa med de/ phyin chad dge slong gis nad pa nyam chung bar gyur pa de lta bu ma ma bkri zhig///mdoran/
bde ldan 'du shes bsgo ba dang// dgra bcom bram ze dbang po dang// chos gos dag dang bsod snyoms dang// grong du nyer 'gro rnam pa gnyis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das yul bre dza'i 'od ma'i tshal gyi go na bzhugs so// krung bde ldan gyi ngegasan gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la bslab pa'i gnas ma bcasapas/ las dang po pa 'khanyes pa med de/
bdag cag gis bslab pa'i gnas ma btsas pa na med la/ med bzhin du ma las bla mar gyur pat+titshesashig rigs mang po la snas na/ bdag cag gi las dang po pa gang yin snyam nas/ dogs
ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'gyodapa skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ dge slong dag bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas ngan/ nga bde ldan gyi ngogs na gnas pa'i dge slong/
rnams kyis 'das pa dang bcas pa ni/ thams cad lasadang po pa yin pas/ las dang po pa la nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig gis mi la mi ma yin par 'du shes pa med la/ med pa/
tshabazhin du ma las bla mar gyur pa'i chos snas pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas// parom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mal ma'i 'du shesan pas pham par 'gyur ro// mi ma yin
pa la thatsiman nyis pa sbom por 'gyur 'go/ ma ma yaning la ma'i 'du shes na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis khyim bdag cig la med la/ med bzhin du ma las bla mar gyur pa/
chos smras pa dang/ khyim bad/de yongs nas btsunapa ci'i gsung zhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bas mnga'anyis pan med do/
nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cig gis dge slong zhig la/ btsun pa khyod dgra bcom pa lags kyis chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal stan dang/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo
byad kyi mchog rnams 'os so zhes smras pa dang/ cang mi sna bas khas blangs pa yin te/ nyes pasbom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cig gis dge slong 'ge la/ sdig pa med pa tshos tshangs pa
dang ldan nam zhes smras nas/ cang mi smabs khas blangs pa yin te/ nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de ste btsunang dgra bcom pa na bdag gi bsod snyoms bzhes shig ces smras pa dang/ decang i
bas khas blangs pa yin te/ nyes ba sbom por 'gyur ro/ dge slong zhig la gzhan gyi grong dusu bar 'gro zhes/ de snga dro'i dus susham thabs bagos te grong du song ba dang/ de la khyim bdag gas tshun
padestodagra bcom pa lags n nang dugshegs shig ces smras pa dang/ cang mi smra ba nang du 'os na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du stan la 'dug/ zan
leng 'bagasol cig/ rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig/ slar byung zhig ces smras pa dang/ de cang mi smran khas blangs bas nyes pasbomapor 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong dubyed par
'grob yin te/ snga dro sham thabs bgos nas groder song ba dang/ khyimabadag gis btsun pa de stodagra bcom pa lags na khyim gyi nang du gshegasashig ces smras pa dang/ kho ban dIg bcom
ba nung zad kyang ma lags na/ de ste khyed bzodan ni nang du mchi'o zhes smras nanyes pa med do// stan la bzhugs te bshos dang/ skyarum dang/ bca' ba rnams bzhes la gsol cig/ rjes/

su yaring zhing slar byung zhig cesasnusapa dang/ 'banadigrobatsan ba chung bodakyang ma gsan/ de ste khyod kyisabazodon phyir 'byung ngo zhes smras n nyes pa med do// khyim bdag gis dge slong zhig la/
[ ]btsun pa khyodadabang po rnams nag ni khubasdams re 'gas babasungs pa'o zhes smras pa dang/ cang mi snabs khas blangasananyos pa sbom por 'gyur ro// slab byung zhig ces smas pa las/ khob
dgra bcom pan cung zad kyang ma 'phags so zhes smras nas phyir byung na nyes pa med do/// modon drugabyas dang naman shes dang/ me yi phung po 'dod pa dang// ma 'da' ni
sgra rnams dang/ dri tse dang na lham yin// rdzing bu bzung dang b+ha laha// dka' thub la gomargyunadu gnyis/ 'thabs pa gnyis dang khye'u gnas bde bar 'ongs// mdzes pa dang na 'di gnyis dang//
mdo'i tshigs bcaganyis porgyas par shes par bya'o// skama'on/ 'tshar basbom panam mkha'i dang// mgal lag pa gnyis kyis byugs// sgro 'dogs khang khrus las dang/
gnas dang tshulabazhin ma yinupa// gleng gazhani mnyan du yodapan/ bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas las dang po la nyes pa med par gyur pan/ tshodang ldan pa'i char ba 'disnyam/
du bdag gsanabaslabang/ 'i gnas nang nas par lanamang zhagatubasams bzhin khu ba phyungan/ bdag gi las dang po gang yin snyam nas thatshom du gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa//
bslab pa cige/nas mabacas pan 'charabs 'das pa dang bcas pa ni/ thams cad kyang 'asadang po bste/ las dang po pa la nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig gis sbubur phyud ma/ nam mkha'
labaskyod dam/ nam mkha' la phyud dam/ phomtshan manamasasam/ btsa'ita dga'abar tshon rum/ btsa te btang phyudangam/ 'phagasang las btadangam/ brtsams nas slar btang yang lung
sto 4 thams cad nyes pa sbom poro 'gyur ro// dge slong zhagi gas brlas ltas te khu baphyung ba dang/ dge slong de 'gyod po skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med do//
dge slong yid la bud med cig gis lag pa gnyis kyis rkang ba gnyis la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ des/khu ba phyung ste/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyes pa med do// ri dgas sgra'ams gam dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshalate/ desatshodang ldan pa dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba dang/ des
de khu ba phyung nas ra dwags sgra'i ma sagama'amago der lhung ba dang/ de phyogs gtsagi tu song ste lag pa gnyis kyis mgo la byugs nas 'di skad du/ mtshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag ni//
bcom ldan 'das kyi dung shAn tunyon mongs kyang tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ bdag gis ni rnyid pa rab tu red pozhis mgu bar brjod pa brjod do// dang ldan pa de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes dmadade/ sgo'u chongs shig/ dge slong zhig gis sgro'u de pa 'gaskyed khu ba phyung ngo// ge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal
pa/ nyes pa med do// dge slong 'gadugs khangan las byed pa sa lu ba byung ngo// dge slong de 'gyod po skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ nyes pa med do//
dge slong zhaga gnas nias gnas su 'chag pan/ de khubaphyung ste dge slong de 'gyodopa skyes nas/ btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'anyis pan med kyi/ nyes
thapa sbom po 'gyurar// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid byed ng 'ang de bzhin no/ mdor na/ bud med rnam pa lngar byas dang// gnodapa la yang rnamang lta// gzung bal
yang lngar byas// du khrodapa la drug tu'o// dge slong zhigel ma dang/ sring mo dang/ bumo dang/ chung ma dang/ mdza' na mo rnams kyi 'grog nas ring po mnangasam gal
nas 'khyudapa dang/ khu ba byung ngo// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med de// dge slong zhig gis bud med me las phyung/ chu dad g.yangs
dang/ saMtshonachadang/ gtsan gaphanadang/ mi ma yin pa rnams dus than par byas pa dang/ de cug byung ngo// dge slong de 'gyedapa skyas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'adang nyes
pa medad// dge slong la bud medatsage gsarkang pas gzung ngam/ byin pa dang/ pusamo dang/ brladang/ mdzub mo rnams kyisagazungabadang/ de khu babyung ngo// dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes ba med de// dge slong zhig gsa rnam par bsngos pa la khu ba phyung bdang/ bam pa dang/ lces pa dang rnamaMpar dmar bdang/ rnam par zhigs
pa dang/ kang sa la khub byungan thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// mdo na 'phrug pa 'drud pa mdzub modong// chu las sbrid par gyur pa dang// nang gi dgur
na byas pa dang/ spyod pa rnam pa nyi shu ko/ dge slong zhig gas 'phyug pa las khyab byung na nyes pa med de// 'dud pa'i ng de bzhin no// dge slong
sa tho mtshan la bzung bdang/ khub byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa sbom por gyur ro// dge slong zhige bsod snyoms la spyod pa ngen/ nachung gzhon
nu'age skugadangs te 'dug par gyur pas/ 'phags pa tshur spyon khomi la 'dudang 'di lta bur mdzod ces smras pa dang/ desader mdzub mo bcug go/ dge slong do 'gyedapa skyes nas/ bcom/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol// nyes pasbomar 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig khrus byed pan/ phromtshan chu'i rgyun dubasdad pa dang/ de sbyad pas khu ba byung ngo// dge slong de 'gyodang/
skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong 'gags mgo bodong/ rnapa dang/ sna'anyid du khub byungon/ thamasacad dage 'dun
gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slong zhi dwags rtsib legs dang/ rgyab dang/ brang dang/ ltaganyer dang/ skra'i nang du khu ba phyungan thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slong gis
lagapa dang/ phragang dang/ dbud pa'i nang du du ba phyungan thamasacad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slong gsakod pa dang/ byin pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ brla rnams kyi nang du khu ba phyung na
wa/ thams cad dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slong zhi'i/bse 'badang/ phying pa dang/ par tangadang/ sngas rnams s khu ba phyungan thams cad nyos pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong gi
khri dang/ gra'u dang/ shing stanadang khri bar du khu ba phyungan thamasacang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis bum budad/ skyogs dang/ bum pa'i nang du khu ba phyung na thams cad nyes
ba sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gas rdo dang/ zhal nal byas pa dang/ zhal zhalo byas pa'i nang dang/ sgo gtanadang/ shamer mer po rnams su khu ba phyungan thams cad nyes pa spom
por 'gyur ro/// mdor na/ 'char ba 'du shes kangang phrug pa dang// mdang sor mo mi las byung ba dang// rkang pa la sogs bzung ba dang// sngo la sogs 'a/ 'khyud pa'o//
tshodang ldan pa charakas bslab pa'i b gnasam bcas pa na/ bdag gis bud med mang po dag dang lhan cig lus kyis kun tureg par gyuran/ de dag la bdag gis sa dang po ni
gang yin snyam du bsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ bslab pa ' gnas /ma bcas pan/ 'char kas 'as ba dang bcas pa thams cad 'dus dang po pa ste//
las dang po lenanyes pa med do// dge slob nag gsami'i bud med la mi ma yin par 'du shes te bzung ngo// dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
ma la ma'i 'du shesanadage 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur// rgyas par ni rnam pa bzhi ni shes par bya'o// dge slong gis bud med la rkang mas shul na nyesabyas su 'gyur
ra bud med kyis dge slong la rkang pas lan nyes pa medad// dge slong las bud med 'khrugs yu'u na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// bud med kyis dge slong la phug pas phulan nyes pamed
dge slong gsama'amagul nas 'khyud pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal6/ nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig la bud med kyis sor mos
rmobazung ngo// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa mad do// dge slong zhig gis bud med cig ma dang/ chudang/ g.yas dung mtshon dang/
gcan gzan dang/ mam yin pa rnams las thar par byas so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pamedad// duge slong la bud med cag gags
rkang pas bzu/ byin pa dang/ pus modang/ brladang/ sor mos bzung ngo// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa nyis pa med do// dge slong
gis bud med kyi ro sngon 'gyur pa'i mgul nas 'khyud pa dang/ bam pa dang/ rul ba dang/ ra dmar por gyur pa dang/ 'thor ba dang/ keng rus rnams kyi mgul nas 'khyungan thams cad nyes
wa0 pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mder na/ 'gred nas brdeg 'tshos bu mo dang// mun par bud med phrad pa dang// bud med gzhon nus 'grong gdangs pa// stan lnga pa dang bcu
gsum mo// bud medatsag 'gred de brdeg 'tshesapa/ dge slong zhig gis bslang na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong 'gred de brdeg 'tshos pa las/ bud med cig gis bslang
na nyes pa medad// dge slong rgan po zhig bu mo la ltar son gnas / bu mo de'i phung par 'dug ga/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med
da dge slong 'bag nas phyadan gtsan gtsazhing 'dug pa dang/ bud medatsag kyang phyi'i byung ste 'ong dang/ mun pa cinang du gdong thugs su phrad nas/ de brdeg 'tshos nas sde steng du 'gyel la//
dge slong de 'gyod skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ na chung gzhon nu ma zhug 'grong gdangs de/
'dug nas/ sa 'phags pa tshur spyon 'dung 'dimadzod cig ces smras pa dang/ des der bong ba banub/ bsod snyoms bcug pas btsas/ 'khar bas btsugs shing brdegs na thams
cad nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhag gis bud med la chos bshad pa dang/ des de'i stan nang pa dang/ parludang/ byin pa dang/ skedapa dang/ rtsab 'dogs dang/ rgyab dang
lag pa dang/ phrag pa dang/ mgo rnams kyis phulan thams cad nyes byas su 'gyur ro/// mdor na 'char ka de dang 'du shes dang/ nga
bu gnas ngan len pa dang// sring mo spyod pa ngan par bcas// khabasa mthong adang khyodakyi mdun// de dang de ste de yid mag// bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas las/po nga
nyos pa med na/ tshodang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar bdag gis bud med mang zhag ' gnas na lan gyi tshig smras na/ bdag gi 'dus dang po gang yin snyam nas the tsom du gyur pa ni rgyas par re/
'o ngas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la sras dang/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bslab pa'i gnas ma nus
pan 'tshar kas 'das pa dang bcas pan/ thams cad las dang po ba sta/ las dang po pa ni nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig gso ma'i bu'i bud med la mi ma yin par 'du shes/ ba 65/]
ngan 'dren gyi tshig smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa// mi la min 'du shes na dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// rgyusang/ra ni
dri bar bya'o// rdzu 'phrul dang/ tshe'aphrul gyi tshes su smra nan nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// tshe 'phul med pa'i chos su sman ni dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig bud med cig
gi drung du song nas 'askad du/ sring mo rgya rna ru zhige byin cig ces smras pa dang/ 'phags pa khyed la rgyan rus ci zhig bgyi/ mos go nas 'phags pa rgya rna ru sta gdon bgyis lags so zhes
smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong dubasod snyoms la spyod pan/ bud med cige 'gong
gdus te 'dug nas// 'phags pa 'dabazhin mdzod ces smras pa dang/ khyod kyi lus skal pa 'di lta bu dang mthun pas bod bu dang 'di ltar 'dabazhin byas zhig/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas//
bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med do// nyisapa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig rang bzhinagyis gnas ngan 'an gyi tshig ga sgrub zhig ste/
sa bud med cig la gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras so// dge slong de 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/ nyes pa spom/
par 'gyur ro// dge slong ma zhig nang par sngar langs te khrus byas/ mgog sman gyis bskus/ mgoshad de/ chos gos rnying pa chags byas pa gyon nas mnyan du yod par song ba dang
dge slong zhige bsod snyoms spyodab des de mthong nas/ dos sring mo khyod skyes palastag cing spyod pa spyod do zhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// nyes pa/sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong rgan po zhig bu mo la ltar sod pa dang/ de'abu mo leg par spyod pa zhig sta/ des bu mo 'di ltar khyim gzhi
'ag bar ma byed cig/ des ma thub na ji ltar bgyi zhes smras pa dang/ de sta mi thub na der ma 'dum chug cig ces smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal ba/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nyes ba med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin to/ desnga drosham thabs bgos na/
gang der song ba dang/ sa khyim bdag de'i chung ma la// sring mo bo bu 'byin cig ces smras pa dang/ 'phags pa khyod la ci tsa gsol// sung go kho ba'am de byin rug smas dang/ mos de ste
'gas pa sta gan bgyis so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyodang skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// sring mo khyod la gang mthong
ba'o// 'phags pa bdag la su zhig gzigs/ sring mo khyed la gang mthong ba de byin cig/ mos gnas 'phags pa sta gon bgyis so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// sring mo khyod kyi mdunan cu yod pa de byan ]btsun pa bdag gi mdun na ci mchis/ srang o khyod kyi mdun na
gang yod pa de byin cig/ mes go nas 'phags pa sta gon bgyis so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa sbom por gyur/
rongo dge slong zhig grong gzhan gyi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de snga drosham thabs dang ches shes bgos nas lhung bzed khyer te grong der song ba dang/ khyim bdag de'i chung ma de la sring mo
khyod kyi yod du 'ong ba gang yin pa de byin cig ces smras pa dang/ 'phags pa bdag la yid du 'o ba zhig mchis/ sring mo khyod kyi yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa de byin cig/ mos gnas
'phags pa sta gnabagyi'o zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por
'gyur ro// ba bam ponyin lnga pa/ mdo na dga' dang yid du 'ong ba dang/ chu dang bca' ba rnams dang yang/ thug pa dag dang bza' ba'i
rnams// smras pa dag kyang de bzhin no/// dge slong 'go grong gzhan zhig grong du bar 'gro ba yin te/ khyim bdag des chung ma la dge slong de ni dga' ba byin cig ces smras
te song ngo// dge slong de 'ong snga drosham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas/ lhung bzed khyer te khyim der song ba dang/ bud med des/ btsun pa khyim bdag gi mchidanas dge slong de ci dgyes/
gsol cig ces mchin/ 'phags pa khyed ci degyis/ sring mo bdagani khyod nyid la dga' ba zhes smras pa dang/ mos kyang gnas stangs/sang sta gon bgyis so zhes
sbas so// dge slong de bdag la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa ma byung gang snyam du 'gyodapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'inyos pa med de/ nyes
pa sbom por 'gyur ro// yid 'od ngo zhes bya ba yang de bzhinano// dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin ti/ desnga drosham thabs bgos nas grong der song ba dang/ khyim bdag
de'i chung ma la sring mo bdag lachu lud cig ces smras pa dang/ btsun pachab bcus te mchis gzhes shig/ sring mo khyod nyid chu yin no zhes smras pa dang/ mosakyang ge nas 3phags pa sta ba don
bgyis so zhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ sring mo bdag la btab byin cig/ btsun pa tshos/
bar du gzhes shig/ sring mo bdag gabaca' ba khyed nyid yin no// des 'apags pa sta ba ]na nga bgyis so zhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka'
stsal pa/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur de// sring mo bdag la thug pa byin tsagi/ btsun pa bsgral gyi bar du gzhes shig/ sring mo khyod nying kho bo'i thug pa'o// des 'phags pa sta gon bgyis
paso zhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar grol yachen/
te de sde drongasham thabs bgos te grong der song nas/ des khyim bdag gu chung ma de la sring mo bdag la zan byin cige des smras pa dang 'phags pa bsal gyi bar du gzhes shige/ sring mo/
khyod nyid bdag gi zin no// des gnas 'phags pa sta gon bgyis no zhes lcasaso// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkol stsal pa// nyas pa sbom por
'gyur ro// ngag slong zhig gis bud med la gnas ngan len spyi tshog stsasan des ma gnas/ mos btsun pa de ji skad gsung zhes dris so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan
'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'anyes pa med// nyese pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ mdo'on ra degs bu dang spring ba dang/ ming dang 'phags pa chung ma
gsum/ smad 'tshong gnyis dang bud med dang// gzhon nu skyes pa khu tshur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon mid pa la bus sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/
bzhugs so// bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas te las ngo pa la nyes pa med pa na/ ri degs lta bu'i bu nag po de 'di snyam du bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas par bdag gis drags mang zhig la spyan
dbyas n bdag ga las dang po gang yin zhes sems la the tshom dang/ dgos pa dang/ 'gyod pa skyes nas/ des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas na/ 'di dgas lta bu'i bu nag pos 'das pa dang bcas pa thams cad las dang po pa ste/ las dang po pa'i nyes pa
mdado// dge slong zhig gi grong gzhan zhis gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de grong der son pa dang/ khyim bdag des smyos nga/ 'phags pa bud med 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshur sheg cig
ces bgyi bar spyod dam/ don re nus te 'an spur skyel ni ma nus so zhes smras pa dang/ 'on dran te bsgrub par ji ltar shes par bya/ gnas 'di zhes bya bar dge slong zhig bzhag go
dge slong du khyim gzhan zhig tu btang ste/ dge slong de yang de nas slar byung ba mthong nas// desade la tshe dang ljon pa skud cig 'di na 'dug/cagi ces smras pa dang/ de gnas der 'dug nas khyami
bdag de phyir byung ste/ dge slong de la btsun pa 'gas de'alegs so// don de grub mod rtsis smras pa dang/ drazhig/ brda'o zhes smras so// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig gleng gzhan zhigeg khag bod du bar 'gro ba yin te/ de gleng der phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag des smras pa//
dge slong de la 'phags pa bud med 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'di ltar tshur shog ces/na phyin bgyi bar spyod dam/ des nus so zhes smras nas song stabasgopa dang/ bud med des btsun/
pa kho mo na me 'tshal 'a zhus nas/ de dag gi don de ma grub ba// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyis pa na me da
nyis ba sbom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cag gi chung mas nyes pa cung zad cig byas te/ dos de la rdog pas brdegs nas bskyed pa dang/ den yang dge slong grong gzhan zhig gi grong du nye ba'agro
ba yin te/ sa de gnyis bsdums nas// de gnyis dum pa gyur te// duge slong de 'dapa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'usal ba/ de sta rdzogasum bar bsnyam/ gshags
bkye ste chung ma ma yin par bsgrags pa de dag gi sman byas na/nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi khrod du zhu bar 'gro ba yAn to/ de gleng de phyin pa dang/ khyim
bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pasmad 'tshong ma 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshushog cig ces 'phrin bgyi bar sbyod dam/ des nus so zhes smras nas/ der song ste mo la bsgo ba dang/ de'ang snyam du
bar nyal du mi khom gyis/ da nyal snyam du bsams nas de nyal ba las namanangs te de gnyis kyi donorem grub bo// dge slong de 'byed pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa ni med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhige grengagazhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de grong der spen pa dang/
khyim bdag des smas pa/ btsun pa smad 'tshong ma 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshur shog cig ces 'phrin bgyi bar spyodadam/ des nus so zhes stsas nas/ de song ste bsgo ba dang/ mo yang 'ong ba las
bar du gzhan gyis phyogs nas gnyis kyi don de ma grub bo// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalango/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong
gzhan zhag ga grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de gung der phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phagasapa bud med 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'phrin 'di skad bgyibar spyod dam/ des nus so
zhes smras te/ de song nas de la bsgo ba dang/ de yang rgyan thogs te chos ma thag tu khyo 'ongs nas de gnyis kyi don de ma grub bo// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ga gnyis shig mdza' ste/ de gnyis kyi chung ma sprum par gyur pa dang/ de ste khyod las bu mo zhig btsas la// kheb las khye'u zhig
btsasan/ khyod kyi bu mo khe ba'i khye'u la byin cig/ 'on te kho bo'i bu mo la khyod kyi khye'u na ni khyod kyi khye'u la sbyin ni// de nas gcig lan khye'u'ago btsas// cig lan bu mo zhig btsas pa//
cham dang khyim bdag de dus 'das so// de dus 'das pas khyim srid kyang dmas par gyur te/ khyim bdag des bu mo mi sbyin no snyam du bsams pa dang/ khye'u des thasonas den dge slong zhig grongagazhan/
du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de grong der phyin pa dang/ de la khye'us smas pa/ 'phags pa bu mo 'di zhes bgyi ba la khyod bdag gamadang pha gnyis kyis ma btsas par badag 'khyani na/ bdug kyang
las sman pas 'khongs spyod dmas par gyur te/ longs spyod lta da dung yang rnyed par 'gyur gyis/ da yang kho ma gtang zhig ces 'phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/ des nus so zhes smras nas/ de song/
bsgo bdang bu mod ma dang pha'i drung nas bris te de'i drung du song nas de gnyis 'dus par gyur to// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalopa/ dge 'dun gyi
lhag mnyes pa med de/ nyis po spom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cig gis bud med la bdag gi skabs phye zhig ces smras Mn/ des bdag ma 'am mo zhes smras pa dang/ khyod ji tsam khom pa
bdag las ji ltar rtogs par bya/ kho mo la gleng du nye bar 'gro ba'i dge slong zhig yod kyis/ des rgyab tu khu tshur cig pa rgyab pa nangashes par mdzod cig/ dge slong de'ang grong der 'os pa dang/
bud med des smras pa// 'phags pa khyim bdag 'di zhes bgyi ba'i rgyab tu khu tshur cag mdzad par spyod dam/ des nus so zhes smras te song nas khyim bdag de 'irgyab tu kha tshub cig brgyab pa dang/ des
dbatsun pa don grub kyis legs so legs so zhes smras pa dang/ 'dis zhig/ den brda'o// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge 'dun gyi lhag a'anyisapa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// ma'on grong du nye bar 'gro ba rnam gnyis dang// gzhan yang dge 'dun rnams kyi gnyis// gos
dang nad par gyurapa dang/ gzhon num dang rnam pa lnga// dge slong zhig grong gzhan gyi grong du nyi bar 'gro ba yin te/ de grong der phyin nas/ bad med des smras pa/ 'phags pa
khyim bdag 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshur spyon zhes 'phrin bgyi bar spyod dam/ de sta dge 'dun la bshes sbyor nus nan nus so zhes smras pa dang/ sa rgyu byin nas dge slong des bshes sbyar nas khyim
bdag de nges pa dang/ de gnyis phrad par gyur te// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun gyi lhag matInyes pa ni med de/ nyes pa sbom por
'gyur ro// de ltar khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no// khyim bdag gi chung ma gzugs legs sdug cing mdzes pa zhig/ ljongs khyad gnas zhes bya ba'i blon po chen po gzhan zhig gis/
btus te/ sa de la 'phrin pa du mar btang yang bud med de ma btubanas khyim bdag de dus 'das so// de dus 'das nas nyes pa cung zad cig gi phyi'i/ blon po chen po des de tsa nas
kyang phyir yang bdag cag gnod pa med/ bde bar 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad kyang medadam zhes smras pa dad/ thabs shig yod de/ blon po chen po des kho mo la' nAste/ sa'aphrinapa
lan du mar btang yang kho mo ma btub bo zhes zer ro// 'on bu mo spro bar gyis shag dang khyod gcig pu'i mthus skye bo 'di rnams bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ mos de la 'o nad 'phrin pa su
gtang zhes smras nas/ bdag cag la sprod du nyi bar 'gro ba'i dge slong yod kyis/ de 'phrin par gtang ngo// dge slong de yang grodir phyin nas/ khyim bdag gi chung ma des snas pa/ 'phags
pa blon po chen po 'di zhes bgyi ba la kho mon khyim 'di dang/ kho mo'i nor 'dadeng/ rdzas 'di dag thams cad 'bul gyis tshur spyon zhes bgyi bar spyod dam/ nus so zhes smras tisong nas/ de la
bsgo ba dang/ de gnyis dum par gyur to// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi chung ma zhige gas dge 'dun gyi
gtsug lag khang zhage brtsigs te/ des der chos gos dang rjes su phan pa'i sman rnams 'bul ba'as/ khyim bdag gi chung ma de dus sa 'dus nas/ dedus 'dus pa dang/ gtsug lag
khang der chos gos dang rjes su phan pa'i sman rnams 'bul ba su yang med nas/ dge slong dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste 'di skad du/ khyim bdag khyod kyi chung mdes gtsug lag khang ji ltar
@#// dbyas pa de ltar khyod kyis kyang chos des dang/ rjes su phan pa dang/ nadapa' smanacud zad m 'bul lam zhes smras pa dang/ btsunang chu ma de na bsod nams
dang ldan la mthu chen mo zhig ste/ gang cung zad smras pa de thams cad de'i phyi'i bgyidan/ des bdag la khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba'i chung mas zan bskyal bar bgying nan/ de bzhin du da dung
sa 'bul la 'a rjewig go/ zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong de dag khyim bdag de'i chung ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad du/ khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod kyis khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba las bras phyin M
par nus sam zhes smras nas/ btsun pa ni nus so// kho mi'i khyos 'di nying na bya ba mang du yod pa de nyid kyang ma nusan/ gzhan la bskyal ba lta ci smos/ de dag gis khyim bdug ga chung ma
spro bar gyis shig/ mchod rten la 'bul 'a/ dge 'dun la 'bul bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang/ khyis bdag gi chung ma'ang dadapa zhig ste/ des dad de zhes smras nas/ de gnyis yang
dang yang du 'grul pa dang dam par gyur to// dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med do// khyim bdag tsa'i gas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag/
khang zhig brtsigs te/ sa der chos gos dang na ba'i sman rnams 'bul zhing rjes su phan 'degs pa las/ khyim bdag de dus 'das te/ de yang rgyas par nadi bzhin no// khyim bdag gi
chung ma des de su khyim bdag ltad zhes bgyi ba phyi las rnams la btang nan 'dibazhin du ya'abul bar nus so zhes smras par yang rgyas par te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
nyes pa med do// dge slong zhig gong gzhan zhagag grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de grong der phyin nas/ khyim bdag gis smras// 'phags pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chung ma la tshur shog ces
bgyi bar spyod dam/ nus so zhes smras nas/ de song ste bsgo ba dang/ bud med nad kyisakhal/ khyim bdag de'anganang kyis btab par gyur te/ deganyis ka nad kyis btab nas don du ma grubapa
gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa sgrom bur gyur/dge slong zhig gleng gzhan zhig gi grong du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ de grong de phyin pa dang/ bud med des smras
pa/ 'bags pa khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba 'a tshur spyon zhes 'phrin bgyi bar spyodadam nus so zhes smras nas/ de denasong ste de labasgo ba dang/ khyim bdag de'angand kyis btab par gyur/ bung
med de'ang nad kyis btab par gyur te/ de gnyis ka nad kyis btab pas don rim grub de// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa sbomapor 'gyur
[K]ngo dge slong zhige grong gzhan zhagi ga grong du nye bar 'grob yan te/ de snga dro tshos gsadangasham thabs bags/ lhung bzed khyer te grong der phyin pa dang khyim bdag des smras pa// khyim bdag
'di zhes bgyi ba la khyod kyi bu mo nam/ sring mo zhig bdag bde ba la rol cig ces 'phrin bgyi bar rtsod dam/ nus so zhes smras nas/ de song ste bsgo ba dang/
khye'u de na dus 'das/ bu mo de sgra mo ma/ smonapa gyur tam/ gzhan la phyin par gyur nas/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes
ba sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig grong gzhan zhig gi grod du bar 'gyob yin te/ de snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas lhung bzed khyer te grong der phyin bdang/ rgyas pa 'di
yang de bzhin du bya ste/ khye'u dend kyis btab pa dang/ bu mo de' nad kyis btab bam/ skur mor gyur tam/ gzhan la byin yong rung ngo// dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyis pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ 'dul bar byed pa rdzogs so// 'dul ba gcig yan chad kyi sgo gsum gyisabasdus
nga ni maste/ bshad pa dang po gnyis po dang// gsum po yang ni de bzhin te// rtsodang tha mar byas nas ni// bsdus pa 'di nas par skyas/// sgo dang po'i mdo
bsdus pa ste/ bshad pa mi mkhas gsol ba dang// kund kyis nyes byung de bzhin te/ mthas pa dang ni bskos pa yang// mang du thos pa tshos spangs pa'o/// bshad
pa pa sdus pa smod pa dang// lta ba dbye ma nga gnyis po dang/ skur padag dang bzhi po dang// gso sbyin gnyis kyang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ sdom pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu
gcig bos skyes pa thams cad brjod par 'gyur ro// 'di ltaste/ sdom pa mdang 'argyu gtsagags nyes thams cad ma brjod pa 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ sdom pa med pa'i rgyu gcig tu
nyes pa thams cad ma 'dus par 'gyusro/ 'di lta ste/ sdom pa dang ldan pa'i rgyugatsasi tu nyes pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyura'o// ba lasakhyud pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi nang
na 4 de bzhin gshegs la med bzhin du skur pa btab pa gcig pu che'o// lus M las byung ba'i kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi nangan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung
bgang yin pa de gcig pu nyes pa che'o/ 'di lta ste/ kho na ma tho ba thams cad kyi nangan/ ge 'dun phye ba gcigi su nyes pa che'o// mang po las byung bani kha nam pa thams cad kyi
nangan/ dge 'dun 'byed par rjes su phyogs pa gcig du nyes pa che'o// phra ma las byung ba'i kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi nang na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
'byed par byed pa gang yin pa de ga/cig pu nyes pa che'o// gang zag las byung ba kho na ma tho ba thams cad kyi nangan/ med bzhin du skur pa btab pa gcig pu nyes pa che'o// srog gcod
ba 'dus byung ba 'a la nam zla ba thams cad kyin ngan/ rang sangs rgyas 'tsho ba dang bral ba gcig pu nyes pa che'o// ma byin pa 'ben pa las byang bstikha na ma tho ba thams
ka na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'inyen byes kyi dge 'dun mnga' ba 'bras brkus pa yin pa gcig pu nyes pa che'o// ma tshangs pa la spyod pa las byung ba kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi nang
na ma yang yana'// dgra bcom ma yin pa la ma tshangs par spyod pa gcig pu nyisaM pa che'o// brdzun du smra ba lasabyung ba'i kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi nang numed la/ mod bzhin du mi 'as
bla mar gyur pa'i chos smras pa gcig bu nyes pa che'o// chos dang ma ldan pa'i gso sbyin gzhag pa gcig ni 'di lta ste/ rtsa bamed pa'o// chos dang ldan pa gso sbyin gzhug pa kha gcig gan 'odi
lta ste/ rtsa ba dang bcas pa'o// gcig ba rdzogs so/// mdu ma mkhas ba 'a gsum du bya// gzhan yang lhag mar bcas la gsum// rdzogs pa ma lus
nyes pa gnyis te/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma ston pa'o// mi dge ba la'ang gnyis te/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma
ma lus pa'o// lung du ma ston pa'i ng gnyasi te/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma ma lus pa'o// nyis pa la yang gnyis te/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma ma lus pa'o//
lhag ma dang bcas pa 'ganyis te/ mi dge ba dang/ lud du ma ston pa'o// lhag ma ma lus pa'i ng gnyis te/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma ston pa'o// nyes pa la'ang gnyis te/ lus/
las khyung ba dang/ ngag las byung ba'o// lus lasabyung ba lo yang gnyis te/ lhag mdang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma ma lus pa'o// gzhan yad lus las byung ba gnyis te/ ma dge ba
dang/ lung du ma ston pa'o/ gzhan yang lus las byung ba gnyis te/ dmigs pa dang/ ma dmigs pa'o// ngag las byung ba'ang gnyis te/ lhag ma dang bocasapa dang/ lhag ma ma
lus pa'o// gzhan yang ngag las byung ba gnyis mdage ba dang/ ludadus ston pa'o/ gzhan yang lus las byung ba gnyis te/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma ston pa'o// gzhan
yang dag las byung bganyis te/ dmigs pa dang/ mi dmanges pa'o// nyes pa gnyis te/ lung du ston pa dang/ lung du mi ston pa'o// gzhan yanyis pa gnyis te// bsgribs pa
dang/ mabasgribs pa'o/// mdor na gsol ba gzhag pags pa dang// ma gzhag slar baslad de bzhin te// dbye ba rnam pa lngar byas nas// nar ma dgu dang smra ba/
nyis pa gnyis te/ gsol bar bya ba dang/ gsol ba med pa'o// gzhan yang nyes pa gnyis te/ gzhag par 'os pa dang/ ma gzhag par 'os pa'o/
pu@#// gzhan yang nyes pa gnyis te/ mkhanang ba'i kha na ma tho ba'o// gzhan yang nyes pa gnyis te/ slar bsad du yod pa dang bsad du med pa'o// gzhan yang nyes
pa ba nyis te/ 'byed par byed pa dad/ ma 'byed par byed pa'o// khyad par byed pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ lhas/tshe dang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma malus pa'o// ma 'byed par byed nga
la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ ma dag pa dang/ lung dum ston pa'o// gzhan yang 'byed par mi byed pa gnyis te/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma ma lus pa'o// gzhan yang nyes
ba gnyis te/ nar ma dang/ skad cig pa'o// gzhan yang nyes pa gnyis te/ sgrub dang/ ma sma ba// mdo'on kun tudakris dang bsgribs pa med// thun mong
ba dang bdun po dang// sangs rgyas dus dang yul dag dang// shani tuchags dang phyogs rnams so// nyes pa gnyis te/ kun tudakris pa dang/ kun tumadakris pa'o//
bsgribs par 'gro ba dang/ ma bsgribasapar 'gro ba'o// thun mong bdang/ yun mong ma yin pa'o// dge slong ma'i thun mong bdad/ dge slong thun mong ba'o// dge slong gi thun mong
bdang/ dge slong ma'i thun mong dang/ dge slong bag thun med pa dang/ dge tshulam thun mong ba dang/ dge slob thun mong ba dang/ dge tshul ya'i thun mong ba'o// dge slong gi thun mong ba
dang/ dge bsnyen pha li na yod pa dang/ dge bsnyen ma'i thun mong ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi dusad la ma'o// yul las gnang ba dang/ yu'alas mi gnang ba'o// shin tuchag
bdang/ shin tum chags pa'o// phyogs gcig pa dang/ phyogs thamasacad pa'o// mdon klog pa sbom po gzhan pa dang// lcapo rnam sman de bzhin ti/
bslangapa rnam pa bzhi po dang// bgags pa rjes su brten pa'o// b.rus pa dang rnam par smin pa med pa'o// slar bslang du rung ba dang/ slar baslang du mi rung ba'o/
slar bsang du rung ba la yang gnyis te/ bshags pa dang po nas sdom pa byin pa'o// gzhan yang slar bslang du rung ba gnyis ba tags pa dang/ don dam pa'o// sladabyung du mi
rung pa gnyis/ ma mthong ba dang/ ma chags pa'o// rten pa la gnyis te/ dge 'dun la brtenapa dang/ gang zag la brten bko/ bshags pa la gnyis te/ dge 'dun dang/
gang zagala'o// mgon/ mkhas pa dag ni gsum dabya// ngo tshang yang rnam gnyis dang// rgol dang zhalanas gsungs pa dang// brtan pa dngan gsol ba'o/
