zhes bgyi 'am/ bsan par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa 'a bsnyenapar yang rdzogs la/ bsnyan par rdzogs par byed pa 'a yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro//
btsunang mkhan po ma mchis bzhin du dge slong dag gis bsnyenAng ra rdzogs par bgyis na/ de bsnyenang rardzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u
pa la bsnyenang ra ni rdzogs mod kyi/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dag ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// btsun pa mkhan po dang ldan par dge slong dag gis bsnyen pa ra rdzogs
par bgyis na/ de bstan par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bsan par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la bstan par yang rdzogs la// bsnyan ng ra rdzogs par byed pa la
yang 'das pa dang bcas pa ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa u pa lasaM zhus pa/ btsun pa btsam ldan 'das kyis lo bdun len la bya rog
skyong nus na rab tuphyung zhag ces gsungs na/ btsunang la drug lon pa de yang dge 'dun gyi skosar bya rog kyang skyong nus na de rab tu byung bar bgyi 'am/ rab tum byung bar bgyi/ u/
pa la lo bdun len par bya ba'i phyir te/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// btsun pa 'badunani len la dge 'dun gyi bsko sa nas bya rog skyod mi nus na de yang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi 'am/ u pa
la bya rog skrod nus par bya ba' phyir te/ rang tudabyung bar ma bya'o// gleng gzhi'i nang na sgo thog ma'i mad tshags su bcad pa dang po'o// mdor na bram ze dang yang
nyan par dang// dkar ba tshes grangs de bzhin te// lhag pa dag dang 'dug dang// drug tu bya dang bcu bzhi dang// shel ba'i zla bar sbyar ba ste// 'du ba rnams la'ang de bzhi
bya dge slong 'khod pa'i gnas na na/ bslab ba byin pas klog pa ni bya'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapanu dzi ta'i tshal mgon med bus
sbyani gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs pat+titsho/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dge slong dag gi gan du 'ongs nas/ 'phrags pa de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang/ de dag gis
sbes pa/ kyi mngeshesaso// bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras// mu stegs can gyis kyang tshos grangs dang/ nyim dang/ skar ma dang/ yud tsam ye shes na/ khyed cag
rab tu byung na tshes grangs tsam yang mi shes sam/ de dag lan med nas cang mi ze bar 'dug pa// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol nga
dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na tshes grangs bgrang bar a rjes su gnang po'as gsos pa dang/ dge slong thams cad kyang bgrang ba la zhugs so// de ltar
gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'dus lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad kyis mabagrang bar dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang/ gtsug/
lag khang skyong gnyis kyis gyis shig/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtanadang/ kheng skyong gnyis kyis kyang mdun nas/ de dug nyes pa'idomigs su gyur pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gis/ bcom ldan 'as la gsol pa dang/ 'jim pa la mi lu bco lnga byos la srad bu la brgyus tezhig la nyi ma re re zhing dran par gyis shig/ srad bu 'phyongs par gyur pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'as kyis 'od ma'i byang bu bco lnga byos la sradabu la brgyus te zhogal/ de'as nyin gcig bzhin mi de gros shig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong thams cad kyis de bzhin bgrangs
pa dang/ dran pa nyams par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dasaM kyisakhaka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bgrang bar gyisashag/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis yang
der 'ongs nas/ 'phags pa de 'ang tshes grangs du lus dras pad du/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtand khang skyong gis shes so// der gtang pa dang de dag gis smras pa/
'apags pa ni de dag khyed kyi tshes grangs kyi mdzod pa yin nam/ ci khyod la dras na ci'i phyir gzhan la gtod/ khyed cag nyid kyis smosashig/ nga ngag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dod
do bram ze dang khyim bdug rnams 'phya zhing gtsug lag khang nas byung ste deng ngo// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis dgongs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus ta/ de bas nadage 'dun gyind du tshes gras brjod par bya'osnyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka'astsal
ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya banagus kyis/ de lta bsan dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes gras rjod par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshos gras
rjod ngar gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod kyis/ zla ba phyed po 'dzin par mi byed do// khyim bdag dang bram bre dag
gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed kyis zla ba phyed po gzung ba yang ma shes te/ de ltar ma bzung na yar gyi zla ba phyed dang mar gyi zla ba phyed po ji lta bur shes par 'gyur/ de dag lan med nas
bya/ cang ma bre bar 'khod de// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zla ba
khyad po khung la tshes grangs brjod pa bya'o// brjod pa ni 'di bzhin du bya ste/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dusang shang 'khodapa dang/ dge slong cig gas rgan rims kyi dang por 'dug 'a yam
'tsho grodang bcasapas thal mo sbyor la tshig 'di skad du smos shig// de ring na zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig ga ste/ gtsug lag khang la gang dag po dang/ lha rnams kyi par tshigs su bcad pa re re rjod
zla cig/ dge slong rnams kyis tshes grangasan brjod kyi/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po' mde nas ma smos pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka3stsal nga// gtsug lag khang ga pag
po' mo nas kyang brjod par bya'o// 'di skad du sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas yang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshes la sbyin drangs kyis/ de labatsun pa rnams kyis dge ba yi/
kyis brtse bar mdzod cig/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po la ji lta ba gzhan yang sbyin par byed pa dang/ sbyin pa'i bdag po la yang dge ba yang ngas brtse bar mdzod cig/ ji ltar dge ba'i/
yid kyis brtse bar mdzad pas na/ de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur gyis/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzhan yang den rkyenadu gnas pa'i sems can thams cad/
la yang so sor mang nas brjedapar bya'o/// ge slong dag gis kyang tshig thams cad rdzogs pa'i rjes so so nas tshigs su bcad pa re re lhogs shig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
yang der 'ongs nas/ 'phags pa de rang tshos du zhes dris pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa// kyi de ring ni btsu lnga'o/bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa// 'phags pa 'jig rten nga
thams cad kyi 'di dri btuba'an/ khyed cag gi ji ltar brtse lnga ni khyed cagrwa zhag 'dums par ma byed dam/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis// bcomi ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag 'dums par yang byas shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhug 'dums par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dge zla ba phyed/
phyud cing zhag 'dums par byed do// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag ya nga ba lhags nas/ 'phags pa de rang tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ skyed
ranged kyi bcu bzhi'o// dedag gis yang snus// 'phags pa de ring 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bco lnga na/ khyed cag gi ji ltar btu bzhi/ ci byed cag zla ba phyed phyed cing
zhag re 'dumasar pa byed dam/ dedag gis smras pa// 'dums par byed d// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang
bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsalang/ dge slong dag khram zedang khyim bdag rnams 'phyab ni yus te/ de lta bas na blab phyed phyed cing zhag 'dums par ma
byed cig/ dus gcig ga zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das shing zhag 'dums par byos shig/ de ltar na 'gacig la gso sbyin bcu bzhi pa ni drug go/ de'i lhag ma rnams ni bco lnga pa'o//
de nas yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams lhags nas/ 'phags pa da ltar gyi blo 'di khyed kyi gang zhes dris pa dang/ dge slong dag gis smras pa// kunged kyi ni dbyar zla tha chung do/
de dag gis smras pa// 'phags pa 'jig rtenapa thams cad kyi ni zla ba 'di dbyar zla 'bring po na/ ji ltar khyed kyi dbyar zla tha chung/ ni khyed kyis zla bsholam bar ram/ ma bar ro// bum
bo dang khyim bdag dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bram ze dang khyim bdag
rnams 'phya ba ni yus kyis// de ltang san bla bshol bar cig/ bcom ldan 'as kyis zla bshol ngor cig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis lar de zhang shol ba'o// bram
thadang khyim bdag rnams yang der lhags nas/ 'phags pa da ltar gyi zla ba 'di khyed kyi gang zhes dris pa dang/ dge slong dag gis smras pa// kyi nged cag gi nga ltar na dbyar zla 'brang
0po'o// de dag gis yang smras pa// 'phags pa 'jig rten pa khrums rud kyani zla ba 'di dbyar zla thu chungan/ khyed cag gis ji ltar dbyar zla 'bring po/ ci khyed cag la re re zhing shol
'dodo dam/ de dug gas smras pa/ 'dore// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'phya nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyami bdag dang bram ze rnams 'grub na yus kyis/ de lta bas na la ra'i nang zla ba shel mdor bar/ 'drug drug cing shol bor cig/ la
dug lnga sum cu ste/ de lta bur zhag dang/ zla ba phyed bo dang/ zla ba dang/ lar ba skyes na mnyam par 'gyur te// mu stegs can gyis grags btsal kyang grags kyang mi rnyedapar 'gyur
rong partsom ldan 'das kyis 'dug drug cing zla bangashol ba'i tsag ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gisaM lo drug drug cang bla bshol 'dor ro// rgyal po dag ni gsum gsum 'dzeshol
'dodo bar byed do// dge slong dag gis de bzhin ma byas pa dang/ blon po dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag blon po rnams 'phya ba ni yusati/ de lta bas na rgyal po'i gzhung bzhin du yang gyis shig/ skar ma mi mthun par rgyu ste/ dge slong
dag gis de lta bur ma sbyor pa dang/ skar ma rtsa ba 'amakhas pa dag dge slong rnams la 'phyanas/ de ltar gyur pudage slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la
[>gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams skar ma rtsi ba dag 'phya ba ni yus te/ de bas na skar mo'i rjes su yang 'jug par byas shig/ gleng gzhi'i
nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gatris pa'o// mdor na yongs su dag pa gnyis byadang/ mtshams kyang rnam pa bzhi bya ste// de bzhani dad pa/
'dzi nam mkha' las// ma bkrol bar yang snga ma bzhin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapan dze ta'i tshal chogod med pas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa 'dis zhus pa// btsun pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis ngas mtshams kyi slad ro'an mchis pa rnamasu yongs su dag pa stsa'adu rung ngam/
u pa li ma rung ngo// btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rolan mchis nag sa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa la yongs su dag pa stsal du rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// btsun pa mtshams kyin
na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad don mchis padi las bgyir rung ngam// phal pa la mi rung ngo// btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshamasakyi nang na mchisapa' las ]
bgyis rung ngam/ u pa 'di mi rung ngo// btsun pa las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis bzhinadu mtshams kyi slad rel namachis pa rnams la 'a su bgyir rung ngam/ u nga la mi
rung ngo// btsun du 'as bgyid pa mtshamasakyi slad la na mchis bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na mchasang rnams la las bgyir rung ngan/ u pa la mi rung ngo// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa 'asi zhusang// btsun tsung dang lenang 'a dege slong gis dad pa drungs nas nam mkha' las mchis na/ dad pa blangs pa zhes bgyi nam/ ma
blangs pa zhes bgya/ u pa 'am blangs pa ste/ gded long zhag btsun pas mtshams snga ma ma bkri' ngar slad mdagumadu rung ngam// u pa la mi rung ngo// gleng gzhi'inang
nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o///mdor na/ bskor ba dang ni 'jig pa dang// shing dang sa yi skye ba dang
ma 'byung ba dang 'byung bar byed// 'chi ba yang na de bzhin te/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzatan+ti tsha'amagon med byas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u ba las nus pa/ btsun pa mtshams la mtshams kyis bskor du rung ngam/ u
dpa la dkyil 'khor dang/ chus bskor ba dang/ dge slong ma'adabyar mo khang ma gtogs par gzhan mi rung ngo// mtshams mtshams kyis gzhig tu
rung dam/ u pa la marung ngo// btsun pa rnam pa dus mtshams 'jig par 'gyur/ u pa la lnga ste/ dge 'dun thamasacukyisakhor te do bdang/ dge 'dun thams cad
mtshan 'thos pa dang/ dge 'dunathams cad slar bsapa dang/ dge 'dun thams cad dus byis pa dang/ gsol ba'i las dang lnga'o// btsunang shing gcig las gtsug
'kha lag khang gnyis kyi mtshams dgum du rung ngus/ u nga rang ngo// de bzhin du gtsug lag khang gsum mam bzhu yang rung ste/ shing nyid ni gcalabar byos shig/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs koshiri spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gzhan zhabe tu'adzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras 'dzum pa mdzad pa po'i
tshon 'od sngon po/ sadango// dmar po// dkar po rnams zhal nas byung ste/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig na stong du 'gro/ 'og tusong bde rnams nasems can dmyal ba yang
sos dang/ thig nag dang/ kun dmyal dang/ 'o ded 'donapa dango/ 'o dod 'byed pa chen po dang/ tshig pa dang/ rab tu tshig pa dang/ bsten med pa dang/ chu bur dang/
rgyun du chu bur can dang/ a ta ta dang/ hahab dang/ du ba dang/ ut+pal lta bu dang/ pad+mo lta bu dang/ pad+motshan po lta burnams su phyin nas/ gang tshang rI sems can
ngamyal bdudag la bab na bsil bar gyur/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag lab na dro bar gyur te/ des sems can dmyal ba de dag la gnod pa ni bde ba'i khyad par du gyur
pa dang de dag 'ad snyam du/ kye ma bdag 'di nas ngasha 'phros sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du bsams pa dang/ de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
sprul pa btang ngo// de dag gso sprul pa mthong pa dang 'di snyam du/ kye bdag cag 'dinas nigashi 'apos da yang med/ gud du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/ sngon ma mthong ba'i sams
cano 'di'i mthusan/ bdag cag gonodapa las khyadangar du bde bar gyur tosnyam dubrasams nas/ de dag sprulapa' sems dad par gyur pas na/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod
pa'i las med par gyur te/ gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du gyur pa de'i lha dang mi'inang du mtshams 'dzin par gyur to// gang stong du song ba de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang/ sum cu rtsa
gsum dang/ mtshom dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phru'adabang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs lha nye phan dang/ tshangs chen dang/ snang ba dang/
tshad med snang ba dang/ kun snang dang ba dang/ chung dgadang/ tshad med ngag bdang/ drage rgyas dang/ sngon mdadang/ bsod nams 'phel dang/
'bras bu tshe dang/ mi tshe bdang/ ma se dung pa dang/ shin tu mtho ba dang/ gya nom snadapa dang/ 'og min gyi bar la sogasapar song nas mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
stong pa dang/ bdAs su med par brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do// 'byung bar bya phyir brtsam par byos// sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byas// 'dzam bu'i
kha khyim la glang chen bzhin/ 'chi bdag sde rnams gnom pa lu byos// gang zhig rab tu bag yod pa'i// chos 'dul 'dal spyod 'gyurab/ skye pa'i 'khor bar ng spangs nas//
sdug bsngal tha mar 'byaning/ ra 'gyur// des 'od gzer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su bskor nas/ slar bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin du 'brang
zhing dong ngo// de sta bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i 'osalungastanang par bzhed nan/ bcom ldan 'as kyi gnam legs sum snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongasapa'i las lung ston
par bzhed na ni/ mdun du ma snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar lung ston parang zhed non/ zhangs kyi mthil du ma snang bar 'gyur ro// byol song du skye bar lung ston
bar bzhing na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par ma snabar 'gyur ro// ya ngogs su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar 'dung ston par
bzhengan ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ni// stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar lung ston par bzhing nani/ phyag g.yon pasImathilaM dumi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor
las sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mathil du mi snangobar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston nani/ lte bar mi snang ngar 'gyur ro// nyan thos pa'i
byang chub tu lung ston par bzhedazhani/ rnal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang byang tshub tulung ston por bzhing nani/ mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bazhudan ni/ gtsug todamasnang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nus// bcom ldan 'dras
kyi gtsug tor du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bos thal mo gnyis sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das 'a gsolapa// kha dog sna tshogs du ma stong// zhal
nas byung ba mang po ste// phyogs kun des na snang gyur pa// nyi ma ji ltar shar ba bzhin// tshigs su bcad de yang smras nga// rgodadang zhum las rnam bral nga rgyal sras//
'a ga la nan tan byed pa dag kyang mngan/ de ni dam pa'i chos zhig pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa upa sazhus pa/ btsun pa mtshamasakyi
nangan rgyal ba bzhugs bzhin du las bgyir rang ngam/ u pa la rung ngo// rgyal bas grangs su bskangs la las bgyin rung ngam/ u pa'i m rung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ u pa la sangs rgyas
dkon mchog kyang gzhan/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshedang ldan pa upa 'asi zhus pa// btsun pa ma bskyed pa' mtshams bskyed du rung
ma/ u pa la sa rung ngo// btsun pa dzitsam gyis na mtshams bskyed du mi rung bu zhes bgyi u pa li gsum gyis te/ dkyil 'khor dang/ chus bskor bupa dang/ mtshams kyi nang nga/
btsun pa klung 'bab pa'i pha rol tu mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa la morung ngo// de ste pham pa brtan po zhig yod na rung ngo// de ste btsun pa zam pa chadam zhig par gyur na ji tsam gyis
na ma 'jig pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la slar yang gtsang bar bya ba'i sems yong na zhag bdun du 'jagi par ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus la/ tshe dang ldan pa ulis zhugs pa// bdun
padage slong gi mtshams 'gums pa'i tsholas byed pa'i dge slong gum// dus bgyis na bkum pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ma bkum pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la mtshan ma rnams brjod la/ las ]
kyang mang du byas na bcad pa zhes bya'o// bzlog pa ni ma bcad pa'o// btsun pa dge slong ma'i mtshams gcod pas las bgyid pa'i dege slong ma gum ste/ de dus bgyis na bkumang zhes
'am// mkhakum pa zhes bgyi/ desnya u pa 'a mtshan ma rnams brjod l/ las kyang mang du byas na bcad pa zhes bya'o// bzlog pa ni mabacad pa'o// gling bzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'amado/
tshigs subacad pa bzhi pa'o// bam po sogacig pa/// mde nas dang nam mkhar las bya ba// mtshams dang yosasungag pa dang// gnas gcig 'dug pa'i drege slong gis/// las
rnams kun la blta ba'o/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pan dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs pa'i tshi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'dasal// tshe dang ldan nga u pa 'asi zhus pa/ btsun pas la mches pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// ngadapa nang na rung ste/ de
ste sa la gnas pas grangs su tshang la sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o// btsun pa sa la mchis pas rtsig pa mchis pa dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa la mo/
rung ngo// dad pa byin pa ni ste/ des sa la gnasapa dag mang por tshad la tshug pa la gnas pa'i rnams las dadapa yang blangs par gyur pa'o// sa la mchis pa dag gas shing la mchis pa dag/
sangs rgyas sku bu mchog gi rgyur gyur pa// rkyen med dung dang pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar// rgyal ba dgra thul 'dzum pa nye bar ston ma mad// de tshorang gis mkhyen cing
blo brtanang// rgyal dbang nyan pa thos su re ba'i rnams M// thub pa'i khyu mchog brtan pa'i gsung rab kyis// the tsom skyes pa dug bas bsal bar mdzod// rgya mtsho las ni rgyalabarnyan
'a pa bzhin// yang dag mgon rdzogs rgyu yod 'dzum ma ston// brtan ngas gang ba'i 'dzum par bstan pa// de ni skye bo mang pos thos par 'tshal// btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas rnams ni ma mchis/ rkyenam mchasing/ 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'dzum pa mdzad/ kun dga' bo de
ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgru bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa' sangs rgyas rgyu med/ rkyen mang po/nu 'dzum pa mi mdzad de// kun dga' bo phyogs
[ ]'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus bzhugs nas chos bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldanong kyun dga' bo rangs shing myur bar stod g.yogs bzhi ltab tu bltab stabati
nas bcom ldan 'das 3ka'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdan bting ba 'di la bzhugs par gsol// gnas 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od srungs dang/ da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sos rgyas gnyis bzhugs par 'gyur dro zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan
pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so// kun dga' bo sa ma smras pa khyod kyisangashes ngan legs so zhes gsus nas/ gdan bting ba de bzhugs so//
bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' la bka' 'ang// kun dga' po phyogs 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas 'od srungs kyi gtsug lag khang ngo// 'di ni 'chagasa'o//
'di ni stags bu'o// 'di ni sgo khang ngo// 'din zhabs 'bru ba'i sa'o// 'di nibasro khang ngo// 'di ni rung ba'i khang pa'o// 'di ni dugs khangado// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
la tshodang ldan pa u pa las zhus nga// btsun pa rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyi/ ma rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyin btsun pa jitsam gyis na rung ba'i sar dag par bgyi/ u pa lo des/
ba'itshos yod pa'i tshorung bdang ma rung ba'agyur/ dam pa'i chos zhig par gyur na thams cad kyang rung ba'o// btsun pa jitsam gyis na dam pa'i chos mchis pa zhes bgyi/ ji tsam gyis na zhig
pa zhes bgyi/ u pa 'a ji srid du las byed rinan tan byed pa yang yod pa'i bar du ste/ las byed la nan tan byed pa yang yodan/ dam pa'i chos yod pa zhes bya'o// las kyang mi byed
dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo/ dad pa byananan du ste/ de ste sa la gnas pa dug mang por tshang la/shing la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang
blangs par gyur ba'o// btsun pa sa la mchas bdag gis nam mkha' la mchis bdag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir nang dam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// btsunang rtsag pat+ti steng na mchis pa dag gas rtsig
pa'i steng na mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyi rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung// dad pa bya nang ste/ de ste rtsag pa'i steng na gnas pa dag grangs su tshang la rtsig pa'i steng na gnas pa rnams las

dad pa yang blangs par gyurang ko// btsun pa rtsub pa'i stongan mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan tsami ga tu las bgyi rudangam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// dad pa byin na rung ste/ de sta rtsig pa'i
steng na gnas pa dag gi grangs tshang sa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o// btsun pa rtsig nga 'i steng na mchis pa dug gis shing gi steng na mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu
las bgyis rung gu/ u pa la mi rung ngo// dad pa byin narung ste de sta rtsig pa la gnas pa dag gis grangs su bskang 'ashing gastong na gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs por
gyur pa'o// btsun pa go pa'i snyingan mchis pa dag gAnam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rang ngam/ u pa 'a mo rung ngo// btsun pa shing la mchis pa dag gis
shing la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// dad pa byin na rung ste/ ste shang la gnas pa dag gras su bskang dngashadi la gnas pa'i rnams
las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o// shingol mchis pa dag gis sa la mchas pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyi rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// dad nga byin n rung ste/ destongashang
la gnas pa dag gis grangs su bskang 'a sa la gnas pa'i rnams 'asadad pa yang blangs nga ra gyur pa'o// btsun pa shing la mchis pa dag gis rtsigapa 'amachis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las
bgyirarung ngam/ u pa la mi rung// de stangashangel gnas pa dag gis grangs su bskang lags la gnas pa'i rnams 'asadad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o// btsun pa shang la mchas pa
ngag gas nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu 'dus bgyi rung ngam// u du 'am rung ngo// btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag gis nam mkha' la mchis nagag dang lhan cig tu/
las bgyir dungam/ u pa la mi rung// btsun pa nam mkha la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyis rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// btsun pa rnamaral
la mchis pa dag gis rtswagipa la mchis pa dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam// u pa la mi rung ngo// btsun pa nam mkhatsal mchis pa dag gisangashang la mchas pa ngag dang lhan cig tu las
[za/ g]da/ bgyir rung ngam// ub la ma rung ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba/
'di'i dkyil 'khor las/ las brgya rtsa gcig tugasus pa btsun pa las brgyartsa gcig pa de'i nang nas las dusan dad pa dang bcas par 'gyur/ dusanadadapa ma mchis par 'gyur/
u pa kha thams cad kyang dad pa dang bcas pa ste/ mtshams bcad ng na ma gtogs so// btsun pa rdzu 'phrul 'am sgyu nas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ upa' mi rung ste/ de ci'i phyi'i
zhen ul la rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma lanitha snyad du gdags pa medado// btsun pa gsu' dang/ 'od gazeradang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ skar ma rnams kyis mtshams dgum du rung ngam/
u nga la mi dungastsa/ deci'i phyi zhe na/ ang lagiza'adang/ 'od gzer dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ skar ma rnams mi brtan pa'i phyarir// btsun pa chu rlabs kyis mtshams dgum
du rung ngum/ u pa la mi rung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa la churlabasan ma brtan pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshongang ldan ng u pa lis zhus pa// btsun
pa yos su dag pa 'dren pa'i dge slong gis yongs su dag pa blangs nas/ stangag nam mkha' las mchis nanges yongs su dag pa blangs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa 'a ma blangs pa ste/
gded byang duges so// btsunapa las dgyid pa gcig gso las kyi tshig kyang gcig/ gsol ba yang gcig gas gnas bzhi snga ba'i la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa' rung ste/ de sta
gnas bzhi'i dge slong gsum gsum gnas la/ gsol ba dang las kyang mngon du gyur rung/ der gsol byed pa'i dge slong gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams su sab mo 'am/ ra lnga 'am/
khra 'am/ gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ sa mnan te de'i steng du 'dug nas 'dus bya'o// las byed pa nyid de dag gi grangs su skong ba'o// btsun pa dge slong gcig gis gnas gcig tu ma
la gnas bzhir 'dus bgyid du rung ngam// u du 'ang rung ste/ de yang gnas bzhi 'di lta ste/ bsdigs pa' sa dang/ snang pa dang/ bskrad pa dang/ slar bsdum pa dang ma
mtho ba'i phyir sdang 'dang/ slar las me byed pas spang brwa'osadang/ sdig pa la lta ba sor ma btang bas sdugan+ti'as dang/ chadapa'i 'as te rnam pa la mngon du gnas par gyurang
la= las byed pa'i dge slong gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams nadab me ma/ rjes mnan te 'dug pa 'o// gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o//
mdor na phyadadang gsum las 'das pa dang// phyed dang gsum yang na yosti// dge 'dun bye bskya rengs dang// mtshams kyi nang du byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med byas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshodang ldan
pa u pa las/zhus// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams chen po chod ga ces gsusan/ btsun pa mtshams chen po de'i tshad jitsam lags/ u pa 'dapag tshad phyedadangagasun
mo// btsun pa dadang gsum phan chadakyang mtshams zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa la mi yin te/ dpag tshadapyadad gsum tshun chad mtshams so// btsun pa 'ogag khams kyi mtshams gang
lags/ u pa tsadzitsam chu la thug pa 'gyur pa'i bar du'o// btsun pa dang ga tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das te/ tshu'atsa thug par gyuran tsade yang mtshams zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa yan
no dpag tshadapyadadang gsum tshun chadan mtshams kyi/ de phan chad na mtshams ma yin no// btsun pa stong gi khams su mtshams gang/ u pa li ji tsamangashing gi rtse mo 'am/ rtsig/
N+NaM pa'i stong la thug par gyur pa'i bar du'o// btsun pa dang ga tshad phyed dang gsum phan chud kyi shing g rtsi mo'am/ rtsige pa'i steng du gyur na ni de yang mtshams zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa 'am
yin no// u pa la dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad na mtshams kyi/ de phan chad ni mtshams ma yin no// btsunang ri'i mtshams gang/ u pa li ji tsam chus bskor ba la zug pa'i
[26 ]bar du'o// btsun padapag tshad phyed dang gsum bran chad cig chus bskor bar gyur na du de dang mtshams zhes bgyi nam/ u nga 'a ma yin no// u pa la dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun
chad ni mtshams so// de phan chad na mtshams ma yin no// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun gyi ste/ de na dge slong gcig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag chos la phyogs pa
bsams bzhin du chos ma 'gas pa'i phyogs kyi nang du mchis na dbyar chadapa zhes bgyi 'am/ dbyar ma chad pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li ji ste de dag gi lta ba la yang dad la/ der song nas skya ges
shar na dbyar chadang zhes bya'o// de ste lta ba la yang ma dad la der song nas skya rengs mngashar nadabyar ma chad pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar tshul na gnas pa'i tshe/
dge slong gis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi sung rol du song zhig ces gsungasan/ gang du byin gyis brlab par gyi/ u pa la mtshams kyi nang du'o// ji lta bur bgyi/ dge
slong gi mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar bab ste tshig 'di skad ces smyos shig dgongs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa mtshams kyi nang gnas 'di'i dbyar dang po nas
tha ma yang rung ste/ tshul du zhugs pa las bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi don la mtshams kyi sud la tu mchiba'i slad tuzhag bdun du byin gyisabarlabs te/ bdag dbya'ada'i gnas so/
bdagudabyar 'di'i gnas so zhes kun tu rgyas par bya ste/ snga ma bzhin no// gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug go/
sde lnga rnams te bsams bzhin du// kun rgyu gnyen la'ang de bzhin te// lung la the tsam byung ba dang// mthob phyir yang 'gro ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan du yodapa' dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so// sangasaM rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan ng u pa 'dis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'os
kyis dbyar tshul du 'jug par gyis shig ces gsungs na/ gang dag tshul du 'jug par bgyi u pa la din rnam pa lnga// dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang/ dge
tshul pa dang/ dge tshul ma'o// ji ltar 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad kyi sras bzhin du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab pa 'byas na/ dge bsnyen
gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol tu song zhig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa de ste mu stegs can zhig mchis na de'i don la yang mchib bgyi 'am/ u pa la de ste sdig pa la lta ba de las 'phral bar
'dodan 'gro bar bya'o// btsun pa gnyen zhig mchis na de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi 'am/ 'gro bar bya'o// btsun pa dge slong zhig gzhung la the tsom mam dogs pa zhig mchis na de yang
mchibar bgyi 'am/ u pa 'a yi ltadang 'gro bar bya'o/[/]kyi nga gi slong pa ma theb pa 'a dus thob pa'i sladu/ ma nud pa la chud pa'i slad du/ mngon du ma bgyis pa las mngon du bgyis/
ba'i slad du/ the tsom mam dregs pa zhig mchis na de nga tshapa nga bgyi nam/ u pa la de yang 'gro ba khya'o// glang gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad ng bdun pa'o//
mdor na ma dras ges kyang de bzhin te// 'on grong du 'byed pa dang/ kun rgyu dang de bzhinapa// gtan la bab na gong lugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras mnyan
du yod ngan dze ta'i tshal mgon med bras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa upa 'as zhusang// btsun pa madras pa'i gos byin
gyis brlab par rung ngam/ u nga 'di mi rung mod kyi/ rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo// btsunang ma dras pa'i gis 3tshal nas grong du mchir ngam/ a ba la mi rung 'od kyi/ de lta
bu'i rkyen gyis na rung de// btsunang ma dras btI ges 'tsha' te'am ngani khapa du ma/chi ra rung ma/ u pa la mi rung mod kyi/de lta bu'i rkyen gyis narung ngo// btsun ngam dras pa'i gis 'tshal te/
khyim pi khyim du dus lus// nga 'a mi u0f7ara nga med lha gu['']dun gyis narung ngo// btsun pad ma dras pa'i shes 'tshal te kun tu rgyu ba'i khyim du mchir rung ngam/ u pa la mi/
rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na dung ngo// btsun pa a dras pa'i gos 'tshal te kun turgyu pa'i gnas su mchi dngangam/ u pa li ma rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen
gyis na rung ngo// btsun nga ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal tasladarol tu mcher rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasal// tshe dang
ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos khrutshad du byos shig ces gsungs na/ btsunapa la la zhig khru thung zhing lus ring na des kyang khru tshad dbagyi 'am/ u pa
lo rin khru tshad du bya ba ma yin gyi/ de'i lus kyi tshad du byosangashage/ btsun ngab gang la thams cad kyis chos gos mi langs na de ji ltar bgyi/ u pa la dris gong zhugs su gyis la chongs/
shig/ glingagazhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o/// mdor na/ lham la rnam pa lngar byas te// seng ge gcan gazan mi bsrunadang// 'jug par
k+Sha yang ni ma rung ste// pags pa la nyel ma bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs
so= sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa upa lasazhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ba glangs shes kyi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang zhig ces
gsungs na/ btsun pa rub glang phal gyi pags pa la yang lham bgyis te 'chad par ma bgyi 'am/ u pa la ri dag gi pagasal 'a yang lham byas te bcang bar ma bya'o// u pa
lade'i phyir zhe na/ de dag kyang sna stobs dang ldan pa// so stobs dang ldan pa// rkang stobs dang ldan pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dras kyis rta cang shes kyi pags pa las/
bgyis par lham ma 'chang zhag ces gsungasan/ btsun pa ni phal gyi pags pa lham ya bcang bar mi bgyi 'am/ u pa la de'i pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bya'o// de ni phyi
nen/ u pa la de dag kyang mgyogs pa dang ldan/ stobs dang ldan nga'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge dang/ stagadang/ gzig gi pags pa la bgyis pa'i
lham ma 'chang zhig ces gsungs na/ btsun nga gcan gazan mi bsrun pa gzhan dgakyang mchis na/ dengag gi pags pa las bgyis pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi 'am/ u pa 'di/
dag gapags pa la lham byas pa yang ma 'chang zhig/ u pa 'di ci'i phyir zhin/ de dag kyang sen mo'i stobs dang ldan/ mche ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis pags pa'i stong du ma 'dug ces gsungasan/ btsun pa ji tsam gyisanapags pa'i steng du mchis pa zhes bgyi/ ul la din ji tsam rkuba bzhi g par gyur pas so// btsun pa/
spya// bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i snying du ma nyal cig ces gsungasan/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis 'apags pa stong du nyal ba zhes bgyi/ de na u pa la ji tsam
'bres par gyur pa// gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o////mda'on sha rjen dang ni rtsa ba mo dang// yongs su btsugasaparagyur pa dang
'a/ ga nang 'brum gcad pa'i mi bya ste// gtsug lag khang dang bca' ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yong pa'i dzi ta'i tshal
[% ]ban bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong se ka ta bro 'tshal ba 'angasha rjen byin cig ces
gsusan/ btsun pa sa 'as blang bar bgyi/ u pa la de nag 'tshong ba rnam pa lnga las so// rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ shan pa dang/ khyim bya gsodapa dang/ rangu gsod pa dang/
T+ThA bag gsod pa dang/ ri dgas gsod pa rnams so// 'o nabatsunang sus blang zhung byin 'an bgyi/ upa la dge bsnyen dad sa so// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan
rdzo ste 4 de dus na dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/ desman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig ces smras nas/ bzhani babs bdag nang 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig gis btaban dpyad cig
ston cig/ des 'phags pa mar 'thung zhig dang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ des bzhin bzadras bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ sman pas khyod kyi
ston pa ni thugs rje can yin gyis gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas
stsal pa// de sta smanangs ma gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo na 'thung zhig/ dge slong des ma 'thungs na skomakyis gzir bar gyur te/ des sman pa la bzhin baphas bdag ni skam
bas gzir to// des smras// 'phags pa rtsub mo skyur po 'thung zhig/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i badra'abam gnang na ji ltar btungabarapya/ sman pas smras
pa 'phags pa khyedakyi ston pan thugs rje can yanangs gnang du gdon mi za'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rtsa ba so skyur po 'thung zhig ces rjes su gnang ba dang/ dge slong dag gas rtsa ba mo skyur po ji ltar btung ba ma shes so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rtsa ba mo skyur po ni rjesapa 'di lnga'o// lnga gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ 'bras bu'i chang las tshur gyur
dpa dang / 'bru'i chang las tshur gyur pa dang/ zhe'i chu dang/ nubu dang/ rtsab mo dang lnga'o// de las 'bras bu'achang las tshur gyur pa'i/ gang 'du 'bras bu
la rnams las byas pa dang ma rung sta skyur por gyur pa'o// 'bru'i chang las tshur gyur pan/ gang 'bru rnams las sbyar nas ma rung sta skyur por gyur pa'o// zhe'i chu ni 'o las chu byung/
naba'o= dar ba'i khu banid nga ba no'i chu lta bur gyur pa'o// rtsub mo na rtsa ba mo nyid yin no// de dag gi nang du chus bslang la ras kyi nang du btsags to/ jiltar mnga'i kha dog bzhin du gyur
pa de ni dus dang/ dus ma yin pa dang/ na ba dang/ ma ni ba'i dge slong dag btung bar bya ste/ la the tsom ni ma byed cig/ gleng gazhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ pa'i//
tshedadage slong gzhan 'gro gnad 'brum gyi nad kyis btab nas/ des 'bum bu sen mos bcad pa dang/ de slar sdug bsngal zhing rtsub pa tsha zhing gnod lanabar gyur pa dang/ de sdug
ny+nyo bsngal gyis rab tugazir nas des 'di snyam du/ bdag labcom ldan 'as kyisisdug bsngal zhing dag pa dag gyur kyang ma dgongs snyem du bsams pa dang de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis thugs rje chen pos bskul nas de'a gnas asu byon te/ dge slong ci nyis nas rmis pa dang/ desnying rje zhing mi dga' nas mag mtshams gang mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig nge 'a nas/
bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar gyur ba rgyas par gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ dge slong dag ngasasn gnas kyang gzhung 'bumam gcod cig cesam bsgo 'am//
btsem ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal to// 'o na khyod kyis ci'i phyir de ltar bya/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
rnams bka' stsal ba/ drag slong dag dge slong 'di ni sdug bsngal gyis gzari bsan nyes pa med kyis/ ngas yang 'di ltar bsgo ba ni dege slong ngag gzhang 'brum gyi nang kyis gzeran/ sen
mo la sogs pas bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bcad cig/ gzhan yang gcod du ma gzhug cig/ de la dbyang rnam pa gnyis su sbyar zhing bya ste/ sman dang sngags kyis so// dge slong gnang/
'brum gyi nad kyis gzir ba lasen mo la sogs pas bcad m/ gtsod du banug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i gling 'dab
tshong ba spu bu can zhes bya ban bzhugs so// de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan zhig bdag nyidadang/ bdag nyid mos/ bdag nyid dga' nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra/
gcan bin gang bag gcig pa la phul la// de nas tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin ji srid tsag ga bar du gtsug lag khang der gnas nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te ljongs spyod du song ngo//
khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin ji srid kyi bar du gtsug lag khang der gnas nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gas khyer te ljongs sbyod du songapozhis byesaso// des
tshe thos nas khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo// de nas tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin ji sridi dga' ba'i bar du ljongs spyad nas/ lhubazed dang chos gas khyer teshAkya'i grong

ma 'dab tshong ba phyu pu can zhes bya ba gangan pa de spyod cing song ste/ ramis bzhin du spyad pa spyod cing tshong pa sdu bu can zhes bya bar phyin pa dang/ tshodang ldan basgragacan 'dzin gyis/ khyim bags
gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun la yul la zhes thos so/ de skadathos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tsha' nas/ phyogs
u0f00 gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dus nas/ tshodang ldan b sgra gcan 'dzin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa 'din khyim bdag gzhan zhige bdag nyid
dang bdag nyid mos/ bdag nyid dag 'a nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ bdag gang zag gcige du la stsal nas/ gtsug lag khang der bdag ji srid cig la bar du mchis te lhung
bzed dang chos ga 'tshal nas ljongs spyod du mchis pa dang/ khyim bdag des 'phags sgra gcan 'dzin gtsug lag khang der ji srid cig gi bar du 'dug nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos ra
te ljongs spyod du song ngo zhes thos so// de skad thos pa dang khyim bdag des ya gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phulan/ btsun pa de la bdag gsad ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang/ sgra/
gcan zan tshun shog/ khyim bdag de gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smos shig/ khyim bdag bdag gi 'dus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis nyes pa'i
gyur pa lta yodadam zhes smos shige/ btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldanupa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/ khyim bdag de gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ khyim
badrag de la 'di skad ces skyes so// khyim bdag bdag gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam/ 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis lus dang/ dag dang/
yid kyi sgo nas cung zad tsam yang nangs par gyurang ma mchis so// de nas tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan zin kyis khyim bdag de la legs pashin tubartagasangashing rnas te/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song nas drung du phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'a'adi skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis
khyim bdag de la khyim bdag bdag gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis cung zad tsam yang nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam zhes bgyis na/ de 'di skad ces 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzinakhyod
kyis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi sgo nas cung zad tsam yang nangs par bgyis pa ma mchis so zhes mchi'o// de'i tshon tshod ldan pa kun dga' bobcom/
sa ldan 'das kyi gnam logs nangasal yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la bas yab g.yob cing 'dug pa dang/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun dag 'a bol/
'a kun dag 'a bo song ngashAkyu'i grong 'dabatshod pa sbya ba can zhes bya ban gnas shadu 'bod pa dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus shig par sgo zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ btsunab
bka' bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun ngaga' bos bcom ldan 'das mnyan te/ shAkya'i grong 'dab tshod du spu bu can zhes bya band slong ji snyad gnas
ngagang 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du bsdus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas//
btsamo ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus la bab par dgosan shAkyagrong 'dab tshong pa sdu ba can zhes bgyin/ dge slong ji snyadu gnasaTashing 'khod pa de
ngag thams cad mdun khang du 'dus nas mchis so zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'dis 'dun khang ga na ba der gzhigs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdunan gdan
bti ba la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsalang/ dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa phyin te/ gzhan la yang/
byin n tshesam yin par byin bsto/ chos ma yaniba' slangs pa'o// ma rung bar spyod pa'o// gnyis las mang ba'am/ dge 'dun la byin na yang chos ma yin par byin pa'o// sam
yani par blangs pa'o// mi rung bar spyod pa// dge slong dag gang gse gang zag gnyis la sbyin pa byin pa gcig la byin nam/ gzhan la 'am/ gnyis la 'ag/ mang po 'a'am/ dge
'dunal byin na tshos ma yin par byin pa'i// chos ma yin par blangs pa'o// mi ru bur spyod pa'o// dge slong dag gang gis gang zag mang po la sbyin pa byin te/ gcig la sbyin nam/
gatrAsi la 'am/ mang pogazhan la 'am/ dge 'dun la byin na tshes ma yan par byani pako/ chos ma yin par blangs pa'o// ma rung bar spyod pa'o// dge 'dun labyin togang zag
gcig 'byin nam/ gnyis la'am/ mang po la byin nam/ dge 'dun gzhan la ni'achos ma yin par byani ba'o// chos ma yinupar blangs pa'o// ma rungabur spyod pa'o// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i nyen thos kyi dge 'dun dag ste/ phyogs dang phyogs ma yaning rta gnas pa las/ phyogs gcig la sbyin pa byin pa gzhan la byin na chos ma yin pa byin pa'o//
tshos ma yin par blas pago/ ma ru bur spyod pa'o// dge slong dag gang gis gang ba gcig la sbyin pa byin pa gzhan la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o//
tshos bzhin du blangs pa'o// rung bar spyodabago/ gnyis lam yin/ mang po lam yin/ dge 'dun lam byin na chos bzhin du byin pa'o// chos bzhin du blangs pa'o// rung
bar sbyod pa'o// dge slong dag gangags gang zag gnyis la sbyin pa byin pa dgacig la ma yin/ mang po la ma yin/ gzhan la ma yin/ dge 'dun la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin
ba'o chos bzhin du blangs pa'o// rung bar spyod pa'o// dgo slong dag gang gas gang zag mang bo la sbyin pa byin pa de/ gtsag la ma byin/ gnyis la 'am/ mang po gzhan 'ga'/
dge 'dun la ma byin na chos bzhin du byin ba'o// chos bzhin du blangs pa// rung bar spyod pa'o// dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin pa de gang zag gcig lam byin/ gnyis/
la 'am/ mang po la 'am/ dge 'dun gzhan la ma byin nachos bzhin du byin pa'o// chos bgan du blangs pa'o// rung bar spyod pa'o// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge
'dun bye sto/ phyogs dang phyogs ma yin par gnas pa la/ phyogs gcig la sbyin pa byin pa gzhan la ma yin na chos bzhin du byon pa'o// chos bzhin du blangs pa'o//
rung bar spyod go/ drag slong dag rgyal bon so ga' la dbang/ bdag po na mal stan ludabadwango// dge slong ni lhung bzedadang chos gos la dbang po// sbyin pa byed pa dang/
sbyin pa'i bdag po dgagis byin pa'i chos rnams la slal 'chos pa'i rigs kyi gzhan la sbyanibalanam yin no// de ci'i phyi'i zhin/ dge slong dag spyin pa ni snga ma yin te/ phyi ma ni
ma yin gyis/ de bas na sgra gcan 'dzanil gtsug lag khang sar phyin cig/ dge slong dgagong gas spyanipa gzhan la byin pa de yang gzhan la byanan de lta bu'i rkyen ma gtogs te
das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gas kyang tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzani la gtsug lag khang slar phyin no/// bam po so gnyis pa//
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapa naste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ gtsug lag khang gi dus ston dang/ dus ston chen po dag byosashig phyes
gsungs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis kyang de bzhin byed do// de'i yul so san gnasaM nga 'i dge slong dag kyang 'dus nas/ de dag 'brum ze dang khyim bdag dang ba dag gis
bca 'a ba mang du phyin pa dang/ de dag gis cung zad cig zos nas lhag ma dge tshul pha ngag la byin no// de dag gis kyang phyi nyin dage slong de dag la de nyid byin len byas pa dang/ de dag gis
dge tshul dag la khyed cag gas bzang ba 'di gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang/ dengag gas smras pa/ khyed cag gis bdagacig la khar tshang byin pa de nyid
lags so// dus slong rnams nged kyis 'di khyed la byin pa yin nozhes snas te/ thatsam du gyur nas ma yin pa dang/ deltar gyur ba dge slong dus gas/ bcom ldan 'das la
'tsho gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re yod bzhin du des byin la/ ri ba yod bzhin du slar bros na/ dad gis byanan na nyis byas/ thosan ltung ba'o//
re ba yodabazhin du des byin la/ ri med bzhin du slar thos na/ de dag gis byin pa'i tshon nyis byas/ thos na nyes pa med do// des re ba med bzhinung byan la/ ba yod/
bzhin du bos na/ de dag gis byin pa'i tshonanyisapa mid/ zes na ltungaba'o// re ba medubazhin du byin la/ re ba med bzhin du bris na/ de dag gse khyen poratsho yang nyes pa med/
smi la tho ba'i tshiyang nyes pa med// gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs te/ sgodang po rdzogs soNA/ mdor bsdus pa ste/ bsgo ba
Da dang yang bsgrags pa dang// ma bting pa yang de bzhin te// bslab pa byin dang lasapyidadang// bzod par bya dang bsladapa dang// gos dang mnyam pa'i tshul bzhin te// brtsig pachad
bas gcad pa dang// mdo rnams bsdus pa gnyis pa'o// mdor na bgo ba dris la lan byon pa// dge slong ba ma dus 'das te// mnyan du yod na rtsod pa
dang dge 'dun gnyis dang chos gos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyanadu yod pa na dzeta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ba na bzhugs so// mnyan
du yodapan khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des/ ragis mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas/ de dang lhan cig turtse dga' zhing yos su spyod de// de rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyad
pa las/ de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu pho 'bag btsas te/ de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gir btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgya
cherabyas nas/ rigs dang mthun par mang btags so// de dus phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tubyun gnas / de yang dus phyi zhig na nad kyis btab ste dus 'das pa dang/
dge slong dag gis de lhung bzedadang chos gos dang bcas te dur khrod du borab bram ze dang khyim bdag lam der byung sta deb de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag gcig la gcig kha/tam du 'dzin cing 'dod
sta/ kyi bdag cag khyim pa khyim na gnas pas thabs rnam pa du mas nor rdzas dag bsgrubs kyang snod spyodadang gas dag na mi 'don/ dge sbyo shAkya'i bu 'di dag ni sgo'i them pa brgya
rgyal zhing dga' bzhin du lto 'gas shing bsod snyoms bsgrub na/ ci'i phyi'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'go zhes smra ba na/ dge slong dag kyang de'i mdun nas/
tshur 'ongs pa dang/ de dag gis de dag la lcas pa/ 'phags pa bdag cag khyim pa khyim na gnas ti/ thabs rnam pa du mas nor rjes bsgrubs kyang stod spyad dang gos mi
'di'on/ khyed cag sgo'athim pa brgyargal zhing dka' bzhin du lto 'gengs pa'i bsod snyoms bsgrubs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di ga laso 'ong na de ci'i phyiri khyed kyis dge
slong 'di'i lhung bzed dang chos gos su bcas te 'khrod du bor zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gsebcomi ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngos smras pa dang/ dedag chud mi zer bar dong ngo//
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ dgi slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed dang chos gsas
bcas tom dod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lhungabazed dang chos gos su btus te mdor tsag ces gsus pa dang/ dge slong dag gas gtsar bur bor nas/ bcom ldan 'as
kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcer bur ma der bar smad g.yogs dang rdul gathan gyis bkris te ba'o cig/ de nas dge slong dag gis gos bzang po dang bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bzang po dang ma der rug ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de dag gsan pa dang por ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis na padad yang ma dor bar 'bring po dang be'o cig ces bka' stsal to/
bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos su bcas te mdor cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba ma shes nas// bcom ldan 'dasakyis dge
slong gang 'gos pa de la byin cig ces bka' stsal to// drug sde dag rtagatu'athos pa ltar byed nas pacom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag lam sbyin bar/ ji ltar rgan rimasu
bzhin du byin cig ces bka' stsal ba dang/ gsar bu du ma thob par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa le lan 'debs pa'i duge slong gso dge 'dun la bsgo la/ dge
slong gi dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang/ gtsug lag khang skyong gis dge 'dun gyi nang du ni thang bskyed par byos shig ces bka' stsal to// gling
gzhan mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pan dge slong gzhan zhag dus 'das nas/ pa'i chos gos dang lhung bzed dge slong ma zhig gi lag tu bzhi g go/ duge slong dag gas
de'i bsregs nas slar gatsug lag khang du phyin nas lhung bzed dang chos gos dag btsal na ma red de/ de dag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang nadage songam ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig la
yod pa shes nas/ de dag dge slong ma' dbyar mo khang du dang// 'phags ma dge slong 'ang zhes bya ba dus 'das pa de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di
nagatams shing 'dug pa de tshur byin cig ces smras pa dang/ sa smras pa// 'phags pa dge slong de gad dus 'das/ dkyi gtsug lag khang du dusa'adas so// 'phags pa//
khyed kyin mchisapan khyod ma3 bdag cag gden mchis pa ni pod gcag dbang ngo// ji zhen/ debadag cagag yang chos kyi ming bo lags so zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur
pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi lhung bzed dang chos gos ni dge slong dag dbang gis/ dge slongam ngag la 'tshang
'ge ces bka' stsal to// mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhagi dus 'dasanas/ 'i lhungabazed dang chos gos dge slong gi la bzhag go/ dge slong ma rnams kyis de ro
bsrogs nas/ dge slong ma'i debyaramo khang du slar lhags te lhung bzed dang chos gis btsal nas redanas/ gtsug lag khang zhig nadage slong mang 'a zhes bya ba go la yod par
shes nas/ de dag gtsug lag khang du'os tidage slong dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phags pa dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'das te/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos
gas 'byin mchis na/ debudag cag 'tshalagyis slar stsol cig ces smras pa dang/ des snasapa/ dge slong ma de gang du dus 'as/ bdag cag gi dbyar mo khang du dus 'dasaso//
de ltar na 'bags ma khyed kyi den 'dug pa ni khyed dbang yod/ dred kyi de na yod pa na ded dbang ba'i stod du/ de'ang ded kyi chos kyi sring mo yin no zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong
mag gas/ dge slong dug la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de sku dge slong ma'i lhung bzed dang chos gos yin na/
dedage slong ma dag ga yin te/ dge slong ma dag dbabs na/ dge slong dag ma 'chang zhig ces bka' stsal to/// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa naste/ mnyan du yod
nganadage slong gzhan zhage ljongs spyad pa spyod cade ra brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas// de khyim pa'i khyim zhagi tu dus 'das te/ de des dur khrod du bor nas lhung bzed dang chos gos
sbas te bzhag go/ dus phyi zhig nad slong ma mang zhig ljongs spyad pa sbyong cidar bregs kyi grong der phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag des de dag mthong ste/ 'phags ma bdag ga khyim
du dge slong zhage sa 'das pa'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di lags kyiso snoms shig ces smras pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma
gnadabus dge slong dbangago/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis/ dge slod dug la smasaso// dge slong dag gsi// bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong med pa de dag tuni dge slong mdag blang bar bya ste/ de la tsom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// gleng gzhi ni
mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod par dge slob mang zhago ljongs spyad pa spyod cing doban/ dedag las dge slong ma zhig nabar gyur nas de dal bus 'gro zhing phyi nas 'osapa la/
des lam stor tiri phrags kyi grogazhan zhige tuphyin nas/ de khyim pa'i khyim du dus 'dus so// des de dur khrod du bor nas lhung bzed dang chos gos spus te zhag go/ de nas dus
phyi zhig gnang gi slong mang zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin dngakhyim bdag des de dag mthong nas 'phags pa dag bdag gi khyim du dge slong ma zhig dus 'as te/
sa de'i lhung bzedadang chos gos 'di lags kyis snoms shig ces smras pa dang/ dedag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ste/ 'di gnadage slong ma
bang ngo// de ltar gyur pa dge slonga rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnadage slongs med pa de na dge slong rnams kyis blang bar bya ste/
de la the tshom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'as la/ tshedung ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun
pa dge slong zhig dus 'das te/ de dbang ba'ilhung bzed dang chos gos khyom pa'i don mchis na/ de gang dbang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang der sngar 'os pa dbang po zhes bka'
stsal to// gnyis mchis naagadadabang/ gangasngar blangs pa'o// gnyis kas blangasan gangadabang/ gang gis sngar thob pa'o// gnyis kas thob na gnyis ka dbang ngo// de sta
gnyis kas theban gangal khyim gyi bdag po dang de byin pa de dbang ngo/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa naste/ de'atshon dze tA'i tshe'anadage slong gnyis shig 'thab par gyur to/
dge slong gzhan dag gis bskor zhing 'khod de// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis de mthong nas/ de dag gis 'phags pa bdag cag gis khyim pa 'brub padag mthong yang/ bag
cig gis gcugs par bya na/ khyed cag gis ci 'di ma gcugs bskor te 'khod dam zhes smras pa dang/ den gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag nying 'thab mo byed pa yanan ci'i
phyi gcugs zhes smras pa dang/ de dag la lanamang nas cang ma zer bar 'khor de// de lta gyurapa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
dkyis de dag la bskor zhing ma 'khod par gcugs par byesangashug ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dedag gnugs kyang gtong dum btub nas// de ltar gyur pa/
dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'dus la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gzugs kyang ma btuban spang ba'alas byos shig ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan
'dus kyis sbyang ba'i sa byos shage ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dus kyi zhig na dge slong gnyis shig nges pa'i gatam byed de/ deganyisan re/ 'di ni'athob pa'o 'di na 'thob pa'o
zhes dris pa 'go tam sma ban gcig la gcig ngag rtsub po smas pa dang/ dganyis kyang dge slong dag gis spang bar las byas nas/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag/
cagan ri pa'i gtam sma ban/ gcig la gcig ngag rtsub bo sma ru zad na/ ci'i phyir khyed kyis nged gany+tsas la spang ba'i las kyis bcad ces smras pa dang/ de dag gas tsho dang ldan pa dag
N+NaM bcom ldan 'dus kyis 'thab rnams la spang ba'i las byosangashagi ces gsungs pas na/ nged kyis khyed gnyis 'bab las byas so zhes smras pa dang/ de dug cang ma bar
'khogo/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsolal dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis lo spang ba ni' sam bya bar gtsugs
bar byos shig/ de ste gnas 'cha' ba zhiginani/ de'i mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis sgo 'gi de sta rgan pa zhig na ni de la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus la rtsod pa zhi bar byos shig/ de ste
des kyang ma slonan gdod de gnyis la spang las byos shig gleng gzhi na mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa u pa las/
zhus pa/ btsun pa mtshams kyi bar du dge slong zhig dus 'dasan/ gum pa de la yo byad rnams su dbang bur 'gyur// upa la de ni mgo gang lags su bor ba'o// btsun nga
gnyis kar mgebiri nag dudabang bar 'gyur/ u pa la de gnyis ka'o/ gleng gzhi ni sgo gnyis pa ste/ tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//// mdo'on bsgrags par
bya dang shing rta dang/ de nas 'phreng ba gas rnams dang// dge 'dun gis kyang de bzhin te// mi rtsom so so'i skyo pa'o sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan du yodapan ya mtshan can du ma gnas nigashing 'khod do// gang gi tshe rom na 'das mnyan du yod par byon pa de ni
tshon mu stagasacan rnams kyi mthu nyams nas redapa chung bar gyur te/ de dag gis ji tsam 'dod pa blangs nas mu stegs su byang bya bar brtsams pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon
med zas sbyin pa chos kyis nang par sngar las nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyi'i 'grogo/ jitsam sa phyi zhige na khyim bdag mgon med pa la thas
sbyani pan pa lu sngar langs nas dze ta'i tshal du song ba dang/ mu stegs can dag tu 'dod pa blangs te/ deng bas de yang dag par bskul nas des bsams pa// 'di dag ni ngan
smaba'i chos dang/ 'dul ba 'a chu stags can dag ste/ 'do ba dag blangs te/ mu stegs can gyi bya ba byed de/ bcom ldan 'angos kyis kyang mdo sde de dang de dag las ma dad
pa dag ni dred pa phunasum tshogs par yang dag par bskul bar byosangashago/ gzhug par byosangashogi/ dgod par byos shig ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnangan
ni bdag gis skye bo mang po dag kyang dge 'dun la yon dbulaparab tudagod desnyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'as gang na ba der deng ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
ny+nyo mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ bcom ldan 'as la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
pa ngan du sgruba'i chos dang 'dul ba'amustegs can 'di dag/ca'adod pa blangs nas mu stegs su bgyi ba bgyingan/ btsem ldan 'das kyis gnang na na de dang de dag tu zhes bya ba nas//
dge 'dun la yonadabul bar dgod de zhes bya ba 'a bar du snga ma bzhade no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta nas khyim bdag rjes su gnang gis/ ci 'dodapa blangs
te/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bya ba byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da 'dod pa blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bya ba byas
shig ces bka' stsal sa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yang dag par bskul bar brtsams pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis 'phags pa dag kyang yadu dag par
bskul nan/ bdag cag khra bsod nams de bas kyang ra btumang bar 'gyur ro'os smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis kyang grogs gyis shig/
bram bre dang khyim bdag dag gis de ste bdag cag gamang nas kyang brjod nan 'igs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ pacom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag gi mang nas brjod par byes
shig ces bka' stsal nga dang/ khyim pa dag gas kyang brjod par byas nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gso di ste 'phags pa dag gis brjod na ni/ bdag cag la de bas kyang
bsod nams mang du 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gas kyang brjod par byos shig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gtsug lag
khang du 'osanas phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang du yang brjod par byos shig ces bka' stsal to// rjod par byed pa de skye bo mapo dag
gas bskor nas mi sna bar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis shing ta'i stong du 'dzegs 'a rjod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshabadang/ char pa dang/ rlung rnams byungabar
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khang bu brtsegs par byos shig ces bka' stsal to// skye bo mang bo dag gis sgo bsgribs pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/
sgo ban bod la brjod pa dang bzhi zhig nus// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa ci 'dodob bslas nas gos thung mang po// gas zung brgya stong mang po rnams sogs pa dang/
des 'di snyam du gos mang zhige tshogs kyis/ dnganang dag gsas sa rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos gsol la/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun/
ny+nyo/ rgan rims su yon dbu la 'o snyam du bsams nas/ des dze ta'i tshal gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ gos kyi 'phro bas steng kun tudabyas nas srus ma yang bzhag ste/ mdza'
Da bad/ gnyen dang/ phu nudag kyang mgron du bos so// donas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas
te dzeta'i tshal dubashes lastsanadrangs so// denang bar sngar langs te gdan bting nas bum pa chus bkang ste bzhag gnas/ bcom ldan 'as dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas te/
bshos gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa 'jig rten na yon gnas du mchis zhes zhus pa dang/ khyim bdag gnyis te// slob pa dang mi slob pa'o// de la yang
khyim bdag slob pa 'a rnam pa bco u0f7a brgyad yod do// mi slob pa 'a rnam pa dgu'o// slob pa rnam pa bco brgyad po gang zhe na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i
phyir zhugs pa dang/ rgyunadu zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs M pa dang/ mi 'ong pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang/ dad pas rnam
par grol pa dang/ ltab thob pa dang/ gong nas gong du 'gro ba dang/ tshe gcig gisaM thogs pa dang/ bar du myang n las 'da' pa dang/ skye ma thag tumya ngan las 'ad3
ba dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ gong du 'thob rnams te/
'di dag na slob pa bco brgyad ces bya'o// mi slob pa dag gabazhin/ chos bsgribs pa dang/ chos ma bsgribs pa dang/ gsad pa'i tshes dang/ rjes
su srung ba'achos dang/ mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang/ so sor rtogs nas skal ba can du mi 'gyur ba dang/ mi bskyodapa'i chos dang/ shes rab rnam par grol ba dang/ gnyis ka'i
'a/ chalas rnam par grol kha 'di ga ni mi slob pa dgu zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis de skad gsungs so/ bde bar gshegs pas nage skad gsungs nas/ ston pas yang gsu
pa / lus dang ngag yidi drang por gyur ba yi// slob dang mi slob 'jig rten 'don bzhugs// de dag sbyin zhing mchod par 'os pa ste// mchod pa'i zhing rab der byin 'bras bu che// de
'a nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa rgan rams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ brjod pa bskos nas/ 'phags pa brjod patshe 'di skadadu/ gangabcom ldan 'dras kyi nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun la sbyin pa lagis pa/ rab tu sbyin par gis pa/ thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/ phyag byabar ri pa/ ban med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing/ 'jig rten gyi yona gnas
su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la gos 'di dag 'bul gyis/ ci bder bzhes shig ces gsungs shig/ de nas dge slong rtsod par byed pa des rgan rnams kyi mdunadu 'dug la 'di skad du gson
cig/ btsun pa 'a reg 'duna rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rigs ba/ rab tu sbyin par rigs// thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa/ phyag bya bar rigs pa/
slan med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gang yin pa de dag la gsarnyed pa 'di dag 'bul gyis/ ci bde bar bzhes poshig ces brjod do// de nas dge slong 'dod
chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba gang yan pa de dag na 'osnyam du gyur to// khyim bdag mgon med bras sbyin ni 'di skad du brjod de/ gang bcom ldan
'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par rags pa/ rab tu sbyin par rigasapa/ thal mo sbyar bar rdzogs pa/ phyag bya bar dges pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing/ 'jig
rten gyi yon gnas de dag la gos redapa rnams 'bul gyi/ tsi der bzhes shig ces brjod do// bdag cag ni bla na med pa yin pas na badrag cag gas red dra 'ad dbang mod kyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dgaslong dag khyed kyis dge ba rnams na bcapar bya'o// sdig pa rnams na bsgrugs par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bdag cag gis gos rnyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid brjod pa lta ga la rung/
bdag cag na 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba'o zhes smras te cang ma zer bar 'dod// kun tusbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang
u/ 'di snyam du bla na med pa la bsngos pas na/ bdag cag na kun tu sbyor ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pas/ bdag cag na mi dbang ngosnyam du bsamasanas cang mi
ber bar 'khod do// bcing ba thams cad kyis bcings pa gang yin pa de dag ni dra snyem du/ bla na med pa la dbul la snyam du bsams nas/ de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod de// kun tu
sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dag kya cang mi zer bar 'khodade/ bdag cag na btsang ba thams cad kyis b.runges pas na/ bdag cagan thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dbang ngosnyam du
bsams nas/ de dag kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gas phul ba de dag dge slong gcig gis kyang a blangs pa dang/ de yang 'di snyam du
ba bdag la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag gis lhung bzed khas phub par ma gyur grang snyam du bsams nas/ de'i lus skya ba bse bsang po de cang skom la smub gyur nas/ bcom ldan
gang na ba der song sto drung du phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug sto/ khyim bdag mgon med
! zas sbyin gyis/ ngenadebcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasanamakhyen bzhin du 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshedang ldan kun
dga' la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas dge slong dag lags sbyar te byin natsa'i phyi'i ma blangs zhes smras pa dang/ des btsun pa khyim pas gam gnamad zas sbyin gyis 'di
skadu/ grang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun sbyin par 'gis ba/ rab tusbyin par rigs te/ thal mo sbyar bar rigs pa// phyogag pagyi bo nas// de dag nang
pa mtshibar mchis so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin brjod// de ltar na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis stsal ba dge slong gcig gis kyang ma blangs so zhes gsol pa dang/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshod ldan pa kun dga' ba la kun dag 'ab song la/ mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du sdus shig ces bka'
stsal pa dang/ btsun pa de ba zhani bgyi'ozhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/ mnyan du yod pa na dge slong nyid gnas nigag 'bod pa de dag thams cad
'dun khong du bsogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da dus la bab par dgongs shig/ mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji
snyed gnas shing mchis pa de thams cad 'dun khang du 'dusang shing tshogs so zhes de skad gsol ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun khagangan bde ga
te byon pa dang/ gdan bting bal buzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong khyed kyis khyim bdag mgon
mod bras spyin gyis gos mang po bsdus te byin na ci'i phyir ma byas zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasan mkhyen bzhin
du 'dri ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang/ kun dga' bo dge slong+ka rnams ci'i phyir mi smra bar 'khod ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa bcom
ldan 'das la yang rgyas par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsalang/ dge slong dag khyed nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsams te rab tu ma
byung ngam/ btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol to// dge slong dag de ltabs na nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsams te/ rab tu byung ba de ni pa Na phrag stong ba'i gos dang/ mi lnga
brgya yod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang/ ro sna brgyadang ldan ng 'a sa rnams rjes su gnang ngo// dge slong dag tshul khrims nyams pa dag ni dge 'dun gyi kun dab ltar brkang pa'i rting pa/
gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par ma gnang ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gong thog la ninyis pa'i dmags 'di bcu yod de/ bcugang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyis
bdag smad pa dang/ gzhan dang/ lhadang/ ston pas smad pa dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dang chos nyid kyis smad pa dang/ phyogs phyogs su sdig pa mi snyan pa'i
sgrudang/ tshigs su bcad pas grags nga dra 'gyur ba dang/ ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dang/ rtogasapa rnams nyams pa dang/ sngon thos pa'i chos rnams brje
par 'gyur ba dang/ rnam par 'gyod pa bzhin du dus byed pa dang/ lus dang bral nas sha ba'i 'og tun 'gro ngan song du log par lhung nas sems can dmyal bar skye'o// 'on kyang
dge slong gis spyad pan bzhi ste/ bdag po khyed cing yongs su spyod pa dang/ byin bas yongs su spyod pa dang/ gnang bso yongs su spyod pa dang/ bu yin gyis yongs su
spyod pa'o// de las dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bralab/ gtimug dang bral pa de dag nibadag po byed cade yongs su spyod pa'o// kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bas
pa dag ni phyin pas yongs su spyod pa'o// so so'i skye bo dag ba can bsam gtan dang/ klog pa la zhugs pa rnams n gnang bas yongs su spyod pa'o// lecan dag ni bu lon gyis
yongs su spyod pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa ni yongs su spyod pa thams cad ma gnang ngo// de lta bas redapa zhig yong na dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgo bar bya'o//
gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i chodo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// mododon bting ba dang ni ma bting dang// phyung ba dang yum phyungadang// deng zhin mtshams kyi phyi rol
gnas// thos pa yi rang bsams pas so/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs
! rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bting ba'i dge slong gas/ shan myos bzhin du brtan pa bting bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/
ungs la yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyi brtan pa 'dang ba'i tsho dge slong des dad pa byin la gnyid kyis log ste/ dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bti bar gyurtswaro// upa 'di ltar na
k+kA dge slongashin tumyos bzhin brtan ba bting bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi brtan pa shin tu myos bzhin brtan par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa la yod de/ dge slong zhig gsi/
dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bting ba'i tshodad pa byin la nyalan/ dge 'dun gyi brtan pa yang btang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bting ba shAnitu myos kyang brtan pa bting bar/
'gyur ro// u pa la de bzhin du dge slong gas dge 'dun gyi bstan pa 'di ba'i tshidad pa byin la gnyid kyis 'ag gam snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ shin tu myos kyang brtan pa bting bar
'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong ga dege 'dun gyi brtan pa 'byin ng 'a tsho myos par gyur kyang brtanapa ma byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa la yod du/ 'diltar dage slong gis dge
'dun gyi brtan pa 'byin pa 'i tshodad pa ma phyin la gnyid kyis lag gam snyoms par zhugs pa sto/ u pa la de ltan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyisabartan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myosapar gyur
kyang brtan pa ma byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi brtan pa 'byin pa'i tsho myos par gyur kyang brtan pa phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ a la yod de/ 'di
ltar dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis brtan pa 'byin pa'i tshadad pa byin la/ gnyid kyis lag gam/ snyoms par zhugs sum/ mtshams kyi nga rol tu song yang rung ste/ dge 'dun
gyis bstan pa byung ngo zhes thos te/ so nas kyang legs par byung pa'o// shin tu byung ba'o zhes rjes su yi rang bgo/ gleng gzhi ni sgol tos pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum/
ba'o/ ngo mdor na bslab pa byin dang tshu'angashing dang// gang las rnams bya ba dang// bcu gnyis rnams la slar 'khyal dang// mi gtsang ba dang
mi btsan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das// tshodang ldan pa supalas zhus pa/ btsun pa bslab pa stsalabs tshulashing brim zhing lasabagyi'i rung ngam/ u pa la mi rung ngo// ma ning dang/ ba mdang
'thaM dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang/ ba bsadapa dang/ ma bsad pa dang/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang/ mu stegs can
dang mu stegs can du song ba dang/ rkun gnas dang/ so sor gnas pa dang/ mi gnas pas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyis rung ngam/ u po la mi rung ngo// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das kyis gal las bya bde sar 'khyal na yang mi btsan no zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa gang chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyis pa de sar 'khyal na yang mi btsan
Sh+Tha par 'gyur ram/ u pa la de na btsanano/ btsun pa gang zag gis las bcu gnyis bsgos pa'i tsho/ de dag 'di skad du nged cag lam sgo 'geg rtse mchin/ ca de dag de ltar 'khyal pa
yang mi btsan nam/ u pa la btsanano// de ni sa chad pas gcad ba rnams kyi phyir bsams tegasungs so// btsunong khacom ldan 'das kyis ma gtsang ba rnams sun 'khyil na mi btsan
ni zhes gsungasan/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi gtsang ba zhes bgyi/ nub la de ni gdang la pas pham pa bzhi'i nang nas gang yarung ba zhige byung bar gyurapa ste/ de tsam kyis nam gtsang bar
'gyur ro// gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'o// ba ma dor na/ bslab pa byin dang las byidadang// kun gnas kyang ni de bzhin te//
bsnyen rdzogs mtshams kyi phyi rol tu// mngags te gtang bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyini kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa lasi zhus pa/ btsun pa las bgyid pa bslab pa stsalabs las bgyis na bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bgyis pa zhes
bgyi u pa 'a ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ slar yang bya dgos so// de bzhin du ma ni dang/ za ma dang/ ma gnas pa 'a bar du snga ma bzhin du bya'o// gleng gzhi ni
mnyan du yod pa ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig la dge sbyong zhig bstan par rdzogs par 'donas/ des bsnyen par rdzogs bar bya pa'i dge slong rnams skrun// des bsnyen par rdzogs pa ru
bya ba'i phyir/ des dge tshul pha de khrid nas dkyil 'khor du dong nas/ dadage slong dag dang lhan cig tudakyil 'khor du phyin nas/ de mtshams kyi phyi rol tu mngags te btangab dang/ de
tshodang ldan pa de rab tu'abyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong das por 'gyur ba'abar chad du gyur pa dang/ ngeltar gyur
pa dge slong dag gis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa
wa de mtshams kyi phyi rol tum mngag cig/ 'drilta ste/ dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo'i bu klu bo dbang bskur ba'i rags pa dbang ma bskur nas rgyal tshab 'thob pa de rab tu bsrung
bar bya ba dang/ rab tu bskyang bar bya ba de bzhin du/ dge slong gas bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de gang rab tu bsrung zhing bskyang ba 'dri legs so// nge lta bas na dge slong gis bsnyen
par rdzogs par 'dod pa'i dge tshul pha de ma thos pa'i nyi 'khor tsam du sngangs la/ mthong ba'i nyi 'khor tsam du thal mo sbyar te mngon du lta bzhin nag cig/ de ltar na nyes pa'i dmigs
ny+nyo su ma 'gyur ro// gleng bzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o////mdor na bzod par gsol ba byadang mtshams// sdu bsnyal ba yang de bzhin no//
'thab mo rgod pa bsngags pa dang// smad par bya dang rigs sun pa'o/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa'i ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ban bzhugs so// sangs rgyas pa tsom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa 'as zhus pa/ btsunapa bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdigs pas bgyis pas bzod par gsol/
cig ces gsungasan/ gang du bzod par gsol bar bgyi/ u pa la di na mtshams kyi nang du'o// ji ltar bzodapa ragasol bgyi/ spu langs shing rab tu langs pa las dge 'dun
'al spu nyal bar byed/ 'byung bar rtsol/ phyag 'tshal ba mngon du ston cing/ 'thab mo rgod ba de yang su gtong ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab mo rgod pa'i dge
slong dog la bsdigs pa'i los byos shage ces gsungs na/ de ste btsun pa de la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshem rangs par gyur na/ de la thabs ji lta bur bgyi/ u pa la
de yo byang dang rjes las kha cig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer cig/ kha cag gsan bar bur gyi snod dag khyer la phyi rol tu phyung ste bor cig/ de sta ka ba la 'jun yang ka ba chod cig/ de ste
sgo skyes la 'junu yang sgo skyes phyung la/ de la ngo zlog ma phod pa ma byed cig/ de slar sus bcos par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyis so// su la bcos pa'i yo byad dgug/ sbyin bdag la
slongs la/ de ste ma 'byor na dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor las byos shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ de sta btsun pa dge slong ma zhig 'thab mo rged par gyur na/ de la yang bsdigs pa'i
las bgyi 'am/ u pa ladi la yang bsngags pa las bya'o// de lta ma rangs par gyur na/ the tsam ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no//
btsun pa de ste dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul pha dang/ dge tshul ma zhig 'thab mo rgod par gyur na/ de dag la yong bsngags par bgyi 'am/ dol the tsom du ma byed cig ces bya
'a bar du snga ma bzhin no// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshigs sun pa'i dge slong la bskud pa'i 'os byos shig ces gsungasan/ de sta btsun pa de la bskud pa las
zla bgyid pa'i tsho/ de ma las par gyur na/ de la ji ltar bgyi/ u pa 'di la yo byang rnams zhes bya ba nas/ the tshom ma byed cig ces bya pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du
la dge slong mas rigs sun pa dang/ dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul pa dang/ dge tshul ma dag la yang bskrad pa'i las bgyi 'am/ de la the tshom ngu ma byed cige ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma
lce bzhin no// gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/// 'dul ba gzhung dam pa//// bam ro so gsum pa//
btsunapa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong skyod cig ces gsungasan/ sus bskrad par bgyi/ den dge 'dun gyis bskrad par bya'o// de'i yo byad
las ka cig ga ni lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer/ kha cig gis ni bar bur gyi snod dag khyer te phyil tu phyung la pe cig/ de ste ka ba la 'jus na ka ba chod cig/ so skyes 'jus nasgo
skyes kyang byulo/ de la ngo zlog ma phod par ma byed cig/ sur sus bcos par bgyi/dge 'dun gyis so// 'chos pa'i yo byadabul sa dgus// yonabangag la bskul lo//
sa kyang ma 'byin/ dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor gyis slar bcos par bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong la ji lta bar/ dge slong ma dang/ dge
slob ma dang/ dge tshul pha dang/ dge tshul ma dag kyang de bzhin no/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa la smod par byed pa'i dge slong de lasar bsdum pa'i las byos shig
ces gsungasan/ btsun pa de ste dge slong mas kyang khyim pa 'a smad ng gyur na/ del yangesarab sdum pa'i las bgyi nam/ upa' de 'a yang slar bsdumo par las byed du chug
cig/ dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul pha dwang/ dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no// btsun pa bcomaM ldan 'das kyis duge slong gis khyim pa la sbyang na/ slor bsdum pa'ilas byed
du chug cig ces gsungs na/ dge slong gis dge slong la smad n de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi 'am/ apa la de la yang slar bsdum pa las bya'o// dge slong gas dge slong/
[P69 ]@#/ ma dang dge slobam dang/ dge tshul phadang/ dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o// dge slong mas dge slong mdang/ dge slong dang/ dge slob ma dang/
tshe dge tshul pha dang/ dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o// dge slob mas dge slob ma dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge tshul pha dang/ dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o// dge tshul
'a sa dge tshul pha dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o// dge tshul mas dge tshul ma dang/ dge slong dang dge
slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o// de ltar 'kher lebazhin rgyas par brjod do// gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun/
pa'o mdor na/ dge tshul dag dang bsdigs pa dang// lnga las nyung ba ma gnas dang// u pa las ni ji ltar dris// nub mo lnga yang byin pa'o/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus mnyan du yodapa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'drasal/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus
ba btsun pa dge slong gis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa 'dage tshul la bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyenang ra rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes ]
