bgyi/ u nga la bsnyon par ni rdzo gas mod kyi/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa 'das po dang bcas pa'o// bzod pa ni gsol ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'do
lnga yon la/ chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan na/ gnas ma bcas kyang ljongs spyad pa spyod du gnang ngozhes gsungasan/ btsun pa 'bazhi yin la/ chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan na/ de'ang
gnasam bcas pa ljongs spyod pa spyodadu gnang dram/ ul gnang ngo// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ la lnga ma lon pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro// de ste lo drug gam 'apod len la/ de yang chos
lnga dang ma ldan na/ de gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyad ng spyod du gnang dam/ u pa la ni gnang ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ldadang ldan par bya ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa dge slong bsnyan
par rdzogs nas lo gsum lon la/ de yang sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ gig pa gsum dang ldan ng/ dri ma gsum dang bran/ de yang gzhan la gnas bca' bar bgyi 'am/
upa 'di yang de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bcas pa'i tshul du bya ba'i phyir// ji srid du gnas ma bcas pa la red pa stsal bar bgyi/ u pa la de mang na yang zhag lnga'i bar du
sta yang gnas bcar ba tshol na'ang sbyor ba ma btang ba'o// gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mde'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o//
tshadagazung du yang med pa dang/ bcas pa dang na mo bcas pa// de bzhin ming dang rigs kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan duyod/
ba'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa nongs pa mthun pa zhes kyang
bgyi/ mi mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa nongs pa mthun pa gang lags/ mi mthun pa gad lags/ u pa la pas bum pa rnams ni pas pham par mthun gyi/ gzhan dangami
mthun pa'o// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ni dge 'dun gyi lhag mar mthun no// ltung pa ni ltung bar mthun no// so sor bshags pan so sor bshags par mthun no// nyes byas na nyes byas
su mthun no// btsun pa nongs pa tshad dang ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi/ nongs pa tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes kyang bgyin/ btsun pa tshad dang ldan pa ni gang lags/ mi ldan pa ni gang lags//

u pa 'gong zhag ga dang nyes pa'i mtha'adran par gyur pa ste tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gang zhag dang nyes pa'i mtha' mi dran par gyur pa de ni tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes bya'o// btsun patshungasung
bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyi/ ma bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyin/ btsun pa bcabs pa gangalags/ ma bcabs pa gangalags/ u pa li ji ni rnam pa gnyis kyis bcabs pa ste/
sems kyis btabs pa dang/ zhag tu babs pa'o// del zhig tubatabs pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcabasapa'o// sems kyis bcabs pa gang yin pa bcabs pa zhes bya'o// btsun
panangos pa rnams kyi ming dang rus zhes bgyi ba/ btsun pa mngegangalags/ rus gang lags/ u pa lapasu pham pa rnams ni ming ngo// de las byung ba ni nus so// dge 'dun gyi
lhag ma zhes bya pan mong ngo// de las byung ba ni rus so/ ltung ba dang so sor bshags pa dang nyes byas rnams ni ming ngo// de las byung ba ni nus so// gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mngo'i
tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o/// mdapono rtsa ba pa chadapas bcad pa dang// bslab pa byin la mi spyad de// de dag la ni dang mi sbyin// dge slong byed dang mi len
ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa ta'i tshalamagon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag dge 'dun gyi lhagamanyes pa byung bar
gyur nas/ de dag chad pas bcad pa dang/ de dgar ba'anang dudakyil 'bar byas nas chad ba byed do// de dag la dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dug ca zhige khyed/ de dag gso smras pa/
chod pa byed zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis 'di ni slar bcangs pa yin gyi chad pa ma yin no zhes smras pa dang/ de dag spa gong nas cang ma zir bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong
[za]@#// dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gang nadage slong gcig pu gnas pa der chad pa las ma byed cig ces bka' stsal/
tong gang du dge slong gnyis sam gsum gnas pa der yang dge slong dag gisachad pa'i lasam byed cig/ gang na dge slong bzhi 'am de las lhag pa yang rung gnas pa der dge slong dag gis chod nga
dang gzhi nas bslang ba'i chodapa dang/ gzhi nas slar bsrung ba dang/ yid mgu bar bya bdang/ gzhi nas yid mgu bar bya ba dang/ gzhi nas slar bslangs te yid mgu ba dag/
sna byes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang nadage slong bzhi'am de las lhag par gnas pa de dag tu dge slong gis chadabudang/ gzhi nas bslang ba'i chedapa dang/ gzhi nas slar bslang ba
dang yadu mgu bar bya ba dang// gzhi nas yid mgu bar bya ba dang/ gzhi nas mar bslang ba dag kyang byos shig ces bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag las bslab pa byin pa'i
dge slong ba la chad pa byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la yang chad pa byed du ma gnang ngo// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bslab pa byin
pa'i ngo ge slong bzhi pachang pa byed du ma gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis bslab pa khyen pa gsum dang/ tshul bzhin gnas pa gcig la byed do// bslab pa byin pa gnyis
dang tshul bzhin gnas pa gnyis la byed do// bslab pa phyin pa gcig dang/ tshu'abazhin gnas pa gsum la chad pa byed de// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang// bslab pa byin pa bzhi la yang chad pa ma byed cig/ bslab pa byin pa gsum dang/ tshul bzhin gnas pa gcig la
yang ma byed cige/ bslab pa byin pa gnyis dang/ tshul bzhin gnas pa gnyis 'a yang ma byed tsag/ bslab pa byin pa gcig dang/ tshul bzhin gnas pa gsum la yang chadapa ma byed
par/ yongs su dag pa bzhi'o// de las mang ba rnams la chad pa byos shig/ chad pa bcad pa pa ji lta bar gzhi nas bslang pa'i chad pa dang/ chad pa gzhi nas slar bsang ba dang/
yidamag bar byed pa dang/ gzhi nas bsangs te yid mgu bar byed pa dang/ gzhi nas slar bsang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
tshe dang ldan pa u pa lasi zhusang// btsun pa bslab pa stsal ba la dad pa stsal du rung ngam/ u pa 'a na rung ngo/ tshos 'di la reg nan rung ngo// btsun pa bslab pa stel ba 'os
dad pa blang du rung ngam/ u pa la di la dge slong du 'dushes bzhag na gdod rung ngo// gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu rdzogs te/ sgo gnyis pa rdzog so////
mdor bsdus par na/ dkyil 'khor lhung bzed dugs khang dang/ dud pa btung dngular por dang// lcags skashing rta'i lte ba dang// gdungs shing skyonam mchod rten no/
mdo na 4 dkyil 'khor lha yi gnas dang ni// phyed gsum dang gnas mi 'cha'// lhung bzed med pa rarab tu byung// lhung bzed layang mi bri
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong ngag gis gar bab bab tu lhung bzed
bkrus pa dang/ sa phyogs der sbrang ma dag gis gang snya ma sdug par gyur pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas/ 'phags pa dag gis phyogs 'di'i bshang gci bgyis sam zhes//
smras pa dang/ de dag gis bzhin bzas 'dir bshang gci rig na sus kyang ma byas kyi/ nged kyi lhung bzed bkrus so zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis 'phags pa khyed kyis 'di'i dkyil

'khor bya ba'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang/ de dag snga gong nas cang ma zir bar 'dug go/ de dag 'apra sti dge sbyongashAkya'i bu dag ni mi gtsang ba ste/ gar bab bab tu lhung bzed 'khru'o zhes smras pa/
dang de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya baniyus kyis/ debasen gar
bab bab tu lhung bzed ma bkru ban ]dge slong dag gis lhung bzed gang du bkrus pat+ti gnas der dkyil 'khor byas shis ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor byos
gi se/ces gsungasanas/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed bkrus pa'i gnas der dkyil 'khor zlum po byas pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te/ gnas
kyi ba na mar dkyil 'khor yod pa dag mthong nas/ kye 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang/ kha cig gis yang kyi 'di lta la shes par byar du yod/ drage sbyongashAkya'i bu dag ni nyi ma la dang po nas
smras so// gzhan dag gis skye de bzhi te/ dge sbyongashAkya'i bu dag ni nyi ma la dad pa bden no zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na ma 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyi ma 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ma byed cig ces gsungs pa/
dang dge slong dag gis zla ba kham pa 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor byas so// der bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gsi yang gtsug lag khang du lhags nas/ kyi dge sbyongashAkya'abu dag ni zla bal
dad do zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bsan zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ya
ma byed cig/ ngag slong dag gru bzhir byed pa la zhugs pa dang/ gtsug lag khang der bram ze dang khyim bdag dag yang lhags nas// kyang g sbyongangashAkya'i
bu dag na ba gleng la dang do zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas
nadakyil 'khor gru bzhi dang rnam pa gnyis ltar ma byed mdung rtse dang rdza 'dra bar byosashig ces bka' stsal nas/ drage slong rnams de si bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal/ ba glang ga lci po rnamaM/ sa 'am/ chus byug par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis byasoshig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge
slong dag gis sangs rgyas dang/ tshesadang/ dge 'dun la de 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis byas te/ des mag du bar gyur pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom
N+NaM ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkon mchog gsum la ni ma 'am/ zla ba 'am/ ji ltar dad pa rnam pa thams cad bya ste/ de la
the tsam ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapan ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sbyin par byed pa dang/
sbyin pa'i bdag pos gtor ma len pa'i lha dga' rnam pa gsum gyis dus dus su yang dag par mgu bar bya/ yang dag par mchod par bya/ yang dag par bde bar bya'o// gsum gang
zhin/ dus dus su gtsang ma'i bya bad dang/ dus dus su gtor ma'i las kyang byed/ dus dus su sbyin pa'i yon kyang bsngo'o// dge slong dag sbyin par byed pa dang/ sbyin bdag
gis gtor ma len pa'i lha dag la dus dus su yang dag par mgu bar bya/ yang dag par mchodang ra bya/ yang dag par bde bar byas na sbyin par byed pa dang/ sbyin bdag rnams la yid bde
bas slar brtse bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skadabaka' stsal pa dang/ bdengar gshegs pas nage skad gsungs nas// yang ston pas gsungs pa// skyes bu gang
thagadad pa dag/ gang gis lha rnams mchod byed pa// ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de la bsngags// sa phyogs gang na shes rab can// mkhas pa
tshul khrims ldan 'khedang// bzhes gsol spyani rab bsgrags par bya// de dag rjed ngas brjed par 'gyur// mchod par byas pas mchod par 'gyur// de nas 'di la snying brtse ba//
mas ji lus bskyed bu la bzhin// lhas brjes brtse ba'i mi rnams kyis// bde zhing bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu gang brag la dad pas lha rnams la
mchod na ston pa 'baka' bzhin byas pa yin te/ sangs rgyas dag gis kyang bsngags so zhes gsungs pa dang/ drug sde dag gis ba'i lhadang/ nags
tshal gyi lha dang/ bzhi mdo'i lha dang/ sum mdo'i lho dang/ 'jig rten gyi ma dag la sogs te thams cad mchod pa byed pa dang/ dadapa' bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dad pa rnams
'tshakaM 'apagasapa 'di dag dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'darab tu byung na/ 'ad ltar gnod nga sha dang/ khrag dang/ rkangadang/ tshil dag tha zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dag lamacho de/
bdag cag dge bsnyen gyis kyang rang du sbasan/ 'di dug ni mchod por byed de zhes nyes pa ngor rjod/ 'phyas 'dogasangashing ma snyan par 'a nas/ de dag dge slong dag gis bzlog pa dang/
ts+tshA ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa drag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni gang skyes bu gang zag dad pa dag gis lha drag la mchod par byas na/ ston pa'i bka' bzhin du byas pa yin te/ sangs rgyas ngag
T+Tha gis kyang bsngags so zhes ma gsungs sam/ ci nged cag dad pa ma yin nam/ ci'i phyir na mi mchod ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'dus lagasol
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ngas khyim pa dag la dgongs te gsungs kyi/ dge slong dag la ma yin gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gas lha rnams
0 la mchod par 'byed cig/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis dge slong dag lha rnams la mchod par ma byed ces gsungs pa dang/ drug sde dag gis de dag la gnod par byed pa la zhugs pa dang/
ngage slong de dag gi rmalam du nged kyis nyes pa ci byas na/ nged laganod par byed ces ston to// bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa dag kyang/ 'phags pa rnams 'di dag gis khyed cag la gnod
bcazhig byas na/ 'di dag ma rung bar byed ces 3phya'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la mchod par yang ma
byed/ gnod par yang ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde dag lam du zhugs te 'dod ba'i tshe/ lha dag bag rten mthong ba dang phyol te lam mtho dman dang/ tshor ma can du dong
ba dang dge slong ba ci na'ijag mas gnod/ khacig ni tsher ma zug/ kha cig na 'greng nas lhud do// de ltar gyur pa dge slong ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam byel tem 'dong bar lam drang por deng la/ lha dag gi rten la sogel gyi sgra phyung la/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad brlag par
bya ste/ de la the tshom ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'as
kyis lhan cig spyod pa dang/ nyi gnas kyis dge slong gis/ mkhan po dang slob dpon la dus gsum dultar song zhig ces gsus pa/ mtshams chen/
bo yang dpag tshad phyedadang gsum du chodatsagi ces gsusan/ btsun pa de ltar slob dpon dang mkhan podapag tshad phyed dung gsum nAmachis na de dag gis ji ltar mchi/ ur la/

dengag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing ltasong zhig/ de lta de dag rgyang grag lnga gnas nid dug gis zhag bdun nam brgyadatsang ltar song zhagi/ de tshun chad ni ji ltar sasultar so zhig/ 'dom lnga brgya na gnas ni ni/
dedag gdus gsum du ltasong zhig/ de lta ma song na 'das bdudang bcas par 'gyuro/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapan ste/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig 'ongs
nas des de lhung bzed med par rab tu byung ngo// de'i tshe na dge slong dag gas lhung bzed bkrus nas lhung bzed gzhag pa'i sar bzhag ste mchod rtel phyag byas nas bdag
gi lhung bzed blangs te zas babra' ba'i gnasaMsu 'khod do// gang gi tshadage slong dgi zas za ba'i tshelhung bzod dag bkrus nas mchod rten la phyag byed pa la zhugs pa dang/ gsaradub
tubyung ba de yang de dgadang lhan cig tu phyag byas nas/ gang ga tshodage slong dag mchod rten la phyag byas te lag pa bkrus pa dang/ gsabu rab tu byung ba des kyang gnasabartan kun
shes ko'u danu'i lhung bzed blangs pa dang/ sa de slar bzlog go/ de nas gang po dang/ ming chen dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi budang/ 'od sus
dang kun dga' bo dang/ rab ti la sogs pa'i lhung bzed blangs te/ dedag gis kyang slar bzlog pa dang/ de mchimasu mig gangabazhin du phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 'dod chags/
dang ma bral ba'i dge slong dag 'di ltar lhung bzed med par-isus rab tu phyung zhes 'phyas 'dogs so// kha cig gsi ni nyi dga' ba yin no zhes smras nas/ de dag gis nyes pa sbom po la sbyod ba
de ma gtogs pas gzhan su zhig de ltar byed ces smras pa dang/ ltar gyur pa dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dge slong 'di rnams 'phya ba na yus te/ de bsan dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed med par rab tu mdabyungabar/ dang por lhung bzed dgashoms la/ gdod rab tu phyung zhig/ de ste
mi 'byor na bdag gi lhung bzed chung ngu byin cig/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed med par rab tu phyung na 'ongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi'i munyan du yod
ban ste/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la nye gnas gzhon nu lhung bzed 'dzin pa zhig yodapa ngesaM/ de'i lhung bzed dang bdag gi lhung bzed gnyis bkrus te/ lhung bzed de gnyis
kyang 'drapa zhig nas/ bdag gi gang yin slob dpon gyi gang yin pa mi shes nas/ phyi zhig nas des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzed la slob dpon/
ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzed ces yi ge bris so// de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams khyim du bshos la sbyin drangs
'a te khyim bdag de 'asngon yongs su spyad pa'i smad 'tshong ma zhig yodade/ sa de la yang bzang mo ngas sangs rgyas la sogs par ngage slong gi dge 'dun dag bshes la spyan dus kyis//
khyod kyang tshungashog la rang gi lag gis kyang bris par byos shig ces spring ba dang/ de yang brel ba'i rkyen zhig byung nas rer ma 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'dras dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag
tsho bshos gsol/ sbyin rabs gsungs nas sla bzhud pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzeng 'dzin pa'i gzhonand/ khyim de nyid du lhung bzang bkrus te 'gro'i snyam/
dubasams nas 'dug pa dang/ khyim bdag des 'ang gas pa lhung bzeng sang cagi g.yar/ mdza' ba zhig la lhung bzeng kyi lhag ma zhig bskur ro zhes smras pa dang/ des bdag gi ni ma
byin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i lhung bzeng byin pa dang/ khyim bdag des de'i nang du bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang mas bkang nas smad 'tshong ma de la bskur te/ 'phrin du bzang mo ngas/
ni ba zas 'di lta bu s sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshim par byas kyis/ khyod kyis de la rjes su yi rang ba skyed cig ces spring ngo// des kha zas de dag byob dang/ lhung/
bzed kyi zhabs la yi ge 'jug pa mtho sa da nga gyad pa na skal ba brgyad la mkhas// 'bakags pa ngang tshangang phyirab mnyags pa'i
da/ da ba ra na da aphashas/ bud med kya pun rnam pa bco brgyad la mkhas te/ des bklags pa dang/ tshongang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i mang mthong nas nges 'ang snyam du
bdag gis 'phags pa lha dang mis mchod pa'i lcebazed de 'di bzhin du bskur ba'i mi rigs so snyam du bsams nas/ sa lhung bzed de dris phyis te/ de nas me tog bsung zhim ngos
bka dn gnas khri'u tshon gyis bris pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ de'i drung du btung nas spros kyis bdug cing 'dug pa dang/ de na skyes pa gzhan zhig kag shapa Nalnga brgya dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng
bdag khyer te de'idrung du 'ongs nas/ bzang mo ci byed kun tu spyod kyis 'dang ngozhes smras pa dang/ lhung bzed la mchod pa byas skung cig sdod cig/ nges lhung bzed 'jigang nas 'ongs/ su'i
yin zhes smras pa dang/ mos ji ltar gyur pa zhib tusmras so// des khyod kyis ya mtshan can thams cod dag la yang sbyin pa gtong ste/ rab tu byung ba dag kyang mngashor ro zhes smras pa dang/
dadage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa// dge slong gang mi bri ba bris pa de ni rkyes pa'i dmigs 'gyur gyis
de bas na dge slong dag mi bri ba ma 'drizhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la mi sring ma 'dri zhig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis gang ma brib mngeshes nas// bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa// mkhri ba rnam pa lnga sU/ so sor thar pa thams cad dang/ so sor thar par ldan pa dang/ 'dul ba thams cad dang/ 'dul ba tham cad du ldan dang/ gang
bag so so'o// mtshan ma can du bya ba nanyis med do// gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o////mdor na dge tshul gyisan lhung bzedabacag/
lhung bzed ji ltar bsreg par bya// bsreg 'gebs gnang bar bya ba ste// drung srong chen pos rjes su gnang/ ]sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
N+NaM skyabs med pa la thus sbyin pa'i kon draga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ dge slong gzhan zhig gi deg tshul pa lhung bzed 'dzin pa de las lhung bzed 'khrur bcug pa dang/ dge tshul pa de yang dran pa/
nyobar gnas pa ma yin pa zhig nas de'i lag nas lhung ste chag go/ dge slong de 'phongs par gyur te/ u0f38de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom lda/
'das kyis dgongs pa// dge slong dag gang cung zad dge slong dag gis dge tshul la lhung bzed 'khrur bcug na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/ de bas dge slong drag gse dag de tshul pa dug la/
lhung bzed 'khur ma gzhug cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed dge tshul pa 'khrur ma gzhug cig ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pal ri'i bu'i dge tshul pa tsun da zhes bya
ba lhung bzed 'dzin te/ des mkhan po lhung bzed tshur stsol cag bkru'o zhes smras pa dang/ des bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gnas bcas te/ dge slong gis dge tshul ngo
ngag la lhung bzed 'khrur ma gzhug cig ces gsungs sa/ nganying 'khrus khyod pa'i o bzhi ge ces smras pa dang/ des mkhanapo ci bangag gis kyang nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ram zhes smras
pa dang des bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras ni chos kyi bdag po bsanangasaji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das 'a gsol nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ dge tshul pa dran pa nye bar gnas pa de dag ni 'khrur gzhug ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na
ste dge slong dag lhung bzed du gzan byas nas de yang ma bcos pas btsas khyer nas rdol lo// de ltar gyurapadage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan s
dkyis bka' stsalapa// lhung bzed sreg pa byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzedasrogs shig ces gsuanas/ dge slong dag gas lhung bzed shing gis
bsregs pa dang/ lhung bzed ma rung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyisangashing gis srogapar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis rtswa dang sog ma dag gisi g.yogasate
bsregs pa dang/ de@de nyes pa'i dmigasaMsu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa dang sog mas g.yogs te sreg par ma byed cig ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bsrog
par bya ba mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi bsreg 'gebs sbyor zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gas lhung bzed kyibasrog 'gebs ji ltar sbyor ba mngeshesanas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsapa/ bsrog cigabs rnam pa gnyis te/ slob dpon gyis byas pa dang/ bdag gis byas pa'o// de la slob dpon gyis byas pa ni bum pa lta bu 'o//
N+NaM bdag gis byas pa na phub 'am rdza ma yang rung ste/ thal pas bkang la rdza ma tsam ldan par gyis shig ces bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag gis gyo mo'i nang du ngo bzhin du bsregs pas de
nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi la tuni 'jim pa dang phub marab sresapas yugasal/ nang du tigyi tshagis ma 'am ba glang gi
bas yugs te/ de skams pa dang sa gzhi byi bdar gyis la// 'og tuphub ma 'am til gyi tshigs mdang/ gzhan yang byad bzang du 'gyur ba dag thung ste/ rtswa dang/ rtsa ba dang/
sog ma dag gis g.yogs la/ tsanes dud pa ma shar bar byos la srogasang/ de'i g.ya'agayo chag chag thob la skyang nul gyis shig/ tsa nas srog chags dag bang bar bya ba'i
phyir ro// bsregs pa de grangs nga dang lhung bzid phyung la khrus te/ nam kha dag zhin par gyuragyi bar du srog par gyis shig/ de bas na lhung bzed kyi srog 'gebs dang yo byad dag rjes su gnang
ngo gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad gnyis pa'o/// mdor na/ gcig la gcig dang dugs khang dang// khyim pa ba gsum pa de bzhin te// gdang
ba dang ni de bzhin sgra// lcagis byas pa kun thos pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
mnyan du yod pan khyim bdagagazhan zhig gis/ dge 'dun gyi phyir dugs khang zhig byas so// de nas drug sde dag gis gsog dus smad g.yogs byas te/ gcig la gcig 'dus byed cing
'khod pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag phyogs der lhags pa dang/ de dag gis de mthong nas/ kyi 'di lta bu dag tu byed pa su zhig ces smras pa dang/ den kha cig mu stegs can de dag/
yin no zhes smras/ yang kha cig gis 'di dag na mu stegs can ma yin gyi/ dge sbyongashAkya'i bu'o zhes smras pa dang/ de dag 'phya ba la zhugs te/ kyi
kyi ston pa ni tshe dang ldan na/ ci'i phyir 'di dug ngo tshab da la med ces smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das/
'a kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni sa kyis/ de lta bsan dge slong dag dugs khang du gos gcig pu gyon te/ gcig la gcig las ma byed
lce tsage/ dge slong dag gis gos gcig pu gyen te gas khang du las byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ mnyan du yod pa na
khyim bdag gzhan zhig gas/ dge 'dun gyi phyir dugs khang 'go byas pa dang/ der dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyis byugs te/ rkang pa la reg gos mgo bo la reg/ mgo ba la reg
nas kha la reg/ kha la reg nas lag pa dang nad pa la reg nas/ slar yang kha la reg cing/ gas ngan pa zhig gis smad g.yogs te 'dug pa dang/ ji tsam zhig na khyim pa ma
dad pa zhag phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des dge slong dag mthong bdang/ de 'phya ba la zhugs tedage sbyongashAkya'i bu dag ni mi gtsang bste/ rkang pa la reg pa kha la reg par byas nas
ges ngan pas smad g.yogs byas te/ gcer bur skye bo dag gi nang na 'dug go zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slongangag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas// bcom
ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram bi dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya bani yus kyis/ de bas na dugs khang du khyim pa ma gzhug cig/ ma dad pa yang las byed du ma
gzhug cig/ dugs khang gi sgo ba dge slong rnams bskos la/ de dag gis khyim pa dag nang du ma gtong zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dugs khang du khyim pa ma gtong zhig/ las kyang
byed du ma gzhug cig ces gsungs pa dang/ de nas dus phyi zhig na dugs khang du zhugs pa'i tshe/ khyim bdag mgon med bas sbyin der 'os pa dang/ dge slong sgo bas smras pa// khyim
bdag nung du ma 'gro bar 'dug ci'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dugs khang du ma gtong zhig ces bka' stsal to// des 'phags pa dag/ da kho bo yang gzhan du 'gyur ram// kho
bos ni nges par 'phags pa ngag gi las bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ gangadad pa dag ni dugs khang du thong la las kyang byed du chug cig/ ngo la the tsom du ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa dag ni dugs khad du thong la las kyang byed du chug cig
klu/ ces gsungs pa dang/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang du 'gro ban/ de dang lhan cig tu bram ze zhig kyang 'ongs nas/ dem btang ba dang nges
'phags pa ci'i phyir khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nanang du btangal/ bdag ni mi gtong zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong gis de la snas pa/ bram ze khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
'a/ ni dadapas na nang du btang ngo// des smras pa// 'o na bdag kyang dadapar gyur nanang du gtong ngam zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste dad par gyur nanang du mthong zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gsang skyabs gsum du btang nas nang du nga tang ngo// nges nga dge slong dag
kangang la reg nas kha dang mgo la reg tsang/ gis ngan pas smad g.yogs nas sgren mor 'dug pa mthong ba dang/ dri ma dad de 'phya ba zhugs so// dge sbyongashAkya'i bu na mo gtsang
Sh+Tha ba ste/ rkang la reg pa kha dang mgo 'al reg cing/ gos nungs snyadagayogs nas sgren mor 'dug ga zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur nga japa slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsolanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalang/ de lta bas na rab dad pa dag ni dugs kha ga ma yathong zhag/ dang pa chung bdag ni ma gtong zhig/
bam po so bzhi ngeng/// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yodapa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis// sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag dugs/
khang du spyan drangs te/ dge slong dag nang du zhugs pa dang/ den dgyilatsam pa'i dge slong zhig gis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dege slong zhig la las byed cing 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis kyang nang du gshegs nas des las byed pa gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'dras kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyed cag gis dge slong 'ongs las byed pa mthong ngam/
btsun pa mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang/ dge slong las byed pa 'di ni degra bcom pa phrag pa zad pa'o// gang la las byapa 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa/ sdig pa'i chos can/ khong rul ba/
zags pa/ gsog tu gyur pa/ dung sgra lta bur spyod pa/ ge slong ma yin pa/ dge sbyong du yi dam 'dzin pa/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa// tshangs par spyod par yi dam 'dzin pa ste/ de bas
dge slong dag seng ge lta bu s wa 'dra ba'i las ma byed cig/ byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge 'dra bas wa lta bu'i las med cig ces bka' stsal
pa dang/ mnyan duyodapa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te// de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do// de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yos/
su spyod pa las/ dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang bu btsas nas bu pho zhig byung ste/ de gzug
legs pa/ blta na sdug cing mdzes pa// yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas mang btags so// debasris bskyod nas cher
'a gyurapa dang/ de dus phyi zhige na dze ta'i tshal du song ste/ legs par gsungs pa chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ de mdzod gsum dang ldan par gyur te des 'di snyam du/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag pu'i pha man dka' bar bya ba byed du/ phan par byed pa'o// gso bar byed pa// skyed par byed pa'o// nu zho snunapar byed pa'o// 'dzam bu gling sna
tshogs pa ston par byed pa yanati/ bus phrag pa gcig la ni ma/ gnyis la na de khyer te/ la brgya tshang gi bar du khyer ram/ yang na sa gzhi chen po nor bu dang/ mu tig dang//
T+Tha brgya dang/ dung dang/ shel dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ as ma gar pa dang/ sdug dang g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba de lta bu dag gi dbang por bcug gam/ dbang
phyug tubcug kyang des ni pha dang ma la bus phan btags pa 'am/ nyo bar phan btags par ma 'gyur gyi/ gangags pa dngam dad pa med pa la dad pa phun sum tshogs par byas sam/ ]
yang dag par bskul lam/ dul bar byas sam/ 'jug par byas sam/ so sor bkod dam/ tshul khrims ngan nga las tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par/ ser sna can
las gtong ba phun sum tshogs par/ shes rab 'chal pa las shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par bskul/ dul bar byas/ zhugs par byas/ so sor bkod na/
de lta bu ni bus pa dang ma phan btags pa dang/ nye bar phan btags par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so snyam du bsaMms nas/ bdag gis kyang ci nas pha ma la phan btags pa nyung
zad cig bya'o snyam nas/ jisrid dga' ba'i bar du longs spyod cing 'dug nas// mnyan du yod pa gang na ba de'agasasu longs spyod cing song ngo// mthar gyis spyad pa spyodatsang mnyan
du yod par ngan te// des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gnas la rab tu bkadod do// de nas dus phyi zhig na des pha ma'i drung du nor las bsod nams su bya ba'i dngos po bdun
po'i yon tan rgyas par brjod pa dang/ des 'phags pa bdag gsad kyang nor sna bdun la byas pa'i bsod nams kyings po cung zad cig bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ sa bgres po de
bzhin legs kyis gyis shig ces smras pa dang/ ci zhig bya/ dugs khang gyis shig/ des dugs khang byas te khyim bdag de rang gi dugs khangedu rang gis las bya ba la zhugs te
shin tul bar gyur nas/ bkru ba'i yo byad dang/ 'bru mar dang phya la sogs pa mang du lhag go/ de nas des bu bdug rab tu 'bar gyur gyis/ pa'i
rgyab cung zhag nyesashig ces smras pa dang/ des yab bcom ldan 'das kyis seng gi lta bu s rtsa lta bu dag la bsnyen bkur ma byed cig ces bka' stsal te ma gnang ngozhes smras pa dang/
sa bu seng ge gang/ wa gang zhes smras pa dang/ yab bdag nisi gi dang 'dra/ khyod ni wa dang 'dra'o// bu de ci'i phyir zhes smras pa dang/ yab bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan
na pa'o/ khyod ni tshul khrims nganapa dang ldan pa'o// bu de ltar pha dang 'dra ba nga lta bu las/ seng ge dang 'dra ba khyod lta bu skyes sam zhes smras pa dang/ deltar gyur pa dge slong dag/
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol// dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag paremagu bar byed/ yang dang par mchod par
byed/ yang dag par bde bas skyong bar byed pa'i rigs de ni tshangs pa dang bcas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu pha ma la chos bzhin byed pani tshangs pa zhes bya'o// dge slong
ngag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni slobadapon dang bcas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rigs kyi bu pha ma la chos bzhin byas na/ slob dpon lta bur 'gyur ro// dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang
dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed pa' gis de na sbyin par rigs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu pad ma la chos bzhin du byas na sbyin par rigs pa'o// dge slong dag ragis
gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byedu/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed n rigs de ni mi dang bcas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu
pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na me lta bu 'o// dge slong dag rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed
na ragegs de na lha dang bcas pa// de ci'i phyir zhan/ rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na lha lta bur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skadu bka' stsal pa dang/ badro bar
gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas yang gsungs pa// pha dang ma gnyis tshangs pa ste// slob dpon snga ma 'ang de bzhin no// ji ltar ma yi lha bran bzhin// bu yi sbyin
pa'i gnas yin no// de bas de gnyis phyag bya zhing// bya bar bya zhing pa khru ba dang// rkang pa gnyis kyang bkru bar bya// de bzhin mkhas pas bsnyen bkur bya// yang na bza' babatung
ba dang bgo ba mal stan de bzhin te// des ni pha dang ma gnyis la// mkhas pas bsnyen bkur bcas byed na// 'dire na mnar bar mi 'gyur te//
sa song nas mtho si dga' bar 'gyur// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde de gsungs pa de'i tshon/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad
[]sgo gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dras kyis pa dang/ ma dang bla mal na romi gre bgyid pa'i yon tanabarjod pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zhus
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di la ci gi ngo mtshar cher yod/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug
med skyo ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ na ba dang 'tshe ba dang/ mya ngan dang smo sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams med bzhin
du pha ma dngadzami gro bya ba'i yon tan brjod pa bas/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas/ skye ba dang bcas// go ba dang/
na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs sum grol ban yang/ ma la gnod
00pa cung zhig byas nas sdug bsngal chen po rjes su myong ngo// phan pa cung zad cig byas nas kyang bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur te/ de dag legs par shin tu yid la byas shig dang/ bshad
par bya'o// sngon byung ban dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer lha ra NA sa na ded dpon mdza' bo zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang/ longs spyod che ba/ gnas rgya che zhing yangs pa
'ag ste/ ngal bso po'i nor dang 'drapa/ bso po'i nor la 'gran pa zhig yod de/ sa rigs mnyam pa'i chung ma zhig blangasanas/ de de dang lhan cig turtse dga' yongs su spyod do//
de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las bu pho rnams byung/ ya sha nas de bu med de/ bu 'dod pas lhag lang dang/ pa run dung/ pal bso po dad/ gas pa la sogs pa lha stong
la gsol kyang de'i bu sos par ma gyur te/ de la gizhan zhig gis de ste khyod la bu po zhig btsas na/ bu mo'i mang du thogasashig dang yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur rozhes bsgo'o// de dus
phyi nage na de dang lhan cig tu dga' yongs su spyod do// des rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas dri'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon nas khye'u
nagi btsas te/ de gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa// mdog gsaMr gyi kha dog lta bu/ mgo gduges 'dra bo/ lag pa rang ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba dang
dazhes ka rung bu/ smin ma snyoms pa/ sna mtho zhing yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du ldan pa zhig bcas te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas
a mnge gdags par brtsams te mdza' bo'i bu sta/ bu mo'i ming gdags pas na/ khye'u 'di'i meng bu mo mdza' mor gdags so// ji tsam na khye'u bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba de cher gyur
'ayaM pa dang/ de'i pha yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du bzhugs te/ de nyid du nge gyur to// de nas bu mo mdza' mos ma la bdag gi pa sngon las kyi 'bras bu gang gis 'tsho ba/ bdag

N+Ti kyang phyis de bzhin du bsgrub bo zhes smras pa dang/ mas bsams pa/ sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'jug pa'i tshong pa yin no zhes 'di la smras na ni/ 'di nyid kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang
du zhugs te/ de nyid dushi bar 'gyur snyam du bsamasanas/ des bu khyod kyi pha ni sngon 'bru 'tshong ba byed byed de/ khyod kyang dga' n 'bru 'tshong ba gyis shig ces smras pa dang/
des 'bru'i tshong khang brtsigs te/ thog ma' nyin par ka sha pa Nang zha red de/ dus de dag ma lo byin no// de nas dus phyi zhig na gzhan zhig gis de la khyod kyi pha ni sngon du 'tsho ba'o zhes
smras pa dang/ des 'bru 'tshong ba btang ste/ 'tshong ba'i tshong khang brtsigs// de nas nyi ma dang po'i tshoka shapa Nabargyad rnyed nas/ des yang de dag ma labyin no// de nas dus spyi zhig na
gzhan zhageg gis de la khyod kyi pan gsar 'tshong pa yin no zhes smras pa dang/ des yang dra 'tshong pa btang ste/ gser 'tshong ba la zhugs pa dang/ de'i nyi ma dang po laka sha pa Na bcu drug red
bdang/ des yang de dag ma la byin no// phyis de nyin mo des gangasha pa Na sum cu rtsa gaTis red pa dang des de dag ma la byin no// de nas gser 'tshong ba phrag dog can dag gis grong khyer
thams cad kyi gsar 'dis nga sdus sosnyam du bsams nas/ bu mo mdza' mo la khyod 'di lta bu byed cing 'tsho ste rung/ khyod kyi pa ni sngon rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i tshong pa yin na/ khyod
sus 'di 'dra ba ngan pas 'tsho la bcug ces smras pa dang/ de gser 'tshong ba dag ga tshig des bskul bas de'i ma'i thad du song ste/ ma bdag ga ba ni 'di ltar sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong
pa'o nas thos na rjes su gnang zhige dang/ bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la mchi'o zhes smras pa dang/ mas de la bu de na bedun mod kyi/ khyod ni gzhan la bu gcig pu ste/ kho mo
bar la rgya mtsho chen por ma 'gro zhige ces smras dang/ de nas bu mo mdza' mos ma'i tshig ma mnyanate/ bdag gi grong khyer du gang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs shing 'dong/ sudad pa rnams 'dong ngo/
zhes des bdag nyid ded dpon du bsgrags so// des tshong pa lnga brgyas bskor tadang ba dang/ de ma'i snying du sdug pas dkrugs temachi mas brnags bzhani rkang pa gnyis la bzung ste/ bu kho
[pai ]/mo bar te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa ma 'gro zhig ces smras pa dang/ de 'di ltar snying rje zhing ma dga' ste dal gyis smras pa la khros nas/ ma'i mgo brkang pas phul
te de 'gran pa mang po dang 'grogs te song ngo// mas bu khyed la las 'di rnam par sman par ma gyur cig ces smras pa dang/ de nas de grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang
yaM 'bo rnams la lta 'ang rgya mtshochen po'i 'gram du phyin pa dang/ sa dong tshernying pa lnga brgyas gru bore nyos tigu'i nang du 'jug pa dang/ 'byin pa dang/ gnyan pa dang/ nyag/
tshu thag 'dzin pa dang/ phyogs rtog pa'i mo de la gla byasonas/ des dril chen grolan gsum bsgrigs nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'inang du zhugs te song ba dang/ dzam zhuge na chusrin nya'i rigs kyis
grum rung bar byas nas/ bu mo mdza' mo glu tshal cig la 'jus nas mthar phyin to// de nas skam la song ba dang/ dga' ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer de mthong ste de der song nas/ de nas lha'i/
bu mo gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzhi byung ste/ der 'ongs nas bu mo mdza' mo bde bar 'os sam/ 'din bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa dang/ btung ba'i khang pa dang/ gas kyi
khang pa dang/ nor bu dang mu tig dang/ btsum dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu rudang/ gser dang/ dngul gyis gang ba 'di bzhes shige/ tshur sngon bdag cag dang/
[z/]lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras nas/ dedang lhan cig du ma/ la brgyadum/ lo stong dum/ la brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa// dge ba byas pa// rdzu
'phrul chen po/ mthu chen po/ rang gi bsod nams la myong bar 'gyur ba bzhani myong bar gyur te// de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo ba dang/ dolho phyogs
kyi lam dum btang yang don 'gro bar gten te/ de phya zhig na lho phyogs su song ba dang/ de rtag tu ra ro ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer mthong nas de'i sgor phyin pa dang/ de nas kyang lha'i bu
mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ de bas kyang mdzes pa brgyad byung ste/ de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/ bde bar byon nam/ bdag cag gi zas
khang ba 'dri dang/ skom gyi khang pa dang/ gas kyi khang pa dang/ nyal pa'i khang pa dang/ mu tig dang/ bozurludang/ dung dang/ shel dang/ byu rudang/ gser dang/
dngul dag gis gang bar yod kyis tshur spyon lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras nas/ de dag dang lhan cig tulo dus/ la brgyadumaM/ le stong du ma/ le brgya stong du mar ji ltar
sems can bsod nams byas pa// dge ba byas pa/ rdzu 'phrul chen po/ mthu chen pos myong ba bzhin myong bar gyur to// dengag gis kyang de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhagi ces
ba sgo lo de lho phyogs kyi lamadu ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo na ji ra gten cing/ 'gro 'dod nas ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang/ dga' ba can zhes
a babagrong khyer mthong nas de'i skor phyin pa dang/ de nas yang lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ de bas kyang mdzes pa bcu drug byung ste/ de dag
'tsho gas bu mo mdza' mo bde bar byen nam/ bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/ bdag cag ga zis kyi khang pa 'didang/ skom gyi khang pa dang/ gos kyi khang pa dang/ nyal ba'i khang pa dang/ mu tig
dang/ pe rgyun dung/ dung dang/ shel dang/ byu ru dung/ gser dang/ dngul dag gis gang ba yod kyis tshur spyon lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras nas/ de dag dang lhan cig tu
! podu ma/ brgya dum la stong du a/ 'bargya stong du mar ji ltar sems can gyis bsod nams byas ng/ dge ba byas b/ rdzu'aphrul chen po/ mthu chen pos myong bar gyur pa
b+he bzhin myong bar gyur to// de dag gis kyang di lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo'o// de lho phyogs kyi lam dum 'gro zhag ces bsgo yang ji thur garten cing 'gro bar 'dod nas/ de ji
tsam zhagi na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang/ bla ma'i tshes po zhes bya ba'i khang pa bzang po zhig mthong nas de 'i sgoraM 'ongs pa dang/ de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs
pa de bas kyang blta na sdug pa// shin tu bzang mo sum cu rtsa gnyis shig byung nas/ de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshun sbyon/ mdza' mo bde bar byon nam/ bdag cag gi zas ]
kyi khang pa 'di deng/ skom gyi khang pa dang/ gos kyi khang pa dang/ mal gyi khod pa dang/ mu tig dang/ brladang/ dung dung/ shel dang/ byu ru dang/ gsar dang//
dngul la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar yod kyis tshur spyon lhan cig tu bzhugs so zhes smras nas/ de dag dang lhan cige tu la dus/ labargya du ma/ 'pho stong dum/ la
brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po/ mthu chen pos myong ba bzhin myong bar gyur to// de dag gses kyang lho phyogs kyi lam dum
'gro zhige ces bsgo'o// de lha phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo yang de shur gtinatsang 'gro bar 'dodonas/ ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song nas de phyi phyir zhing dad pa skyes te/
du rim gyis lho phyogs su song ba dang/ lcags las byas pa'i grong khyer zhig mthong ste de der zhugs so// der zhugs ma thog tu de'i sgo yang skur bcad par gyur to// de nas yang nang du
song ba dang sgo yang de bzhin du bcad do// de nas yang nang du song ba dang sgo yang bcad bar gyur ti dzatsim zhagi na skyes bu rab tu lus tsheb zhig denas byung ste/ de'i spyi bol lcags kyi
'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba// shin tu rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa zhige 'khor zhing 'dug ste/ de'i mgo las rnag khrag byung ba ni zas/
subor mthong ngo// de nas bu mo mdzub mos skyes bu de la khyod ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris pa dang/ sa ngas ni me la gnod pa byas pa'i phyir ro zhes skyes bu des de skad smras ma thag tu
@# bu mo mdza' mo de las kyang mngon du smin pa gyurati/ bdag gis kyang ma la gnod pa byas nas de'i las kyis 'dir khrid de 'os so snyam bsams pa dang/ de ma thag tu nam mkha'i
las sgra 'di skad du/ gang bcings pa de ni thor/ gang ma bcings pa den bcings pa'i 'is sgra de byung ma thag tu/ skyes bu de'i spyi bo na 'khor la yod pa de ni med par gyur to// bu mo mdzad
@# mo'i spyi bo'i 'khor lo byung ngo// de nas bu mo mdza' mo rab tu sdug bsngal bar skyes bu des mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rtagatu dga'adang dregs byed cing// skyed par byed pa
bor byas te/ tshangs paM bla ma'i khang pa nas// ci yi phyir ni khyi 'di'i 'ongs/ bu mo mdza' mos smras pa/ rtag tu dga' dang dregs byed cing// skyidapar byed pa bor byas te// tshangs nga
bla ma'i khang pa nas/ 'darin 'ong bar 'dod gyur pa// yun ring po yi las kyis gnyer// las kyis rang nas gter nas kyang// gang du las kyis gnyer ba der// las kyang rnam
00par smin par 'gyur// las gang rnam par smin pas na// 'khor lo 'bar bu rab 'bar ba// bdag gi srog la gnod gyur te// glad pa 'khor la 'barab r gyur// mi des smras pa/
khyod kyis ngan pa'i sems bskyed de// dga' bar byed pa ma yi mgor// khyod kyis rdog pas brgyab pas na// de yi las kyi 'bras bu yin// bu mo mdza' mos smras pa// 'kher
la 'bar ba rab 'bar bgra bdag gi srog la gnod byed pa// lo grangs stong phrag ji srid du// nga ya glangal 'khor bar 'gyur// minges smras pa/ lo grangs stong phrag drug cu dang//
lagrangs brgya yi bar du ni// 'bar ba' lcags kyi 'khoro las kyang// khyod kyi mgo la 'joms par byed// de nas bu mo mdza' mo nges ma de la// kyi skyes bu gzhan dag kyang 'dir 'ong ba
lta yod dam zhes smras pa dang/ mi des snas pa// gang gis las 'di lta bu byas pa dag ni 'dir 'ong bar 'gyura'o// de nas bu mo mdza' mo de sdug bsngal gyis mngon du gzir ba dang/
sems can rnams la snying rje ba bskyed nas ma di la 'di skad du smras so// kye skyes bus sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'khor la'ang mgo la bzod par bya// gzhan dag gas
'di 'dra ba'i las byas pa de dag 'dir ma 'ong zhig ces smras ma thag tu/ bu mo mdza' mo byang chub sems dpa' de'i mgo las 'khor la ngashang ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags
[r]@#/ nas 'dug pa dang/ de'ang dus 'das te/ dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i khams su skyes so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dge slong dag
ji snyam du sems/ de'i dus na bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba na nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe dus tshong byas te/ngag pa cham la phyin pa dri'i las kyi rnam par smin nga sa na/ grong khyer chen po rnam
'a bzhir rab tu bde ba myong bar gyur to// de nas dus mal gnod pa cung zad cig byas pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to//
de lta bas na dge slong dag de bzhin du bslab par gyis// pha dang ma la phan gdags par bya'i/ gnod par ma byed cig dang/ de lta bu'i gnod pa mi myong bar 'gyur ba na ji ltar bu mo
mdza' mo so so skye bo'i tshon myong ba bzhin te/ yon tan mang po yang 'gyur zhing/ da yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin te/ dge slong dag de bzhin bslab par byisashig/ dge slong
N+NaM dgade lta bas na tshul khrims rab tunyams par 'gyur yang/ rnam pa lnga la ni nyi g.yog bya ba gnang ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ pha ma dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang//
nad pa rnams so// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapan ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsal// dge slong dag nyi ma nangeshar/ bya rogani
khrir zhing pa ni rmo rko byed/ ma lus pa na ba rnams na ngu'o// dge slong dag de ni dper byas te/ don de mi shes pa'i phyir/ don de'ang bstan par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyim
shar ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas so// bya rog zer ro zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi snongagang zag rnams kyi tshig bla dgas
so/ zhing pa zhing rmod ces bya ba ni/ sbyin par byed pa dang/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// ma byin par rkub rnams du'o zhes bya ba ni/ bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig bla
dgas so// de lta bas na drag slong dag ston pa ni hran thos dag la thugs brtse bas thugs rje'i don ston// phan par dgongs pa/ thugs rjebazhin pas na ngos khyed la don byas
kyis khyed kyis da bya ba'i rigasaso// de 'di ltar dgon pad/ shing drung dang/ khang stong dang/ dang/ grog po dang/ phug dang/ sog ma'i phung po dang/ bla gab
med pa dang/ dur khrod dang/ nags tshal gyi phyogs dang/ bas mthar gnas par bya ste/ dge slong dag bag med par ma byed cig/ phyis 'gyedapar gyur ta re/ sa bstan pa 'di
ni ngas rjes su bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgenapagasungs ban phyis 'gyod par gyur tare/ 'di ni ngas bstan pa'o zhes gsungs ba'i bar du snga ma bzhanino// dge slong
dag dgon pa dang/ nags tshal gyi phyogs dang/ bas mtha na la gnas shing bsam gtan byed pa la zhugs so// mnyan du yodapan khyim bdag gzhan/
zhig gis dgon pa la gnas pa 'dege slong dag gi phyir dgon pa'i khyim brtsigs te/ jitsam zhig de na bsod snyoms pa ga zhan zhige ldes spyad pa spyod cing mnyan du yodapa phyin pa dang/
de'ang slar khyim du 'ongs te 'dug pa dang/ de dus phyi zhagin de'i skra dang ba spu ring bor gyur nas snga dro'i dus na sham thabs bgos te/ lhobazod dang/ chos gis khyer to so ba dang/
de la khyim bdag des 'phags pa skra dang kha spu rang bzhis smras pa dang/ des bzhin bzas 'dreg mkhan med do zhes smras nas/ khyim bdag gis 'phags pa de ltan bzhud cig dang
bdag gis 'dreg mkhan gtodrango zhes smras pa dang/ des bsod snyoms blangs nas slar song ba dang/ des 'dreg mkhan yang btang ngo// bsod snyoms pa de rab tul lo can zhig ste/
de gding ba'i steng du 'dug bzhin sku bregs pa dang/ sku ya dra gdang ba'i stong du lhung nas zad par der mnas so// khyim bdag des bsams pa/ 'dreg mkhan khyod song la/ dag
slong de'i skra dang kha spu dag bregs sam ma bregs ltas shig ces smras pa dang/ de der song// song nas gdung ba de'i stong du 'dug pa dang/ de'i gos la sku dag chags nas/
khyim bdag des bsod snyoms pa de la mgu ba dag byas nas slar khyim du song ba dang/ de'i chung mas jo bo'i sras ni khyod 'dreg mkhan gyi khyim na 'dug 'dug gam/ des gos la bltas na/
sku chags shing 'dug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bsod snyoms pa de gdung ba'i stong du 'dug bzhin du skya ma khregs grang zhes de ltar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/ de der song ste bltas
pa dang/ de'i gdong ba la skadag gis gang zhing 'dug pa mthongs/ 'phags pa gdung ba'i stong du sku mi brig pa tsam yang ma shes sam zhes nyes pa dor brjod pa dang/ bsod snyoms
de gnang nas snga gong ste ngotsha nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa drage slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'dras la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalapa/ dge
slong dag khyim bdag de dag 'phya ba ni yus te/ dobs na dge slong dag gding ba'i snyingan 'jug cing skra ma 'gacig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gdang ba'i steng na 'dug cing skya ma
'dreg cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis gnas khang dang/ bkud sa dang/ sgo khang du skra bregs nas/ nying nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' stsal pa/ gang dge 'dun gyi phyag dar byed pa'i gnas der skra ma 'drig gi/ khregasana'as pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge 'dun gyi phyagadar
bya ba'i gnas der sku ma 'drecageg ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong kha cig rgas shing 'khogs la'ang par gyur/ kha cig nan bar gyur te/ phyi rol tu
gyo a sa/ mi na ba dag kyang tsha zhing char pa bab par gyur pa dang/ de dag kyang phyir 'byung ma nus nas gnod par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'as
'al sol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang dge slong dag rgasangashing 'khogs la 'dabar gyur pa dang/ na sto ma bde ba dag ni snga khang duskra breg par gyis
shig// mi na ba dang tsha zhing char pa bab par gyur te/ phyi rol tu 'byung ba ma bden/ de yang snga khang duskya brag par gyisangashage/ sa'i des po thams cad du'ang so ga'i phyi bar
bya yang n na byedu chug cig/ skran bsdus la phyag dar khrod du bor cigaM/ sen mo gcod pa yang g romis 'di bzhin no// gang ma bde bar gyur pa de la rjes su bcas kyi/ mi
bde ba med pa dag ni de ltar ma byed cig/ byas na 'das pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapan ste/ de'an dge slong zhige na bar gyur nas/ des
rtsa ba dang/ sdong budang/ 'dab ma dang/ 'bras bu rnams kyi sman gyis gsos kyang de'i nang sos par ma gyur nas/ jitsam zhig na sman pa gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang/
de la dge slong dag gis bzhin bzangs dge slong 'di 'dra ba na bar gyur na/ smad pyad kyi thabs ston cig ces smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa phyi dro phyi zo zhig dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras
pa dang/ de dag gas bzhin bzas phyi dro bya bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnangan/ nged cag gis ji ltar phyi dro phyibaza' bar bya zhes smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa khyed cag
gi ston pan thugs rje can gyis gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal
pa dge slong dag ba glang rgan po so med pa dug gas de nas ji ltar thos pa de bzhin du 'byung ba yod de/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ba na ba glang rgan pos bris pa'i nas 'as phye
thogs la byin cig/ de la the tsoman ma byed cig/ de la phyi de phyin kyang sos par ma gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa dag de ni ro yal
bas ma phan te/ nas gzhan las phye byas la byin cig ces smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong drag gras/ bcom ldan 'dras la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ de lta bas na gzhan gyis ma bris pa'i nas las phyi byas te/ tshogs kyis tshogs la byin cagices bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag gso de bzhin du byin yang sos par
ma gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa lde gu byas la byin cig dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar rgyu
bdage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste sman pas sgo na phye las lde gur byas la byini cig/ de bzhin du les
'a ga zan du byas pa dang de nyid kyang rung ste thams cad byon cig/ de la the tsom ma byed cagi/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ de'i tshomanyan du yod pan/ dge slong
klugazhan zhig na bar gyur nas/ de rtsa ba dpa/ sdong bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis gsos kyang sos par ma gyur nas/ phyi zhig na sman pa gtsug lag/
khang du 'ongs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis dris pa/ bzhani bzungs dge slong 'di na ba'i thabs 'di lta bu sman dpyad ston cig ces smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa dag phyi dro khug byin
tsag dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis bzhin babus phyi dro za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na/ de la phyi dro khungasha ja ltar bza' zhes smras pa dang/ sa
! 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pani thugs rje can gyis gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de ltar gyur ba dge slongad gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
tha kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dred mo zhes bya ba'i srog chags shig yod de/ de sha ji ltar bris pa de bzhin du 'byung gas/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ba ni dred mos rjes/
pa'i ngegalas bu shar byas te byin cig/ del the tsam ma byed cig/ de dag gis dred mos bris pan+tig las khushar byas te byin yang sos par ma gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis smanapa
la zhib tu smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa dag ngen ro yal zin bras shasar pa las byas ba dug byin cib dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste sman pas nagasha sa pa las khu shar phyes la byin cig ces bsgo nan/ de lta byas na rjes
su gnang banangan sarapa las khungashar gyis dar gyis tshogs te byin cig/ dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin yang sos par ma gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras r
dang/ des 'phags pa dag sna tshogs byos la byin cig ces smras ba dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ de ste sman pas sna tshogs byin cig ces bsgo na nibyin cig/ de la sogs te gtubs pa dang/ skam bo thams cad kyang byin cig/ de la the tsom ma byed cig gleng gzhi'i
nyu// sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o/// mde'on dud pa btung dang seng ras dang/ snar blugs pa dang phor bu dang/ khab
raladang ni mig byug pa// drang srong chen pos gnang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa phata'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa com ldan 'das kyis drud pa btung ba'i spubu chongs shog ces gsungasan/ ji lta bu
btsad par bgyi/ u pa la ni po che las byas pa ma gtogs so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ras chongs shig ces gsungasan/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ bal las
byas pa dang/ bar ma las byas pa dang/ sa las byas pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sna'i nang du blugs pa chos shig ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u
glu pa la rin po che las byas ma gtogs so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzhin btuba'i phor bu tshengs shig ces gsungs na/ jilta bur bcang bar bgyi/ u pa larinaM
rin po che ma gtogs pa'o// btsun pa bcos ldan 'das kyis khab ral chongasashig ces gsungasan/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa la de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs go/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mgo byug pa'i sman gyi snod chos shig ces gsungasan/ ji lta bu bcad bar bgyi/ u pa la din rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o// gleng
gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// mdor na phor bu dang yang skudakris dang// rkang gnas pa dang nang rten dang// bkru sman dag dang dran/
pa dang/ shi bar gyur pa'i chos gos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa du ba las nus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi phor bu chongs shigaces gsungasan/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/
u pa la de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skud ras tshes shig ces gsungasan/ ji lta bu bcang par bgyi/ u bal skud pa bdun las
byas pa ste/ b.ladang/ ldum bu sha na ka dang/ ras ba la dang/ gso ma dang/ rtsa du gu la dung/ ldum bu kotam pa dang/ srin bal gyi skud pa las byas pa'o// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang rten tshongs shig ces gsungasan/ lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ upa li de ni rin po che laso byas pa ma gtogs pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khridang/
skang rten chos shig ces gsungs na/ jilta grubacad bar bgyi/ u pa la de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod
banaste/ mnyan du yod pa na khame bdag gzhan zhigen bar gyur nas/ des sman pa la dris pa// bzhin bzangs bdag nad 'di 'dra ba zhig gis btab na smanadapyad kyi thabs ston cig ces
'a/ smras pa dang/ des khyim bdag snum bag sngar bzhag dang/ phyis bkru sman gtongadrozhes smras pa dang/ de snum bag za ba la zhugs so// jitsam zhig na de'i grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i
klu dge slong de'i 'osanas/ des khyim bdagag ci byed cing 'dug ces smras pa dang/ des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so// des khyim bdag kho bo bkru sman gtong ba rab tumalas kyis/ sman pa
la sbyin pa de kho bo la byin cig dang/ ngas khyod la bkru sman gtong pozhes smras pa dang/ khyim bdag des legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ sa de bkru sman btang nas
we gtsug lag khang du langs te song ngo// khyim bdag de'i bkru sman mchod nas de'i nye du dag song ste/ sman pa 'dres pa/ khyim bdag de bkru sman mtshon thabs ji lta bur bgyi zhes smras pa/
dang de labakru sman sus blud/ de dag gis 'phags pa 'di zhes bya bas blud do zhes smras pa dang/ des khros nas de nyid kyi gan du song la dris shig ces smras so// de dag gis de re'u
0 shi ba las sos nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na dge slong dag gis dran pa len
cing sman ma gtong nage/ de ste bkru sman btang na yang gud du ma 'gro 'gi/ de 'drab ' rkyen cig byung na yang sman dpyad ston la song nag/ de bzhin du ma byas par song na 'das pa dang bcas par
gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan sku/ nor bdag gis nor chags pa bzung ste/ des de la dus 'ditsam zhagi na byin cig ces dus btab nas btang ngo// des
bsams pa/ de ltar dus btab tu zin kyang ngasaM dus bzhin du gzhal bar ma nus kyis/ ci nas sa la bab na bros te 'gro'o snyam du bsams so/ phyir yang bsams pa/ yul
dang bral te 'gro ba ya ngarab sdug bsngal gyis/ ci nas nor bdag de gsadangosnyom bsams nas/ de dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba'i lam yongs su nges bsad do// jitsam zhig na drug sde dag
gas de mthong nas de dag gis bsems pa// bdag cag gis phyagadar khrod kyi gos red dosnyam bsams nas/ bshu bar bsams pa dang/ de'i gnyen dag gnas der 'ongs nas/ deg
gis de mthong ste ngu ba la zhugs nas/ khyed cag gis bsad de zhes smras ba dang/ de dag gis nged kyis ni ma bsad kyi/ gdon mi za bar dgus bsad ngo zhes smras so// doltar gyur pa dge slong
thubya/ dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de'i gnyen rnams dogs pa skyes pa'i yus te/ de bsan

dge slong dag gis de 'dra ba'aphyig dar dan ma len cagi/ gang gi tshin skye bo mang po dag gis rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshon blang bar bya ste/ de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng
a gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o/// bam po so lnga pa// mdo'on lcags kyi gong bu gza bu dang// rgyab khur rked pa mgo
bodang// pha dang ma la gos dang zas// spu can chos gos gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyanadu yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba
na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa su pa las zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi gong bu lcags thag gis thogs shog ces gsungasan/
b+he lcags thag ji lta bu s gdugs par bgyi/ u pa la rin rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi gzer bu chongs shig ces gsungasan/ ji lta
du bcang bar bgyi/ u pa la de ni rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyab dang/ rkedapa dang/ mag la khur ma khyer cig ces gsus
na btsun pa dge slong ma dpa da gas kyang rgyab dang/ rkang pa dang/ mgo la khur mi bkur bar bgyi 'am/ u pa la dge slong ma dag kyang rgyab dang/ rked pa dang/ mgo la khur ma khyer cig/
de ste khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuro// gleng gzhi ni mnyanadu yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/
de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyad nas dus phyi zhig na de chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ ngo zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang/ bu gzugs legs pa/ blta na sdug pa/ bzang
ba yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i khye'u zhig btsas te/ de dag gis btsas pa 'batsas ston chen po byas nas ming btags so// debasrings bskyod de cher gyur pa dang/ ji tsamo dus phyi zhig
na pha ma la ma gsol bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// de snga ngosham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs
ba dang/ de'i pha rgan pos mthong nas bu khyod rab tu byun/ nged cag sus gso bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang/ de snga gong nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldan 'das 'a gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa dang ma ni bu'adeka' ba byed pa ste/ de lta bas na rab tubyung yang pha dang ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang bgo
[t ]@#// ba dag sbyor bar rjes su gnang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung yang ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang/ bgo ba dag sbyor cig ces gsungs ba dang/ dge slong dag gI
ji ltar sbyar ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ gang lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par gyur pa des sbyar bar byos shig/ de ste med na sbyin bdag la slongs te
sbyor cig/ de sta dge 'dunadu gtogs la/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dbang bar gyur na/ de phyud byin cig/ de ste bsod snyoms pa zhig na/ bsod snyoms kyi phyod sbyin par gyis shig/
de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa nas mi ring ba zhagon ra brags kyi grong 'gi yod de/ ri
khrags kyi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa de'i nang na rgan zhugs gzhan zhig gnas te/ de nas dus phyi zhag na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par song ngo// drug

sde rnams ni chos kyis kyang drug sde'i nang na gcig gis na dzi ta'i tshal gyi sgo srung bas na/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo sgo na 'dug pa des mgo dkar lasmin ma ring ba zhig rgyang ring po nas 'os
mthong nas des bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gang zhig 'dar 'ong bsur 'gro'o snyam bsams te/ de sngar song ba dang/ des gnas brtan bde bar 'ongs sam zhes smras so/
des slob dpon phyag 'tshal la phyag 'tshal 'go zhes skyas so// tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bos bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'dis slob dpon yang mdeshes/ mkhan po yang mngashes par rag nas/
des rgan zhugs tshungashog/ gtsug lag khang du 'dong ngo zhes smras so// des gtsug lag khang du khridi nas ngal sor bcug pa dang/ des nyung zad cig 'dug nas/ slob dpon bdag ni
mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du mchi'o zhes smras pa dang/ nye dga' bos sdod cig 'du ba'i dus la bab pa dang bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ des slob dpon bdag gis chos gos gsum
yang khyer te ma 'ongs ngas 'ge'onas smras pa dang/ nye dga' bos rgyan zhugs sdod cig dang 'di'i chos gos gsum byen gyis brlab par bya'o zhes smras nas/ ji tsaman 'dug pa/
gyur pa dang/ des de la par thang ni mthang gos su byin gyis brlabs/ la ba ni stong g.yogs su byin gyis brlabs/ be'u rasan sbyar mar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas la ba dang be'u
las gnyis phug pal bzhag nas/ par tha gis bkris pa'i stong du the gus dkris tangam du bcings nas/ de nas 'dus pa'inang du btang ba dang/ dge slong dag gis mthong nas/
de nas dge slong kun tu btsanges pa kha cig gis ni nyis pa des brjod do// kha cig gis ni rgan zhugs ma gi ci'i phyir skyon thabs byed ces smras pa dang/ des tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni kho
bo'i chos gos gsum yin te/ kho ban blo bur du 'ongs na gang du gzhag ces smras pa dang/ de dag gis chos gos gsum de 'dra ba yin nam zhes smras pa dang/
ngas gang la med pa de ni 'dra bar 'gyur zhes smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'as la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po// gang
nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gis snga drang po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis
brlab pa ma gnang bar dgongs nas bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dge slong rnams nyos pa der brjod pa ni yus te/ nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni spu ring po las chos gos gsum du
byin gyis brlabs patshaste/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis ma rlabasangashag/ de ste byin gyis brlabs na 'angs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis ma rlabs shig ces gsungs pa dang/ dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis la ba dang/ drug stan dang/
be'u ras ngag phul ba dang/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma blangs pa dang/ des 'phags pa dag nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshon ni/ mu stegs/
can dag yon gnas lags na/ dan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas khyed cag yon gnas lags te/ nga khyed kyis ma blangs na bdag cag gi dge ba'i zong med/
bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu ji ltar 'gro zhes smras pa dang/ de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag zer ba ni bden te/ de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang gis 'phel/ spu zung rnams ni lhag pa'i gos su
byin gyis rlobs shig/ spu ring po rnams ni yon bdag gir byin gyis rlobs la bcang bar gyis shig/ gleng gazhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o////
mdaro na/ dbu dang sen mo'i mchod rten dang// kha dog dkar po mar me dang// khyi dang mar me snod dug dang// ba glang btsun mo rta babs so// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag man med zas sbyin ni chos kyis nang par sngar langs nas/ bcom
ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o// ji tsam dus phyi zhigan bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi bsod nams kyi don bstan pa'i phyir/ 'dreg
mkhan bkug nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs pa dang/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dzata' tshal du song nas/ bcom ldan 'angs la mgos phyag
'tshal nas/ btsum ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnangan/ bdag gis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gas brtsagis shig/ des gzhi yadras pa'i gnas shag tumadza' bodang/ phu nu dang/ gnyen ngag dang lhan cig tu rim gro tshong byas
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten yang skye ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhig brtsigs na/rdo thal gyis ma byugs kyi bar du ma mdzes par gyur nas/
de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa// bcomi ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu sku dang son mo'i mchod rten skye bo
thams cad kyis bstan sdug pa zhig brtsigasan/ rdo thal gyis ma byugs kyi bar du mi mdzes par gyun/ de la bcom ldan 'dus kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ bdag
gis rdo thal gyis byug par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'od s kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis rdo thal gyis skus shig// des
rdo thal gyis bskus nas/ dri dang/ bdug pa dang/ me tog gis mchod pa byas so// mtshan mo mar ma med pas ma mdzes par gyur nas/ de yang bcom ldan 'das gangan pa//
der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
kyi dbu skradang sen mo'i mchod rten rdo thal gyis bskus nas/ dri dang/ byug pa dang/ me tog dag gis mchod pa bgyisan/ mtshan mo zhugs mar ma mchis te mi mdzes par gyur na/
de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnangan/ bdag gisabcom ldan 'dasaM kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod pa bgyis/ mtshan mo zhugs mar gyi 'phreng ba bud do zhes gsol/
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na khyim bdag sa rjes su gnang gis/ de la mchod pa gyis te/ nub mo dbu skadang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi steng du
mar me'i 'phrongab busangag/ de nas mar zags nasaM/ mchod rten gyi kha dog dkar po ma rung bar gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka'i
stsal pa/ mar me'i 'phreng ba 'og tu zhog cig/ des mar me'i 'phreng pa 'og tu gzhag pa dang/ khyis mar ma 'thungs nas snod kyang khyer ro// de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
[n ]/ der song nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dus bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi 'og tu zhugs
mar gyi 'phrodAb bzhag na/ khyi dag gas ma 'tshal nas zhugs mar gyi snod kyang 'tshal te mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ bdag gis
zhug gis mar gyi bdasu bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis de ltar byas pa shig/ des mar me'i
khang bu dag kyang byas so// dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la ba glang dag gis bsnyogs pa dang/ de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang san mo'i mchod rten brtsigs pa la ba glang dag gis bsnyogs par gyur na/ bcom ldan
u0f09 'das kyis de la rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ bdag gis stag khus bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na khyim
bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis skor bar byos shig/ sa stegs bus bskor narta babs med pa dang mi mdzes par gyur te// de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la
0phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gso bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skradang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi tha ma stegs bus bskor na/ stegs bu de'arta babs ma mchis te
ma mdzes na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ bdag gis stegs bu'i rta babs bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis byas shig ces bka' stsal dang des rta babs byas te/ yo byad thams cad busogs nas/ bcom ldan 'as
kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchodartenal/ mdza' ba dang/ phu nu dang/ gnyen dog bsogs nas mchod pa chen po byas so// skye bo mang po dag de lta bu mthong nas rab tu mos te de
dag dad pa skyes nas/ de dag gis kyang rnam pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skradang sen mo'i mchod rten dag gnas gnas su brtsigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dras mnyan
du yod ba na ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du bzhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der ljongs spyad pa spyodatsang rim gyis rgyalapo khab tu byon te// rgyal po' khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya
ka lan ta ka gnas pan bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das yul dbus gyur 'chang nas ldes spyod pa spyod cing rgyal po'i khab tu byon to// rgyalaM
bo'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs par thos te/ thos nas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang/ yo lang chen pos nang gi btsun mo dang/
a gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ nang gi skye bo dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhani mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i
chos de lta bu bshad de thos pa dang/ rgyal po gzugs can snyang pos lha stong phrag brgyad cudang lhan cig tu'ajig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes btsem nas/ rgyan
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so// des bden pa mthong nas/ lha stong phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la dus gsum du ltar 'dong ngo// de dus phyi zhog
t+taM na dpyad kyi dus la bab pasashing drag kyang me tog rgyas dang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma byadang/ ne tso dang/ skya ka dang/ ko ka la dang/ ji ba dzi ba ka la sogs
ba'ang skad 'byin par byed pa'i nags stug po de nanang gi btsun mo dag gis bskor zhing 'dug pa las/ de lanang gi btsun mo dag gis gsol pa/ lha bdag cag gis nyin re re
0 zhing bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhal lta zhang mchi bar ma nusan/ lhas nang gi btsun mo ngag gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'+ri mchod rten zhig brtsig par mdzod cig dang
de la bdag cag gis rim gro bskyod de me tog dang/ dri dang/ byug pa dang/ spos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis mchod par bgyi'o zhes
gsol pa dang/ sa bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu sku dang sen mo stsol cig dang/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra
dung sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun mo'i dbus su brtsig go zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo stsal nas/ des bsti stang dang rim gro tsherabyas
te nang gi btsun mo dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo' mchod rtenanang gi btsun mor dbus su brtsigs nas/ dri lanang gi btsun mo drag gis ma
mi dang/ spos dang/ me tog dang/ dridang/ byug pa dag gis rab tu mchod par byas so// gang gi tshirgyal po ma skyes dgra la ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis rbad
nas/ pha chos can chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa 'tsho ba dang yongs su phul nas bdag nyid rgyal por zhugs so// de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la chos kyi sbyin pa thams
kuny+tsa// cad gacod par khrims bcas bas/ sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu sku dang sen mo'i mchod rten la bya ba med do// gang gi tshe bco lnga ba'askabs 'byed
sa pa'i dus la bab pa de 'tshin yang dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la su yang phyag dar dang/ mar me dang/ ma tog dag gis mchod pa mi byed do// de nas btsun mo dag gis dbu skra dang
tsit+taM san mo'i mtshod rten la rnam pa de lta bu mthong nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po dran te de dag mi dga' ste mya ngan byed cing kyi bu chos kyi rgyal po dang bral bar gyur nas/ bdag
cag gi bsod nams kyang zad par gyur tozhes zerazhing du bar gyur to// de'i nang nas btsun mo dbal gyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gis 'tsho ba la ma bltas par saMngs rgyas kyi yon/
tan rjes su dran nas/ dbu skra dang sen mo' mchod rten gyi phyag dar byas te/ mar me'i 'phreng ba dag phul la// dzitsam na ma skyes dgra khang stong du byung ste bltas pa dang snang
[ ]tshan po byung ba mthong nas/ ma gci shog ces dris pa dang/ gzhan zhig gis dpal gyi blo gros mas dbu sku dang sen mo'i mchod rten la zhugs mar gyi 'phreng ba phul zhes smras pa dang/
! dpal gyi blogres ma bsanas/ ci'i phyir rgyal po'i khrims las 'gal bar bya zhes smras pa dang/ mos kho mos rgyal po'i khrims las 'gal mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho mos chos kyi rgyal
bo gzugs can snying po'i khrims las ni ma 'gal lo zhes smras pa dang/ de khros te 'khor lo 'phas nas de'i 'tsho ba dang phral ba dang/ de bcom ldan 'dras lasems mngon par
pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'a gnas bzang bor skyes so// de'i tshon lha rnams 'dunasar 'dus so// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma/
dpag tshe dang khor khor yug tu snang ba' 'od kyis lus bskor nas lha'i 'dunasar song ngo// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dpag tshad kho ra khor yug turgya cher snang ba'i 'od mthong nas
sa pa/ gser gyi lus la su yis bskus// pad+mo ut+pal bzhin 'dra ba// dpal ldan mi mtshungs ru las byung// khyod kyi lus las 'od byung ba// tsa phyir khyod gdong pad+mo kha
'bus 'dra// khyod ni gser gyi 'od 'dra ba/ ci yi 'bras bu lha mo bdag lasmos// gang gi las las byung ba spyod// lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po na/
skye bo rnams kyi mar me ste// sangs rgyas mchog gi mtshan mthong bas// mun sel de la mar me phul// nyon mos mun pa sol lul// zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba'i 'od mthong

nas// thub pa gsal ba'i dngos po ste/ ston pa' 'od mgu mang bas na// gsung ba mchog la phyag byas pa// de yi las kyis 'di'i skyes te// khadag la rab tu gsal zhing gang gi las las byung// khyod kyi lus las 'od brgyatshor snang ba'i 'od mthong nas
mdzes bdag gdong blta na sdug pa na// pad+mo zla bzhin rnam par dag/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ e ma'o zhing 'di yon tan can// nyes pa thams cad
rnam sngas ga/ mtho ris gang du skye ba yi// khyod kyis sa bon der btab bo// gser bzhin sngags la dkar ba yi// rnam pa mchog la sus mi mchod// sangs rgyas pad+mo kha 'byes
ayaM bzhin// gang du lhags pas skye ba pad+mo spyan// yan lag mchog rnams 'bar ba ste// sbyanan mi tog ka ma la 'dra// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu pho 'am lha'i bu mo yang rung ste/
sum cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas/ ring po ma lon par gangunas nigag 'phos pa dang/ gang du skyes pa dang/ las gang yin pa'i sams na gsum skyo bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dpal
agyi blo gros mas bdag gang nas shi 'phos zhes bltas na ma lasaso// gang du snyam ba dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i khams bzang bo skyes pa mthong ngo// las gang yin zhe na/
bcom ldan 'dras la sems rab tu dad pa'o snyam du sems nas/ de nas dpal gyi blo gros mas 'di snyam du bdag gis zhag lan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta ba'i mi/
rigs kyi/ ci nas bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam bsams nasaM/ de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas dri ma med pa 'tsher ba'i rna cha ni
0 thogos/ lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan te/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+modang/ ku mu da dang/ paNA lanadang/ mnadar ba la sogs pa'i me tog dag gisapang pa bkang
nas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa rgya chen pos thams cad 'od snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nya' ba dang khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad de byas nas lhatsA bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjesabcom nas// rgyun
tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so// des bden pa mthong nas brjod par bya pa rnam pa gsum brjod du/ btsun pa badrag la 'dit+taran pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma
bgyis/ rgyal bos kyang ma bgyis/ lhas kyang ma bgyis/ sdug ngas kyang ma bgyis/ phu nu dang gnyen gyis kyang ma bgyis/ tshesnga ma la ma bgyisA/ bram ze dang dge sbyong gis
ma bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchi ma dang khrag gi rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste/
nyu@#// bdag ni lha dang mi'i gnas su bzhag go zhes gsol to// smras pa// khyod kyi mthus ni rab gsalab// ngan song lam ste nyes ma po// mtho dzas bsod
nams sgo yang// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// khyod la brten nas nyes pa rnams kyang spangs// bdag gis rtag tu rnam dag nyid kyang thob// 'phags pa dga'/
zhing zhi ba 'alam yang thog/ sdug bsngal mtsho las pha la bdag rgal nas// 'gro ba na ya lha ma rnams kyis mchod// skye rga 'chi ba'inyis dang bral// srid pa stong yang rab tu/
thob pa radaka'// de ring thub pa'i zhal mthong 'bras bu thob// btud nas sa mo de yang rab tu 'byung// zhabs gnyis la yang phyag byas dga' ba skyes// rgyal la g.yas kyi phyogs
'aau nas bskor// lha yi 'jig rten khams su mngon du song// de nas lha'i bu mo dang laspyi blo gros mtshong pas khe red pa bzhin/ zhing pa lo legs ngang bzhin/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal
tsaSh+Tha ba bzhin/ nad pa nad thums cad las thar pa bzhin/ longs spyod ba gang dag dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa'iles spyod de nyid dang bdag gi gnas su song ngo// dge
slong dag srod dang tho rangs mi nyal zhing thub pa la brtson zhing 'khod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi der 'od rgya cher snang ba mthong ngo// mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ba// ci bcom ldan
