0 'das/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal blta ba'i phyi'i tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po 'am/ brgya byin lha'i debang po 'am/ 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi ma/ gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'dres kyi
nal ltar mchis zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yin/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang ma yin/
'jig rten skyong bzhi la sogs pa lhags pa'i ng ma yin mod kyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i chung ma dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig gis bdag gi 'tsho ba la ma bltas te/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba phul ba dang/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'khor 'phangs te 'tsho ba dang phral lo// de nga la sems/
mngon par dad bzhin du dus 'das nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum du gnas bzang po'i lhar skyes so// denub mo nga'i drung du 'ongs te/ de la sa tshos bshan gnas / nges bden pa/
mthong ste bdag gi gnasaM su song ngo// de lta bas na dge slong dag bsod nams la 'jags par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ de na bde ba'i tshig bla dgas so// mos pa dang//
sdug pa dang/ shin tu sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ong bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/ bsod nams so// dge slong dag khyed cag gis bsod nams ma yin pa la 'jigs par gyis shig/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sdug bsngal gyi tshig bla dgasaso// ma mos pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ shin tum sdug pa dang/ yid du ma 'ong ba ni 'di lta ste//
bsod nams ma yin pa'o// dge slong dag ngas yun ring bo nas kyang mngon par mthong ti/ yun ring ponas bsodonams byas pa rnam par sman pa mos pa dang/ sdug pa dang/ shin
'tsho tu sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ong pa dug myong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag ngas labadun gyi bar du byams pa'i sems bsgoms pas/ bskal pa 'jig pa dang rtas pa bdun gyi bar du 'jig
na 'di'i ma 'os so// 'jag rten 'jib pa'i tshe kun snang dung ba'i lha'i ris su skyes so// rtas pa'i tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skyes nas/ der yang ngas tshangs pa dang tshangs
chen gyi bdag po gyur nas/ ngas bal gyis nan gyis gzhan gyis ma yin na/ sems can brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur te/ sems can gyi nang na mchog tu bsngags so// stong phrag
sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur to// brgya phrag grangs med pa'i bar du'abor las sgyur ba'i rgyal po'-igyur te/ mtha' bzhi btul nas rin po che sna bdunudang ldan no//
rin po che sna bdunan rnam pa 'ad lta bu yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor la ni po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med rin po che dang/
khyim bdag rin po tshe dang/ dmag ma rin po che dang bdun no// dal du yang stong tshang nas de dag kyang dpa' ba dang/ nus pa dang/ gzugs su ldan pa// pha rol gyi sde tshar gcod pa ste/
de yang ngs 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i mtha' tshun chad sa chen po 'di chos kyis btul kyi/ dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis gnon cang mi bde ba med par gnas so// de'i tshe yang ng 'di snyam du las gang gi
'bras bu rnam par smin pas bdag 'da'i mthu tshe rdzu 'phrul che ba'agyur snyam bsams pa dngo/ yang 'di snyam du las 'di'i 'bras bu gsum dang/ las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa
gsum gyis bdag 'di ltar mthu che rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang/ gdul dang/ dul ba'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'dA
kyis de skad gsungs nas yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs so// dge 'ang bde bar 'dod pa yis// bsod nams rnam par smin la ltos// lo bdun bar du dge slong dag/ byams
par byed pa'i sems bsgoms pas// bskal pa 'jig cing rtas gyur pa// bdun du 'jig rten 'di'i ma 'ongs// 'jig pa'i tshon bdag nyid ni// 'jig rten kun snang dang bar gnas/
rtas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na// tshangs chen dbang sgyur gnas su yang// lan bdun gyi na bar du gnas// sum cu rtsa drug bar duni// lha yi dbang po byas par gyur// brgya phrag
rgyal po rab tu'ajig grags byas// rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bor blugs// 'dzam bu gnas kyi dbang por gyur// dbyug dang
'a mtshon gyis ma yin par// 'jig rten 'di yid thul bar byas// chos nyid kyis narkyen med par// yang dag rjes su slob par gyur// chos kyi 'khor 'gro rab bskor nas// sa yi dkyil
glu 'khor 'di dag tu// phyug cing longs spyod che ba de// de 'dra'i rigs su nga yang skyes// nor rdzas thums cad phun sum tshogs// rin chen sna bdun de bzhin te// nor dang yo byad
mang por ldan// rgyal po grags shing 'jigs par 'gyur// mthu chen de yi rgyu yis ni// gang du skyes pa'i mchog tugyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa can// de yis 'di
ltar bshad pa'o// ngo mtshar che ba 'di shes pa// de yang 'phul chung ba yin/ mkhas pa gang gis dad la 'gyur// de ste rigs ni dmar gyur kyang// de la dran par 'dod pa dang
ny+nyo mthu rnams chen por mngon 'dod ba// dam pa'i chos la bla gor phyis// sangs rgyas bstan la dran par gyis// ban+dom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag yid
mgu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' go/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdunapa'o//
khyim rmang rta babs bcas pa dang// ba gam stegs bur bcas pa ste// ka ba mtshal gyis phyugs pa dang// rtsig ngos rgya skyegs ri mor bri/// sangs rgyas btsem ldan/
'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ btsum
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen
mo'i mtshod rten la mgar ma dri gtsang khang gis bskor la/ rta babs kyang gzugs par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na khyim
bdag rjes su gnang gis byos shig/ yang bcom ldan 'das de ste rjes su gnangan/ bdag gas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dung sen mo'i mchod rten la bgam bgyi'o zhes gsol pa
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang gis phyesang shig/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de ste rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis stegs
bus bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ de lta bas na khyim bdag ngas rjes su gnang gis byos shig/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste
rjes su gnan/ bdag gis ka ba dag mtshal gyis byug go zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang
gis byos shig/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de sku rjes su gnangan/ bdag gis rtsa ga des rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bgyi'o zhes gso la pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal//
'ayaM khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis bris shig/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o/ mdoran/ ba glang so dang tha ba dang/
rgyun 'phreng ba rin chen 'brong pa can// ga bogs ma dang ni snying bo dang// snying po yan sgo yang ngo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod pa dang bkur sti byas shig ces gsungs nA/ dge slong dag gis/
k+kA mchod rten la mchod pa byed ngan/ bur du btab nas me tog gi 'phreng ba btags pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis mthong nas/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag gis
ston pa'i mchod rten la phur bu med pa la phur bu btab ces 'phyas 'dogs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'phya ba na yus te/ de lta bas na mchod rten la phur bu ma gdab par baglangag so lta bu chung dus thob cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba glang gi
so lta bu chung dus thob cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis mchod rten la khung bu brkos te/ ba glang gi so lta bu 'dzugs pa la zhugs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis mchod rten la khu bu brkos te ba glang gi so lta bu ma gzugs ra/ mchod rten brtag pa'i tshanas tshugs shig ces bka' stsalato// dge slong dag mchod pa byed pan mchod rten la
'dzegs nas/ ma tog dang me tog gi 'phrang ba rnams mgur chu'i phre la 'dogs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag gis ston
ba'i mchod rten la rdog pas rdzu zhing 'dong zhing 'dong zhes 'phyas 'degs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ btsam ldan 'dasakyis
bka' stsal pa// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/ de lta bas na drag slong dag gis ston pa'i mchod rten la ldog pas rdzu 'ang ma 'dong zhig/ de ste mchod pa'i
phyir ni khyim pas 'dzegs shig/ de med na dge tshul pas rkang pa gnyis khrus la dras byug gam gos kyis dkris te 'dzegasashagi/ de dag kyang med na dge slong dag gis ston par
'du shes zhig la dus la bab par soms te/ de ltar de bzhin du mdzegs la dri'i'i mo byos shig/ mchod rten che sa 'dzeg mi nus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// thag pas thogs te 'dzegs shig/ dbu skra dang sen morwa mchod rten la me tog gi 'phreng ba phul ba dang/ de dag bar s te mo mdzes par gyur nas/ khyim
bdag skyabs med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog ga 'phreng ba phul ba dang/ de dag brtsis te ma mdzos na/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
m+b+ha gnang na/ bcom ldan 'dras kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la rin po che'i 'phreng ba dbul lo zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na khyim
tsho bdag gnang gas thul cig/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams 'khod de/ de dag ga rtag pas mchod rten ma rung bar gyur pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon
Sh+Tha med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la dbu skra dang sen mo' mchod rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams mchis shing rtog pas mtshod rten ma rung bar bgyis na/ de ste bcom ldan 'ang
kyis gonan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la g.yogs pa'i snying pos g.yo 'go zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khya'i bdag de lta bas na
gnang gis// g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yogs shing ces bka' stsal pa dang/ des ga yog pa' snying pos g.yogs so// g.yogs pa de dbyar 'drul zhing mun pas mi snang bar
gyur pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis dbu sku dang sen mo'i mtshod rten la g.yog pa snying pos g.yogs pa da/ da ltar dbyar gyi chab
kyisi rul te mun par gyur nas mi mngon na/ da ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnan/ bdag gis chab sgo gdod par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang gis sgo thod cig/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// mdoran 'kharab la sogs
mchod rten bya gser dang dngul la sogs pa dang// rgyal mtshan gyis su 'di la bskor// 'bru mar la sogs chag chag gdub// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med byas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med was sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ti/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnan/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'as
kyi 'khar ba'i mchod rten bgyi'o zhes kha gso' pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag de lta bas na gnangags byos shig/ ya bcom ldan
'das kyis de lta gnangan/ gser gyi mchod rten bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis byos shig/ de bzhin
yaM du dngul las byas pa dang/ po zlum las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rgya cher byas shag/ de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnangan/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi/
dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la rgyal mtshan dbu la la zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'ade// khyim bdug de lta bas na gnang gas phul cig/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis rgyal mtshan phul tsagi ces gsungs pa dang/ des ci 'dra ba zhig dbul ba mingeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal mtshan bzhi ste/
seng ge 'i rgyal mtshan dang/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ ku'i rgyal mtshan dang/ khyu mtshog gi rgyal mtshan no// de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la 'bru mar gyi chag chag gdab bo zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na khyim bdag
0 gnang gis chag chag thob cig/ yang gsol// de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchodarten la ljang sa kyis byug go
zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang gi byugs shig/ ji ltar ldong res kyis phyug pa de bzhin du tsan dan gyis byug pa yang
rgya cher byos shig/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu ste/ gleng gzhi nang nas sgo gsum pa rdzogs so// mngaga' gnan gnas sgo gsum pa rdzogs sa// mdor bsdus/
paran/ sgo leb dang yang de ltar dbyar// drug sde dag dang btsablog mkhan/ gnong pa bstan pa de bzhin te/ kun turgyudang skyen po dang// chag chag gdab dang rung ba dang/
de bzhin mdo rnams bsdus par brjod// mdon sgo leb dang ni dus 'khyud dang// dra ba dang yang gazugs 'khor dang// zhing dang 'bras dang skye ba dang// na'o/
las skyes dang gos rnams so/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo leb la lag gzungs byos shig ces gsusan/ ci 'dra ba las bgyi/ a/
pa la rin po che ma gtogs pa'o// yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gas pas 'khyud chongs shig ces gsus na/ su lta
bu las bcang bur bgyi/ u pa la skud pa sna bdun te/ bal gyi dang/ ldum bu rag na ka'i dang/ rus kyi skud pa dang/ bar ma'i dang/ rtswadu gdula'i dang/ ko dam pa/
ka'i dang/ srin bal rnams so// yang gsolo pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba byos shig ces gsungasan/ ji lcabu lasabagyi/ u pa la rnam pa bzhi sta/ rtswa
mun dza 'a deng/ b.lab dzad ng/ thar ma'i dang/ ras kyi skud pa lasaso/ yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba'i gzugs 'khor byos shig ces gsus
na ji lta bu las bgyi/ u pa la rin po che ma gtogs pa'o/ ]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig dad cing des la
dge bar sems pa zhig 'dug ste/ de nagacer bu pa'i dge bsnyen pa'i bu mo chung mar blangs te/ des de la bzang mo sangs rgyas ni ston paM/ tshes ni rgyal mtshan dge slong ni yon
gnas te/ de dag la bya ba byos shig ces bsgo ba dang/ de g.yos kun tu spyod de g.yo med pa ltar jo bo'i sras legs kyis/ de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang/ khyim bdag de'i
khyim du nyin gcig bzhin dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong rnams bshes bar 18 pa// de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag der brags kyi grogs gzhan zhig tu don cung zad cig yodapa
gyur te/ des chung ma de la bsgo ba/ bzang mo kho bo yul 'di zhes bya ba'i ri drung gi grong du ngon cung zad cig yod par gyur te/ der 'gros khyod kyis de bzhin du sbyin gnas rnams la
bshos gsol cig ces smras pa dang/ de g.yos kun tu spyod de g.yo med po ltar jo bo'i sros legs kyis bshis gsol lo zhes smras pa dang/ de song nas bdag gis chung ma
la bsgo branin/ dge slong la yang bsko'o snyam bsams te/ degatsug lag khang du song nas/ dge skos kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras M pa dang/ 'phags pa bdag yul 'di zhes
bya ba byugs kyi grong der don cung zad cig mchis par gyur to/ bdag der mchis khyod kyis de bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong gtong bar gsol/ des khyim bdug
de bzhin legs kyis gtong pozhis smas so// de nas khyim bdag des ston pa dang/ tshes tshe'i 'dun la phyag byas te/ ri bragasakyi grong der song ngo// dge 'dun gyis
bskos pa'i dge slong dag phan tshun tsho dang ldan pa khyami bdag de'i chung ma dad pas/ gdugs tshod dus snga zad du 'dong ngo zhes gtam byas na/ dedag gdugs tshod la dong ba dang/
thathubya// khyim bdag de'i chung mas mthong nas/ 'phags pa khyed cag ha cang snga byon te/ ci bdag gi sug las gzhan ma mchis sam zhes nyes pa dor brjod pa dang
a de dag gong nas cang mi zir bar ga dugs tshod bab kyi bar du bod nas/ gzan thos te dang ngo// des phyidinyin mo zas dag snga zad du sbyar te stan bting nas bya ra byed cing 'dug go/
dge slong dag gags tshod bapa khas 'dong ba dang/ des mthong nas 'phyas pa dang/ dge slong dag gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa gnyis kar yang 'phyas/ ji lta bu yanang thos
ts+tshA 'dong nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la bsgo ste/ phyin chad 'di dge slong dag kyang ma 'dang bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ gzan khros te gtsug lag khang du dong ngo// dge slong de dag
gsi ji ltar gyur pa bzlas pa dang/ dge slong dag phyis der ma 'dang bar gyur to// dzatsem na khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas/ bzang mo yona gnas ngag bsgo ba bzhin du bshos gsol
sh+tsa tam zhes dris pa dang/ des jo bo'i sras nyi ma gnyis shig gshegs te/ bshos gsol nas ma gshegs par gyur to zhes smras pa dang/ de skad ces thos nas gtsug lag khang/
du song ste/ 'phags pa ci'i slad du dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i rige slong rnams ma btang zhes smras pa dang/ de dgags ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bzlas so// sa 'phags/
pa de lta na bdag gi zhing las skye ba 'bras de 'phags pa rnams la dbul gyis// khyed 'di'i gsol cig ces smras pa dang/ des khyim bdag cha'atshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ma btsos pa'i 'bru len par btsom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ decung mu wer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol/
ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyi phyir 'bras lal the tsom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na
sto/gnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gang zag ga zhan zhig gi phyir gnas khang zhag brtsigs te bzha gnas / de'i nang du mal stan dag kyang mang du phul te bzhi pa dang/
dge slong dag gso mdzod chen po'i nang du gtsig tu bsdus te bzhag go/ dge slong des khyim bdag de la smras pa dang/ de 'phus 'go sa so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'grub ni lus te/ de bas na mal stan ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du spyad par bya ste/
de gang dag gnas pa de nyid dbang ngo// de nas yang khyim bdag des gnas khang der gos kyirid pa mang zhagi phul ba dang/ de la mal stan 'gyed pa dge 'dun gyi rnyed po'inang du brubs
pa dang/ dge slong des khyim bdag de la smras so// de yang 'phyas 'dogs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'dus la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ban yus te/ yon bdag gi dbang du byas yod la/ dge slong dag khyim kyi rnyed pan der gung gnas pa de dag/
nyid dbang ngo// de dag gis dge slong de la 'thob pa gzhan dag ma byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'ang dge 'dun gyi gtogs pa'i nyidapa de dag las kyang
byin ga/ des kyang de la longs spyod du gyis la/ de la the tsom du ma byed tsagi/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//
drug pa nga ngo man/gang zhig gang du gnas pa dang// dge slong des kyang de rung ba// las kyang sar pa'i yo byadadag/ zas dang maram rung bu//
k+kA sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan du yod pan khyim bdag gzhan zhig gas gtsug lag khang
du gnas khang dag brtsigs nas/ dor mal stan dag kyang phul/ rnyed pa dag kyang bcas pa dang/ dge slong dag mal stan de dag kyang dge 'dun gyi nang du brubs te/ rnyed pa yang sku/bam pos/
khagos go/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dngos po nges par 'gyur ba la ma skyod cig/ den
sa par gnas pa gang yin pa de dag gis spyad par bya ste/ rnyedab la bdag gar byos shig/ dge slong dag gis de la red pa gzhan ma byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba gnyis ka yang byin la ci bder spyad par bya ste/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams la ji ltar rgan rams su bsko bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan sto/ mnyan/
du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig der song nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gnas la bzhag go/ dus phyi zhigan yang nor
las bsod nams su bya ba'ades po bdun po'i yon tan brjod pa dang/ khyim bdag de rab tudad par gyur nas/ 'phags pa bdag gis kyang nor las byas pa'i bsod nams
kyi dngos po cung zad cig bgyi'o zhes smos pa dang/ bsod snyoms pa des khyim bdag de bzhin du byos shig ces smras pa dang/ 'phags pa ci zhig bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag
khang byos shig/ 'phags pa bdag la ni kar sha pa Na na mchas na/ bsod nams bya ba'i grogs dag ma mchis so// khyim bdag kar sha pa Nakhyeratengashog cig/ ngas khyod kyi
bsod nams kyi grogs bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ des kasha pa Na rnams byin nas/ lasasarapa byed pa yang bskos so// des kasha pa Na rnams gnas
khang gnad du bcug ste bzhag nas/ las cung zad tsam yang ma brtsams so// khyim bdag des 'disnyam du bdag gi gtsug lag khang ji tsam zhig byas pa ltar 'gro'o zhes bsams
nas de der 'ongs na cung zad tsam yang ma byas par mthong ngo// des bsod snyoms pa la 'phags pa tsa'i phyi'i las dag ma brtsams zhes dris pa dang/ las sar par byed pas/
'di'i yo byad dag dgos so zhes smras pa dang/ khyim bdag gis bdag gis kar sha pa Naphul ba del/ las sad par bya ba'i yo byad dag ci'i phyir ma sbyar/ des smas pa/ khyim
bdag sa phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas ma rung bar ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang/ 'bags pa del nongs pa ma mchis kyis gyis shig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsale pa/ de ste khyim bdag gis bsgo na las sar pa'i yo byad de las sbyor cig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ des de
las sar pa'i yo byad sbyar te/ bsod snyoms pa des lasasar pa yang byas nas/ bsod snyoms slong du song ba dang/ khyim bdag des mthong nas 'bags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms
bcaspyodan/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang gi las sar pa su bgyid ces smras pa dang/ khyim bdag soms can thams cad ni sa la gnas ni/ cang rtogs bzhin du khyod kyi gtsug lag
khang gi las sar pa byed dag/ las kyang bsod snyoms la 'jug tshod ces smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa de ltar na las sad pa'i rgyu de las bshes su mdzod cig ces smras pa dang/
des ci'i phyir na ngas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyir bsngos pa baba' zhes smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa de la gnod pa med kyis zo zhig ces smras nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste khyim bdag gis bsgo na de nyid las gzan du za zhig/ de la the tsom du ma byed
bar bza 'a bar gyis shig/ de nas bsod snyoms pa de zas mi bzang po bas pas gram bar gyur ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zas na pa ma bu zhig ces gsungs ba dang/ zas bzang
du thabar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bras bzang bor yang ma ze bar/ ji ltar gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi bza' ba'i thod de bzhin du bro zhig/ snum bag dag
maredas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ji ltarogatsug lag khang gzhan na snam bgard pa de ltar bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ bsod snyoms pa des las
sar pa'i yo byad dag blta ba'i phyir/ 'bru mar bsod snyoms su blangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ las sar pa'i rgyu las 'bru
mar nyos shig/ yo byadagazhan rnams ci dgos pa yang dolas sbyar bar bya ste/ dril bu tshom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//
mdor na dge 'dun rnams kyi mal stanAni// bla gab med par ma pa dang// tshon dang lhung bzed las byed ma bgo ste// srod 'as mtshan mo mal stan bgo mkhya/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan bgos nas/ tshon gyi
'a las byed/ gos 'khru/ 'tshod/ lhung bzed kyi las byed pa' sar gas rnams es tshig/ drin can du yang gyur cing/ tshon gyis kyang ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge
T+Tha slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun gyi gos gyon la tshon gyi las ma byed tsig/ lhung bzed kyi las dang
! gzhan yang shange gshags pa'i las dag ma byed cig/ byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan sta/ yang drug sde dag gis dge 'dun
gyi gos rnams gyon nas/ bla gab med par tshon rtsi 'i las byed cing char bab bzhin du 'dug nas ges ma rung par gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa drage slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge 'dun gyi gosa rnams gyen la bla gab med par char bab bzhin ma 'dug cig/ 'dug na 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ yang drug sde dag ljongs spyad pa spyod pa las ri brags kyi grong nan zhagi tumtshan mo srod 'das te phyin pa dang/ ri brags
kyi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der 'ongs nas/ dge slong dag gsi so sor ba shes pa'i gnas su ngal bso ba la zhugs so// de dag gis smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
ngal bso ba ni phyis byas mal stan 'gyod pa bas la/ rganams bzhin du mal stand gnas kha bgosangashago/ de dag gisatshodang ldan pa dge slong khacig nyal nas srod kyang 'khor
na gnod pa byus teci rung gas/ gang du bshes pa'i gnas gnas su skyol cig dang/ sanganam nangs nas gnas khang dang mal stan bgo bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis
tshodang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du khyed kyis bstan pa dag zhig par bya 'am/ gnas khang dang mal stanadag nged cag rgan rims su bgos shig ces smras pa dang/ mal
ston 'gyed pas gnas khang dang mal stan dag 'gyed pa la zhugs nas/ gsar bu rnams la ma gos bar namanangs nas/ drug sde dag cung zad cig nyal
saM nad par sngar las te/ mal stan dag slar phul nas dang ba dang/ drage slong dag gsi ci'i phyir na mal stan dag slar phul/ de dgags tshe dang ldan pa dgu nged cag mchod rten
tshal phyag 'tshal du 'os te/ dan slar 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag de ltar na khyed cag gis mtshan ras dge slong dag gtsos te ci bya zhes smras pa dang/
de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag bstan pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir byas kyi/ dal nyes pa cu yod ces smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gso dpyas btags so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na mtshan mo srod khor phan chadumal stan ma bgo zhig de ste glo bur du nub
mo 'ongasan gang mdza' ba'i gnas su 'dug la/ de ste namanas nas kyang 'dug par gyur na gnas khang yang sko zhig/ mal stan yang byan cig/ gleng g zhinu mnyin/
du yod pan ste/ drugasde dag ldes spyad pa spyod cing don gnas ra brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas/ ri dung gi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der phyin nas/ dge slong dag
0gis gang mdza' ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ de nas mal stan bgo bar byed pan rganarams kyi khri'u'i steng du de dag nan gyis 'dus nas/ dedag la rganarams kyis kyang bslang bar
mnusago/ gang ga tshomal stan dag bgos pa dang/ de'atshirgan mis kyi khri 'a de dag lhan cig spyod pa dang rte gnas rnams la byin nas/ mal stan ma thob pa rnams 'phya
ba'agyurato/ de ltar gyur pa drag slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gsar bu rnams 'phya
bani yus te/ debasan rganarims kyi khri'u dag dang/ chung du na snyan dag kyang rganarams su bgos shig/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o//
mdo'on snams dang bgrubs// gtso ba'i sa dang rkang pa bkrus// grub snod dang gzer bu dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin no// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapan dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag snam sa'i sgo na'achag cing gtam zer zhing 'dug nas/ dge
slong dag la gnod par byed/ tshe dang ldan pa dag skad cig sdod cig/ nged cag rgan rims su bya'o zhes smras nas/ de dag gis de'i nye 'khor du ston cing kha ton yang byed/ btso blag
gi las kyang byed nas/ dge slong dag snam phyi sar 'dod du yang ngo tsha nas/ bshang gni la sogs pa yang bag yangs su byar med/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin
nang du 'jug tuyang med par/ de dag gis 'gags pa dang/ de dag thamasacadun du gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dug gis/ bcom ldan 'dusal gsol pa dang/ bcom
'ab+baM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bsan dge slong dag gis snam phyi sar song nas gotam zer zhing ma 'dug go/ de'i nye 'khor du ston par yang ma byed cig/ klog par yang ma byed
cig/ kha ton yang ma byed cig/ btso blag las kyang ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gas snum gyis na gtam zer zhing 'dug gam/ rims bzhin du byed dam/ de'i nye 'khor du ston tam/
kha ton byed dam/ klog gam/ btso phyag gi las byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag bkrus na 'khru zhing 'dug pa ma zin pa na/ drug sde dag gis nged rgan no zhes zer/
N+NaM nas bslang ngo// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gis bkrus na/ ge slong
zi ba ku ba ma zin par a bslang zhig/ bsas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gtso sar song ba dang// phyis drug sde dag der 'os te/ nged cag rgan gyis ji ltar/
00 rgan mas bzhin du 'jug go zhes smras pa dang/ de dag 'phyas gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgan rims su gtsasaram 'dug par/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i rims bzhin du zhugs ngashagi/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'jug na 'das pa dang
bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag rkang pa 'khru zhing 'dug pa la bkru ba ma zin par/ nadapa 'khrub 'og gzhi rgan rims su bya'o zhes te khyer ba dang/ dedag
'phya bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slo dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gsarkang pa bkru ma zin
bar rkang pa bkru ba'igazhi ji ltar rgan rims bzhin ma bkur zhigi/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi rkang pa bkru ma zin par/ rkang pa bkru ba'i gzhi rgan rims bzhin du khyer na
'das pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gdod phyi bas gdong phyi ba ma zin par/ rgan mas su bya'o zhes zer nas gdong phyi ba khyer ba dang/ dengag 'phya bar
gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gisaM/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge slong gi gdong phyi ma zin par
nyu// rgan rims su ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi gdong phyi ma zin par/ gdod pa brganarims su khyeran 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
du snod dang/ gzar bu dang/ kha gzar la sogs pa yang rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o// gleng gzhi'inang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// mdor na
bum pa dang ni gzhong bu dang// lhung bzed nag po pa tung por dang// spu gri'i

pagan mid bras skran gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par/ dge 'dun gyi chon gyi bum pa// sduradang sen gcad dang// snang tsher dang norkong rten no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes zer te khyer budang/ de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsalab/ dge slong dag gis btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par/ dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa dag rgatu rams su ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong ga btso blag gi las byed pa/
ma zin par/ dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuro// bum pa la ji lta ba bzhin du/ gzhong khung la yang de bzhin no// drug sde dag
gis dge slong dag zas za ba ma zin par/ lhung bzed nag po rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer ba dang/ de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gas dge slong dag gzan bza' ba ma zin par/ lhung bzed nag po rgan rams su ma bkur zhig/ dge
slong gis dge slong dag gzan babra' ba ma zin par/ lhung bzed nag po rgan rims su khyeran de dag 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gzan za zhing skom phung
tsam 'thungs pa dang/ btung ba'i phor du rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer te/ de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gsi/ bcom ldan 'dras la gsol pa dang
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gzan za zhing skyom phyed tsam 'dus pa la/ btung ba'i phor bu rgyan rims su ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag
gis dge slong dag gzan zhing skam khyadatsam 'thungs pa la/ phor bu rgan rams su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skra phyedatsam bregs pa
dang/ spu gri yang rgan rams su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ro// de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as
dkyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gis dge slong dag skradang ba spu byed tsam dregs pa la/ spu gri rgan rims sum bkur zhug/ dge slang dag gnyis dge slong dag sgra dang/
sku byad tsam bregs pa dang/ spu gri rgan rimasasu khyen 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skudang kha spu 'breg pa'i spu gri rnon por bya ba'i brdar laphyedatsam
brdar ba dang/ brdar rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang/ de drag 'phyabar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slongadag gis/ bcos ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
'a/ ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi skra dang kha spu bregApa'i spu gri brdar la phyed tsam brdar nas// rgan rims su ma bkur zhag/ dge slong dag gi
sku dang kha spu breg pa'i spu gri brdaral phyed tsam brdar nas/ rgan rims su khyer na 'dos dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis nga ge slong dag sen mo phyed tsam bcad pa dang
sen mo gcad pa rgan rimis su bya zhes zer nas khyer ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa dge slong dag gis sun mo phyed tsam bcad pa la/ sen mo gtsad pa rgan rims su ma bkur zhagi/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gsonamo phyed bcad pa la// sen mo gtsang
ba rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par gyur te// drug ga sde dag sa dge slong dag sna spu phyadatsam btogs pa dang/ sna spu btog pa'isgod tshor rgan rams su bya'o zhes zer te/
khyer ro de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag sna spu phyed tsam btogasapa la/ sna sgra
'thog pa'i snang tsher rgan rims su ma bkur zhig/ khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi khri rkang rten du bcas pa la nyal zhing 'dug
pa dang/ rgan ramis su bya'o zhes zer te khyer ba dang/ de dag 'phyang r gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ btsam ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi khri rkang rten can gyi steng du nyal ba la/ rgan rims su ma 'dug cig/ ngage slong dag gis dge slog khrirkang rten can/
gyi steng du nyal zhing 'dug pa la/ rkang rten rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad palnga pa'o//
mdor na brtan pa skud pa gnyis pa dang// gri dang khab dang blangs dang// gzhan yang 'diltar m zin par// bslang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis shing leb kyi steng du spyi
mdang/ stod g.yogs dang/ mthang gis dug dge 'dun gyi shing leb kyi stod du phyud tsam bting ba dang/ rgan rams su bya'o zhes zer takhyeraro// de dag 'phya bar gyur naso/
dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi shing leb kyi stong du sbyar ma dang/ stod
g.yogs dang/ mthang gos dag byed tsam bting pa la/ dge 'dun gyi shing leb de rgan rims su ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi shing leb kyi steng du sbyar
ma dang/ stodag yogs dang/ mthang gos dag phyed tsam bting ba las/ dge 'dun gyi shing leb rgan rims su khyeran 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gos
dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi skud pas phyed tsam drubs ba dang/ rgan rims su bya'o zhes zer nas khyer ba dang/ de dag 'phya bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcomo ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gosaM dge 'dun gyi skud pas khyodatsam
btsems pa la/ rgan rims su ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi skud pas datsam btsoms pa las/ rgan rims su khyer na 'dus pa dang bas
par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag khag gis dag tshon las byed tsam btso blag byas te/ dge 'dun gyi btso blag srad bu la bres pa dang rgan rnams bzhin du bya'o zhes zer te khyer ro//
de ltar gyur pa dge slo dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi gos phyed tsam btsobag byas
sa dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi srad bu la bres pa rgan rims su ma bkur zhagi/ ge slong dag gis dge slong dag ga gos phyed tsam btso blag byas pa/ dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi srad bu la
bris pa rgyan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gas dge slong dgag tshes gos dge 'dun gyi gras phyed tsam dras pa dang/ rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes/
zer te khyer ba dang/ de dag 'phyar bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
ngag gas dge 'dun gyi gros chos gos byed tsam dras pa rgan rims su ma bkur tshig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi gras phyed tsam sa ba rgan rims su khyer na
khya@#// 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gi ches gas dge 'dun gyi khab kyis spyod tsam dub pa la/ rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes zes
nas khyer ba dang/ de dag 'phya bar gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gsu/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong
dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun rgya khab kyis phyed tsam drubs pas rgan rims su ma bkuru zhig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag gi chos gos dge 'dun gyi khab kyis phyed tsamadrabs pa
rgan rims su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skra phyed tsam dregs pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi skabazedapa'i sa rgan rims bzhin bya'o zhes zer khyer
ba dang/ de dag 'apya ba gyur ste// de dag gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gis dge slong
dag skra phyedatsam bregs pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi sku babed nga tA'is rgan rims su ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra bzed
nga dras rgan rin sa su khyer na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis gang yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin par/ dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng
na 'dug pa dang/ rgan rims bzhin bya'ozhes zer nas bslang ste btang nas// de dag 'phya bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong dag gis gang yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin par/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng du 'dug pa 'gan
rims su bya'o zhes ma bsang zhig/ dge slong dgags dge slong dag gang yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhan dang gzhan gyi las ma zin pazhin du/ dge 'dun gyi stan gyi steng na 'dug pa la/
rgan rims su bya'o zhes bsrung ste btangan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/// mdor na/ ma
stogs kun tu rgyu ba dang// mngon mtshan bdag gi byin pa med// yid ches par na gzung ba lnga// gnyan phyir te spyod dge slong ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshol bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis gang gi tshe yul mnyamadaka'i rgyal po gzugs can sang bo mkhas pa can/ lha stong phrug
brgyad cudang/ yul mnyam dka' bram ze dang/ khyim bdag brgya phrag stong dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshon rgyal po'i khab tu/ 'di ltar kyi
khyed cag rgyal po' bab na gnas pa dang/ yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po dag nyon cig/ rgyal po pa'i yul na su yang rkun po ma byed kyi// gang
gas byas pa de ngas yul dang phral togatong ngo// nor bdag la ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril chen bsgrags so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa la'i
yaM rgya la po gsal rgyal dar la bab pa lta bu'i mdo sdus btul ba de'atshin/ des kyang mnyan du yod par 'di ltar rgyal po de'i yul nusu'ang rkun po ma byed cig/ gang gis nga'i yul du kun
pa/ po byas pa de chad pa gsadang sa bcad la/ nor bdag lan nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bab nas sbyin no zhes dril chen bsgrags so// de'i tshe na gang yul mnyam dka' na gnas pa'i rkun po
rnams dang/ gang yul ko sa la na gnas pa rnams de'i sa mtshams kyi bar du dong nas 'bod do/ yul mnyamAdaka'an gnas pa'i rkun po rnams dang/ yul ko sa la na gnas pa
sh+tsa rnams thams cad sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khon gnas / 'gren pa mang po dag 'joms so zhes de skad kyi sgra kun tu grags so// de dag gis thos nas yul mnyam dkacu'agron pa
mang po bsil dang lhan cig yul ko sa lar 'deng ngo// yul ko sa la nas kyang yul mnyam dkar de bzhin du dong ste/ ji tsam dus phyi zhag na yul mnyam dka' nas 'gran pa mang/
po bsal dang bcas te/ yul kos lar ded pa dang/ de dag gang gi tshe mtshams las 'das nas/ yul ko sa lar phyin pa de'i tshode nas ded dpon gyis smras pa/ kyi ko sa la'i
rgyal po gsal rgyal ni mi srun la gtum zhing khro ste dpa' zhing mthu dang ldan no zhes grag/gse/ gal te 'gon pa mang po dang bdag cag rnams bcom na yang bsob par nus kyis/
bsal ba de dag slar khyi nag ces smras pa dang/ 'gran pa mang po dag gis smras pa// de ltar na de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas bsal ba de dag slar bkya'o// rkun po rnams kyis bya
ra btsugs te bsdad pa dang/ byar bas bsel ba slar log pa mthong nas/ des kyi bse'al ba rnams slar log gis/ 'gon pa mang po gzhom mo zhes sbas nas/ 'gron
pa mang po de dag sa la'i dgon par phyin pa dang brtsom mo// de la tshong pa kha cig ni bsad/ kha cig ni phrogs so// del phrogs pas mgo rdul gyis gang bar byas te/ rgyal po gsal
rgyal gyi drung du song nas lha la bdag cag ni tshong pa lags na/ khyed kyi yul du phyin na tshong pa ma lags par gyur to// tsa byas lha bdag cig na rkun pos btsemamo// rgyal pogs/
rgyal gyis/ 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu myur du ris par song la/ rkun po dang noro rnams zung la 'on cig ces bsgo ba dang/ lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhis nas
dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ba glang gi tshogs dang/ rta'i tshogs dang/
shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dbung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha bskon te/ myur bar 'dres su shing sa la'i dgon par dang bdang/ rkun po drug cu'i bar dgon pa nashangs la stag po'i
nang du zhugs te bag yangs su nor 'gyed cing 'khod pa dang/ 'phags skyes pos de'i drung du brtsis te/ de dag gis rkun po kha cig ni bosad/ kha cig ni bros/ kha ci'i don gson
por bzung ngo// de nas rkun pos g.yul las rgyal te/ rkun po dang bcos pa'i nor rdzas dag/ byer te rgyal po'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas/ lha 'di dag na rkun po'o//
'ang dug ni nor rje zhes sbas pa dang/ rgyal pos tshong pa dag lo kyi de dag bdag bdag gi ner dag ngo shes par byos lo slar khyer cig ces bsgo ba dang/ de na mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba dang/
dge slong dag kyang bcom pa'i nang du gtogs nas/ rgyal pos de thams cad phyogs pa'i nor rdzas slar byon pa dang/ [']kun turgyu ba'i rang ga u0f7agos btsag gnang du btsos pa dang/ dge slong
dag gi yang khyer ro// dge slong dag gis bdag cag gi shes btsag gi nang du btsos pa ngo ma shes nas/ de dag kun tu rgyu ba dang lhan cig tu 'thab mo byung bdang/ rkun tu rgya ba mang po
dag gis de dag khyer pa dang rgyal po'i drung du song ste/ lha bdag cag ga gis btsag gi nang du btsos pa mu stegs can kun tu rgyu bas 'tshal te slar ma stor nas smras pa dang/ rgyal pos mu
stags can kun tu rgyu ba de dag bkug ste/ kwa ye 'phags pa dag bde gis dag ci'i phyir bkur gyis/ slar phul cig ces bsgo ba dang/ de dag gis lha btsag gi nang du btsos pa 'di
dag na bdag cag gi gos so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos 'phags pa ngag khyed kyi gang yin pa shes par gyis la khyer cig ces smras so// dge slong dag gis gcig nas gcig phyung ste bltas
ba dang kha cig ngoshes te/ lha 'di dgan bdag cag ga gis so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba dag la/ e ma'o mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba 'jab bus zhu
ba rkun ma yin na/ khyed cag na rkun po chen po yin no zhes smras pa dang/ de dag la lan med nas cang mi zir bar 'khod do// rgyal pos smras ng// kyi 'phagos pa khyed cag
gas da phan chad chos gos la mngon mtshan bya ba'i rigs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
dag rgyal po de skad zer ba yus te/ de bas na chos gos dag mngon mtshan thob cig/ kha chag dang 'or thabs su drubs shig/ sgro gu yang thogs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon mtshan thob
shig ces pa sungasan/ dge steng dag gis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsal pa// chos gos kyi mthar snaga'i thig le phyosangag
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim pa dug gnan zhig gis/ de'i rigs mnyam pa zhig las chung ma zhig blangs nas/ de dang lhan cig tu dga' yongs su spyod/
'tho do de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las/ de dus bu zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de sgrub brgyudadam dgu 'das pa dang/ bu khye'u zhig btsas te/
zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas so// de rigs dang mthun par ming btags so// de bsrings bskyad de cher gyur pa dang/ sa phyi zhig na
de' ma dus lA 'das so// khyim bdag pas kyang chung ma zhig byas nas de dang lhan cig rtse dga'i yongs su spyod do// de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las/ dus pa zhig na bu pho gsum
ny+nyo zhag btsas te/ de dag kyang rigs dang mthun par mang btags so// 'di ltar dgra'i nang na chen chung 'thab pa gcugs te/ mos mi shi ba'i bu khye'u chen po de la rtag par gtses
pa dang/ de ma dran nas da chad de yul gzhan du song ba las/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung de// de nas dus phyi zhag na khyim bdag de na bar gyur nas/
de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dag ga sman byas kyang de'i nad thag bar ma gyur nas/ de na ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ring po ma thogs par dus
'da' ba shes nas/ des khyim tshes dag bsags te 'dus nas de'i nang du bu la smras pa// bu dag khyed cag ga yu bo chen po dge sbyongashAkya'i sras kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de yang khyed kyis
nor skal byin cig ces smras nas/ bsags pa kun mthan zad par 'gyur// mtho ba'i mtha' na 'jig par 'gyur// 'dus pa'i mtha'ani 'gyes par 'gyur// chos kyi
mtha'an zhi bar 'gyur// dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te// de'i bu longs spyod cing 'dug pa des bdag gi pha dus las 'das so zhes thos te/ de yang 'di snyam du bdag song
la ma yar mo dang nu bo dag gi mya ngan bsad gas/ chos bshad du 'gro'o snyam du saMms nas/ de jitsam dga' ba'i bar du ljongs spyod de mnyan du yod pa gang na ba de lags su lhungs
spyod cing song ngo// rims bzhin du sbyod cing mnyan du yod pa la phyin nas lam gyi ngal bsos te bdag gi khyim du 'os pa dang/ nang gi skye bo dag gse mthong nas ngus te/ a
ba'i sgra dag khyim tshes dag gis shes nas/ de dag 'dus te kha cagen skad phyung ste ngu/ kha cig ni mgo mchi mas gang zhing 'dug nas/ so so'i skye bo dag ni 'dod chags
dang ldan pas gnyen dang bral bar gyur pa la mya ngan gyis mag mchi mas gang ngo// de yang du ma ga khyer zhing 'dug go/ de la rgan mo gzhan zhig gis bu khyed kyi
bsananir skal byin pas nged kun gyis kyang bris na ma du zhig/ skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de cung zad tsam zhig gi bar du sems shing 'dug nas/ des ma yar mo
dang na bod la chos bshad do// de dag gi mya ngan cung bad sangs nas/ de dag gis khyod kyi nor skal dag lang zhig ces smras pa dang/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis nga 'das nas byin pa na mid de zhes gsungasan ji ltar blang snyam du bsams nas/ tshodang ldan pa dag ngan rab tu byung ba la nor rdzas kyis byar med kyi steng du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
kyang nga 'das nas byon pa med de zhes gsungs kyis/ khyed cag nyid khyed cig ces smras pa dang/ de dag gi nyes pa ngon brjed pa// 'phags pa phung la sbyin pa yang byin cig/ bsod
nams kyang nges shag de la nyes pa ci zhig yod ces smras so/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'as la gsol nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyim pa la na re ba yod/ rab tu byung ba la ni re ba med pa'i phyir te// khyim pa dag la ni nga 'dasan byin cig pa ni khyim pa dag gi ste btsan
ni rab tu byung ba lan de lta bu med de// de bas na khyim pas de bun bsams te byin pa lo nag/ sangs rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bya ba'i phyir te/ de la the tsom du
ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod nga na ste/ dge slong dag lce ba'ani lu dang/ so shing dang/ bkru ba'i yo byad dang/ ba glang gi lce bo rnams 'chags dang/
khyams dang/ sgo khang dag tu bar nas ljongs spyad pa spyod du 'dong ngo// de dag la dge slong dag gis bcom skyes nas spyad de// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yid bcugs pa rnam pa lnga las ni lang zhigi/ mdza' ba dang/ yid 'dres pa dang/ bla ma dang/ mi 'gyurab
dang thos na dga' bar 'gyur bste/ yid gcugs pa rnam pa de lnga la ni spyad par bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cage/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ mnyenadu
yod panu khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhigi blangs nas/ de dang lhan cig turtse dga' yongs su spyod do// de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las/
dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang/ bu mo zhig btsas nas de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston
[7/ 2]/ dachen po byas nas/ rigs dang mthun pa'i mang btags so// de bsrings bskyed de cher gyur pa dang/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de blangs te/ deldan/
la sogs pas de brdzangs te btang ngo// dus pa zhig na khyim pa de dus 'das nas/ de khyu dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
tu byung ngo// de dus phyi zhage na mu ge byung nas/ bsod snyoms slong zhing 'dug pa dang/ de bsod snyoms spyod pa las srang zhig tu de'i pas mthong nas/ des smras pa/ bu mo nga ltar
gang na ji ltar 'tsho zhange 'dug ces smras pa dang/ des pa mu ge byung nas bdag rab tu bkres shing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang/ des bu de ltar na khyod rab tu ma byunganani/ ngas khyod la ma
'dod bzhin du sbyin na/ da bsodri snyoms ma byed par bdag gi khyim du ga ban ba zhing dar mo khang du song zhig/ des khas blangs nas/ de grogs gcig dang gnyis kyis zesangashing dbyar mo
khang du song ngo// zhag du ma zhig gi bar du de la bos nas// bu bsod snyoms pa gnyis na byas spyin par mi nus kyis/ khyod gcig pu 'di'i gzan zos shing song zhig ces smras pa dang/
des pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig pu gud du 'gro bar ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa de dge slong ma dag gas/ dge slong dgal smras nas/
dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// de ltar na sa gnang gas dus 'di 'dra ba lan dege slong mas dge slong ma'i dag/
'dun la gnyenu dang lhan tsag 'dri bar te spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cagi/ gsol ba na 'di ltar gyis shig/ stan thade la/ gaN+Di rdungs te/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dag 'dus shing 'khod
ba dang/ jiltar rgan rums su phyag byos la/ rgan rims kyi mdun du pha gu 'am/ stananang tshangs can gyi stong du 'dug nas/ thal mo sbyor latshig 'di skad ces smos shig/
gson tsag 'phags ma' dege 'dun ma rnams/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di 'dra ba'i mu ge'adus la bab nas/ bsod snyoms bsang ba yang mi nus na/ 'phags ma'i drage
'dun ma bdag ming 'di zhes pa gya ba 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma 'das gnyen dang lhan cig tu'adre bar nye sbyong kyi sdom pa gsol na/ 'phags ma'ige 'dun dag gas bdag gi ming 'di zhes
bgyi ba las nyenadang lhan cig 'dri bar te spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cig/ brtse ba can brtse ba'i phyir ro// de ltar lanaganyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// dre'og dge slong ma gcig
gas gsol ba gyis la las byos shig/ gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/ dge slong ma mang 'dazhis bgyi ba 'di/ 'di ltar mu ge'i dus la bab ste/ 'phags/
ma'i dge 'dun dag las gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dri bar te spyod kyi sdom pa gsolan/ de ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis dus la bab cing babodan/ 'phags ma'i
dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnod la/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar te spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cig/ 'di gsol ba'o// las
kyang 'di bzhin du bya// gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams/ dge slong ma mang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ 'di ltar mu ge'adus la bab ste/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams la gnyen
dang lhan cig tu 'dri bar te skyed kyi sdom pa gsol te/ de'as 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mu ge'i dus la bab na/ gnyen dang lhan cig 'drebar nye
spyod kyi sdom pa gsolan/ 'phags ma rnams las gang la dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mu ge'i dus la bab ste/ gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dri bar te spyod kyi sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de
dag na cing ma gsung zhig/ mi bzedapa ni smyos shig/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gnyen dang lhan cig tu'adre bar spyad kyi sdom ba sul lags te/
'di ltar cang mi gsung bas/ de de bzhin du 'dzin te// dge slong mas gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dri bar te spyodakyi sdom pa/ dge 'dun ma rnams kyis byin par gyuran/ gcig
gnyen gyi khyim du zas za bar gyis la/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig nam mu ge'i tshon rjes su gnang ngo// de ma yin par ma gnas shig/ mu ge ma byung bar gnas na 'das pa dang bcas
par 'gyurar// gleng gzhi'i nang nas skyo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o/// mdor na= bsu ba lan rnam gnyis te// sa la yang ni rnam gsum ste// skyob
yang ni 'dod pa dang// sdor sdus par n gyur pa'o/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge
slong gzhan zhig khyim bdag cig las kar sha pa Na zhig bsdus pa dang/ de dus kyi mthazhig tu ji zhig gis dus 'das nas/ dge slong de ji ltar dus 'dus pa khyim bdag des thos
so= dge slong de jiltar dus 'das pa khyim bdagayes shes nas/ gtsug lag khang dusong ste/ shes bzhin du dge slong dag la dris pa/ 'phags pa 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dge slong
degang na mchis/ de dag gis smras pa// bzhin bzangs dus 'das so// 'phags pa des bdag ga kar sha pa Na zhig bskyis te 'tshal lo// bzhin bzangs de ni dur khrod du bskyal gyis
der song ste dos shig/ 'phags pa khyed kyis de ltung bzed dang chos gos bgos na bdag gso ji ltar dur khrod du song ste bda'/ khyod kyis stsol cig ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams
thubya// kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag desan legs par smras te/ de nor las
ba bskyis bu dge slong dag gis byin cig/ de rtag gis gang nas sbyin pa ma ngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos yod pa las byin cig/

gse byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la rgyan dbul lo zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnong gis khul la rkang ba'i rgyan dang rna rgyan ma gtogs/
snyab gdu bu la sogs pa yang phul cig/ de ste bcom ldan 'dus kyis gnangan/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' gzhugs la phyi'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnang gis brgyan par byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs grong khyer du rkang pas khyer ba dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas
N+NaM sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnan/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs khyogs las grong khyer du bkur bar bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisakhaka'i
stsal pa// khyim bdag gnang gis khyer cig/ khyogs las khyer yang mi mdzes par gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'dasakyis gnangan/ bdag
0 gas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs shing rta las bkur bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag gnang gis de bzhin du byas shig/ nga
rta ya nga ba dan dang gdugs dag med bas mi mdzes par gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med khras sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'as kyis gnang na/ bdag gsangashing rta'i snying du ba danudang/ gags
dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas brgyan par bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnang gis brgyan par byos shig/ byang chub sems
dba'i gzugs la me tog gis snyan gyi gong ma brgyan ma mdzes par gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i
gzugs kyi dbu snyan gyi gong du me tog gi rgyan dbul lo zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnang gis phul cig/ gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshogs
su bcad ba gnyis pa'o/// mdoran yon phul ba dang yonadabul ba// de bzhin 'phreng ba'i snod rnams dang/ rol mo rnams kyang mi dgag cing// rgyun tshogs rnams
kyang mi ga zhigeg sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa 'dzota'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon ming bas sbyin gyisade/
ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag ga'i bya chub sems dpa gathugs kyi zhabs la yonadabul lo zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
ka stsalal khyim bdag gnang gis phulag/ de'i mchod ston gyi tshe yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong mdang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen mdang/ gzhan yang
zla lta bar 'dod pa'i phyir phal mo che lhags pa rnams kyis de la yon phul ba mangs pas/ red ba de sus bkur ba dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge slong gis bkur ba bya'o zhes pa dang/ dge slong gnas brtan dang/ gnas brtan dag gas khyer ba dang/ ma dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas
bca' bar byed pa dang/ gzhan yang gzhon pa dgon pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya'o// dge slong gnas brtan dang/ gnas brtan dag gsan bsrung bar byos shig/ yon phul ba dang/
ny+nyo me tog dang/ gos la sogs pa shing rta'i thog tu bzhag pa dang/ la cig na ltung ba ma byin par len pa dag gis thugs thub tu khyer nas/ khyim bgamagonamed zas sbyin gyis de stabcom
ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gsangashing rta'i steng du 'phreng ba'i snod bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnang gis byas shig/ dge slong/
mcha rnams kyis rol mo rnams kyang ma zhi/ skye bo rnams kyang so sor mgyes bar/ gzugs kyi rgyan rnams sbas pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag ji ltar
dad pa de bzhin du/ ma dad pa yang skyes te/ kye ma'o khyod kyis lo mo rnams kyang de/ skye bo mang po yang so sor gyes nas gzugs kyi rkyen rnam bkral na cinyis zhes dbyas pa dang/ de ltar
gyur ba dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/ de lta bas
nal mo rnams kyang mazhi/ skye bo mang po yang so so'i ma gyis par dge slong rnams kyis gzugs kyi rgyan ma tshul cig/ brtul na 'dus ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga'i
mdo'i tshogs su bcad pa gsum pa'o/// mdor na kun 'dus pa dang dus ston dang// dpyid zla tha chung zhal pasro dang// la ldadang ni drug byas la// mchod ston
chen po tha ma'o sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/
yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams mthong bdang/ yid dga' ba skyes nas des bsams pa// bcomo ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong rnams 'di ltar dus su sbyin pa ni rnam pa lnga ste/ lta gang zhen/ glo bur du 'os pa dang/ gdong ba rnams la sbyin pa byin pa
'di ni sbyin pa'i dus dang po'o// nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus gnyis pa'o// lanyes shing 'phongs brel ba la sbyin pa 'din sbyin pa'i dus gsum pa'o// gang
su la yang rung ste/ lo tog gsar pa dang/ 'bras bu gsar pa dang/ gsar thog de dag des thog mar tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa la byin zhing/ de'i 'og tu bdag za ba
bdin sbyin pa'i dus bzhi pa 'o/ gang su la yang rung ste/ rlung ldang ba 'am/ yul rmas ba 'am/ char 'bab pa nam/ grangag la sogs pa de lta bu 'a rnam pas rlung ldang ba dang/
tshul rgyas pa dang/ char 'bab pa dang/ grang ba la gAwan nam/ skyob 'am/ blug pa'i m/ skom la sogs pa de dag phyir phyung ste/ dge 'dun la 'bulazhinge/ 'phags pa'i di
bros na sus kyang ma gsham/ chos gos la yang nan gyis ma phog ste/ bde ba la reg pa de gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa 'din sbyin pa 'dus lnga pa'o// de ltar na 'din yul so son gnas
pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyenadang/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa lam gyis ngal b rnams la do ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis de dag 'dus pa'i zas
wa sbyar rosnyam du bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
phyogs gtsasi tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das glo bur du mchis pa// yul so so na gnas pa la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin
pa'i dus dang po'o zhes bya ba nas snga ma ltar bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba 'di'i dus kyi sbyin pa ldeba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyin pa'i dus ltar gsungs na/ da 'di'i byang chub sems
dpa'i mchod pa chen po la yul so so nas mtshis pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyenadang dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa glo bur du mchis pa lam gyis yosasu gdu sa
pa de rnams la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang// bdag gis 'dus pa de dag gi zas sbyar zhes gso la pa dang/ btsamo ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag gnang gse sbyor
ga/ bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das zla ba gang la btsas zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag
dpyid zla tha chung la btsas so// de ste bcom ldan 'das kyisaganang na/ bdag gisi bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang gi zhi la bsro ba sbyor zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa khyim bdag gnang gas sbyor gi/ yang bcom ldan 'das 'du lags nas da du bregs zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba khyim bdag lo lnga lon pa na'o// de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la la lnga nang lan cig mchod ston sbyar ro zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal la/ khyim bdag gnang gis sbyor cig/ yang btsam ldan 'das kyi bo gtsug phud du lags na bzhag ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa'i pa khyim bdag lo drug na'o// de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnanganA/ bdag gis gtsug phud kyi mchod ston sbyar to zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal ba/
khyim padag gnang gas sbyor cig/ yang zla ba gang la bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes mngon du chud ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag
dpyid zla tha chung la'o// de lta bcom ldan 'das kyis gnangan/ bcom ldan 'as 'dzam bu'i grib ma la gzugs bzhugs pa la mchod ston chen po sbyar ro zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag gnang gas sbyor cage/ gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// mdoran pa rtswa stan dang na the tsom
dang/ snga phyi dag tu 'dug pa dang// ca co dag dang lam rnams dang// gan+d+hi dung dang dra rdung bko sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i zas spyodicig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong mang bo rnams stan med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rtswa'i stan sbyar te der 'dug la ba za 'a bar bya'o/ btsa ldan 'das kyis rtswa'i stan la 'dug par bya'o zhes gsus pa dang/ dge slong rnams gzan zes pa dang/ the
tsom skyes nas/ rtswa stan de khyer ted nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stan khyer te ma 'dang bar bu nga bor byas te 'og la/ gang gi tshe dus ston yongs su rdzogs par gyur
ba de'i tshe thams cad bor nagi/ dge slong rnams ston mo'i dus la snga phyir 'dug pas gzhan gzan khros te song bar gyur pa dang/ gzhan gdod rong las la las thob/ la las ma thebasta/
brel bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis go ramis ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug cig ces gsungs so// dge slong mang po 'dus pa dang ca cor gyur pas dus mngashesanas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dus brjod par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang/ de dag nyid du dus la bab bo// dus la bab zhes brjod ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gaN+Di
0 spya// brdung bar byos shig/ de ltar yang gzhan dag la gsal bar ma gyur nas/ de la bcom ldan 'dasakyis sngar nagaNi chung du brdungs la/ phyisigatsArdungs
kyi shig ces gsungs so// de ltar yang gzhan nyin par gnas par song ba rnams kyis ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dung kha sdoms bus la rta yang zungs shig ces gsungs/
lci/ so glegazhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o/// mdor na deran rje yang brdung bar bya// de nas shing rta dbyung ba dang// dngos po byung dang rnyed pa/
dang/ ji ltar tshul bzhin bsko bar bya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med gras sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bzhugs ti/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gaN+Di dang/ dung kha sdoms pa dang/ rnga rdungs shigaces bka' stsal na/ de dag gis gaN+Di rdung ba'i rjes bzhin brdungs pa dang/ nad pa dang las 'gatogs pa/
rnams la gnod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsalapa/ gang gi tshonang ba rnams zas mnos zin par gyur la/ las byed pa rnams kyang zas bris zin pa de'atshin/
gaN+Didang/ dung kha sdoms pa dang/ ngordungs shig mchod zin kyang yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dgekhanyin dang/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa

wa00 so sor ma dong ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing rta phyung zhig dang de nas ra 'dong ngo zhes gsungs ba dang/ mchod ston de'i tshodage slong rnams kyis rnyed pa grub pa de ji ltar
bgo ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du mnyam par bgesashig/ dge slong mang bo 'dus pa de ngag ca co byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcu zhango gtsasi/ tu bgo bar bya'o// brgya zhing gcig tu bya// de'i 'og tu stong zhing gtsagaturedapa bgo bar byos shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe
dang ldan pa u pa 'asi zhus pa/ btsun ba gal te bcu'i nang nas gcig dus las 'das na dum ba 'i yo byad sudabang zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// u ra/
la di ste bsgos pa'i tshe dus 'das na shi ba yo byad dge 'dun 'dus ba dbang gis spyi'i bgasashig/ 'on te ma bsgos par dus 'dasan na dgu bo rnams kyis thob bo// de bzhin du brgya stong sde
rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o// gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su btsad po drug pa'o// gleng gazhi'i sgo lnga ba rdzogs te/ gleng g rnams rdzogs so//
rkyang ba'i sgo'i mdor na/ phyag na thog mar bya ba dang// gnyis pa'i snod rnams ma nges pa// gsum du yo byad rnams kyang ste// den rkyang par btags pa'o//
0// bar n phyag 'tshal ba dang gsing ma dang// de bzhin 'jog ga dang nyal dang// de bzhin btung bor bu ram shing// de bzhin mar dang sra ba sdong po rnams// mdor
rnams bsdus par gsungs pa'o/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ban bzhugs so// de'i tshonadage slob
ga nyis shigi rnam pa gdon mi za ba'i gtam smra ba las gcig la gcagi tshig rtsub mo smras nas/ de la gzhon nus rgan po la rab tu sbyos te/ de gnas khang du zhugs te 'dug pa dang/
gzhon nus rganapa la rab tu spyos kyis song ste bzod pa gsol lo snyam bsams nas/ des de'i gnas khang du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ btsun pa bdag gis khyed la rab tu
smyos pa bzod par mdzod cig ces bzod pa gso' bar byed pa dang/ de cher khros nas gtses te gnod pa byas so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis thos nas/ brgyugs te/ tshe dang ldan/
h+phub ci'i phyir 'o dod 'bod ces dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'di ltar bdag gi gnas khang du 'os te/ gnod par byed pa la ltos/ de dag gis de la tshodang ldan pa ci'i phyi
khyod kyis dge slong rgan pa 'di la gtses zhes smras pa dang/ des kyang ji ltar gyur pa smras nas/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ des bsams pa// de'i phyi na bcom ldan 'das kyis
phyag byos shig bar gsungs te/ dzinus pa nyan thos rnams byams pa'i so mas dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ brtse ba'i sems kyis rang gi don bsgrubs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/
'di ltar 'di ni bdag mthong nas ma dga' ba dang khros par gyur na/ bdag gis 'di la bzod par byas te tsa ri gas 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/ de song nas phyis de la phrug kyang ma byed n bzod

pa byed pa lta ci smos/ de nas dus phyi nagi na dge slong rgan pa de dge slong ga zhan zhig dang lhan cig 'chag cang gtam zer zhing 'khod pa dang/ dge slong de yang dge slong dag la phyag 'tshal ba las/
phyogs der 'ongs pa dang/ 'chag pa'i grogs kyis dge slong des de la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'dilaci'i phyirje bzod par ma byas/ rgan pa
nges 'din 'di ltar sdig pa'i sems thob can te/ ltasangashagi dang da yang khyod la phyag byed kyi/ nga la mi byed de zhes sbas pa dang/ de bzhin des phyag byas pa dang/ des smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis sdig pa'i sems can de mthong ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa mthong ngo// de nas des de la tshodang ldan pa bdag gis gzhan du byesanagazhan du mthong ste/ khyod ni ngo tsha zhing
'gyod pa can bslab pa la mos pa 'o zhes thos na/ khyod ci'i phyi'i de ltar ma yin zhes smras pa dang/ des btsun pa bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong tshul khrims dang
ldan pa 'di lta bu la khyod kyis ci'i phyir bzod pa mi bya zhes smras pa dang/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang/ de 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyurapa
dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag so rnams dge slong de 'phya pan yus kyis/ gang rnam par 'khon pa de
sbyabazod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'khon pa de bzod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhan zhig gis ba byed par byas kyang mkhazod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
la ba gang ma spyod pa de nye sbyong du phyin pa dang phyag byos shig/ des kyang nad med cig ces smra ba 'am/ yang na phyag byos shig/ de ltar ma byed na gnyis la'ang 'das pa dang bcas par
waM 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khon pa'i dge slong la bzod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong gnyis shig rnam pa gdon mi za ba'i gtam smras pa las
'khrugs pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod par gyur te/ de gnyis las dge slong gzhon pas dge slong rgan pa la tshig drag pomasnyan pas/ blun zhing khros te sbas
tho ba dang/ rab tu khros nas gnas khang du zhugs pa dang/ sgo bcad nas des ngan du smras pa'i tshig de lta bu de sgom zhing 'dug go/ de'i bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mkhyen
0 ba dang/ ma gzigs pa dang/ ma chud pa dang/ rnam par ma mkhyen pa mesde/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni tshes nyid kyis thugs rje chen po can 'jig rten la phan 'dogs
ba la zhugs// srung ba gcig du/ dpa' ba gcig tu zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ 'dul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrulakyi
rkang pa bzhi'i mthil la rab tu brtan pa/ ma 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa/ yan lag lnga rab tu rnam par spangs pa 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'as pa/ yan lag drug
dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa// rtag tu drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyan nga/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la mkhas pa// stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa// phyogs banu snyan par grags pa// brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'i mchog tu byung bas
gang 'grabs/ gang 'phel/ gang sdug bsngal du gyur/ gang dag par gyur/ gang gnodapar gyur gang sdug bsngal dang/ dog pa dang/ gang gnod par gyur/ gang ngan
song la gzhol/ gang ngan song la 'bab/ gang ngan song la rab tu bstan/ gang ngas ngan song gi lam lasabaton te/ mtho ris su thar pa'i 'bras bu la so sor dgod par bya/ gang
dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams la bskyed par bya/ gang gsi bskyod pa rnams na yongs su smin par bya/ gang yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya'o
a7 nas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten pa la gzigs shing ye shes snang ba la 'jug go/ yang gsusal// chu srin gnas pa'i rgya mtsho ni//
dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi// gdul bar bya ba'abu rnams la// sangs rgyas dus 'da' mi srid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das gnas gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos
'tshad kyis gang gatshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de la tshon/ zhal nas 'od gather sngon po dang/ ser bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po la sogs pa byung ste//
la lan 'og tu 'gro/ la la ni stong du 'gro sta/ de la gang 'og tu song ba des na yang 'tsho ba dang/ thig nag po dang/ 'dus pa dang/ 'o dod 'bod pa dang/ 'o dod 'bod pa chen
[ ]bo dang/ gdung ba dang/ rab tu gdung ba dang/ bster med pa dang/ chu bur dang/ rgyun du chu bur dang/ a Ta Ta dang/ ha ha pa dang/ sushub dang/ ut+pal dang/ pad+mo dang
!/ pad+mo chen po la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal bar song ste/ gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba la des bab pa ni bsil bar gyur/ gang grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de la bab pa de ni bro bar gyur te/
des sems can de dag ye lta bu s gzir ba'i khyad par de dag bde bar byas pa dang/ de dag 'disnyam du/ kyi bdag cag rnams 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes bsams/
na de dag la rab tudad pa bskyod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa btang nas/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong ba dang 'di snyam du/ kye bdag cag rnams 'di nas shi 'phos par
gyur pa yang med/ gzhan du skyes pa yang med kyi/ sngon ma byung ba'i somasaM can 'di mthong ba'i mabris na/ bdag cag gzir ba'i khyad par rnams bde bar gyur to snyam du bsams nas/
dedag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa dang/ dmyal bas gzir ba'i las zad par byas te/ gang du bden par gyur pa'i snod du dam lha dang mi'i mtshams 'dzin to// gang steng
du song ba des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ mtsho ma dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/
tshangs lhate phan dang/ tshangs chen dang/ chung snang dang/ tshad med snang ba dang/ kun snang dang bdang/ dag bdong/ tshad medadage ba dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sngon med dang/
bsod nams 'phel ba dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ mi che ba dang/ ma gdung ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ 'og man gyi lhar song nas mi rtog pa dang/
u@#// sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ bdag med pa rnams bsgrags te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyang brjod do// 'byung bar bya phyir brtsam par byos//
thabs sa rgyas bstan la brtson par byas// 'dam bu'i khyos la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag de na gzhom par byos// gang zhig rab tubag yod par// chos 'dul 'di la sbyod 'gyur ba//
sbya skya ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// de nas 'od gzer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi phyi
bzhin du 'brang ngo// de dag gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa las lung ston par bzhed par gyuran/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tunub bo// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la lung ston
pa bzhed par gyuran mdun du nub bo// dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na zhabs kyi mthil du nub// byol song du skye bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na nying par nub bo/
'degs su skyo bar lungaston par bzhed par gyun zhabasakyi mthe bar nub ba// mare skye bar lung ston par bzhed par gyur na bus mo nub bo// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lung
ston par bzhedabar gyur na phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub ba// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed par gyuran phyag g.yas pa'i mthal du nub ba// lhor skye bar lung ston par

bzhed par gyur na lte bar nub bo// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed par gyur na zhal du nub bo// rang byang chub tulung ston par bzhed par gyur na smina mtshams su nub bo// bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed par gyur na spyi bo'i gtsug tunub bo// de nas 'od gzer des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs kyi rting par nub pa dang/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus ba/ ngaltar snang bar byed pa shar ba bzhin// zhal gyi nang nas byung ba mang
bon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs stong ldan pa// gang gis phyogs bcu kun tu snang gyur pa'o// yang tshigs su bcud de gsol pa/ rgod pa zhum rgyugs spangs nas khrul gyur pa// skye
ba rnams kyi rgyur gyur sangs rgyas te// rgyal ba dgyi rgyal dung dang pad+mobazhin dkar ba// rgyu med 'dzum pa nye bar ston ma mdzad// brtan pa'i thugs mnga' de dus rang gis mkhyen mdzod cig/
rgyal ba'i dbang la thes btsal nyan rnams la// brtan zhing thub pa'i khyu mchog dam pa yis// the tshom byung ba dge bas rnam paru sol// don med par nirgya mtsho ri rgyal brtan// rdzogs
ba'i sangs rgyas 'o dzum pa ma ston te// brtan pas gang phyir 'dzum pa mdzad pa de// skye bo mang po 'di dag thos par mos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'/
bod de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa so sa rgyas nargyu med rkyen med pa'i dzum pa ni mdzad do//
kun dga' bo gang dge slong gang ga zhan pa des dge slong la tshig ngan pas mtshang bus shing smras pas khros pa mthong ngag/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// de gnas khang du zhugs te sgo bcad
nas de'i tshig ngan pa smras pa de phyi'i sgom zhing 'dug go/ khros pas kun tu khebs nas phyi phyir bsgoms pas na/ zhe sdang gi sa bcu rab tu byung ste/ de dus 'das te shi 'phos
nas de gnas khang de nyid du sbrul gdug par skyes par gyur to// bam po so brgyad pa// de ltar bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'i
yaM bodang lhan cagi gtam gsung ba'i bar du/ dge slong de yang tshig ngan du smras pa de lan mang du bsgoms shing shin tu khro bas kun tu khebs te/ mang du byas pas zhe sdang gis bcu po thob pas
t+ti na der 'phos pas dus 'das te/ de'a gnas kha nyid du sprul gdug par skyes so// de nas btsem ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun
dga' bo skyes bu gti mug can de ni gnas khang de nyid du sbrul gdug par skyes kyis/ der song la drung du phyin nas/ nga'i tshig gis nad med cig ces byas la 'di skad du/ 'di ltar
khyod nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las gang yang rung/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ba las/ dakhyod khros pa'i dbang gis na 'dir sbrul
gdug par skyes kyis/ dge slong de la bzodapar byas shige/ 'di las yang dus 'das na sems can dmyal bar skyes sa de zhes sgo 'ge/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas// de nas
tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das samanyan nas/ dge slong de khrid de dge slong de'i gnas khang du song nas/ sgo la dal nas khags kyis brdungs te smras nga// bzhin bzangs
khyod la bcom ldan 'das na nad med cig ces gsungs te/ 'di ltar khyed nga'akhestan pa rab tu byung la/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las gang yang rung/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rtogs par
'gyur ba las/ dakhyed khros pa'i dbang gsan 'da'i sbrul gdug par skyes kyis/ dge slong 'di la bzod par gyis shige// 'di nas dus byas nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes sa re zhes
gsungs so// de nas de nyid du khros pa'i dugabatang nasaM/ gnas khang nas phyir ma byung zhing 'dug pa dang/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la//
mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyed kyis sprul gdug pa gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang/ 'daskad du dge slong de la bzod pa byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ des kyang de song ste smras
pa dang de lde mig khyog po'i bu ga nas mgo tsam bstan te phyir nang du zhugs so// dge slong gas dge slong las mas kyis gnod pa byas pas/ rab gnas khang du
sbrul gdug par skyes so zhes sgra de lta bu mnyan du yod pa kun grags pa dang/ ka sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal nang gi btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ grong mi dang/ ljongs
su bcas pas gang sgra de thos ba dang/ ltad mo lta 'dod sa de yid bskyod nas ta'i tshal du deng ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos chen po kun shes ko'u dicu dang/ rlungs pa dang/
ming chen dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ sha ra'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ 'od snang dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ nam gru la sogs pas bskor te/ rgyal po gsal
rgyaladang/ de'i gnas khang du bzhud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi skad du gsungs ba dang/ de rtabs bzhin du gnas khang nas phyir byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de khrid
nas gtsug lag khang nas phyir byung ste/ ta'i tshal gyi sgor la bor brgya stong du ma dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdunan gdan bting ba la bzhugs pa dang/ de nas sbrul gdug pa de phan
tshun kun tu skye bo mang bo la bltas te skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan logs su rgan ranyis kyi mthar/ btsam ldan 'das la lta bzhin du 'khyil to 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'as
kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ bzhan bzas 'di ltar khyod nga'i bstanapa la rab tu byung nas/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las gang yang rung/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur pa las/
da khyod 'di'i shin tu khros pas kun tu khebs nas lan mang du bsgoms la// dge slong la yang sems gdug pa skyes pas/ da ltar sbrul gdug par skyes te/ 'tshob dang gsod pa la chags
shing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cadi/ gzhan 'tshob dang phral nas 'tsho bar byed de/ 'di nas nga shi 'phos nas rgyud gang du skye/ gang du skye bar 'gyur/ gang du mngon par skye bar 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gang gi tsho de'i rigs dran par byas pa de'i tshadu bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// khyed na byol song skye gnas gyur// mdal/
