bar yang skyes gyur na// don med par natso phyir du// dan ci zhogi byar yod kyis// rgyal ba thugs rje ldan mnga' la// sems kyis legs par dang skyed dang// byol song skye gnas 'di
spangs te// de nas mtho risi 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa chud ma bris bas/ de kun tu gnas pa de dang bral bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ tshur shog dge so khyod kyis sbrul gdug pa de la bzod pa khyos shig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bzod par bgyi/ ca de'i rkang pa
la gtug par bgyi'am zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ji ltar sngon gyi dge slong yin par man du bya ste/ the tsom du ma bya bar gtub par/
bya 'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ston pa' bzhin des rkyang pa la gtugs pa dang/ des kyang de'i mgo go la'i ga par byas pa dang/ de gnyis la skye bo mang pos mthong ba dang rab tu ngo mtshar skyes/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po de dag la de'i phyir de lta bu'i tshul du chos bshad de/ de sa pas na srog chags brgya stong dus rnams kyis ni khyad par chen po rtogs par gyur to// sbrul
gdug pa de yang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dang sa/ de dus 'das pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas bzang por skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa// de bas na dge slong rnams 'di dang gzhan dag kyang khro bas kun tu khebs na nyes pa'i dimigs su 'gyur te/ de bas na dge slong gis khros pa'i dge slong la ji ltar de'i
khros pas khebs par gnas pa rnam par bya ba de lta de lta bur bzed par gsol la// des kyang sems kyis bzod bar byos shig/ gang snga dro khros pa la de phyi drobazed par gsol cig/ gang phyi dro
khros ba la ni nub mo// gang nub mo ba ni des phyi de nyin mo bzod par gsol cig ces gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/ nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug pa'i phyir gtsug
lag khang du gshegs so// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo yazhung/ skyes nas ring bo ma lon par/ gang nas sha 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang yin zhes sems pa rnam pa/
'di gsum skye ste/ sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bzang bor skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon du dad pa skyed par ma theng ngo// de nas sngon
gyi sprul gdug pa lha'i bu des 'di snyam du bdag 'dir zhag len te/ bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro bar mi rigs kyis/ bdag 'dari nag ma len par bcom ldan 'das la lta pa 'gre'o snyam du bsams
nas de nas lha'i bu sngon sprul gdug pa de dri ma med pa'i rna cha 'phyang bzhin du thogs shing/ ngoshal dang se mo des lus brgyan te/ de nyid kyi nub mo lha'i me tog ut+pa ladang/ brlodang/
ku mu da dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ mnadar pa la sogs pas phang ba bkang ste/ snang ba chen pos dze ta'i tshal thams cad du snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis
gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bal la nyal ba dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/
de'adra bar 'phags pa'i bden bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas/ lha'i bu sngon gyi sbrul gdug pa des thes pa dang/ 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ro'i rtse mo
nyi shu ye shes kyi rojis bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig gsum smras te/ btsun pas
ban btags pa 'di lta bu n mis kyang ma bgyis/ phas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal bos kyang ma brgyus/ lhas kyang m bgyis/ sdug pas kyang ma bgyis/ bdag gi gnyen mang pos kyang
ma bgyis/ sngon gyi ri mos rnams kyis kyang m bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram zes kyang m bgyis te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchama'i rgya mtshon bskums rus
ba'a'onobasgral/ ngan song gi sgon bcad/ mtho ris dang thar ba'i sgo ni phyi nas lha dang mi'i gnas su bzhag go/ khyod mthusangashin tu mi bzad ngan song gi/ nyis pa mang du ldan pa'i lam
rnams bcad// mtho si 'gro ba'i lam phye bsod nams mchog/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lamani bdag gis thog/ khyed la brten pas nyis kha med pa yi// bdag deng shin tu gtsang ba rnam dag
wI mig/ 'phags pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i zhi gnas thog/ bod gsi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ba la rgal// skye ba lha dang lha min ma yis mdzod// skye rga na dang 'chilas rnam par bral// srid
bstod du'ang mthong ba'i tudaka'// thub khyod deng bdag mthong bas 'bras khur bcas// de nas se mo do ni'aphyang bazhin du// zhabs gnyis la ni phyag byas dga' ba skyes// dgra/
grul de la g.yas su bskor nas ni// lha ya'ajig rten lha yul der song ngo// de nas lha'i bu ston sbrul gdug pa de tshong pa khe thob pa ltar/ chun pa 'akolegs pa ltar/ dpa' bog yul
las rgyal ba ltar/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba ltar/ ji lta bu'i longs spyod dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs ba de lta bu'i longs sbyodadang/ rang gi gnas su song ba
dang/ dge slong dag srod dang thorasal ma nyel bar thub par brtson par spyod pa rnams kyis ma byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na rgya cher snang ba mthong nas the tshom du gyur te/ bcom ldan
'das la ]bam ldan 'das kyi mdang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la tshangs 'khor gyi bdag boltar machis sam/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag blta ba'i phyir
mchis sam zhes zhus pa dang/ dge slong rnams tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yani/ lha'i dbalo brgya ba yang ma yin 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi sogs pa la blta ba'i phyir
'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ gang dug gdug pa dge slong gis bzod par byas pa de nga la sems mngon du dad nas/ dus las 'das pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum rigs kyi lha'i gnas bzang por
skyes/ de 'di ltar mdang pa'i drung du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan pa dang/ bden pa mthong nas rang gte/nas su song ngo// de bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
gang gis bzod par bya ba dang/ brjod pa'i yon tan brjod par bya ba de ltar/ dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal
dang/ dge slong de dag yidim nas/ bcom ldan 'aakyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' go gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe
dang ldan pa ku pa laso zhus pa/ btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi dban/ tshodang ldan pa rnams bdag la bsnyen par rdzogs par ma byed cig ces dam bzhin du/ dge slong rnams
kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyisan/ bsnyen pa ra rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes ma bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par
byed pa rnams kyang 'dus ba dang bcas par 'gyugo/ u pa 'di'i phyir zhen/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid kyang bslab pa 'bulan/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs zhes byan/ bsnyen par
zla rtogs par byed pa 'tsholtaci smos/ yang bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshodang ldan pa ba lasi zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul rnams la nyi shu len nas/ bsnyen par rdzogA
par byosang shig ces gsua na/ dge tshul pa gzhan dag khadag gi grongs ga 'tshal te/ de las khong na che ste/ de dge slong rnams kyis lo grangs ma rtogs pas the tshom skyes te/ bstan/
baabar rdzogs khar mi bgyidan/ de dag la ji ltar nan tan bgyi zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal u pa ladi lta bu ni mtshan las so sor rtogs la bsnyen par rdzog
ba byos shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan las rtogs la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyisashig ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis de gcer bur byung
ste mtshan rtog pa la zhugs pa dang/ shin tungo tsha nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gcer bur ma dbyung ba ragaso 'am gos kyi gdang la lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi snodazhog la
'di phob cig ces smos la/ de ni mchan kung dang mtshan la rtogs te/ de sta yod na bsnyen par rdzogs pa bya'o// de ste med na bsen par rdzogs par mkhya'o/ yang zhus pa/ btsun
bdage slong rnams kyis dge slong la/ dge slong ma'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyisan/ bsnyen bar rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyan par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la
bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes na bya ste// bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong ma la dge slong dang/ dge slong a rnams kyis dge
slongagi las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyisan/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ upalibasnyen par rdzogs pa zhes byaste/ dge/
'dun gnyis ka yang 'aa pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa thog ma 'o// dmador na gsidam
grong dang bsdus pa dang// soms bskyed pas na gso sbyin dang// gsad pa gsum yang de bzhanite/ rnam dbye dge 'dun lhag ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'atshil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag cig 'gronapa mang bo dang lhan cag ljongs spyodadu dong ba dang/ de dag de'i tshe gso sbyin la
bab nas/ de dag gsi sa gsang ma'i phyogs ga ge mthong nas/ de dag las smras ba/ tshodang ldan pa dag tshur shog/ sa gsing ma'i phyogs khag la gso sbyin bya'o zhes de dag der giso sbyin
byed pa la zhugs pa dang/ 'gron mang po dag 'das nas de dag kyang phyi bzhin 'dong ba las khang du rkun bos btsam ste/ gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang/ dge slonga rnams kyis mthong ste/
sh+tsa bde bar 'ongs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar 'ongs sam/ bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang/ bdebadag la spyad/ nyis/ bdag cag na rkun po rnams kyis bcom mo//
deltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khaka' stsal pa// gsang ma la chags pa'i phyir gso/
sbyin ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dang nye ba'i 'khor du gso sbyin byas shig ces gsus pa dang/ de dag las dge slong khyed na grong du zhugs/ khyod ni phyi lo tu 'khod pas de dag
ma 'dus par gyur nas gso sbyin ma byas te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// gang grong na gnas
pa rnams na grong du gso sbyin byis shig/ de bzhin du dge slong rnams gso sbyin bya ste/ gso sbyin lam sdodacig/ sdongan 'das pa dang bcas pa 'gyura'o// dge slong dag cig tshong pa'i
'gon pa mang po dang lhan cig tu lam du zhugs pa dang/ dge slong gis tshong ba la ba zhin bzas bdag cag gso sbyin byed kyis/ pa'i bar du skad cig sdod cig ces skyas 'dang/ de dag gis
'bags pa rnams 'di phyogasanarkun pos 'jigasakyis/ phyi bzhin ston cig bstad de zhes smras pa dang/ der sdod grang der sdod grang snyam nas/ dge slong rnams bzhin du 'brang zhing
de dag 'dong ba las nam nas so// dge slong rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsolanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong rnams gso sbyin/
gyi tshog so sbyin ma byas par ma 'gro zhig/ yang na 'gro bzhin du gso sbyin byos shig/ dge slong dag gas 'gro bzhin du gso sbyin khyadabal zhugs pa dang/ tshong pa rnams kyisi'aphags
pa bdag cag na rkyen bos 'jigs pas cang mi smra bar 'gron/ khyed ci'i phyi co byed ces skyasanas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das
sha lagasol pa dang/ btsamo ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gso sbyin rgyas bar ma byed bar mdabo byos shige// dge slong rnams kyisi mdo'o byed pa la zhugs pa dang/ 'onakyi tshong
sgra pa de dag gso dpyas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// soms bskyed pa tsam gyis byin gyis bsad// de bas na dge slong rnams chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang/
pa/ gos bsngo ba dang/ gso sbyin dang/ tshul nas byung ba 'di bzhin sems bskyod pa tsam gyis 'grub bo// de yang 'di ltar bya ste/ sangs rgyas la dmags pa'idranang
ya kyi bar gzhag ste/ sems bskyed par byos la// gso sbyin byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas tshig tu ya ba/don bar pa ste/ deng dge 'dun rnams kyi bco lnga'i gso sbyan te/ bdag dge slong
ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i yo bco lnga'i be/so sbyin te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag gzhis rang gis brjod do// gso sbyan byin gyis brlabs la/ gang
ga tshodage 'dun 'dus pa phrad pa de'i tshodage 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin bya'o// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod de gso sbyin de ltar bya'o// gso sbyin ma bya ba ni ma yin no// sa
byas na 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa naste/ dge slong dgacig ljongs spyad pa spyod pa na/ rkun pos zin nas de dag gis kyakhasam rlag tu
'khod de ci byed kyis/ mgo rig 'di dag gsad do zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ bdag cagan gsad par chad pa lta snyam nas/ de dag gis rkun pol/ kyeci'i
phyir de datsag gsad ces smras pa dung/ rkun pos smras pa khyod la rgyal bo dang/ phyug po dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon rab tu dad pas/ khyed kyis de dag la sbas pa dang/

de dag gis nged la kha gnod pa byed do zhes smras pa dang/ de na dge slong gzhon nu gtsag tsag khardzun du smras pa las byung ba'i nyes pa ltung ba byung ste/ des tshodang ldan pa rnams bdag gi ltung ba byung ba/
bshags pa de'i bar du bsdad par gnang zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis de ltar na gnas 'anyid du shog cig ces smras pa dang/ sa dge slong gi mdun du'achags pal zhugs M te/
dges shig tshodang ldan pa rnams/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bangashes bzhin gyi brdzun smras pa las byung ba'i ltud banyisapa mchas te/ bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du bshags so//
mthal 'go/ mi 'chab bo// bshagasashang mthol na bdag la bde bar 'gyur gyi/ ma bshagasaM ma mtholanan ma yin no// des smras kha/ nyes par mthongos/ mthong ngo
phyin chad sdom par dam 'cha' 'am/ dam 'cha' 'o// de ltar lanaganyis lan gsum du smras pa dang/ rkun po de dag thams cad kyis thos ba dang/ de dag gis
smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed rnams brdzun mas+sa'am/ bzhan bzasamastsa'o zhes smras pa dang/ de dag mngon du dadus/ 'bags pa rnams de ltar na deng lasu la yang ma smra zhig ces
smras pa dang/ nad med cig su la yang mi skya'o zhes lcas te donas/ dedagagatsug lag khang du lhags ba dang/ tsom skyes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalal/ dag so rnams nags tshal dbang bo rkun po 'drud bshags pa yin gyis/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong gzhan zhage ljongs spyad pa spyod pa la/ rkun pos zin nas de dag gis bsam rlag tu 'khod de byed kyis/ mgo reg 'di dag gsod do zhes smras
sh+tsa bdang/ dge slong dag gis bsams pa// bdag cag nagasod bar chad pa lta snyam nas/ dedag gsarkun bol/ kyeci'i phyir nged gsod ces smras pa dang/ rkun pos smras pa/ khyed
zla la rgya la bo dang/ phyug po dang/ tshong dbon dang/ ded dbon rnams ga na par dad pas na/ khyed kyis de dag la smras pa dang/ dedag gis nged la don med bar byed do zhes smras pa

dang dge slong rnams kyis skyas pa// 'ong zhig dang su la yang ma smra'o// de dag gis de ste khyed kyi btso lnga'i dus na gci'i tu'adus shade 'don pa de nged cag la rgyas par smra bar dam 'cha' na gtong ngo
zhes smras pa dang/ de na dge slong gcig kha zhung kha ton du lobs pas de bsad kyis 'jagis pas skrag pas so sor thar pa myur du bton pa dang/ de dag mngon par deng nas/ 'phags pa/
khyed kyis de thams cad yang dag par bzung ste srung a zhes smras pa dang/ ded gas tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni ston pa'i bka' yin na/ ci'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin cing ma srung zhes smras ba dang/
dedag gis 'phags ba rnams legs kyis bzhud la/ su la yang ma gsung zhig ces smras ba dang/ nad mod yig mi smra'o zhes smras te dongonas/ de dag gtsug lag khang du phan pa dang/ de
dag the tsom skyes te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong rnams nags tshal gyi dbang porkun po'i
dung du kha ton bklags pa ni legs par bklags pa yin gyis/ de la the tsom du ma khyedatsag/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong dag cig yul de'u zhes bya ba nas
ljongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba dang/ rkun bos ban nas/ de dag gis skye bsam rlag tu 'khod ni byed kyis/ mgo reg 'di dag gsod do zhes smras pa dang/ de la rkun po gcig dge slong
rgyus shes bas/ des de dag mthong ba dang snying rje skyes nas/ des de dag thapar byani ma nus kyi/ snying rjeba'i phyir kyi 'di dag bsad de ba'i ru nga gas/ rtswa ma bsdus

pa la khatsangs te rdzas phyogs la dong dang/ de nyid rang bkres shing nyamachung bas gdungs te srog dang bralagrab zhes smras pa dang/ de'i nang nas cig gsi smras pa/ kyi 'dodi skad smyan ji ltar bya
zhes smras pa dang/ khacag gis smras pa// deltar bya ba legs so zhes nas/ dedag gis de la thog gsanas rtswa ma brdzas la bcings te dang go/ tshul be'u zhes bya ba'i rgyal po 'ga' po
dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba dang/ ri dgas bshor ba'i phyir dong ba dang/ de dag gis de dag rgyud 'di bo nas mthong nas/ des bon bo la skye snang ba pha gi ri dgas ma yin nam zhes dris pa dang/
ngas lha ma 'tshal te zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal po der nye bar song nas ma yin bar mthong nas/ nges kyi chu stags can ga/cer bu pa yin nam tsa zhes smras pa dang/ de dag las cig gis lha de
bzhin no zhes smras pa dang/ de dag las dge slongag rgyusangashes pa zhig gis smras pa/ lha de ni mu stegs gcer bu pa ma lags kyi/ lha shAkya'i dge slong ngo// ji ltar shes/ lha de ltar
lags gcig na gnag/ gnyis pa nad karakozhes smras M pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos de la dris pa/ 'phags pa khyed ci'i phyir 'diltar 'dug/ lha bdag cag rkun pos bcom mo// 'phags pa
natsa'i phyir de ltar 'dug/ lha 'di ltar bcangs so// 'phags pa 'di 'dra bar brtsis pa'i phyir bcad du ma 'dod/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi bslab par bcas pa
sa bon gyi tshogs dang/ srog chags grong ba shig gam/ bshi'i tu bcug na lta ba'ozhes bya ba'abisapapa'i bar de bas bcings so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bo de bdatsang mngon par dga'
nas/ des de dag bkol te/ re re la yang chos gos gsum gsum bskon no// de dag gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang/ bdag cag gas rgyal po'i mdun du de ltar ltung ba smras so zhes te the
tshom skyes pa dang/ sa de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par smras nas/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsolate/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalab/ rgyalaM
po'adani rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtsopo bsan/ gangasmas pa denalegs par smras pa yin gyis/ de la thatsom dumakhyadag
gleng gzhin menyan du yod ba na ste/ sos rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshedang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa// btsun panos pa dang bcas bsanos pa dang bcas pa'i mdun du nos pa
bshags su rung ngamaM/ u pa la mi rung ngo// de ltar das po ma mthunan ni rung ngo// gleng gzhi ni mnyanadu yod pan ste/ dge slong zhige la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung
nas de 'gyod pa skyes ba dang/ de skya bo bsong bsong por gyur pa 'di cing nyam chung ste/ smyul lus ma rtas par gyur nas/ de la dge slong dag gas smras pa// tshe dang

spa ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bsang bor gyural rid cing nyam chung la mya ste/ lus ma rtas par gyur ba de'i nang sgros shig ces smras pa dang/ de cang ma smra nas/ nam de dang mdza' ba'i dge/
slong gis mthong ste dras pa dang/ des de la rgyas par smras pa dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa de lta na dge slong rnams la brjod kyis shog shig ces smras so// de ltar brjod na bdag nyid 'chi'o
zhes smras pa dang/ des de ltar na tshur shog/ yul gzhan du dongal/ der de dag bshags so zhes smras pa dang/ des kyang khas blangs nas de dang de lhan cig tu yul gzhan du song ba
las/ de lam phyed du dus 'das pa dang/ dge slong des bsams pa// gang gi don gyi phyir bdag 'gro ba de na dus 'das na/ da ci'i phyir 'gro/ phyir ldog go snyam nas de phyir leg/
ba dang/ de la dge slong dag gis bab 'os sam/ tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'os sam/ su khyedacag bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang/ de ngu bar gyur na// de la dge slong dag/

sgo gas tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyiringu zhes smras pa dang/ gang bdag dang lhan cig tu song ba'i dge slong de dus 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyi'i du/ 'dus byas
thams cad ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin no zhes smras so// des de na nyes pa dang bcas pazhin du dus 'das so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis des dmyal bar ring du gnas par 'gyur
bsu na/ du ba 'di ni rogis so zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge
slong rnams rigs kyi bu de ninyis pa de las phyin to// ngas na bsam ba las nyes pa phyin par gsungs kyi/ chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no// de lta bas na gang de ltar rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha
dang ldan pa des gcig ga mdun du shog shig par gnang ngo// des na gtsag ga mdun du shogs shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig ces gsungs pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa
skye bo tha dad pa// mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma lta bu 'dzin pa kha cig dang/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang/ grags pa dang/ bsod nams chen po bcag/
gse brtags pas na/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ste/ de dag chad par spyod pa las lhan cagi spyod pa dang/ rta gnas dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ gzhan yang
rung/ nyung du thos pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang dbyas/ kha cig ni mi dga' bar gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// de dag gis kyang phyis ma bya bar shin tu bsam pa brten te gcig po'i mdun du shogs shig/ 'di la the tsom du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa 'an n gnas
sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// mdoran/ gzhag pa' rigs pa gzhag par bya// bdun lon nas kyang 'gro bar bya// mnyam du ma zin de bzhin te//
gang gas kob ma rung ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita tshel mgan med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa kun ng ga' ye/
gtsug lag khang skyong gi rjes bab bo// yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gangan
ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug g/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mdesdo la zhugs nas/ de las phye nas cung zad tsam
[% ]zhag rgyas par bshad nas/ mdor 'chad pa la zhugs pa dang/ rgyal bos 'phags pa bdas/brel ba med kyis mdor ma bshad cig ces smras so// de bzhin du lan gsum du skyes pa dang/
!/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen bo khyod la brel ba med kyang/ bdag la brel pa yod dozhes smras pa dang/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo cazhige khril zhes smras pa dang/ khong skyong bya
dgos so zhes smras ba dang/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo yang las kyi ris mdzad dam/ lha bdag na dege 'dun gyi nang du gtogs bas na las bgyi 'tshal zhes smras ba dang/ rgyal bos 'di/
bdag gas bya ba yin no snyam du bsams nas/ debcom ldan 'as gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag
rgyal po rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa ste/ gang bdag gis bgyi ba'alas ni bdag bgyid do// gang nang gi btsun mos bgyi ba rogs pa 'anang gi btsun mos bgyid do// ganga gzhon nus
bgyi ba'i rigs pa'i ng gzhon nus so// gang bon bo'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ dmag dpon nam/ gong ma'am/ lcengs pa'i ng rung ste/ ljongs pa nyid kyi las bgyid de/ bcom ldan
'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal bo ste/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das brtse ba can gyis kyang gzhig par 'os pa bzhag la// las kyi res mi bsko bar gnang zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal
po gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa bzhani/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so// rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/ rgyal
po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'astsalang/
kun dga' bo song la mnyan du yod pa na ga nas shang 'khod pa'i dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du sdus shig ces gsus pa dang/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/ mnyan du yod ban dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang dbusdus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bso/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa mnyan du yod pa na dge slong dzisnyada gnas shing mchis pa de thams cad 'dun khang du 'dus te mchas lags na/ del bcom ldan 'das kyis da dus la bab pa dges
gshig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dunakhang gang na ba der btud de byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun na gdan bti ba la bzhugs te/ bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag deng yul kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'drung du 'ongs te/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das gzhag pa rigs pa rnams na zhig la/ las
de kyi ris la bkad pa stsal pa'i mi rigs so zhes zer gyis/ khyed cag gis deng phanachad gzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams las la ma bsko bar zheg cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhag pa'i rigis
ba rnams las la ma sko zhagi ces gsungs ba dang/ dge slong dag gis ga nga gzhag bar rigs pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/ 'dul kha
'dzin pa dang/ ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang/ bad gol 'chad pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dag na gzhag par rigs pa'o// de la mdo sde 'dzin pa ni de nyade las so// de bzhin du
'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang/ mang po la 'chad pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgakyang de nyid las yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/
'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma lta bu 'dzin pa ni de nyid las yin no zhes gsungs pa dang/ drug sde dag gis mdo sde le'u gcig gnyis bklags nas/ ngedacag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa yin pas na
nged cag la las kyi res ma dbab cig ces smras ba dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gsi/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang mdo
sde thams cad 'dzin pa de mdo sde 'dzin pa ste/ de ni las lam sgo zhig/ de bzhin du bas pham pa gcig gam gnyis rtogs pa dag gis nged kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'o// de bzhin du rab
tu byed pa gnyis bklags pas kyang nga na ma lta bu 'dzin pa yin gyis/ las kyi rig lam sko zhig ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang 'dul ba thams cad 'dzin pa dang/ ma lta bu thams cad 'dzin pa ni las la ma so zhagi/ gleng gzhi
kyi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ de'i tshe na yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ri khrags kyi grong dag cig log nas/ dmag ru gcig btang ba dang/ dedag gis slar btsem btags nas
lhags so// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du btang yang slar btags bcom nas lhags so// blon po dag gis gsol// lha ra brags kyi grong dag gi mthu ni cheragyur//
lha'i mthu ni 'gribs na/ de la lha nyid gshegasan na re bregs kyi grong de dag kyang gdong lugs par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan gyis na mi nus so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos pha yul ni ji skad
mtshon cha'i akhrus 'tsho ba de dag thams cad ma 'khod par shog cig ces dril chen po bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po mthu mang po dang lhan cig tu grong rdal der lhags nas/ thams cad bskos
pat+tiM khod do// 'on kyang de dag nags tshal stug po la brten nas ma phebs pa dang/ blon pos lha khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de bsod nams rab turgyas shing lha rnams kyis yongs su zan
pas de 'dar mchis na gdon ma 'tshal bor ra brags kyi grong phebs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bsti stang cher byas nas/ khyim bdag
ma khyod kyi ngolta bar 'dod de zhes pa sa sbrang ngo// de yi gi de thos ma thag tu rams bzhin du song ste/ ra brags kyi grong rdal de byin to// 'on kyang grong rdal der phebs nas khyim bdag mgon
med zas sbyin der rang du thogs par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams m mthong ba'i phyir skya'u bsang bseng po radi cing lus la rtas par gyur nas/ rgyal pos mthong ste phyis pa/ khyim bdag khyod bu
dag dran nam zhes smras pa dang/ des lha bdag su la dran pa ni ma lags kyis/ 'phags pa rnams lta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du'o zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos blon po dag la ngas bka'
stsal pa skad du ma zer bar/ tsa nas 'phags pa rnams 'di byon pa rithabs su sbyor cig ces yi ge spring ba dang/ blon po dag gis yi ge bklags nas gros byed pa la zhugs te/ skye
la thabs ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang/ blon po rgan po gzhan zhig gas de lta byas/ de'i thabs shig bdag gso sbyar la dge bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ sa dze ta'asgron a ratatshas
sbyan gyi skyidamos tshal zhig yod ba bar nges te/ mda' lta bu'i tshal du gyur pa de ba ces legs byas/ mchod rten gyi dag ra nas skyed mos tshal de yur ba drang ngo zhes srad du bres dang/ dedag
nyod la gnod pas na/ lha lta zhing 'dong bar 'gyur ro zhes te/ de nas de dag gsi skyed mos tshal rnyidir de 'chos pa la zhugs/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi dbus su srad bu byas nas/
srad bu 'di'i rgyud bzhin du yur ba bskolozhes smras pa dang/ dge slong btsug lag khang na gnas pa dang/ nyin bar spyod du dong ba de dag 'dus te blon po'i gon du dong nas
bzhin bzas 'di ci zhig rtsom zhes smras podang/ 'bags pa rnams lhas bdag cag la pa'i pa'i skyed mos tshal rnying ba tshesang shi dang/ nga dor 'ong ngo zhes yi ge mchis pas na/ 'di dag
bdag cag gas byi bdar bgyid de der chu drang ba' yur bo bsko'o zhes smras pa dang/ ci khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gzhig gam/ de ltar ma byed cagi cesasnas
ba dang/ 'phags pa dag lha' bka' bzhin ni bdag cag gas ma bgyir rung ste/ bdag cag la mgo gnyis su ma mchis kyis/ lha'i bka' gcag tu mi rung ngo zhes smras pa dang/ bzhin
rgyu/ bzangs ded kyis lha la gsol gyis/ de'i bar du sdod cig ces smras pa dang/ 'phags pa bdag cag gas bsdad kyis gsol ba mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa dang/ bzhin bzangs lha 'dug
zla pa de ji srid yod/ 'phags pa lamarang ngo// bzhin bzangs zhag gtsage nas bdun gyis slar 'khor ram/ slar ma 'khor ro// de ltar gyur pa de dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'das/
zla la gsol pa dang/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na dge slong dag sangs rgyas dang/ tshes dang/ dge 'dun gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la/ mtshams
wa kyi phyi rol tu 'dod bar gnang ngo// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab ba mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ stan rnams bting ste/ gan+d+ribardungs la sa
pa'ilan ldon ba'i dge slong gi bskos te/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus nas 'khodapa dang/ sngar dge slong gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum yang rang dad par bgyis te/ sangs rgyas
srung dang chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde khyed rnams gnas 'di'i mtshams kyi nang dudabyar snga ma'am phyi ma yang rung tshul du zhugs pa las/ dge 'dun don gyi phyir/ zhag bzhi bcur bun gyis
brlabs te/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dong la/ khyedadabyar gyi gnas 'di'i te/ dbyar 'dzade gnas par dad dam zhes bsgo la/ de sta dang na de'ig tu dge slong cig gis ba so' ba dang las byos/
shig/ gson mgo btsun pa'i dge 'duna rnams/ sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde 'di dag mtshams kyi nang gnas 'di'i dbyar snga ma'am phyi ma yang rung tshul
zhugs pa las/ 'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyi zhag bzhi bcur khyan gyis brlabs te/ mtshams kyi spyi srol tu'adang zhing/ 'di dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te/ dbyar 'di'i gnas
na de ste dge 'dun rnams kyis bzod cing dus la baban dge 'dun gyis gnang la/ dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde dag zhag pa na bcur skos shig/ sangs
rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde dge 'dun gyi don gyi ri zhag bzhi bcur byin gyisabarlabs te/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dongal/ de dag dbyar gnas 'di lag
sa ]he dbyar 'di'i gnas so// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di bzhin du byisangashag gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang//
dge 'dun sde 'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dang zhing/ 'di dag dbyar gnas 'di'i gnas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/
gang la sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde dag gas dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyi'i zhag bzhi bcur bsgo bar 'bad ba de dag ni cang ma gsung gi/ gang mi bzod pa de dag na smyos shig/
dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde 'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyi'i zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshams kyi phyi lo chumachis la/ de dag dbyar gnas
'di lags te/ dbyar 'dir gnas par dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na/ cang ma gsung ste/ de de bzhin du 'dzin te/ gang la dwage 'dun gyis zhagabazhi bcur bskos
pa dag byin gyis bos te/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dengs shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ byin gyis brlab pa na 'di bzhin du gyis shig/ dge slong gcig gi mdun du thal mo sbyor la 'dug ste tshig

thamakhari skadadu/ dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa khodag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gnas dbyar snga ma 'am gyi ma yang chung/ zla ba gsum gnas pa las/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi don gyi
phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu mchis la/ bdag gi dbyar 'alags te/ dbyar 'di gnas so// de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du smos shig/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'as la/ tshodang ldan pa u pa lis zhus ba/ btsunab zhag gtsagatubyin gyis brlabs la/ mtshams kyi slad rol tumatshabar rung ngam/ apa larung ngo// de bzhin du zhag
gnyis sam/ zhag gsum mam/ zhag bzhi'am/ zhag lnga 'am/ nag drug gam/ zhag bdun nam/ zhag brgyad dam/ zhag dgu 'am/ zhag bcu 'am// zhag tishu 'am/ tsha
sum cu 'am/ zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshams kyi phyi shol tu 'gro bar 'ung po// btsun pa zhag bzhi bcu phan chad byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa 'am rung ngo//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ u ba la mtshams kyi nang du na zhag mang du gnas par khya'i/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tun zhig nyung du gnas par bya'o// langagasol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus kyis
zhag gcig tu byin gyis brlab par byos shig ces gsungs na/ su'i mdun du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa la de ni dge slong gcig gi mdun du'o// de bzhin du zhag gnyis sam/
zhag gsum mam/ zhag bzhi 'o// zhag lnga 'am/ zhag drug gi bar du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ zhag drug khan chad nas/ zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du ni
ka dge 'dun la gsol te bskosan/ dge 'dun nam gang zag gi mdun du lasung/ ci dga' bar byin gyis rlobasang shig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa laso zhus
pa btsun ba pa la gas pa mi rung ba de'i risha yang ma rung ba lags sam/ u pa la rigs pa ma rung pa de'i yig yang ma ngago/ de'i rgyus bdang nus pa dag kyang mi rung ba'o// rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i
a mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// bam po so dgu pa/ kamado'on gzugs can snying bo mal gos dang// phyi mo dus 'das de
bzhin te// bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang// de dag bza' bar ma bya'o// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgya la po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs pa'i
tshe/ gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lhas byin gyis bslus nas/ de'i pha chos can chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa 'tshob dang phral ba de tsho/ de'i mal shes dag mtho ba dang du bar gyur nas
zla blon po dag gis/ lha rgyal bo bgres po ni 'phags pa dag la dgyes na/ gzims cha 'di dag kyang dge 'dun la dbul ba'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang/ des mal gas de dag gtsug lag

mtha0 khang du phul lo// dge slong dag gis de sgo khang du bting ste bzhag ge dngas phyi zhig na rgyal po gtsug lag kha sa du 'ongos nas/ des de mthong ba dang du bar gyur to// blon po ngag gis 'phags pa dag
khyed la sbyin pa 'di ma mthong bar bya ba'i phyi'in/ sgo khang du btang ba 'di ninyis pa'i dmigasasu gyur to zhes smras pa dang/ de dang gcang zir bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
ba tsam ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo khang du ma gdung zhig ces bka' stsal nas/ ya thog tu btang ba dang/ de nyid shes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan
'as kyis yang thog tu bting bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gnas khang du bting nas bzhag go/ ma dad pa dag bas rgyal pos la gas ni dge slong dag gis nges bar btsongs te zes
bsan/ de ste phul ba'i bsod nams ma snang dbonas dbyas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'i tshi/ yang thog tu thang la zhog cig// ma dad
pa dag gis mthong nas lha' mal stan dag ni dge slong dag gis btsongs nas zos te med do zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'as la gsol nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yon du phul ba 'das po/ 'din rgyal bo gzugs can snying po'i yone'onas mtha' ma la yi ger bris te zhog cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du
yod pan sto/ de'i tshon yul ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyi phyi mo sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig dus 'dus pa dang/ de phyir phyung ste btsugs nas shi ba'i tshog byas te/
nang par sngar gas kyang gsherasgra lang gsher bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yul ko sa la'i rgya la po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po nang par sngar sku yang gshen gos/
kyang gangasher bzhin du ngu 'dis ci la 'os/ btsun pa bdag gi phyi mo rab tu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig dus 'das pa dang/ de phyir byung ste bsregasanas shi ba ni cho ga bgyis te/ de'i phyi'i
nang par sngar gos kyang gsher skya yang gsher bzhin du 'di'i mchis so// rgyal po chen po phyi mo rab tu sdug gam/ btsun pa rab tu sdug cing yid du a chi ste/ btsun pa phyi mo sos par byas/
b+he baglang mang po 'tshal zhes mtshab zhig mchis na yang/ bdag gis ba klung mang bo yang gtongang// de bzhin du tshu mang po dang/ shing rta'ang bo dang/ rgyal srid phyod 'tshalan yang/ phyi mo
u0fc4 sos na rgyal srid byed kyang gtong bodad// btsun pa bdag gas de la de bzhin du mya nganadang/ de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang/ de bzhin du mya ngan gyis gzir bzhin du bsgrims kyang/ phyi mo
wawasdug cing yid du 'ong ba dus 'das pa dang/ bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngomatshar tshe ste/ sems can thams cad dang/ srog
chags thams cad dang/ 'byung po thams cad 'tsho ba'i mtha' na'achar 'gyur ro// mthar ni 'chal thug pas na/ skyos na 'chi'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni ngomatshar che'o zhes
gsol pa dang/ rgyal po chen po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can thams cad dang/ srog chags thams cad dang/ 'byung po thams cad kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi bar 'gyur te/
mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na/ skyes phan chad ma 'chi ba med do// rgyal po chen po gang rgyal rigs che zhing mthob dang/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing

mtho ba de dag kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni'achi bar 'gyur te/ mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na/ skyes phan chad ma 'chi ba med do// yang rgyal po chen po rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba skye bo mang po
la dbang zhing brtson 'grus thob pa// sa gzhi chen po'i dkyil 'khor yang rab tu brtulacing gnas par byed pa de lta bu dag kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' 'tshabar 'gyur te/ mtha' 'chi ba la thug pas na/

rgyas pan chad ma 'chi ba med do// rgyal po chen bo yang 'di ltar rgya la bo las drang srong du gnas na gnas pa/ 'bras bu nga ltung ba tha ba/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bus 'tshob de lta bu yang 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni'acha/
0 kanubya/ bar 'gyur te/ mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na/ skyes ban chad ma 'chi ba med do// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang lha tshorang po kha dog dang ldan pa mang ba gzhal med/
khang mthon po na 'dug kyang/ de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho ba'i tshos su 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang rgyal po chen bo dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba bsgrubs pa/ khur bor ba/
rang gi don theg pa/ srid par sbyor ba zad pa/ yang dag pa'i bka' la sems kyis rnam pa ragrel ba de dag gi lus kyang brjeba'i chos su 'gyur/ yang 'di ltar rgyal po chen po rang sangs rgyas/
'a bse ru 'ab/ bdag gcig pu 'dul ba/ bdag gcig pu zhing/ bdag gcig pu rgyun las zlo ba de dag kyang lus brje ba'i chos su 'gyur ro// yang 'di ltar rgyal bo tshon po de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas stobs bcudang ldan pa// ma 'jigs pa bzhis ma 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gdam pa/ seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs pa de lta bu'i sku
yang brje ba'i tshos su 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po rnam pa de lta bu thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par gyis shig/ gang sems can thams cad dang/ srog chags thams cad dang/ 'byung
! bo thams cad kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' 'tsha kher 'gyur te/ mthar 'chi ba la thug pas na/ skyes phan chad mi 'chi ba med de/ sems can thams cad kyang 'tsho ba'i mtha' 'chi bar 'gyur te/
ji ltar las byas de yis ni// bsod nams sdig pa 'bras bur 'gro// sdig pa'i las ni dmyal bar lhang// bsod nams byas pa mtho ni 'gro// kha cig lam la bsgoms pas ni/
zag pa med par mya ngan 'da'// sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams// lus 'di rnam par 'don 'gyur na// skye dgu ma rabs smos pa dag gis/ nam
yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ btsem ldan/
'das kyi drung nas song ste/ bdag gi khyim du phyin pa dang/ phyi mo 'i nal gas stong par mthong nas/ yang sdug pa sha ba'i mya ngan gyis sems 'khrugs nas/ blon po dag la smras pa
kyi ngas mal gis 'di mthong nas rab tum dag 'a ba skyes kyis/ sang 'a 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag 'a 'du phulo cig/ de dag gis kyang dze ta'i tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag la
phul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis sgo khang du bting ste bzhag go/ de nas dus phyi zhagi na rgyal po blon po drug gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas des de mthong ba dang/ de dus so// blon po dag gis
'phags pa dag 'di ni bstan pa'i phyir khyed la dbul dbalan/ sgo khang du bting ba de nyidanyes pa'i dmags su gyur to zhes smras pa dang/ de dag ca ma zer bar 'dug nas de ltar gyurar/
dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa ka' stsal ba/ sgo kha du ma gding bar yang thog tu things shig/ de yang
nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang thog tu ma gdang bur gnas khang du ba nges shig/ de gnas khang du bting ba dang/ ma dad pa dgagasi rgyal
sgra bo' mol gas ni dge slong rnams kyis btsongs te zhes gor ma chag/ snga na ni sna na/ dan ma snang ngozhis dbyas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshes brgyadadam bcu
yaM bzhi'i dus su yang theg tu thang la zhog cig/ ma dad pa dag gis mthong nas/ 'di ni lha mo'i mol gos ma yin gyi/ dge slong dag gis nges par btsos nyes so zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar
gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis phul ba'i gos so zhes yi ger bris/
la zhag cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshomanyan du yod par ser ba drag po zhig bab nas/ derar dgas dang bya mang zhige shi'o// skye bo mang po dag tho
zla rangs snga langs nas/ ri dgas dang bya gang bzar rung ba la sogs pa na bsdus te khyer/ bya rog la sogs pa bzar ma rung ba ni bod ro// drug sde rnams chos kyis mang du za zhing rang du nyal lo//
de dag ring zhig nas langs te thos ma thag tu myur du ranges par dang nas/ dedag gis bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rgod dang/ phyi chu skyar mo dag blangs te 'ong nga bram ze dang
khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas/ de dag gis 'bab 'di zhagi bya zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis bza' 'o zhes smras pa dang/ 'phags pa 'di dag ni bslar rung gis ratu//
kyi kha zhan rnyedan yang blangan/ 'ang ci'i phyi'i a ba za'/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge
slong dag bya rog la sogs pa 'disha bzar mi rung ba'arisha ma za zhig/ thos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad ng bzhi pa'o//
mde'on khyi dang khri dang 'ug pa dang// ma sha za ba'i bya dag dang// rtadang dri dang rtsa dngan// spro'a rnams bza'abar ma bya 'o// sangs rgyas btsos ldan 'dasamanyan/
du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mu ge byung nas khyim pa dag khyi'isha za ba la zhugs pa dang/ drug sde dag mnyan du yo dang bsod snyoms la
dngoste/ khyim gang nas gang du 'ongs pa dadang der 'phags ba cung zad tsam yang ma mchas sozhis smras pa dang/ de nas yang khyim gzhan zhig tu 'os pa dang/ den lde'u'i nang na khyingan zhige
'tshod de kho la 'dre 'dug go/ khyim bdag gi chung mas/ 'phags pa cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud cig ces smras pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa// rdzi'u'i nangan/
a khol zhing 'dug pa de ca yin/ 'phags pa 'di ni khyi sha'o// ci khyed cag kyi sha za 'am/ 'phags pa mu ge byung bas na 'tshal la/ de lta na ngedachag kyang byin dgo/ 'phags pa khyed
kyang gsol lam/ kye nged cag gi srog khyed la rtenan/ khyed cag phan nged cag kyang ci'i phyi'i ma zi/ de dag gis byin no// de byin pa dang de khyer te song ngo// khyi dag gi snaramanam pa tshor nas/
'a de dag gis bskor zhing/ bdag ba skad kyis blugs shing du ste/ phyi bzhin du 'brang ba bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras ba/ 'phags pa ci'i slad du khyi dag gas
gtses bzhin du 'dong/ de dag gis smras pa// bdag cag bsod snyoms khyi sha cung zad cig red do// 'phags bcakhyed cag khyi'i sha bla 'am/ kyi 'di lta bu bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa'i
san nged cag lcogs bzhin du 'chi 'am/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gang dge slong dag gis khyang sha zos
ba ni nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te/ dbasan dge slong dag khyi sha ma za zhagi/ dge slong dag gis khyarisha zos na 'das pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ro// gleng gzhani mnyan du
[4 ]yod ba na ste/ drug sde dag gis khra dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya mi sha za ba de dag ga sha yang za ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa dag 'bya ba'agyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khra dang/ lug ba dang/ mdisha za ba dag ga bya'iti'am bla zhig/ dge slong gis
khra dang/ 'ug pa dang/ sha za ba dag gi bya'adisha zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ ma byin par len pa dag gis yul
ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dri zhige brkus te khridi nas nags stug po 'anyid du bsad// sha khyer nas mgo sug bar te deng ngo// drug sde rnams chos kyis goms pa na nang par sdural sa
nas khang stong du byung ste phyogs bzhir bltas nas/ dung ba gang na chapo dang/ bya rgod gangan lnga ba phyogs pa zhar ba ltas nas der 'deng ngo// de dag gis nags stug po na bya rgod ldang ba
mthong nas/ de dag nags sdug bor rgyug cing rings par deng ba dang/ nags stug po da na dre'u 'i mgo dang/ rkang lag dang/ mjug ma dag mthong nas/ di dag gsalcasakha/
dag rtsa nye dga' bo rdul khrod zhagi ridan blang ngam zhes pa dang/ legs kyis blang pozhisanas/ de dag gsagacig tubasdus pa dang/ dre'udza yan man tsho bas mthong nas/ de dag
gas smras pa/ 'phags ba dag ni drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzinan/ ci'i phyir ngan du spyod pa mdzad/ dad cag gis ci zhig te sa zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal po
sha dren khyid cag gis bsad de zhes smras pa dang/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig/ nged cag ni mi gsod do/ 'o na sus pasad ces pa dang/ ma byin pa len pa dag gis bsad de/ nged
rdzu cag gis ni mgo dang/ rkang pa dang/ mjug ma dag rdul khrodapar byin gyis brlabs so// de dag gis ci 'phags pa khyed cag dre'u sha bsnams sam zhes smras pa dang/ za'o zhes
smras pas/ de dag 'phya bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang dge slong dag
srog chags dre'u 'apisha zos pa na 'os pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/ de bas na dge slong dag gis srog chab gas rmig zlum gyi resha ma za zhig/ de ste zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/
zla/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ drug sde dag gis za 'a sha zos pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa 'ditsalags/ wa'i sha'o// sa 'phag/
u0fc4 ba dag kyang wa 'a yig bsnams sam/ za'o zhes smras pa dang/ de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/ dge slong dag de bas na wa 'arisha ma za nagi/ dge slong dag gis lnga 'i sha bros na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyu'o//
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dIta' tshal bu na/ spre'u zhig ngashang kha nas shing khar rgyu ba las lhung nas dus 'das te/ drug sde dag gis rdzi'u zhig gi nang du bcug ste 'tshod/
pa dang/ bud med gzhan zhig bu chung ngu zhig stor nas de 'tshol nang dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs na/ drug sde rnams rje 'u'i nang du spre'u 'tsho ba mthong ngo// mthong nas des drug sde dag gas bdag
bu 'di'i ma bcos sam snyam bsams te/ rtog pa la zhugs pa dang/ ji tsam zhig na lhud lhud khel ba dang/ spre'u'alag pa gyen du byung ba dang/ des drang brdungs te/ kyihud/
du kyi hud bu zhes smras pa dang/ de'aking pa yang byung ste/ kyi hud du kyi hud bu zhes yang smras pa dang/ drug sde dag gis ci'i phyir de ltar byed ces smras pa dang/ des rkang lag byung
ba 'di na bdag gi bu'o zhes smras pa dang/ jitsam nas mjug gam yang byung ngo// drug sde dag gis ni khyod kyi bu la mjug ma yod dam zhes smras pa dang/ de skyengs te smras pa/ 'phags//
ba 'di tsi sa' 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ spre'u'o// 'phags pa dag spre'u'i sha yang bsnams sam/ des khralozhes smras pa dang/ de dag 'phya bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa//
dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalab/ dge slong dag sprekun mi shadang 'dra/ de bas na dge slong
dug spre'u'i sha ma za zhig/ dge slong dag gis spre'uTin zosan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad l ldapa'o//
daa'atshas bcad baldapa'// mder na / phor bu gos dang pags pa dang// 'dab ma'i bor bur ma sbyin na// lcags sbug du ma gtogs par// nor bu 'khar bas gtang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshonamanyan du yod pa na/ dge slong gzhan zhig na ste/ de rab tu nad kyis gzir nas//
de sman pa' dung du song ste nad med cig ces nas/ bzhini bzas bodag ni rnam pa 'di lta bu zhig tun bar gyur na/ sman gyi thabs ston cig ces smras pa dang/ sman pas 'phags pa mas
gtong ba'i sman gyis shig ces smras pa dang/ sa bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can lags kyis/ rjes su
gnang bor 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas bsgo la/
des sos par 'gyur nams gtong ba byos shig/ de la the tsam du ma byed cig bcom ldan 'das kyis mas gtong ba'i sman thong zhig ces gsungs pa dang/ de dag gse phor
bus byugs pa dang/ po sta ma run gnas / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bor bus a klubasashig ces gsungs pa dang/ gsakyi mtha'ams blugs pa dang/ de 'ang nyes
pa'i dmags su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos kyi mtha' mas ma glugs shig ces gsungs na/ bags pa'i nang nas blugs pa dang/ de'ang nyes pa'i
dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pags pa'i ning nas ma glugs shicig ces gsungs pa dang/ 'dab ma'i phor bu'i nang nas klugs te/ de'ang
nyes pa'i demigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ 'dab ma dbor du 'anang nas ma blugs par sgrug gu'anang nas blugs par gyis shig/ des lcags sbug
gu nas klugs pa dang/ denang du bcug na rab tu tsha nang nub par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lcags kyi sbug du ma gtogs par/ nor bu'i sdug gu 'am/
'khar ba'i sbug gus gtong bar gyis shig/ rkyang pa'i sgo dang bo'i epo'i tshigs su bcad b drug bgo///mdoran/ bur shing dang zhe zhag 'bru mar dang/ gso ma
bsregs pa'i thug pa dang na mar// rtsa ba 'bras bu sdong bu la mar bcas// thug pa dag ni thams cad blud par bya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa u ba laso zhus ba/ btsun pa sman gcig las de nyid snga drong/
denyid phyi dropa/ denyid zhag bdun// de nyid nam 'tsho' bar du rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa la bu ram shing na sda dro'ago/ de'i khu ba ni phyi dro pa'o// bu ram ni bdun pa'o//
bu ram shing dang bum bsregs pa la thol ba nanam 'tsho'i bar du 'o// u pa la zhi na snga dro pa'o// zho'i chun phyi dropa// maran bdun pa'o// zho bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar
du go/ u pa larig ni snga dro pa'o/ tshil ba ni bdun pa'o// sha bsregs pa'i thel ba na nam 'tsho'i bar du'o// u pa la tel ni snga dropa'o// til gyi mar na bdun pa'o// til
bsregs pa'i phel bani nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig na bar gyur nas/ sman pas mthong ste/ 'phags pa gso ma'i
thug pa byos la'athung zhage ces smras pa dang/ des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
0 bka' stsalab/ de ltar sman pas bsgo na de bzhin du gyis shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na// dge slong gzhan dag cig yang na bar rgyus
nas/ de dag kha cag la ni sman ra sa yus kar gyi thug pa 'thung nag ces bsgo go//kha cig la ni tshu pa'i thug pa 'a thung zhig ces bsgo'o// kha cig la ni sdong bu'i thug ba'athung zhig ces bsgo/
kha cig lan 'bras bu'i thug pa 'byung zhig ces bsgo pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// delta bas na
ngas rjes su gnang gis sman pas nad pa la lung bsgo na/ thams cad kyis thug pa'i ng 'thung zhig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo dang bo'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun
adoran bu ram chudang btung ba de bzhin te// zhag bdun bzhag pa gyur ba dang// gzhan gyi phyir yang bsngo ba dang// rjes su phan gdagasamyang bar bya/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dgar ban bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te ljongs spyod
cing gshegs pa dang/ de dag ri brags kyi grong ga nan zhig tu phyin te/ ra brags kyi grong de na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'dras
ri khrags kyi grong de byon pa dang/ khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi dung du 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyenanas/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bshan gnas / khyim bdag
des thos pa dang/ 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'abras bu mngon du byas so// ji tsam dge slong de dag lam gyi ngal bas
gab nas/ lag pa'i lha khang dang/ bkadas dang/ skyed mos tshaladang/ shing drungodag tu glos phab ste nyal nang 'khod pa dang/ lcami bdag de rab tu dadapa theb pas na bkad/
zhes dang/ lha khang dang/ shing drung dag tu rims kyis dge slong dag la phyag bya ba'i phyir song ba dang/ dge slong dag gnas na nyal zhing 'dug pa des mthong nas// 'phags pa dgabastan
ba shin tu brtson par bgyi ba la ni'i slodadu na gzims shing bzhugs zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis khyim bdag lam gyi ngal bas gzir zhing nyam chung ste/ dge ba'i phyogs stod par yang
sa nus so zhes smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa rnams de ltar na phyi dro pa ram gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyis na stsol cag ches gnang na/ bdag 'tshal te mchis gsol cig ces smras
pa dang/ de dag las kha cig na re/ khyim bdag de legs kyis bsla ba bar bgyi'o// kha cig gis tshe dang ldan pa khyim bdag 'ber tA si dag gas bu ram bza' la brtenus/
bcom pa mngon du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin rjes su gnangan/ bdag cag ni lam gyi ngal bas gzir te/ 'jig rten ma dad pa dag ni grongan 'khod pa zhan du khu lto nags mi
dga' bar 'gyur gyis/ gdadu 'dod do zhes smras pa dang/ kha cig gis yang tshe dang ldan pa de ltar 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes smras pa dang/ deltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald bu ram ni thams cad du bza' bar bya ste/ la the tsom du ma byed cig/ btsus ldan pas
kyis thams cad du bu ram blo zhig ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag gis zos pa dang/ de dag lam gyi ngal bas skom gyis gdungs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa lA
stsal pa// bu ram gyi chu rgyus la 'thung zhig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te 'tshal du rung
ngam u pa la rung ngo// btsun pa ji tsam gyi bar du bzhag la btung bar bgyi/ u pa li ji tsaman dang bar gyur te/ skyur por ma gyur cing rang bzhin ma nyams pa'i bar du'o/
gleng gzhin mnyan du yod panaste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyin dang/ tshul nas dbyung ba dang/ chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gos bsngo ba dang/
gang zag gcig bu mgon du bos pa dang/ 'di lnga na'i nga gso bsams pas 'grub bo zhes gsungs so// dge slong de dag gang du'u gron du bos pa der/ de las gzhan du'ang mgron du byas sam
de las lhag par yang rung ste/ gcig tunabadag nyid/ gnyis sun bdag gi sa mas btang nas gzhan ga ta ba'o// mu ge'i dus la bab ste/ dge slong rnams bsod snyoms kyisangashis
nga tu 'phongs par gyur to// dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag zas la mgron du bos pa dang/ khyim bdag cig la bas blangs te/ gzhan btang
rgyu dngo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na ngas mug byung zhing sdug bsngal la rnyed dka' ba'i dus na/ ji snyed du mgron du bos pa de thams cad bdag gar bya par gyis shig
zlade dag la bdag kyang bo zhagi/ dge slong dag la yang bsgo bar bya'o// dge slong dag khram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan gyi dor dong ba dang/ de dag gis 'phags pa khyed ni bdag cag gis mgyen du ma
bos kyi/ 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas brtan bdag cag gis spyan drangs so zhes smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// bdag nyid song la byin len bya ste/ kham gnyis sam gsum blo la/ 'di skad du khyim bdag dge slong 'di dag zas kyis brel te/ 'di la sbyin gyis rjes su yang ma byed
shig ces smos shig/ de bzhin du gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ ji srid mgron du nges pa thams cad las byin cig/ thams cad de ltar byas nas tha mar mgron du bos pa ni ji tsam
par bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed tsug/ rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyud pa'o/// mdor na/ mar la mde ste 'bru mar la ma rtagazhan/
yang gzhag par gyur pa dang// mag sman gyi ni gab rtse dang// ya ngos pa can da rung pa gnas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dza yAlA tshu pha me
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong gzhan zhige rlung nad kyis btab pa des sman pa ni gan du song ste/ bzhani bzangs bdag la 'di 'dra bawAnd kyis kun
sman ston cig ces smras so// des 'phags pa mar 'di tsam zhag gsol dang/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste sman pas mar 'thung zhig par bsgo na btung bar bya'o// ngag so/des nu ngas nga dang
nyin par bde ba dang/ mtshan mo yang rlung nad langs so// dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang/ des mtshan mo'ang 'thung zhage ces smras so// dge slong dag
gas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo yang 'thung zhig ces bka' stsal ba dang/ sa mang du bsags nas zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te sos
bar gyur to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yodapan ste/ dge slongag nan zhage nad kyis btapanas/ de'ang sman pa'i drung du song ste/ nad med cig ces byas nas/ bzhin bzang/
padag la ba 'dra ba'i nad cig gis btab na/ sman gyi thabs ston cag ces smras so// des 'phags pa 'bru mar 'datsam zhi'i 'thungs na sos par 'gyur rozhis bsgo ba dang/ de ltar
gyur ba dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas 'bru mar 'thung zhig
tshu ces bsgo na/ 'bru mar 'thung zhig dge slong des 'thungs pa dang/ nyin par sos kyang mtshan mo yang rlung nad langs so// dge slong dag gis sman bal dris pa dang/ desamtshan/
mo yang 'thung nagi ces bsgogo/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gso la nas/ bcom ldan 'dasaM kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan mo yang 'thung zhagi/ des 'bru mar
0bsags te/ zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs nas 'thungs pa dang/ sos par gyur te// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig nad kyis btub/
pa dang/ de yang sman pa'i drung du song nas/ nad med cig ces smras nas/ bzhin bzangs bdag la nad 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na/ sman gyi thabs ston cig ces smras so// des
mar ram 'bru mar 'di tsam zhig 'thungs na sos par 'gyur zhes smras pa dang/ dengashes nyung bas btsal kyang ma red nas/ yang sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin pazangs khyod kyis bsgo
yang kha bis 'bru mar yang ma rnyed na/ mar lta ga la red/ gzhan lta cung zad tsa rung ston cig ces smras pa dang/ des 'phags pa 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong zhig gis 'bru mar sbyar
na 'dazhes bya ba zhig gis mar sbyar gyis/ de'i gan du song dang/ gal te sbyarab de lhag ma yod kyang sridi de zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gi drung du song nas bslangasan de dag gis tshe
dang ldan pa de zhag bdun las 'das te/ spangs bar gyur pas med do zhes smras pa dang/ de de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa'i thabs rtogs la// mar ram 'bru mar gzhan ci yang rung/ gzhag pa yang bas bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tshom
! @#// du ma byed cig/ kha com ldan 'das kyis mar ram 'bru mar gzhan las chung/ gzhag pa yang bas grol/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig ces bka' stsal na/ byin
len byed pa med de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byin len byed pa'i go medan/ byin len ma byas kyang blos zo 'gi/ gang ga tshon pan gnang ba sosan ma spyod cig/ sdud/
na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur do/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa a pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis mig sman gyi snod gab tsechongs shig ces bka' stsalan/ tsa'adra ba 'chang bar bgyi/ u pa ni po che las byas pa ma gtogs so// yang zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis yul yangs pa can na ma rung ba rnam pa bcu spos la/ rung ba'i kha nga ba byin gyis brlab pa gyis shig ces bka' stsalan/ ci btsun pa khang pa 'og rung bar byin gyis brlabs na/
b+h+yA khang pa'i steng yang rung bar byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li ji ltar stengag khazhani du/ sakyi yang brjod par bya'o// rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu
nga mdor na rtsa stong lam 'bras bu rnams// thams cad chang gis spangs pa dang// kha zas medabar bkrus pa dang/ yang na zas ngan de bzhin no/
sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i de sa pongashing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ shAkya'i rigs re re zhing yang shAkya lnga brgya zhig/
btsem ldan 'das kyi g.yog tu phul ba dang/ de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung ngo// de dag sngon lus chang gis gsos pas na/ de dug chang medun lus la nad zhugs so//bcom
ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan po kun dga'ago la kun dga' bro tsa'i phyir na shAkya dag tA nIpor gyur ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur/
pa btsem ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na sa gnang ba ni chad du 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang sdong bu la sogs pa skams la phye mar gyis te/
ras dkar po'anang du thum por gyis la/ chang ga mthu nal ba rdza ma ma gad pa'i nang du lugs shig/ de nas slar phyung sku lag khrus la/ tshul thas med pa dang bsros te/ ldangapar tshog
la 'thung zhig/ de skoman snga dro yang rung/ phyi dro yang rung ste/ the tshom ma byed par 'thung zhig/ de ltar byos dang de dag chang la sred pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dge slong khyed skyon
pa nga la dmigs na na changam 'thunganage/ ma blud cag/ rtswa mchog gis kyang ma rig cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/
de la sman pas bas ngan pa byin cig ces bsgo ba dang/ de la dge slopa kha cig gis ni shes kyi/ gang gi ming zhes pa de dag gis/ tshodang ldan pa u pa
las dris pa dang/ sa de dag zhib tu smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong swa sti la zas na ba cin
rug ces gsungasan/ ci de yang byin len bgyi 'tshal lam/ u pa li da ya byin len byos shig/ u la byin len bgyi/ khu ba la de ni dge bsnyenadad pa las go/ rkyang pa'i
sgo dang po'i mdo'atshigs su bcad pa bcu ba ste/ sgo dang po rdzogs so mdor bsdus par na/ snodadang chos gos gnyis ka dang// ko sa la dang sar
ba de bzhin te// bsgrags dang chos gos sna tshogs dang// lhan cig ba yang dge slong ma rnams ni// tha mar byas te bsdus ba'i mdor gsungs so// mdor na
b+he snod dang yo byadagatsug lag khang// 'gron pa mang ba tsam gosa rnams dang// gos dang gdugs dang de bzhin shing// dur khrod pa dang de bzhin sbyangs/// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab n bzhugs so// de'i tshon khyim bdag gzhan zhage gsi/ ri khrags kyi grong gzhan zhige tu yo byad thams
sA cad dang ldan pa'i khe tsug lag khang zhig btsugs nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo// de na mal stan dang snod sbyad mang du gyur/ dge slong ninyung du gnas gnas
ti de'i nang nas kha cig gis tshodang ldan pa dag/ mal stan dang snod spyad yokhyad dag ma spyad n/ de dag chud za bar 'gyur gyis/ de dag las bdag cag la sbyad par ji tsam dgos pa/
detsam zhag bcasal/ de'i lhag ma rnams ni gtsug lag khagazhan du dbul lo zhes skyas nas de dag gis de bzhin du byas so// jatsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig ljongs spyad
pa spyodatsang gtsug lag khang der 'os pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis ngal bsor bcug nas/ de'ang dge 'dun de dag gnang na rgan pa zhig ste/ gtsug lag khang du lam gyi ngal bso nas
sa de dag la/ tshodang ldan pa lasnyan mchis sam zhes smras na/ med do zhes smras pa dang/ dag slo de dag gis ji ltar yin pa de la zhib tu smras so// de gdang ba med par sa la de
bzhin du tu la nas/ nang bar sngar las te/ lde mig 'khyog po dang lde mig khyer nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang/ de nas khyim bdag des de la bde bar byon nam zhes pa'i
tshig brjod nas/ stan khyer te phyi'i byung ba dang/ bsod snyoms pa de spyod lam zhi ba'i tshul du 'dug go/ bsod snyoms pas kyang de la nor las bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi yon
tan rgyas bar brjod pa dang/ khyim bdag gas 'phags pa bdag gis de thams cad bgyis so zhes smras pa dang/ bsod snyoms pas khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang
na mal stan dag yod med de/ mdangs nga yang gdang ba med par sa'i ston de bzhin du nyalanyal te 'di'i 'os so// khyod na ri ni thams cad bdag gse de bzhin du bgyis so zhes kher na/ 'di
lha canyis zhes smras pa dang/ khyim bdag gas 'phags pa kho bos ni der malastanadang/ snod spyad dang/ lo byang rnams su du sbyaran/ 'phags pa de dag gis kha/tsug lag khang gzhan du
'a gdon ma zas bar btang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ sa khyim bdag nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gi lde mig la phyog po dang lde mig gi ngo shes sam zhes smras ba dang/ 'phags pa shin tu 'tshal to//
des de bstan pa dang/ des 'phags pa bzhud tsag/ bdag kyang mchi'o zhes smras so// de nas bsod snyoms pa sod pa dang/ khyim bdag kyang rjes bzhin du 'ongs nas/ des dag
slong rnams bsdus nas/ 'phags pa bdag gis 'di'i mal stan dang/ snod dang/ yokhyad mang du phu lan/ de dag gar mchis zhes rmas pa dang/ des ji ltar gyur pa de dag/
! thams cad khyim bdag lasmras pa dang/ des nyes pa 'o brjod de smras pa// khyod kyis ma legs par byas te/ de yang der bsan/ da ci sar blang darang ma/ 'on te mi rung/ de
dag gis smras pa/ ming go/ 'phags pa bsanadir ma bul gyis/ songal sar long zhig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ gtsug lag khang gzhan du ma 'bul cagi/ ji ltar dmagos pa de bzhin du sbyad bar bya'o// gzhan du na gang gis byin pa de larinam nganan du phob
cig gle nga gzhi ni menyan du yod ba na ste drug sde rnams 'gran pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongasasbyad pa spyod cing dang ba dang/ de dag gi chos kyis rdul gyis 'jigs pas
na/ yang nani 'gron ba de dag kha mdun du dongo/ yang nan phyi bzhin deng ngo// ji tsam na 'gran pa mang po rnams rkun bos bcos nas/ skye bo mang po rnams kyis ra bar te bros pa dang/
rkun po rnams kyis nor na bkur ma nus nas/ de dag gis bzang ba gdams te khyer te dang// drug sde rnams 'gran pa mang po'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te dong ba las/ gnas der
byin pa dang/ de dag gis lo mang po'i 'o la mthong ste/ de nas dga' bo nye dga' bo phyag dar khrod pa rnyed kyis blang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis de las kyang gos rnams la gdams te
khyer ro// 'gron ba mang bor med 'od lam spungs su bcas te slar log pa de dgag gas/ drug sde dag ga gis khyer ba rnams ngo shes nas/ de dag gis gang rkun po rnams kyis bor ba de
yod/ dge sbyong mgo rig rnams kyis brkus so zhes bsams te/ drug snga rnams la kha ngan du 'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin la/ de lta bu'i
sa lag par sbyod pa dag spyod pa zhes sbyos te/ nyis pa der brjod pa dang/ de dag gis 'gron pa mang bo rnams rkun pos patsamo ste/ ngedakyis ni ma yin gyi/ nged kyis phyag dar khrod kyi gos
rdzornyed donas smas pa dang/ dedag las phyag dar khrod kyi gnas legs so zhes smras pa dang/ de la lan med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong rnam pa 'gron pa mang po 'phyab na yus te/ de bas na dge slong dag gis 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i ges
ma bkur zhig/ dge slong dag gis 'grenab mang bo bcom pa'i gos khyer na 'das ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dad par gyur ba de dag gis/ 'phags pa dag ci bder snoms/
shig ces smras na/ dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas mi len te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de staci bder khyer cig ces smras na/ la la the tsom du ma byed cig
gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/ dge slong drug sde dag gis bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du de ba dang/ sha kho'i yo byad gdugs dang shing gos dag mang po bor ba de dag gsim
waka'anas de'i nang nas gcig gis dga' boskyo dga' phyag dar khrod kyi gos med kyis bkur ro zhes smras pa dang/ dga' ba lags kyis bkur zhes smras nas/ de dag gis blangs te
dong ngo// dur khrod kyi srus ma rags ngan dag 'ongs nas des bsams pa// dur khrod 'din cung zad kyang med pas na/ kha cig gsi dar brkus bar gdon mi za'osnyam bsams nas/
khang 'di snyam du gang gas btus pa de brtogos pas/ slar yang 'ong bar gdon ma zis/ mngon par gab ste 'dug go snyam du bsams te/ drenags stug po'i nang du zhugs nas nyin gcig
bzhin sdodacing 'dug pa dang/ drug sde dag zhag bdunanam brgyad lan te/ dag 'a ba nyi dga' bo bdag cag gis dur khrod dum dong nas da rung zhig len// cung zad tsam red kyang srid
kyis/ yad 'deng bonas smras nas/ de dag dong ngo// ji tsaman de na gos dang/ gdugs dang/ shing dag bor ba de dgags blang bar brtsams pa dang/ ragis ngan nags
tshal stug po na 'dug pa des mthong nas brgyugs te 'ongs nas/ des 'phags pa dag bdag cag yun dang/ gnyen dang/ grogs po dag rgyal po'i bkabazhin du byed pa yang dun
khrodakyigs 'di'i ri/ khyed cag gos pa'i phyir bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi shi ba'i yo byad dag bkur par bya zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis bzhin bzangs nged cag gis phyag
dar khrod pa 'a gos blangs so// des 'phags pa 'di la de dag dur khrod kyi gos yin n rab tu ma legasaso zhes smras pa dang/ de dag lan medunas cang mi zer/
bar 'dug ge/ de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rigs ngan 'phya bani yus te/ de bsan dge slong
lca dag bdag po yod pa'i dur khrodanas phyag dar khrodakyi gos ma lenatsag/ dge slong dag gis bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i gos blangasan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur//
gzhan yang dad par gyur pa dag gis de dag la/ 'phags pa dag ci bde bar khyer cig ces smras pa dang/ dge slong dag the tsom du gyur te ma blangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
'a la pa// de ste ci bde bar leng zhig ces zer na blang bar bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o//
we bam po bzhi bcu pa// mdor na gos la sogs bangashing bal dang// lha khang nas 'phrog de bzhin te// dge 'dun gyi ni chos gos gsum// gang zag dag las khang/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ drug sde bzhon pa mang po'ishing rta dang lhan cig
wa lam du zhugs nas/ khamagyi byed du phyin pa dang/ shing rta gcig gi srog shing chag nas/ tshong pa des srog shing yang brjesanas/ srog shing chag pa bor te song ngo// nyengaga'
bos shing rta'i srog shing de blos te/ lam bo tsho'i bzhi mdor bodonas smras pa/ dag 'gronyi dga' bo'adzin bidag cag gas srog shing dbang phyug ces bya ba'i lha rten du btsala'i phyir/
btsugs so zhes byas tado ba las/ khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang der stabs su brtsigs so// gzhan nagi gdis kyang de la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te bdag gi don 'di dang
'di lta bu zhig grub na/ bdagags 'di'i khang pa brtsigs la/ bram ze brgya rtsa brgyad ston mo khya'o zhes smras pa las/ de'ang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas/ de'i
de'agrubanas/ sa der dam ji ltar bcas pa thams cad bsgrubasanas/ de log pa'i lha khang du gyur te/ lha khang pas kyang byin gyis brlabs so de nas tshong pa 'gron ba mang
bodag gi lamador zhugs pa dang/ der gos dang/ b.li dang/ shing bal dag mang du bul lo// drug sde dag slar log pa'i tshe lha khang de rab tu rgyas par mthong nas/ de dag
gas smras te/ dga' nyi dga' bongashing rta'i srog shing dbang phyug gso dang/ bo la dang/ shing bal dgarab tu mang zhing phun sum tshogs pa de b.ro// zhes de dag gas blang
zha bu@#// khar brtsams pa dang/ lha khang pa dag lhags te/ de dag gse 'phags pa dag lha khang 'di ni bdag cag ga ste/ 'ani las dang byi dor bdag cag gis bgyis/
na/ lha'i gos rnams ci'i phyi'i len cing 'brog/ khyed cag ma byani par len pa ma sngas sam zhes smras ba dang/ bdag gis bkrin pa 'di ji ltar khyed kyi lha khang/ datsag gsar
rta srog shange chag pa zhabod rten thabs su btsugs te bzhag go zhes smras so// lha khang pa des ku robaton pa dang/ de nas nye dga' bo khros nas de gob gcig brgyab nas bskyob byas
so/ de nas de snyems shing dregs pa rnams sba gnas/ 'phel sa pa khyed dam gzhan zhig gis byas par gyur na yang bdag cag na 'di la rten cing 'tshob yang 'di la ltas na/ ci'i phyir
wa khyed kyis 'phags pa'i tshos ma yin pa byed ces smras pa dang/ de dag ma spobs te cangam zer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
sh+tsa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag log pa'i lha khang na gnas pa dag 'bya ba gi yus te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blang
bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag gis lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// log pa'i lha khang pa dang pa gzhan zhig gis ci bde bar spyod
tsawaci ces smras pa dang/ dge slong de dag tsam skyes te ma smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa []// lapa// gal te ni bder byas ban blang bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed
cig gleng gnani mnyan du yod panasto/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la skul cig ces gsungs pa dang/ ji tsam zhig na dge slong zhig na ba gyur pa de'i nad g.yog gis/
tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun la cung zad tsag phul cig ces smras pa dang/ des kyang bdag lacung bod tsam yang med mod kyi/ chos gos gsum dbu la' zhes smras pa dang/ decang mi zer bar
'dug go/ des chos gos gsum bu la nas/ de dag gas btsongs te bags so// dge slong de phyis sos te langasanas chos gos gsum gyis 'phos par gyur te/ de ltar gyur ba
bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gis dge slong la dge 'dun gyi chos gos gsum la blang zhig/
blangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyis kyang ma blang zhig/ de ste blangs na yang ma 'god pa'i// bgos na 'das pa dang bcas pa'i 'agyura'o/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi
mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so/// mda'o na 4 gnyis ka la yang gnang ba dang// rnam pa tha dad rjes su gnang// sum cha dang yang dge tshul dang/ dge slong/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/
dge slong drug cu nag ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing 'khrugs kyi grong 'gag tu phyin nas// de na khyim bdag dad pa zhig gnas pa des de dag de gi khyim du bgos la spyan drangs nas/ des dge slong re'i
lci zhing ras yug re re dbul lasnyam du bsams so// de dag gzana' bal zhugs pa dang/ dge slong ma drug cu zhig kyang ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi gong der phyin pa dang/ bsod
snyoms slong ba la zhugs so// gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag 'di'i khyim na dge slong dag bshos gsol gyis der bzhud cig ces smras pa dang/ dedug der song ste/ de dag gis kyang
ya gzan zesapa dang/ de dag khyim bdag des ras yug drug cu zhige rganarams kyi mdun du bzhag go/ dge slong dag ji lta bur go ba mashesanas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom
zla ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis 'thob pa yan gyis/ dge 'dun sde gnyis su bgos shig
gling gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhige gsi gtsug lag khang zhig brtsi bo des te/ des de zhal bsros te/ dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol nas/
mkharnyed pa yang mang du bul te/ dge slong dag gis bgos pa dang/ dge slong dag nged cag la chos gos gsum dgos kyis/ dge tshul pa dag la ni stod g.yogs dang mthang gos su zad na/ ji
ltar bdag cag dang mthang gos su mnyam par bgo zhes 'phya'o// de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
ngag slong dang dge slong man skal ba mnyam par bgasog/ dge tshul pha dang/ dge tshul ma dang/ dge slob ma dag lan sum cha byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pa dag la
sum cha byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ ji tsam zhig na dge tshul pha lagazhan zhagi lo lu yang tshang zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par yang 'dodon/ de la dge sogs tshodang ldan pa la yang
shu tshang na/ ci'i phyi'i bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed ces smras pa dang/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyisan bdag cag gi rnyed 'dilta bur bcasate/ stod g.yogs dang mthang gos
sum ldangan/ chos gos gsum du statsa smos te/ ji ltar bsnyen par rdzogs par bya zhes smras so// de lta bur gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
khatsamo ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ dge tshul ba bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa dang/ dge slob ma la sum gnyis khyin cig/ dge tshul dang dge tshul ma gzhan ni skal ba sum char
zad do/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum kha'o/// mngon ko sa la na drug cu dang// brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum
a dang 4 sgra gcan 'dzin dang dpal sbed dang// gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten de bzhin te// gdugs dang bris pa de bzhin sbyar// gzanal mgron du bos pa'o/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar lces rgyu zhing spyod pa na rubrugs kyi grong gzhan zhig tu byon nas/ ri sbugs kyi grong de na khyim bdag cig gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun du bcas par khyim du bshos la spyan drangs so// dge slong ma drug cu zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod pa na/ ri brags kyi grong der phyin nas/ de dag kyang der gzan zos pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang lhan cig tu bshos gsol nas/ khyim bdag des ras yug brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhag rgan rims kyi mdun du bzhag ga/ dge slong
shA dag gas ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/ dge slong ma dag gis de la gzhan byar yod/ sngon yang dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol ba las bdag cag gis red pa'i byed theban/ da yang
bdag cag la redapa' phyad byin cig ces smras so// de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang du dge/
ma slong ma mang la/ dge slong pha nyung na deng rnyed pa dge 'dun gnyis ka' ba shes shig/ gang na dge slong pha mngal/ dge slong ma nyung na der mgo grangs bzhin du bgos shig/ gleng
gzhi ni khanyan du yod pan ste/ khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshes la spyan drangs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun dag ni dong/ bcom ldan 'das/
ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ bshes tshur mnos so/ rnam pa lnga'i phyi'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnas te gsol la// lta gang zhen/
lha rnams la chos 'chad bor bzhed pa yin/ nad pa dag gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ mal stan dag gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par bzhed pa yin/
nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa yin no// don 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa'i phyir/
gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing shes mnos te gsol le// khyim bdag dor rgan pa dag mngon par dad nas/ der rgan ramis su mar dang mar la btsos pa'i bca' ba rnams khrims/
bar ma dag la ni 'bru mar dang 'bru mar la btsos pa'i bca' ba dag khrims/ gzhan nu lan 'bru mar gyi tshags ma dag khrims so// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bcom ldan
'das kyi bshes mnos te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bshes mnos nas 'ongs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra gcan 'dzin la dge slong gi dge 'dun
a rnams bsod pa'i zas kyis tshim par byas sam zhes rmas pa dang/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa rgan pa rnams tshim mo// sgra gcan 'dzin khyod ci'i phyir 'dicing nyams chung zhing de skad zer ba
sku/ smosashig/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'bru mar gyis ni mthur gyur te/ mar gyis kyang n mdangs su 'gyur// 'bru mar tshigs kyi chod mas ni// mdangs ma mchis na stobs
lta ga la zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan 'dzin yin pa de smos shig/ des de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
sgo sgra gcan 'dzin la// den gnas brtan su zhig 'dug ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das mkhan po mchis so// sgra gcan 'dzin la dge slongashA ri'i bus ni 'og ma dag ma brtag
pas na ngan du thos pa yin no// de lta bu byung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slongagi dge 'dun dag bsdusanas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/ nyan
