ro/ thos rnams la 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas bca' ba'i phyir/ dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis mtshangs par spyad pa'i tshes ngas btsa' ste/// dge 'dun
gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis zas 'grim pa'i tshi/ snyoms par brims shig ces sgo 'gi/ des tshodam sna re re la'ang skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lan tshu'am/
dang bo gang bris sa ba de'i tshe smosashig/ thams cad lan ma yin no// dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong bas ji lta bur mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bzhin ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par
'gyur ro// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi gzan zes ba smad gozhes thos nas/ des bdag ston pas gzan thos pa smang na/ 'di ltar 'dug pa mi rigs so/
zhes bsams nas/ des skyugs te btang ngo// dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la gzan zes pa smad pa dang/ des slar skyugs pa la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag 'ang 'bag
zhig ma yin gyi/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas de la gzan thos la la smad pa dang/ des phyir skyags so// dge slong dag nyon cig/ de sngon byung banu grong khyer gzhan zhig na mang po 'chad
pa'i bram ze zhig gnas te/ de bram ze bu dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu nang sbyod pa na/ khrags kyi grong zhig tuphyin nas/ des rdzing nag gi 'gram du bram ze des bram ze'i bu der bzhag nas cung
zad cig sdod/ nga gleng du phye la sogs pa bslangs te slar 'ong ngo// de den 'dug pa dang/ chi can zhig rdzong du chu brog 'byung du 'ongs so// de la bras the'abus/ kyi
skyes bu bdag kyang chu brag cig stsol cig ces smras so// des kyang ma la snod drubs shig ces smras pa dang/ des snod drubs so// des de la khyi'i pags pa lu byas pa'i sgye'u'i nang nas byung

ba'i phyi byin no// de snum pa dang bram ze'i bus phye 'di snum natsa zhig ces dris pa dang/ 'di ni phyi'i pags pa la skye'u byas pa'i mthu ste/ des sgye'u de dag ci las byas pa zhib mor byas na/ bram
yaM the'i bu des ma go'o// bram ze de sar 'ongs nas des brom ze'i bu khyod song la chu brog slongs shig ces smras pa dang/ des kyang chu brog 'tshal lags so zhes smras// dbus kyin/ mi pa gis
byin no// des pa ga khyi gcan te/ des khyed la phya byin na de khyod kyis sdug par gyur to zhes smras nas/ des de la rab tu smad pa dang/ des bris pa slar phyugasaso// dge slong dag mi shes

zlasam/ gang mang po 'chad pa'i bram ze de ni da ltar nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dusan bram ze'i bu de na da ltar gyi dge slong shA ri'i bu ste/ de'i tshon yang ngas gso byas pa rab tu skyang nas de slar glu
so da 'dadi yang ngas las zos pa la rab tu smad nas 'dir yang slar skyugs bar gyur te/ gleng gzhin rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de'i tshe nargya2po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bo
me skyes kyi sring mo'i khyo gcer bu ba'i dge bsnyan dab la sbed ces bya ba ni gi 'dug ste/ khyim bdag mo skyes dad ba des 'di snyam du/ dab la sbyod 'di dge 'dun dag la yon 'bul du bskul le snyam
bsams nas/ des de la dpal sbyod dge 'dun dog la mchod pa dang yon phul cig dang/ khyod kyi bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dpal sbyod kyis smras pa/ ngas kyang dge 'dun
dag la mchod cing yon dbul bar sa/ khyod kyis kyang gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag la mchod cing bshos gsol cig/ de skyes kyis 'di snyam du bsams pa// de ste khas
ma blangs na dpal sbed kyis/ dge 'dun la mched pa bar chad du 'gyun/ soms can thams cad la sbyin pa lta nyes med kyis/ gcer bu ba'i dge 'dunadag la gzan byin to/ bdag
gis des dge 'dun la mchodatsang yon dbu 'a ba'i tshod du bya'o snyam bsams nas/ des gzan sbyin nozhes khas blangs nas/ dpal sbed kyis 'di snyam du bdag gso dang bor sangs rgyas
la sogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sngarab ngashos gsol na ni ma skyes kyis gcan mi sbyin gyis/ gang bo la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag bshes sngar gsol ba dang/ ngas
phyis gzan sbyin no snyam bsams nas/ ma skyes la 'di skad ces smras so// me skyes khyod kyis dang por gzan byin cig dang/ sa kyang phyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang/ nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun dag la gzan sbyin no// des kyang khas blangs nas/ de nas khyim bdag mi skyes kyis gang bo dag gang na 'dug pa der byon nas/ gang po dang lhan cig rab tu
dga' zhing mgu ba'i si/tam sna tshogs dag byas nas// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag ma skyes kyis/ gang bo la 'di skad ces smras te// gang po
zla khyod sang bdag gi khyim du gcer bu pa mang po dang/ dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu bshos gsol gyis khas ledazhig/ gang pos bsams pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni gor ma chag par dge sbyong go'ur
'a ma la sun par gyur nas/ bdag cag la rab tudad par gyur te/ de na bdag cag ga rnyid pa rab turedapa ste/ gang po bdag cag gi dge 'dun gyi rigs la rab tu dad par gyur to snyam nas des sa/
blangs so// de nas khyim bdag ma skyes de dag spyan drangs nas song ngo// de nas khyim bdag mo skyes kyis de'i nub mo rab tu bsod pa'i bza ba dang bca' ba'i kha zas dag sbyar nas nad pa la sngar las
[~ ]ti sngar langs nas stan bting/ ri ba dag chu sa bkang ste bzhag nas/ gang po dag la spyan 'dren pa'i dus gsol pa/ kye gang po bshos rnams bshamasakyis// dus mkhyen par mdzod
cig/ de dag deng ba dang/ dpal sbed kyis de'i gan du 'ongs te lcas pa/ 'phags pa gang po dge sbyong go'u ta man byis bdag gi khyim du bzhud de/ denang dubazhud kar sgo'i thim pa la zhabs
bzhag nas 'dzum pa ston te/ de nas nyan thos kun dag 'a bo zhes bya bas stod g.yogs phyog ba tig tshugathar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas// de bzhin gshegs pa/
dang/ de bzhin gangshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ma mdzad na/ btsun pa tsa'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'dzum pa mdzad ces zhus pa dang/ des kyang kun dga'/
bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kun dga' de de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgan rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa ston pa ram mdzad de/ ji lta bur
dgongs pa bzhin lung ston to zhes smras nas/ de la skye bo mang bo dag kyang rab tudad par gyur gyis/ khyod kyis kyang khyim bdag mi skyes kyi khyim du 'gro ba'i tshod ltar bya ba'i rigs so// 'on
kyang skye bo mang po dag rab tu dad par 'gyur ro// des bas blangs so// de nas gang po gcer bu ba mang bo bskor nas/ khyim bdag mo skyes kyi khyim du phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag me skyes kyi
sgo'i thimakha la rkang pa bzhag ste/ rta gad du bgad pa dang/ de'i nang nas gcer bu pa gcig gis rkang pa ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa khyod lta burgyu med rkyen med par
'dzum pa ma mdzad de zhes dris pa dang/ kyi chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u po zhig gis spre'u mo zhi'i mthong nas/ lasems rab tu chags taM/ spre'u mo de la brgalu0f8bsnyam nas brgyugs
kha dang 'gred de shing gi rtse mo nas sdug cu'i 'chos nas dus 'das so// de'i nang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni 'dod pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba che
gyur to snyam mo// de skad du kha nas byung ma thag tu khyim bdag ma skyes kyis thos nas/ des bsams pa/ bu zan mo'i bu gang bon khab 'tshong pa sa khab brdung ba'i khyim du bab 'tshong bar
sems pa bzhin te/ jinas 'di la kyal ka zhig khya'osnyam nas denas dbyu gu can mang bo thams cad bde bar 'dug pa dang/ khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang bza' pas
bor pa bkang nas steng du tshod ma blugs te byin no// gang po gcig pa la na bor pa'i zhabs su tshod ma blugs nasastong du 'bras kyis g.yogs te byin no// gcer bu ba la 'dug ga za zhing 'dug pa
dang/ gang pos bsams pa// gor ma chag par des nang la ston par dmagos te/ sa tshod ma zhim po dang kha zas bzang bo sbyin par bsams so snyam nas jitsam tshod 'bri mas zin pa dang/
y+Yo des bsams pa// de'akhril bas brjod kyis bdag gis bskul lasnyam nas des bes nas/ khyim bdag nga la ni 'bras 'ba' zhig 'ongs kyis/ tshod man med de zhes smras pa dang/
des mar tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ mi mthong ba na mthong bar byed// mthong bar bya ba ma mthoste// dregs khral 'gram gyi spre'u mthong l// phor bu 'aning ga tshod ma yin// gang bo/
00 yang de'i go dong bltas pa dang des phor bu'i zhabasan tshod ma 'dug pa bstan te/ gang po khyod kyis chu bojigs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u 'dug pan da/ por bu'i na na tshod ma 'dug pa ma mthong
bozhes smras pa dang/ des bsams pa/ 'das bdag skyengs par byas kyis/ cinas kyang 'jig rten 'did nga ba pol gnyis kar phan par ma 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod de snyam du bas//
pa dang/ me skyes kyis de skyengs par shes nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i tshade'i mdun du ma 'dug go/ des gzan zos nas sbyin pa'i yon tan bklags pa// sbyin bdagagisan sbyin bzhis
dge sbyong gzhan na bro ba'i dus// lhag ma gzhan la 'od pa'i dus// bsod nams ma dge yod ma yin// sgo bzhig 'dug pa des sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa la nyan nyan te thosanas khros
pa 'di 'drab 'i sdig can/ gzan khros la bsrung yang ma nus te// 'di 'dra ba'i sbyin pa'i yon tan lta ga la sridi kyis/ bu zan mo'abu 'di la kyal kazhig bya'o snyam nas/ des 'bras
khu bum pa gang sgo drung du po'o// sgo gtan gyi ldang phyedatsam drangs te bzhag pa dang gcer bu ba phyir byung ba dngang/ 'bras bu las 'gred de klad ba sgo gtan la phog nas khrag byung ngo// de nas
sgo ba des mthong ste tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ sgo ga tan phyung ba'i dus la bag/ 'bras khu bo ba 'dus bab pas// mgo bosnodapa' dus yin gyis// dge dang mi dge'i dus ched do// deklad/
kha las khrag ]thog bzhin du khyim bdag dpal sbed gangan ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ dpal skyed kyis mthong nas/ btsun ba gang bo 'di'inyis zhes dris pa dang/ des smras
ba ma skyes kyis 'di 'dra ba gnod btus so// dpal sbed kyis smras kha/ khyed ni gson por thar gyis sdod cig dang/ rinas 'di ltar dge sbyong go ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
par kho bo'i khyo nas gson bzhin du phyir ma 'byung bar byas/ mdagar ma byed cig/ dpal sbed kyis bsamasal/ 'di bdag la lan khan gyis/ sbyan drang du 'gro'o// de snyadage sbyong
dgo'u ta ma de thams cad mkhyen pa yin na ni mgronodu bas kyang khas len du ma btub bo// de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yananan khas lan tosnyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cige tu dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag dab la sbed kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi go'u ta ma sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dunadang lhan cig bshos la gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes shig gnyis spyan drangs pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gang gis nga las bden ba mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'di ltar byed do// de ste sam blangasan na bden pa'i bar chad dag tu gyur te/ jinas khas blangs ngo snyam nas
ga4shegs par zhal gyis bzhes so// dpal sbed kyis bsamasal/ 'din thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te/ de ste thams cad ma khyen pa yazhin na 'di ltar bas ma len pa'i'igisan/ ji
nas 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma 'gyur bar dgra lan glan no snyam nas/ de nas de khyim du so ste/ de'akhyom gyi sgo khar dong chen po brkos nas nang du shing kad de'i mi mang dung ba med pas
bkang nas/ de'i stod du rtswa sa g.yogs nas sas bkab ste bzhag ge/ dug rnon pos bza' ba dang btung ba sbyar ro// de nas ma skyes kyi sring mos dbal sbeng la ngobatsazhig mdzad ces si ba dang/
des smras pa/ dgra gsod par bya'o// ngob dgra su mchis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o// de lho rob khyod kyi degrwa bcom ldan 'das yin na/ mdza' bo su zhig mchis kyis/ jo bo 'di lta bu
'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa'i las bya bar mi rigs par soms shig ces smras pa dang/ de nas dpal sbed kyis bsams pa/ 'di'ang ma skyes kyi gnyen du 'ong ste/ dge sbyongago'u tam la
dad pas nags shor bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des mo mdzod kyi nang du bcug la sgo lcags bcug ste bzhag go/ gang bol sogs gcer bu pa thams cad bosanas/ sa dgra gsodapa ltar
shog cig/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsod pa'i phyir sgor dod chen bo brkos nas/ nang du song ldeng gi mi tshadag gis bkang sto bzhi g/ kha zas dang skom gyi nang du dug rnon pos bkang go/ de dag yid
rab tu dga' nas myur zhing rings su dong sto/ yang go ga nyid du 'jigs te 'khod nas/ deng bdag cag bde bar 'khod do// dge sbyong go'utam me'i dong gi nang du ji ltar
a tshig pa dang/ dug rnon pos rab tu zhen pa dang/ yon man du sa la ji ltar 'gyel ba dag blta'o// dpal sbed kyis gdan bting nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol
te ga'u ta ma bshos kyang sbyar lags kyis/ kyi go'u ta ma dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ do na dag
bo khyod song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du dpal spyod kyi khyim du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par dge slong su'ang sder ma 'dong zhig ces sgo zhig/ btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes nas/
tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te/ dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed kyi khyim du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par sngar
wI dge slong su'ang ma 'deng zhig ces bka' stsal te zhes bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dusanasham thabs mnabs/ lhung rtsed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong mang pos bskor nas/
! dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du byas te/ dbal srid kyi khyim gang na ba der logs su gshegs so// de nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i lha bran rnams sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' bas
ga zir te myur zhing ris bar btsom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste shi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te snying rje ba 'tsho'i gzhi 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal spyod kyi
khyim du gshegs par mi rigs so zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha de na gnod pa ci zhig yod/ bcom ldan 'das dpal sbod na bcom ldan 'das la ma rung
bar bgyi ba'i slad dung shums so zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'apa// lha de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang bralan/ des nga la kha/nod pa ci zhig
byar yod/ lhakhran gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das des bcom ldan 'das bkrongs pa'i slad du dong chen po'inang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gas bkang pozhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha gang 'dod chags kyi ma dang/ zhe sdang ga mi dang/ gti mug ga i dgag kyang ye shes kyi chus btab na zhi bar 'gyuran/ ma 'a nangan tha ma des ci zhig byar yod kyis/
mya ngan ma byed par 'dug gtsang/ lha bon gyis gsol ba/ de gcig bu ma lags kyi/ gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das bkrongs pa'i slad du bya bar sbyar te/ dug rnon po mi bzad pas
kha zas dang btung ba'i nang spyir zhes smras ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lha dug ba gnyen po lengashes kyis 'dod chags kyi dug dang/ zhe sdang gi dug dang/ gti
chug ga dus kyang rab tu btang/ rab tu skyugs/ rab tu boran/ dug gin nAtsam des khyadatsanageg yod/ bdag slar log la bdag gi lasalanan tan du byos shig/
de nas btsem ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gis snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang/ lha de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lha snga ma bzhin du bsgo sta slar
bkye'o// de nas dpal sbed kyi khang pa'i sgor byon pa dang/ dpal sbed kyi khyim gyi lhas snga ma bzhin du gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bsgo ste sar bkye'o//
denas dpal sbed kyi chung mas bsams ba/ dan bcom ldan 'das sgo dang bor byin tsang datsaman deng gi steng du zhabs gzhog go/ datsam ni deng gi kha snas kha g.yogs pa'i sten gnas lhung ngo//
datsam ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i nang du lhung nas dud pas kyang 'tshal/ mchi ma yang byung/ me lces chos gs tshig pa'i dung ba yang phyung ngo snyam nas ma dga' ba de khang pa'i nang du bcug pas
ny+tsA yid ma dga' kha skyes nas/ mig mchi mas gang zhung bon dzum bag/nags nas brtags ma dge ba la rtog ste du nang 'dug ga/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa la
rab tu'ajug pa'i yid kyis sgo bar mar byon nas/ me'i dong gi snying du zhabs bzhag pa dang/ de nas me'i deng gi stod du zhabs bzhag ma thabatud thams cad kyang mtsho pad+ma can dgyur te/
00 ]ut+pal dang/ pad+modang/ ku mu da dang/ puN+Da ri ko dag gis li bibs/ bya ngang ba dang/ ka ran da dang/ ra pa la sogs pa tshun spyod ba rnams kyis brgyanate/ bya de dag
kyang skad sna tshogs 'byon pan ji ltar lha' rdodi'and ka bzhin no/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dag kyang lha ri mi to'o ku mud dang/ lha'i mi tog kha dog dang ldan bas stong nas gtor ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das bad+mo'i snying po'i stong dag tu zhabs ba zhig ste/ dpal sbed kyi khyim du byon pa dang/ khyim bdag dpal sbed ngo mtshar che ba'i mig gis bgrad de bltas nas/ btsun
ba gang bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tsho'aphrul la ltos shig ces smras pa dang/ gang po ma dga' ba'i bzhin du bsgyur nas/ khyim bdag dge sbyong ga ru tam la dad dam/ de'i sgyu
ma la dad dam zhes smras pa dang/ dpal skyed kyis smras pa// btsun pa gang po de ltar 'di lta bu s bsgrub tu rungan na phyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa na/ sgyu ma de lta bu byas la ston gi/
de lta bu s ngadang/ 'amadzakhedang/ bu nu bo dag kyang bsgrub par gyis shig gang bos bsams ba/ dgos pa ma grub par gyur te/ slar 'gro'i snyam nas/ des de lasmyos
te khang pa'i stong nas babs te skyongasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar ma nus te/ de nas 'gros dal zhing bags kyis song nas/ gdong yangs la bltas te dbal sbed
kyi khyim nas byung ste bros te song ngo// de nas khyim bdag dpal sbod khyim bdag che skyes kyi sring mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ sgo lcags bya sa bzang mo tshur shog/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag tshol cig ces smras pa dang/ des bsams pa/ 'di bdag la spu bar byed desnyam nas/ snying rje ba'i tshig gas dal nas smras pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos bslus
te bsad na/ bdag la bgam du ci zhig yod ces smras pa dang/ des bzang mo bden pan zer ti bgam pa na ma yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bkrongs par ma nus pas/ da btsem ldan
'das la mngon du 'byung bar mi nus kyis dbakhrid la song zhig ces smos pa dang/ n gnas dpa' spyad kyi chung ma de dag 'a ba skyes nas mag pa yid kyis dpal sbed khrode de/ bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bsod dar mdzod cig/ khyim bdag
'di mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus gsan/ pa tsam ldan 'das la dge ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bgyis so zhes smras ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis glang bo'ilI sna 'dra 'i phyag brgya
nas gsungs pa// khyim bdag la ngos shig dang bzod de// de bzhin gshegs pa lan mdza' ba dang dgar bye brag mi 'byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
00 rgyus ni mdza' ba dang dgur byed brag mi 'byed/ tsan dan dang ste mtshungs so zhes smras pa dang/ de nas khyim bdag dpal sprod de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ mos pa'i yo
kyis bcom ldan 'das la cung zad tsami ga zhes shig/ bdag gis bshes da gdod sbyar zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la
sbyan 'dren pas dus gsol te/ gi'utam bshes dag sbyar lags kyis/ kyi go'u ta ma dus mkhyen par mdzod cig ces zer na/ da yang ci'i phyi na 'di skad du smra/ des gsol kha/ btsun
ba bdag ni mo dge ba'i grogs po la bltas par gyur ba'i blos log par lta ba gsum du 'gro ba'i sdug pas de la gzhol te kun la sdug par 'gro ba gnyis kyang bgags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
gnod par bya ba'i phyir zhugs so zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang bralan/ ci'i phyir nga la gnod par
'gyur/ btsunapa bdag gis dug rnon pos zhal zas dang skyems kyi nang du sbyar gyis/ de dag la gdod sbyar zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ khyim bdag khag
'dod chags kyi dug dang/ zhe sdang gi dug dang/ gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu skyugs shang bo na/ dug nga ba 'di lta bu saci zhib khyar yod/ gang sbyar ba de khyer teshog cig/ de nas bcom
bya// ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du sa gdan bting pa la bzhugs te/ bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo song la drag slong
dag la 'di skad du/ nam rgan rams su 'byor tshogs so zhes skadam byung gi bar du su yad ga zan ma nagi par sgo 'gi/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom lda/

sbya 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni rgan rims su 'byor tshogs so nas skad ma phyung gi bar du su'ang mi za zhig ces byung ngo// de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bde bar 'khod nas/ kha zas dag bsnyen pa dang/

rdzu 'phrul dang tsho'aphrul gyis dpal h+phad kyi khyim du rgan rams su 'byor tshogs zhes skad phyung ba dang/ kha zas dang skom dag kyang dug med par gyur to// dpal sbed de dag sa bzhin du kha bras dang skom
dag 'gram nang bsams ba/ rgan rims nas gzhin nu dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang/ datsam dge slong rgan rims dag na dug snon bos 'gyel gor ma chag ga/ gzhon nu nas yang rgan ramasakyi
drung du 'ongs nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ de'i blo yang de lta bur skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gdug spangs kyi/ nyan thos thams
cad kyi ma yin no snyam du bsams nas/ de ltar dge slong thams cad kyis bshes gsolan gcig la yang gnodo bar ma gyur to// chung du na de'i lhag ma bris ba dag la yang gnod par ma gyur/ de
00nas khyim bdag dpal sbed phyi phyir dad pa skyes so// de chung ma dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas lhung bzed byung ste/ phyag btabs pa ra shes nas/ stanadama'ab zhagi blang
te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyi'i 'dug go/ de nas btsalo ldan 'das kyis dba'asbadadang chung ma'i bsamabo dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin dag
mkhyenanas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu bshad do// khyim bdag dbal sbed kyis de thos nas/ 'jig tshogs su blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi
sa bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mdu byas so// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lanagasum smras te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus kyis phan btags pa 'di lta bu ni/
bdag la las kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ sdug pa dang/ mdza' ba dang/ gnyenadang/ 'khor gyis kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal bos kyang m bgyis/ lhas kyang m bgyis/
snga ma'i pha mes dag gis kyang m bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang m bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag mchil dang khrag gi rgya mtsho'iskams/ rus ba las ni
bsgral/ nasong gi sgonapid/ mthongosikyi sgon phyisU/ bdag ni lhadang mi'i gnasasu bzhag gnas smras nas/ yang gsol ba/ nyes pa mang ba mkha na du 'gro ba'i
lam rnams te// khyod kyi mthus na de dag bcad// mtho si 'gro ba'i sgo bya bsod nams can// mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam yang bdag gis thob// khyod la rten nga sa
thob panyes bral bgi/ bdag gamoge na dgag mi rnam par dag/ 'phags pas dgyes pa'i gnas shig thob// sdug bsngal rgya mtshopa la rgal// skye bo lha min lha dang mis mchod// skyob
tshe na brga gi rnam par bral// srid pa stong yang red pa shin tu dka'// thub pa khyod mthong dang ni 'bras bur ldan// btsun pa bdag ni mngon par rgal te/ mngon par rgal la// dan bdag bcom
sbruldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun du skyabs su mchis/ deng phan chad nam 'tsho'i bar srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchinas mngon du dad kyis/ bdag la dge bsnyen du
[ ]zung zhig/ btsun pa de nga phan chad du stegasatsan gcer bu ba dang/ gcer bu ma dang/ gcer bu pa'inyan thos rnams la ni sgo gcodo/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang/ dge slong dang/
b+he dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma la ni sgo dbye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag dbal srid la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan bstabs/ yang
ngag bar gzengs bstod ]rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting
[z]la ba zhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsa'akha/ dge slong dag/ khyim bdag dpal sbed kyi khyim du de lta bu'i khed pa dag byung ba de la/ der de bzhin
gshegs pas mkhyen par ma gyur na gor ma chag par dge slong ba tu mang bo zhig dug gis dus 'das par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de'ang nang sbyad pas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo//
de bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong la mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca' 'o// dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi rgan rims su 'dug nas/ kha zas dag bshams te 'ongs
bdang/ sngar chung dun lan tshwatsam yang ma blang nage/ nam rganaramis su 'byor tshogs zhes skad cha byung bar blosan 'das ba dang bcas bar 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa
naste/ de'i tshon khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang chen po zhig brtse se kha la zhugs pa las/ des phyed tsam brtsigs pa dang dus 'das so// de'abu khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge
slong dag gis de gan du song ste/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyibs la gtsug lag khang brtsi gog pa la zhugs pa dang/ de'ang phyed tsam zin pa dang dus 'das so// denan spyod kyis mjug bsgrub pa'i rigs
so zhes gs pa dang/ de dad pachung ste/ ba gtsug lag khang de'i tshe bsan/ detsam brtsi geg susanus kyis/ de stobcom ldan 'das kyis gnanganan chen bo dbashig la/ chud gi bskyangs te/
bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de statshigAmanus shig/
pa 'chung dur gyis ga/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ gleng gazhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang chung ngu zhig brtsigu kha la zhugs pa las/
ba khyad tsam bzhi pa dang de dus 'das so// de'i bu khang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de la/ bzhin bza ngas khyod kyi phas gtsug lag khang phyed brtsigs nas lus pa de/ da khyod
kyis mjug sgrubs shig ces smras pa dang/ de rab tu dad pa zhig ste/ 'bags pa dag bdag ni tsher bgyid pa ra dadan/ de na chung ste btsam ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ snga ma bshig la
chen bo zhig brtsig go zhes smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste nus na chung du bshig la//

b+h+yA cher brtsig tu gnangagis/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan zhig gsi mchod rten chen po zhig brtsig par byas pa la/ phyed tsam zin pa dang de dus 'das so// de'i bu'ang

blo/ khyi migyi bdag por gyus de la dge slong dag gis/ bzhan bza ngas khyod kyi bas mchod rten phyed tsam brtsigasangashadi 'dug na/ de khyod kyis mjug sgrubs shig ces smras pa dang/ de'ang ma dad pa zhig
[na ]sta 'phags pa de che ches pas brtsig ma nus na/ sto bcom ldan 'das kyis gnan/ de la bdag gis de skyar bshige la chudadad bgyi co nas smras ba dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gI/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gtsug lag khang chen po las chung rab skyang du yang nang/ cher yadabudagi/ mchod rten na chen po las
chung ram skung zhig/ chung dur byas n 'das ba dang bcas par 'gyur// khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis yang mchod rten chung ngu zhig brtsig pa la zhugs pa las/ phyadatsamazin pa dang/ des
'asaso// de bu la khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de la/ bzhin bzangs khyed kyi bas mchod rten brtsig tu zhugs pa las/ phyed tsam zin pa dang de'ang dus las 'dasan/
khyod kyis mjug sgrubs shig ces smras pa dang/ de'ang rab tu dad pa zhig ste/ bdag nachir dad pa lags kyis/ destobatsem ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis cher bskyed pa'ibagyi'o/
zhes smras pa dang de ltar gyur bdage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ deste khung du bshig sta chen po byed nusan gnang sa
byosangashagi/ de la the tshom du ma byed cagi/ mchod rten dang gdugs brnyings shing gi pa'i ng de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshesangag ces bka' stsal ba dang/ gzhan zhig gis gdug
phab nas slar mi bsgrubs kyi bar du dus 'dus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// brjes ma ma zin gyi bar du snga ma dbab par mkhyed cig/ de bzhin du sku
gzugs 'jim pa labyas pa da banas ni/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma byas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de dang 'dra ba'am/ de las lhag par ni byis shig/
chung du na ma yin no// de bzhin du ri mor bris pa dag kyang mi byed pa dang/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ra mor ma bris nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal pa/ byid na de nyid kyi rgyud
slar bris shig/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas[] bka'i glegs bam dag byed par gyur pa na/ dge slong dag gis the tsom skyes nas ma bris pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byid na/
sangs rgyas kyi bka' slar bris shige/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o/// bam po zhi gcig pa//
n+d+he//mdon gsar bu 'jug par bya ba dang// 'khor rnams rnam pa lnga yis dang// yon dang snod dang rol mo dang// dge bsnyen dgan bsgrags pa'o/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la/ dus kyi mchod ston chen po dang bcas par byas la/ grong khyer gyi nang du bkur
bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis sus bkur ba mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsal pa// dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyed cag par bka' stsal pa dang/ de 'khor med par gyur pas nam mdzes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma
dang dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma'i 'khor lnga dang chos shig/ dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis yon b.lan/ sus kyang ma byings pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsalapa/ dge slong dag khas blang bar byos shig/ gzhon nus blang ngam rgan po rnams kyis blang ba de dag gis ma shes nas/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgan po rnams
kyis lang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gis bkur bar byos shig dang/ dge slong gnas brtan dag gis khyer tengal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan dag gis bsus la/ gzhan gyis bkur par gyis shig/ dge slong dag gis rol mo ma byed bar dong ba dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni/ sku gzugs gshegs pa'i tsho/ bdag gas rel mo sbyar zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khaka' stsalal/ khyim bdag
de ltar n gnang gas sbyor cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus par// btsun pa dge slong gis rol mo bgyis rung ngam/ u pa li mi
rung ngo// nam mchod pa'i dus na 'di skad du bzhi ni btsangs ston pa la mchod par byos shig ces sgo 'gi/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// mdor na
lce sgrogs par byed dang snod sdod dang// shangatotha dad byed pa dang// snod rnams 'gyed pa dad pa dang// mdo yi tshigs su bcad par brjod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i
tsho la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston chen po gyisi la// shing 'dzam bu'i grib man bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs grong khyer du gshegs pa rgyas

mo[ ]par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dag la ma sbran par dong ngo// de dag gis e ma'o 'phags pa dag nged cag 'a sngar skrunanan nged kyis yon rnams sta gon
bya ba zhig ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zhag bdun nam brgyad kyi snga rol nas//
dus kyi mchod ston chen po byed dazhis grong khyer dang/ tshong dus dang/ srang dang/ lamadang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags par byos shig/ de dag gis dus ston nodus ston no zhes bsgrag
ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ nag ga dus thob la zhag 'di snyed cig na dus ston byed do zhes sgron cig/ de ltar byas kyang 'jig rten spams cad kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan/
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ grog la bris la ba glang gi stod du zhen te tshong dus dang/ sra dang/ lamadang/ lam gyi bzhi midad gtubasgrags par gyis shage/ gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan
'das kyis dus ston chen po byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan dang/ gnas brtan dag gis ni yon rnams srungs shig/ gzhon nu rnams kyis khyer cig ces bka' stsal
pa dang/ des khyer te nga pa bang tu ber ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ snod spyad byed pa'i dge slong skos shig/ bsko ba ni 'di ltar/
bsko'o/ stan thade la/ gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris pa la lan ldan pa'i dge slong bskos te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing 'khodapa dang/ sngar ni dad bar byos shig/ khyod/
ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbad bar bskon dad dam zhes dris/ dadan des kyang dad do zhes smos shig/ de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig
gson nase btsun pa 'a dege 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbad par dad na/ de ste dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cadi bzad na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang nage dang/ ming 'di//
zhes bgyi ba snod skyed par bskos te/ snod sbyad pa mang 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed de/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/ gson cig
kyi btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyod par dad de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbad par bskos te/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbadan/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbyod du bsko bar brjod pa de dag nicang gsung zhig/ gam bzed pa de dag ni smyos shig/ dge 'dun
gyisaming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbad par bskos te/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bsan cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to// der yang rnyed dge mang du byung nas/dge
slob ma dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag la red pa'i skal ba stsol cig ces smras kyang/ dge slong dag gis ma byin no// de dag gis phyi de nyin mo shing rta gzhan zhig bshams pa dang/ bram
tsit+taM ze dang khyim bdag gas/ 'phags ma dag shing rta 'di nyid dam/ 'on te gzhan zhigeg ces drisanas/ dge slongam dag gis kyang red pa mang du gyur to// dge slong ma dag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti
la ma bdu gyur pa dge slong dag gis mthong nas/ 'phags pa khyed kyis kho bo cag la red pa ma byin mod kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang shan rta logs zhig tu bshams pa sa bdag cag lamed pa yang
0/mang du thob par gyur to zhes smras pa dang/ deltar gyur pa dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgangasapa// dge slong dag gang nyes pa'i dmigs/
gyur pani/ dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi tsho shing rta gud du bshamA pas/de bas dge slong dang
dge slong ma dag gis shing rta legasashig tu ma bsham par dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dge slong mas mi rigs pa byas te/ de bas na dge slong mas dus ston gyi tshongashing rta log shig tu ma shom zhig/ dge slong ma dag gi dus ston gyi tshong shing rta
gsangashagi tu bshams na/ dbyen byas pa dang nye ba'i nyes ra sbom por 'gyur ro// snod de dag de bzhin du 'dug pa dang/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bgos ngashag ces gsungs pa dang/ de dag gis ji ltar bgo ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod 'gyed pa'i dge slong zhig skos shige bsko ba 'di ltar
bya'o ston thang ste/ gaN+Di brdungs la/ dris pa la lan ldan pa'i dge slong bskos la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod pa dang sngar dadapar byesashig/ khyod dge 'dun gyi sdong 'gyed//
snod 'gyed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod 'gyed par dadan/ de ste dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnangol/ dge 'dunagyis
a ma 'dazhis bgyi ba 'di snod 'gyed par skos shig/ mang 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'gyed de/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di ltar byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge
'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod 'gyed par dad nas/ dge 'dun gyi snod 'gyed do/ dge 'dun gyis ma 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'gyed par tshodang ldan pa rnams gang bzod
banicang ma gsung zhig/ gang ma bzod pa ni smyos shig/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'gyed par bskos te/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bsan/ cang mi gsung ste/ de de
bzhin du 'dzin te// rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mde'atshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/// mdor bar ma ste/ rnam pa tha dad byas dang yon// gang gi tshon gcig las lhag/ gang gi
tshan gnyis las gcig/ bdag gir bya bar ma rung ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ban bzhugs so//
gang tshidus ston chen po byung ban/ rnyed pa mang po dang ldan par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mngeshes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gas sbed pa'i
dge slong gis snyan tho de la/ gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris pa la lan ldan pa'i dge slong bskos la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du btsong ba'akhya'o// de dag gse sus rin thang
gdab pa mngashes nas/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis thebacig/ de dag gis de nyid nyor bcug pa dang/ de nyid la nyob ma gzhug cig/ dge 'dun
gyi gnas brtan gyis rin cher btab ste/ sus kyang mnyos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ cher mgadab cig ces gsungs pa dang/ shin tu chung ngu btab bo// shin tu
chung du yang ma gdab par ran par thob cig/ gang gis thog mar rani bskyed pa de nyid tor chug cig ces smras pa dang/ de la ma btsong bar gang gi tshoran tha sus kyang ma bskyod na/ gdong de nyid la
des rin thang skyed cag gzhan gyis rin thang bskyodan 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis rin thang bskyed de nyos nas bkrus shingebagosaso// rin len pa la de nyidisar byin
pa na dge 'dun gyi don gyi par nged kyis ni byung bskyed do zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// gang skyob
no/ btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rin 'ongs kyi bar du de la ma byin cagi/ rin ma phyin bar bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshogs
su bcad pa bdun ba'o/// mdo'on/ gtsug lag khang na zhig pa ste/ lca ba'i phyir gzhig par bya// nam zhig 'jigs par gyur pan// skad
cig b.rob dge 'dun gyid/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong dag gnas khang lnga rtseg tu byos shig/ drigatsang khang nabadun rtse ga/ sgo khang yang bdun rtseg tu byas shig ces bka' stsal to// dge slong ma'i gnas khang ni sum rtseg go/ dri gtsang
pa khang ni lha rtseg go/ sgo khang yang lnga rtseg ga/ steng gi lcadi kyis rtsi gapa 'jig tu byed// de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// steng ma'i rami gcig pra zhig 'on kyang 'jib par gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalar// de bzhin du rims pa nas gnyis bzhi'i bar du phra la/
'og khang gcig pu nag nag/ gleng gzhin mnyan du yod pan ste// dge slong rnams la 'jigs pa dag byung nas/ gtsug lag khang stong par byas te/ dge 'dun gyi mal
zlostan yang de nas khros te dong ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so// brkus pas dge slong dag 'phongs par gyur te// deltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dge 'dun gyi mal stan bor te ma 'dong nag/ gang du 'dong ba de khyer cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du 'dong bar khyer cage ces
bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong zhig gis bgo ba dag khyer te/ dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bros 'deng ba dang/ den nub mo dge slo bzhi gi gas tshedang ldan pa 'din dge 'dun gyi nang nargan te/ ji
ltar rgan rims su dbang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de byin no// des de phyin nas ji tsamanamanangs pa dang/ des ba gal 'di phyir cig ces smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshabago ba bgos pa/
de'i tshin na khyod rgan pos khyer la/ da nga khur ba'i tshonan nga la sbyin nam/ khyod nyid khyer cig/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis/
bka' stsal pa// gang gis 'dzami gas pa'i tshe khyer khyer ba de da nyid kyi'o// gang gi tshe 'jigs pa med par gyuran yang/ dbcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngozhes slar ma phul ba dang/ de ltar
gyur pa dge slong dag gsi/ bcom ldan 'das lagaso'apa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong dag re zhiges dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag gnang gis/ gtan du
ni ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa dang bralan slar phul lo rgan rims su byon cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// kamada'on r-ita'i tshal du
mchod ston/ rdza chen gyis na 'du bar bya// galan 'tshol bar bsnyad pa dang// dge slong las ni zhal tar bsko// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon medawas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas bcom ldan 'das la/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag
gas dus ston chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyim bdag ngas gnang gas byos shig/ de phota'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas pa dang/ dge slong mang
po 'dus par gyur nas/ sang bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod ston chen po byed na/ gan+d+ri dang/ rdodang/ dung bus shig dang/ dge slong dag gdugs tshod la bab par dus rig par 'gyur ro zhes/
'a bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag rdadang dung dag gi sgras brdegs na 'tshol bar 'khod de/[ ]/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis
N+NaM bka lnga stsalapa// dge slong las nal tapa bskos te/ cinas rganarams su 'khed pa dang/ nam zas dag rgan rams nas khrims te/ gzhonanu'i gan du phyin tsam nas gdugasatshod kyang yol
te/ dge slong dag blas kyi bar chad du gyur to// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lnga brgya phreng du gyis la/
kha bas ni rgan rims kyi mdun du shog cig/ dge slong dag las de bzhin du byas pa dang/ khyim bdag na bza' ba dag 'grim pa la zhu'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'grim pa'i sbyin dge slong skos shig/ de dag kyang kha zas kyi bar chad gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalar/ de
dag sdur gzan byin la phyis zhal ta byed du chug cig/ rkyang pa 'a sgoganyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o/// mdoron dge slongaman mang dgyur// dge slong dang por
rjes yi rang// gcig dang gnyis dang mang bo dang// bu chung rab tu dag gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ba na bzhugs te/
ri brag kyi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag cag la/nas pa des dge slong ma mang zhig bshes la spyan drangs pa dang/ jitsam nab na dge slong gcig cig 'then pa mang po dang lhan cig tuljongs rgyu ba
spyodatsade'i bregs kyi grong der phyin pa dang/ de der bsod snyoms la zhugs na/ den ga zhan zhagi gas de la 'phags pa lcam 'dun dge slong ma dag bshos gsol zhing 'khod kyis/ der bzhud/
cig ces smras pa dang/ de'ang der song na dge 'dun ma'i gnas brtan spom mo dga' ldan 'dug ste/ des 'phags pa de ste sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod nas nanargan rams su bzhugs shag/ de ste
na shu// mnusanan phyogs gcig tu bshos bsnams la bzhud cigeces smras pa dang/ de skyengs nas des bsams pa// de ste bdag gis sbyin pa 'i yon tan kyi bar du 'dug na/
'gron ba mang bo dag kyang doban 'gyur gyis/ phyogs gtsage tugawan khros te 'gro 'o snyam nas phyogs gtsagi tshu gzan khros te song ngo// rims bzhin du mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang/ dge
slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'os sam/ ca bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ ga la zhagi bde bar spyod/ dge slongams kyal ka byas so// de ji ltar byas zhes
smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa rgyas par dge slong dag la smras so// dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang na dge sod
gcig dang// dge slong ma gcig pa de na dge slong de gral kyang dang po/ chu yang dang po/ gzan yang dang por tho zhig/ gang na dge slong ma gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ de las kyang lhag
bzhi gi la/ dge slong gcig cig 'ongs na/ dge slong gcigi pu de snyan yang dang bo/ tshu yang dang bo/ gzan yang dang por zo zhig/ gang de ste dge slong ma dag 'bagazhag na yang rtag tu gral gyi
dang por stan gcig lhag par zhog la 'khed cig/ de ste dge tshul pa zhagi 'ongs na yang de dir 'dug ga la zi zhagi/ de ste des mnus par gyur na yang dge slong mas sbyin pa'i yon tan lhags shig//
dge slong mas de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ r-ita'i tshal du dus ston chen
po byas nas/ bu dang chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mngashes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ khyim bdag la dris shig/ dris pa dang/ bdes smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rin thang tshodonug dang bdag gis glud gsol lo// drug sde dag gis
de la 'gran cing spel pa la zhugs pa dang/ de'i nang nas chung ma bu chung ngu can gyis/ khyim bdag mgon med bas sbyin gyi rkang pa la btud de/ ngo bo bdag gi bu chung gas bdag ma gtang zhig
ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ dge slong dag sems can gyi nang na bud med
las sange chung ba med kyis/ 'jigs par ma bya zhig/ de bas na dge slong gis bud med kyi rin thang ma gcod cig/ bcad n 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// sbyin bdag gis ji ltar
dga' nang dga' stabyin pa bzhin du long zhig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogasaso/// mdor bsdus par na/ yo byad bus pa blun pa/
dang gang gi ba dang de yi ste// de ltar khye'u las bslang mi bya// mgonamed pas sbyin de bzhin te// spyi yi gri dang 'khor rnams dang// chu dang bsdus pagasus
[ ]'o////mngon yo byad rnams dang gnang ba dang// u pa 'asin dris pa ste// ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya// yid gcugs tshigs bcad mdor gsus pa'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod pas nan bar gyur te/ kha cig la sman
glu medas lhung bzed btsos kyang/ khyim ba dag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das pa gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis
bka' stsal ba/ de lta bas na gnang gas yo byad dang gas tshangs shagi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad dang gas chongs shige ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis bkrus nas kha bsgyur
ti bcangs ba dang/ rin chung ngur gyurato// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma bkrus/ khamabasgyur/ sar ba btags ma thag tshongs shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as
zla la/ tshodang ldan pa a pa si zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag gis yokhyadabcu gsum tshosashig ces bka' stsalan/ ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u
0 pa la so sor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ chos gos 'dan sbyar mar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ bya ba zin pa yongs su spyad bgo/ de bzhin du stod g.yogs dang/ mthang gos dang/ sham/
thabs dang/ sham thabs kyi 'theb dang/ stodangshegs dang/ stod/gas kyi 'theb dang/ gdong phyis dang/ lus kyis dang/ g.yan pags dang/ sku bzedadang/ g.yogs/
ma dang/ gas 'din yo byad kyigs su byin gyis brlabs te/ na ba la dgos te/ bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo// ya nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/
tshe dang ldan pa u pa lase zhus ra// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsalan/ de las lhag pa'i gis rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka'astsal pa// u pa la de ni slob dpon dang/ mkhan po dang/ yid gacugs pa rnams la bsngos 'khacang bar bya// de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ dge slong zhig
gi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad smosashig/ dgos shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ges 'di lhag par basngo ste/ bsdob rigis pas mkhan po labasngosta/ mkhan po la yade
gcugs bas bcang bar bgyi'o/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod bar bya'o// rkyang pa'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang pog/ mdor na
dbus ba blun la sogs bshes// bcu gnyis kyin ge nga brag dang// de bzhin rnam pas dbye ba dang// tshul bzhin bge gsum pa 'o// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u ba lase zhus pa// btsun pa gang zag tu'i sa bzlog/
pa mi btsan/ btsacho ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa la bcu gnyis kyas te/ dus pa dang/ thun bo dang/ mi gsal ba dang/ mi mkhas pa dang/ ngo tsha med pa dang/ khon
du 'dzin pa dang/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa dang/ spangs pa dang/ tshig ma brtan pa dang/ spyod lam las 'gal ba dang/ tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang bslab pa sbyin
pa'o/ yang nus ba/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na byas pa lta bu nas/ dzatsam gyis nang slab pa stsal ba'i bar du lags/ u pa lagapaleg par bsam pa soms pa dang/ logo bar
smra ba smra ba dang/ bzlog dka' ba bzlog pa yin na// u pa 'di ltar na byas par 'gyur ro// btsun pa jitsam gyis na glen ba lags/ mdo snga ma 'dzinakha/ 'dulal ma 'dzin pa//
ma lta bu mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pa la glin pa yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyisan mi gsal ba lags/ ub la gang mdo yang 'dzin/ 'dul ba yang 'dzin/ ma lta bu/
[2 ]yang 'dzin mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ chos mngon pa'i don mi rishes pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pa la mi gsal ba yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyisan mi mkhas pa/
lags/ upa lagi gang mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ ma lta bu yang 'dzin/ de dag gi don ye shes mod kyi/ gzhan shes par byed ma nus pa ni/ u pa la mi mkhas pa sta/ 'di
tsam gyis na u pa la ma mkhas pa yin no/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na ngo tsha med pa lags/ u pa la de ni pas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung zhes pa byung bar gyur pa ste/ a pa la de ni ngo tshamed
par gyur pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na len du 'dzin pa lags/ u pa 'dri na khro ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ gzhan yang gang dang gang du 'thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/ u pa li de tsam
gyis na khon du 'dzin pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams kyi slad relin mchis lags/ de ni u pa la dge slong gi mtshams kyi phyi rolan 'dug paste/ u pa la de tsam gyisan mtshams
kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na sangs pa lags/ upa la de nudage 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/ u pa la de tsam gyis na spangs par gyur
pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshag ma brtan par gyur pa lags/ u pa la de ni tshig ma brtan par gyur nga dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsu ba bo dang/ tshig
nubya// 'khyal par smra ba'o// u pa la de tsam gyis na tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// btsun pa jitsaman spyod lam las 'gal bar gyur pa lags/ u pa ladi na dge 'dun
gyi nang nas langs nas song ba'o// u la 'di ltar na spyod lam las 'gal bar gyur pa'o// btsun pa jitsam gyis na tshul bzhin la ma gnas par gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la de ni mo spyod pa ni spyod/
dge slong gi bslab pa na mi slob pa'o// u pa la de tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la ma gnas par gyur pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal bar gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa ladin dge
dang slong la dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa byin par gyur pa ste/ u pa la de lta bu ni bslab pa byin par gyur pa'o// yang gsol pa// btsun pa jitsam gyis
na gang zag gis slar bzlog pa la btsun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// u pa la rnam pa gsum ste/ tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang/ tshag brtan pa dang/ spyod lam las/
ma 'gal ba'o// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o//// mdor na/ gangag pi'i ni bya ba dang// gang zag kyang ni bcu gnyis te// bsnyen par
zla rdzogs par byed pa dang// khyim pa yin pa khas blangs pa'o/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs
[4 ]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa su pa lasi zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de la sor bzlog pa ma btsan no zhes bka' stsal na/ btsun pa gang
zag bcu gnyis so sor bsko ba'i tshide dag 'ad skudamatsha[W ]/ tshe dang ldan padag nged cag la nimasgo zhig ces mchin/ cadi dag ga sar bzlog pa yang mi btsananam/ u pa li btsan no//
de chod pa'i las la ngas dgangs te gsungs so// btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim pa lags par khas blangasan/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bsnyenapar a
rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa la bsnyen par rdzogs zin kyang/ khyim ba yin bar khas blangs na/ de yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes byan/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tsho lta smos
kyang ci dgos/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// mdor na tshal bu dgan ma rung ba// lnga pa gang gi rkang mi bsku// dbang phyug khasgrag
bar bya ba dang// zhang ga das po dge 'dun gyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 'tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga'i lham ma 'chang zhi'i ces bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde dgags mi rung ba rnam pa lnga po de dag gi tshil bus rkang pa khyugs nas/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po bsad/
rgyal gyi ba glang ga dung du song ste/ rje phyogs su 'khod pa dang/ ba glang dag bas dri tshor nas bros pa dang/ de dag gis tshodang ldan pa dgazung zhage zung zhig ces smras
pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis gzung bar ma nus so// bzhin bzangs med kyis bzung dus/ 'phags pa dag zung zhig/ med la ni sbyin/ btsa' ba'i rin no//
des de dag gi mdun du song ste/ rdzus nang ba'i phyogs su 'dug pa dang/ ba glang de dag kyang rakhod do// de dag kha sa smras pa// 'phags pa dag ci byed rogi pa mkhyenanam/ bzhin babs
nged rig pa ma shes mod kyi/ ded kyis ba glang cashes kyi tshil bus rkang pa bskus pas so// 'phags pa dag rgyal po'i ba glang mchog dag bros par gyur nas/ khyed kyis rgyal po la gnod
ba byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas/ de dag nyes pa ngor brjod cing 'phyus 'degs te ma snyan par ther ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gis ba glang cang shesakyi tshil gyis rkang pa byug par ma byed cig/ dge slong gis kha glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang pa la byugs na 'das
blo ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// ji ltar ba glang cang shes pa bzhin du/ rta cang shes dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ gzig la sogs pa rgyas par brjod par bya'o/

gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab naste/ de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying po tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na par song ste drung du phyin pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos/
phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gtsag tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'olags/
pa kun dga' bo seng ge 'agodan bshams pa 'di ci zhig bgyi/ tsA dang chos bsgrags sam/ de'i tshig so sbyin gyi dus la babasta/ des rgyal po chen po dge slong gas mtshungs par bzung ba
las lags kyi/ khyim pas mtshungs bar bzung ba ma lags so zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo// mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo na'i phyir rgyal po chen po chos ma mnyan par song zhes rmas pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyisanyes so// de ste rgyal po gzugasacan snyade po so sor thar pa zhes par gyur na/ nges par de sngon bas
kyang sdon du dga' bar gyur te/ dga' nas dga' ba'i dbang gsi bya ba byed du gden ma zi'o// debs na ngas gnang gis 'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa dad pa de dag la ni thos par gyis shig/ gzhan
yang rab tu phyug la ma dad/ dbul la rab tu dad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bu dag la'ang thos par gyis shig/ gang gi tshe tshe dang
ldan pa gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya'u bso bso po skum zhing 'di la zhing lus nyam chung bar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs te/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga'
bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ni'i phyi rin gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu zhes bya ba skya'u bsang bsong po skam zhing 'di la smra zhing nyam chung bar gyur/ des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas
nas thug pa 'ba' zhig gso lus ba skyed pa lags so zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga/ kun dga' bo de phyung na ngas gnangugs gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa la
thug pa blad nug/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas glo panon phyi ba nyi shu bal// tshodang ldan pa gro bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ni thug pa 'thung nAgi par gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang/
des smras pa// btsun pa kun dag 'a ba bdag gcig pu la 'am de sta dge 'dun thams cad/ desnus pa/ khyod gcig pu'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dis glengs pa sa na/

tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gas kyang 'daskad du globazhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung ba sngon grong khyer tsam pa na la legs par gyur pa'i tsho/ ba glang bdun gyis drang ba nang spangs
te rab tu byung nas/ da thug pa tsam la yang chags so zhes zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gaphyi'i dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa gnangan/ bdag kyang gzed 'tshal bar bgyis/
zhes gsol pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ de ltar naganang gis/ gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu/
pa'i phyir dge 'dun thams cad kyang thugakha'athungs shig/ gang gi tshirgyal po gzugs can snying po/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'byung bar gnang ngo zhes thos nas/ des
dge 'dun la sa bon bum pa stong gis gdab pa'i zhing dag phul pa dang/ dge slongadag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge 'dun gyi phyir blang bar bya ste/
de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de bas na zhing las byung ba'i rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyisashig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o//
mngon gding dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang// dge tshul dang gsar bu dang// snyomasazhugs dang nas gnang ba// bslab pa byin pa gnyis pa'o// sas rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yodapa na dzeta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u ba las zhus pa/ btsun
pa dge slong dang khyim pa gnyis lhan cig tu gdang ba gcig la mchis su rung ngam/ ngal di na mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cige/byungan gnang ngo// btsun
phyi ba dge tshul budang/ dge slong gsar dang/ mnang dang/ za ma dang/ dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang/ pha bsad pa dang/ ma bsad pa dang/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang/ mu stegs can dang/ mustegs can du song ba dang/ rkun gnas dang/ so sor gnas pa dang/ mi gnas pa dag la
sogs ba dang gdang ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ u pa ladi ltar ni mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na/ de bzhin du stan gc-ig gam/ khro gcig gam/
khri gtsage gam/ par tang gcig tu rung dwas/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byungan rung ngo// btsun pa khyim pa dang stogs la stan bting ba'i stongan lhan cig tu mchis
bar chung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung// par tang dag gdang yong nang mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na par tang dag bting bar gyur pa'i ng de bzhin no//
de bzhin du dge tshul pa dang/ dge slong gsar bu nas/ so sor b gnas pa'i phyir du sto/ de bzhin du gnas la/ nyes pa'i dmigs ma byung gi bar du lhan cig tu 'dug n 'das pa
dang bcas par 'gyur ro// btsun par slab pa stsal pa gnyis shig stan gcig gi steng na lhan cib/mchis su rung dam/ tshul la din mi rung ngo// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad
bam po gnyis ba ma ngon bslang ba dang khri 'u gcig 'brelabar gyur pa'i ng de bzhinate// cung zad brel khar
gyur ba dang// rtswa dang shing yang dge 'dun gyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab n bzhugs pa'i tsho/ dge

slong dag khri shu la steng na btso ga ka las byed cing 'du ba dang/ drug sde dag ga de nyid du 'dug cing gnod par byed de/ de dag khrelakhazhin du bsrung ba dang/ de dag la gnod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur/
ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong btso blag gi las byed cing brel ba la dge slong ngag gis ma su zhig/ bslang
na'adas pa dang bcas par 'gyur// gleng bzhin mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong dag gzan za zhwang 'a 'dab rnams la/ drug sde dag gis rgan rnams bzhin du bya'o zhes
bsang ba dang/ dge slong dag ldang du ma btubanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin
ga/ du 'dug cagices bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde dag phyis 'osanas dge slong snga mkhas za zhing brel ba dag bslang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong gis dge slong ba zan za nAng brel bdag la bsang bar gud du 'dug par bya ste/ bslangan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u ba las
zhus kha/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dge slong dag gzan za zhing brel ba zhes bgyi/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chung du lan tshwa 'am/ shatse'am/ la phug kyang rung/ brims
bar gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gzan khra zhing brel ba la kha slang zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde dag rganarims kyi dang bor 'dug nas/ gzan za zhing chedadu brel/
bar byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong dag gis gralam yin par 'dug pa lagazan za zhing brel bar ma byed cig/ byas na 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//
dge slong dag gral rims la mkhas par gyis shig/ delas gzhan dun 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi bum pa dang/ gzhi khung dag dge slong dgakha si
blangs nas khatso ga ga las byed pa dang/ drug sde dag gis tshodang ldan pa dag nged rgan pas nged sngar dbang bo'os smras nas/ tshon rtsi dag phos khyer ba dang/ dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas/
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ dge slong dag gis bum pa 'am gnong khung dag khrel pa la ma gling bar/ bya ba rnams zin nas gdod longs shig/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gas bum pa 'am gnong khung dag brel ba la ma byung zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ drug sde dag gas bsams bzhin du snod rnams tshon cung zad tsam gyis khrel
bar byas te ba nag pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ tshon rtsi thams cad snodagatsag cig nang du blugs la dgas na blang khagyis shig/ dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du
tshon cung zad kyis brel bar byas te ma gzhagacig/ bzhag na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhin mnyan du yod pan// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
dzata'i tshal shing thogs kyis bskor ba dang/ khyim bdag dag gas bcag cing bcagatsang khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkur zhagices sgo zhig/ de ga
gas bsgo ba dang/ shing dang rtswa yang bor te dong ngo// de dag chud zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal/ spyad du mi rung ba dag tshang mang du skyol ca'i// lhag ma dag las
gsar du byed pa la phul cig/ drug sde dag gas las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag gshags nas mer bus te btso blag ga las byed ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ las
gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag na mi bu zhig/ busan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshogi gas su bcad b drug pa'o//
mda'o na mgon med zas sbyin gyi rgyan dang// 'dug pa bslang bar mi byadang// snod sbyad lag na thogs pa dang// lham yang phyi bar bya ba'o// sangs rgyas
sgra bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'atshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na/
'tsha bdag gsareta'i tshal yang dbul bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalta stsal pa// khyim bdag ngas gnang gis yul cig/ desangashing ga nga po'i ming du bya ba la ni
po'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ gang mo'i ming du bya ba ni mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ dge slong dag gso ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag nyid la dus shig/ de dab gso khyim bdag nyid la dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar bsngos pa de bzhin du
mdzod cig/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ gshinge bo'i mong du bya ba dang/ gshing mo'i ming

du bya ba rnams kyi rgyan so sor bsdus 'thum bor byas te 'go cag/ namadus ston gyi tshild de bzhin du brgyan par gyisangashage/ rtsig pa'i ni'i mo'i yo byad du byas shage/ bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang/
kab dag gnalas gsar du byos shig/ de'i san dege 'dun gyi snang mar byas shage nad pa'i sman khag rtsig pa dang/ ka kha'i de dgan las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa 'an sman gyi
yo byad du byosashig/ tshang mngag rtsag pa dang/ ka ba'in do dag las gsar du byesashig/ de'isi na dge 'dun gyi bshos su gyis shig/ chu khang gi rtsig pa dang/ ka kha'in de'i las
gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa' ni skom du brimasangagag/ dugs khang ba rdzogapa dang/ ka ba'anodi'i las gsar du gyis shig/ des na dugs khang du gyis shig/ bkad sa'i
khang pa'i rtsig pa dang/ ka ba dag gan las gsar du gyis shig de'isa'i ni snum pa'i zong gyis shig/ khyams dang/ stogasabu dang/ 'chags dang/ sgo khang dang/ yang
thog kha rtse ga pa dang/ ka ba dag gi ni las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa ni dge 'dun spyir bags shig/ gang rdzing bu'i po sa ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dag gi spyir shog cig/
dge slong spong ba'i khang bu 'a na na 'dug cing dge ba'i phyogs spyod pa dang/ drug sde dag dir 'ongs nas dedagon no zhes zer nas de dag bsang stabatang radang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsalapa rgan rams so zhes dge slong gas dge slong 'khodar la ma slang zhig/ bsangan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag bya ba byas nas stan las
langs te/ 'chag ci 'dug bzhin du gzhan gyis stan khros na ma ste nas/ dge slong dag brel bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das pa gso lapa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bya ba byas nas stan las langs nas stanama'adzin cig/ dge slong dag ring zhig tusnyan l 'dug nas langs te 'chag pa dang/ de'isor drug sde dag
'dug nas/ deltar gyur pa dge slong dgagasi/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// der ma 'dug tsamig/ langs te 'chag tu 'gro na yang
de steng du tshos gos sam pus 'khyud tsage zhig la tshogs shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag snod rnams thogs bzhin du gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa
dang/ de nas dge slong zhig gas thogs bzhin du phyag byas pa dang/ de'i ril ba chag pa gyur to// gzhan zhig gsakyang khang bzangs kyi ka ba la lham brdabs pa dang/ dge slong dag
'bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i mitshungs par
[8 ]sbyad pachos bca'o/ dge slong lam du 'jug pas chu mthongon/ lhung bzed dang chos gos phog ste phyogs gcig tu shog la/ de nas gos dag kyang sprugs te khrus byas la/
donas niang ba dang lag pa khrus la/ chu yang chu tshags kyis tshogs te ra dgasher bas lham byas la/ de'i 'og tu lag pa bskul nas/ bla 'og gibagog legs par gyonal/ spyod lam zhi
bzhin du gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o// de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o/// mdon
sdugyi brdar dang sen mo gcod// smad tshor rkang pa'i nad ni/ bshang bar pyadang gtsang ' gnas // bya ba byas pa ma bcad de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan du yod pa'i dzi ta'atshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag 'ar ban bzhugs so/ btsam ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir sdugyi'i snod chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ drug
sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gru khyer te bya bakhyas kyang/ sdug bsan da dung bya ba yod ces zer nas spu gra masta'o// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das 'gasol/
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spu gri bya ba byas nas ma 'chang zhige/ 'chang na 'as khadang bcas bar 'gyur ro// spu gri ji lta ba bzhin du brdar dang/ sen mo gcod
gapa dang snang tsher dang/ rkang pa rten pa rnams so// drug sde dag gis gci b gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas kyang/ dadung yang snar 'jug gzhas smras nas/
dge slong lhags pa rnams 'jug tu ma ster ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong gis gci
sbyo ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas nas/ dge slong dag ma bgag cig/ bgags na 'das ba dang bcas bar 'gyur ro/ bshang ba'i sar yang de bzhin no// rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i
'tsho tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o/// mdor na g.yog dang sa ston chen po dang// rtog pa can gyi chu dang ni// phye las rjes dang skyo ma dang// sngar bsdus de bzhin bsgrags
angs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan
n+d+he 'das kyis de ste gnang na/ bad ga gas sen mo dang dbu sku'i mchod rten la dus ston chen po bgyi 'os kha sol pa dang/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ltagan gnang gis
gyisashig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mtshod rten la dus ston gsol cig ces bka' stsal ba dang/ dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dus nas/ de dag rdzing bu'i nang
du lhung bzed rnams bkrus bdang/ gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dang/ dge bsnyen dgagasakyang mang dang/ 'bru mar dang/ nodang/ sbrang rtsi 'khyim pa rnams kyang rdzong du bkrus pas na/
lhung bzed rnams dang bum pa de rnams kyi snum dag gas chu ba stong du zhag chags par gyur te/ de la dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas chu mi 'byung ngo/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// des kha zas kyi bya ba byed nus kyis dkrugs la 'thung zhig/ de la the tshom ma byed cig/ chu de gor khor yug tu skye bo mang
bodag gis dkrugs pas na/ thams cad kyang rnyog pas ga nga// gdong ga kho thugs brnyan yang mang bgyur ]chu tshags kyang rtog pas 'gagasanasachu mi zag pa dang/ de dag la
gnod par gyur to// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ btsagaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang gdong gi gzugs brnyan ma snang bder lhung
bzed chung du 'am snod gzhan gyis chus la/ shing tog ka ta ka'i 'brasabu chug ste skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang/ nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan yod sna kha 'gyur ro/ de lta'u
medan gzan gyi chang bu chug cagi de snum mod bas zhagi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalal/ phyomar gyis la der chug cig/ chu ba tshwacan du gyunas/ dge slong dag the tshom
skyes pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de ste des lan tshu'i bya ba byed nus na byin len byas la 'grub zhig/ de ste bya ba byed ma nus na chus la 'thung zhage/
la the tsom du ma byed cig skyid pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su gcad pa dgu pago ma doran chudang zholas chur gyur dang// bum pa bung ba'ang de bzhin te//
lab pa bsnyal nas btung ba dang// dge tshul ba la'ang rnam bzhir bya// lhung bzed dang ni gdong bkru dang// bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa gnyis// rgyags dang 'bras bu me tog dag/ 'phos
'a na rung bas bza' bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzita'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag khron pa'i nang
nas chu bcus te de dag gis btsagasan/ 'bras chan gyi bul ba dang khur ba'i dum bu dag phyung ngo// dedag the tsom skyes nas chags pa dang/ dum bu dag kyang 'khru bar gyur nas/ de ltar
gyur ba dge slongadag gas/ btsam ldan 'as la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// des kha zas kyi bya bskyed mi nus kyis phyung ste bor la tshog sashig/ de la the
tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag rje nga nas tshu 'tshub dang/ der chu'i bum pa dang sbrang rtsi'i bum ba dag bkrus pa dang/ dge slong dag gsikyang lhung bzed snum can dag der bkrus so// dedag
0 sa snum gyis chu 'a stong zhag chags par gyur/ zhe'i dum bu dag kyang snang bar gyur nas/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes te ma brkus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ sa kha
khrus kyi bya ba byed ma nus kyis rgyus shig/ phyi dro ma 'thung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'byung 'gi/ bum budang ril ba dag gi nang mi lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang slab sashage/ dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs te dang du dung/ den tshu yod de khyim bdag gas snod nas chu'agron bu mang po la byin pa dang/ dge slong dag gis
ma 'thungs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste gzhan med na rtog sa la 'thung zhigi/ de dag khyimadudang ril ba'i nang du a lcags pa dang/ btsam ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ der yang blugasashig/ phyi dro ma 'thung pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'byung zhig/ laman rdo chu sgom yod pa dang/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes
te tshul blangs ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rdochu sgrosan bku bklub yin gyis/ rtogs la'athung zhige/ ril khadang bus budag tus lcags pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/der yang blugs shig/ phyi dron 'thung ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'thung zhig/ del the tsom dus byed cig/ de bzhin du shing/
sgrom dang rkyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa yang rtogs la 'thung zhig/ phyi dro dang/ la pa dang/ bum khu'i nang du'angaskyugs shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong

a dgagaso dge 'dun la chu brims pa dang/ denadage slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa chu rgyun lhung bzed kyi nang nas ma chad pas na kha zhagaparagyur to zhes smras te/ de dgags ma blangs so// de ltar gyur
bdage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khu ba thams cad kyi rgyunan thur du 'bab kyi/ steng dum 'gyur gyis
'grul/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ de ba nan du 'o ma dang/ 'dang/ no'achu dung/ dAr ba dang/ rtsib mo dang/ tshul sogs pa la rgyas par brjod do// gleng
ga zhin mnyan du yod pa na sto/ dag gi slong drug ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las/ ba glangag lhas su phyin pa dang/ de dag la de na chu med de/ de dag gis zho'i ru byin pa dang/ dge slong dag the
T+Tha tshom skyes nas ma 'khru'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalar/ gang na chu med pa der zho'i tshudang dar ba das
! bas khrus shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gis baglang rdzi la bum pa kharnyas pa dang/ de dag gis mar gyi bum pa dang/ 'o ma'i bum pa dag redan/ de dag the tshom skyes nas ma/
khungs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ dge slong dag bum pa la rnam pa lnga ste/ bshang ba'i bum pa
dang gcapa'i bul ba dang/ chang gi bum pa dang 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang/ mar gyi bum pa'o// de la snga ba gsum po ni ma bzhag pa yang ma gzhag cagi/ bzhag nani rgyang ring por 'o
cig 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang/ mar gyi bum ban mi'i nang du bsregs la/ nas lce ba'iro lu 'am/ ba glang gi lci bas rung bar gyis la chu chus te/ desnga drodang phyi dro yang spyod cig// la
tsom du ma byed cig/// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod panasta/ dge slong ga zhan zhige gas bumabu'aning nas chu'athungs pa dang/ bubs thos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dgags/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal dge slong dag bum bu'inang nas tshun 'thung zhig/ 'thungs na'angs ba dang bcas par
'gyur ro/ sngar lag pa snyol la kha khrus te gdadachu 'thung zhig/ bum du 'kha khab med par ma ga zhagacig/ debs nas gnang gas/ bum pa ba khab tshongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bum pa'i kha khab tshongos shig ces bka' stsalan/ dge slong dag gas kha khab ji lta bu bcang bamangashes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalo ra/ shang las byas pa 'am/ ro
bya// las byas pa 'am/ sa las byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa snyol chu 'thung zhig cesakhaka' stsalan/ lam du zhugs pa dang gcig 'chu nyung bar
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsalab/ 'dab ma'ang lhags batshol la de'i zhing nas 'thung zhig/ de'ang chod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ bag
yod bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thung zhig/ de'ang med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dben par 'dug la bum bu nyidi nas 'thung zhig/ gzhan gyis
ma mthong ba dang mdzes par gyis shig/ dge slong dag ngas 'phongs pa na gnad bde ma 'phos patshom spyod ci'i spyad n 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur 'o// gleng gzhan
mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyodatsang deng b.las/ de dag gis rgyags dgatshul po dag la bskur ba dang de dag mtheg/sa/ de dag gis thegal skur zhig ces smras pa/
b+h+yA dang/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma bteg go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ btsam ldan 'das lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnastsalal/ thog ma'i
! dge tshul kha dog lanas phog ste slang zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong dgags ma thob nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dgags/ bcom ldan 'angs lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
cas kyis bka' stsal ba/ bog nag/ dge tshul bas ma bzung bzhin gdeg pa dang dbab ba dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshulangs ma bzung bar gdegar
dang dbab par ma byed/ dge tshul pa dag gis bdag cag chad de 'khasos/ khyed kyis cung zhige khyenatsag ces smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis ma khyer bdad/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal ba/ tha gus chang sa la/ gu mo dgatshul ngas zung ste phyi bzhin du 'bad du chug la/ dge slong gis khyer gi// dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas de la mi kha ba dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhad pa stsal pa// de la the tsom du ma byed par bo zhagi/ dge slong 'thon ba mang bo dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang/ 'gron pa mang po dag rkun pos bcom
ba dang/ dge tshul gyis rgyags rnams bo nas bros te deng ngo// dge slong dag gis rgyugs mkhyer nas de nyidan 'o zhang 'dug kha dang 'gron bo mang bo dag gas 'apags pa khyedakyi rgyagasan/
rkun pos mkhyer ro zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis dge tshul padag la de la rgyugs led stangashog cig ces smras pa dang/ de dag skrag nas 'dod du ma btub ste/ khyed nyid tsa'i phyir ma/
'dong/ nged cag rkun pos gsad mod ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ longal
gzed dge tshul pa la byin gi/ dge slong dag gso the tsom skyes nas de dag mazos pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ de la the tshom dumakhyed par
blo gi/ klung rga labar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge tshul pa dag la khyed nyid kyis khyer te rgal bar nus sam zhes dris la/ de ste nus zhes zer na legs
lcade ste ma nus so zhes zer na rgyags bdag cag gas khyer largol cig/ de la dge slong dag gis rgyags dag pa rol tu bsgral bar byan/ dge tshul pas bsgral bar byan brtags bar gyis shig/
da stodage tshul nga yang ma nus na/ dge slong dag gas rgyags pa rol tu sgrolal/ de'i 'og tu dge tshul la yang bsgral bar gyis shig/ de ste gnyis kar nusan dge tshul pa dang rgyags lhan
cig tu bsgral bar gyis shagi/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu bsgral pa dge slonganams the tsom skyasanas ma zegaso// de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/
blobcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalar// de la the tsom du ma byed par bza'abar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed du tho zhig ces bka'astsal pa dang/ dge slong
zla 'ge gis lhung bzed bkrus nas mthe bas brdabasan sgra mi gsang nas/ dge slong de la the tshomo skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ sgyu med par lan gnyis lan gsum
du bgrubs khrus la mthebs brdabasan sgra gsang bar byungan/ de la the tsom du ma byed par ze zhig/ dge slong ba/zhan zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus te/ de 'gunas zas kyi tshigs ma zhig mthong ba
dang/ de the tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'angashang bus brud dalan gsum gyi bar du khrusal/ lab tsam du ma byed cig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis yang
lhung bzed gas pa zhig gi nang du du ba sngon po zhagi bangs pa dang/ de'abronas snum byung ste/ zhag steng du byung ba dang/ dge slong de the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa stengag zhag ga zhemasa'al tung bar gyis sha'i// dge slobazhige rlung nad kyis btab nas des phyi dro khub zhig 'khrungs te/ nub kar lhung bzed de zhing du skom btung zhes byas pa dang/ lhung
bzed kyin ng du snum la ngas nas de'i stod du zhag chags pa dang/ dgo slong de the tshom skyes nas/ skom yang ma 'thungs so// deltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ lag pa dang kha khrus te snam zhims te bo nas/ de la the tsom du ma byed par 'thung nagi// bcom ldan 'das kyis kha khrus shig ces
bka' stsalan/ dge slong dag kha bkru ba ma shes nas/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ lcaba'am/ sa'am/ shing gdeshun brags la sogs pa gzhan gyis so//
gsas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na kha bkrus pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ kha
dang rma gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zug bas ma 'bags par ma nus med kyis/ lan gsum du kha bkrus te chu bar pa ni kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o// dge slong zhig gas khasod snyoms bslangs te gnas
zlo khang du bzha gnas phyi rol tu byung pa dang/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i stong du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang/ jatsem bsod snyoms pa slar 'oabasod snyoms kyi stongan bras gzhan
[$]na ]zhage blugs par mthong ste/ de the tsom skyes nas gzan ma zes so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de
sa byin len byed pa yod na byin len byas la zo zhig de ste medan steng gser ba de logs shig tu bal/ de la the tsom du mkhyed par tho zhig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bsod snyoms bslangs nas
gnas rta bdu bzhag ste phyi rol tu song ba dang/ dekhyam pa zhig gis reg par mtho pa ste/ drag slong de the tshom skyes na ma thos so// de ltar gyur padage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gso'
za bdang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ khyim bdag de la ci'i phyi'i rig ces sa la/ des rtswa dang sgrung dag bsal ba'i phyir reg ces zer na byin len byas la tho 'gi/ de ste 'ded
pa phyi'i reg go zhes len de 'ang byed mar bgos la byin len byas te/ la tsom du ma byed par ba zhig khacom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyags khyer ci'i ces bka' stsalan/ khyim pa dang
dge tshul dag meng nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khakastsalal/ sbyin pa'ibadag po spro ba skyed cig/ sbyin bangag kyang
