med na bdag nyid kyis slar khyed la de khyim pa dang brjes la bo zhigi/ de stod la medazhaskal ba gnyis su tshod la khyim pa la byani// sa khyer na nadi'i skal ba sar slongs te byin len lus la zo zhig/ bdag
gi skal ba ni de la byin cig/ de ste de ltar ma 'byor na nyi ma dang po' tshon skudabar 'dug cig/ de nyin kyang byin len byed pa med na/ stag gi sngar thabs gcig tho 'gi/ yang phyi de nyin mo/
yang byin len byed pa men/ stag ga par thabs gnyis kho zhige/ de ste zhag bzhi'i nyin mo yadabyin len byed pa medan/ jitsam 'gas pa'i bar du khro zhig/ de la the tshom du ma byed tsagi/ deste
rgyugs medan 'bras bu rang lhud pa de 'do la gdugs tshod la bab kyi bar du khyer te songal/ des khyim pa dang phrad na skal ba gnyis su tshod la gcigeg na de la byin te/ de'i skal ba slar bdag
gis slongs 'arung bar byas la 'ozhagi/ khad dil byin cig/ de ste so thadan snga dro'am phyi dro nga rung/ dung bar bya ba'i phyir rgyu med na srog dang 'bral bas btsom dul byed par kho ga deste
ya da ltung bae shi la 'dzegs te thogosang shig/ yang na sprugs la byang phyob sa kyi dus su bsngos te zhig/ de bzhin du rtsa ba la sogs pa'i ngs las rang gi brkos te byung la
yi tha tsom dus byed par ba zhig/ ngas khyed la 'phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de ma 'phongs pa'i tshom spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyurar// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad
zla ba bcu ste sgo gsum pa rdzogs so/// mdor bsdus pa ste/ sa bon bum pa rkun po zhu ba dang// lus kyi rig pa de bzhin te// 'bras chan lan tshu song ba dang// bu ram
a shing dang rgun 'bru dang// glo bur 'ongs dang gnas pa'o/// mdor na/ sa ban bum pa shing rta gru// khur dang 'o ma tshong pa de bzhin te// bya rog sgrung ma btso blag las//
u pa la bzhi chog kun shes pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pan bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bum pa stong
ga sa bon btab pa phul ba de 'tsho/ dge slong dag gis de'i thig thes nas zhing yang tha bar bar te/ ku sha ste gnas su gyur to/ de nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying po phyi rol du byung bas de dag nang
nas des blon po la kyis sa 'di ltar zhang kun thabar bor nas ku sha'i gnas su gyur ces rmas pa dang/ des lhas 'phags pa dag la bum pa stong ga sa bon gyis btab pa phul ba de/ de dag gi/
[p/ ]legs par blangs pa de dag gzigs modaces smras pa dang/ rgyal bos 'phags pa de dbags thunangashas su 'du ma btang ngam zhes/ de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge 'dun gyi zhing dgun thun shas su bong zhig/ dge slong dag gesi thun shasasu phyin no// zhange bas
gshin pa'i rnams na thams cad bdag cag khyer yang/ de dag gas de dgag labam khrungs pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
kyis bka' stsalal/ zhi ngashas kyiskal leng zhagi/ dge slong dgags blangs te de nyid du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ skal ba gtsug lag khang du skyos shagi
ces gsungs pa dang/ sngaganang pa nyid kyidir bskyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsalab/ ston du 'ang bdagag dil skyos shig/ dedag skyod pa na yang brkus so// de ltar
gyur pa dge slongad gse/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ srung ba'i dge slong rnams skosashig/ shang ton du skyod pa lasashang rta chag
kyang dge slong gsi grogs ma byas pa dang/ khyim pa dag mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa// 'phags pa 'anikhyedakyin/ khyed kyisatsapo'i grogs mikhyi/ desalcasal/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis ma gnang ngo// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gsi/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalal/ shing rta las phyugs 'debs
pas ma gtogs par der bskyas pa dang zhang ba'agrogasakyis shig dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/ shing rta pa dag gis shing rta'i steng du zhin cig ces smras pa dang/ de the tsom skyes
te ma non nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nan shing rta la zhen cig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ gru'i nang na thun shas kyi skal ba skyed pa laso/ gru'ang chag par gyur
nas dge slong dag gis grogs ma byas pa dang/ khyim bdag ma dga' bar gyur nas smras pa 'di na khyedakyin/ khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ de dag gis smras pa// bcom ldan
[@/]'das kyis ma gnang ngo// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gru'i dang ma gtogs par phul ba'i grogs
Sh+Tha/ dang zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig yang klung gi 'gram nas song ba las na bar gyur nas/ mnyan pas 'phags pa 'di'i nang du zhugs zhes smras pa dang/ de'i rtsom skyes nas/
nang du ma zhugs so// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag kha sa/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dngo ma gtogs par nang du zhugs la/ de la the
tsom du ma byed cig/ gzhan yang khur gyis bskyas ba las dechad par gyur nas/ des 'phags pa 'di mar bodacig gces snas bdang/ dge slong dgatsom skyes nas ma phog go/ btsem ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog na// dge slong dag gis phab nas slar ma bteg bdang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka'astsalal/ ji ltar dabogapa de bzhin du theg cig/ lhakhangag sgor bar te
dong ba dang/ mkhyen bar len ba dag gis brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ nang du skyos shig/ dge slong dag gsi sus nang du bskyas pa mi shes nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pas so// khyim pa medun dge tshul pas so// dge tshul pa'i ng med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag cag nyidakyis nang du skyos/
shis// dge slong dag gis nang du bskyasan/ bdag cag gis bskyas pa yin nosnyam nas ma thos pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bkastsalapa/ de la the tshom ma byed par ze zhagi/ dge 'dun gyi zas kyi nang du me chen 'bar bas 'o ma la sogs pa na khol/ rung bar byed pan sgor song nas bo ba dang/
btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de phyi rol tu ma 'gro zhagi/ de rkyen cig byung nas phyi rol tu songan/ mgal pa dag phyi drongs shig/ 'on kyang de bzhin du lud pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdag ma dag phyir dbyung bar gyi sa ngashag/ mdag ma phyir phyung yang lud pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos
[] kyi tha mas g.yobs shig/ 'on kyang lud par gyur nas/ bdag nyid kyis gzar bu lang la dkrug pa gyis shig/ dge slong dag ngas 'phos pa la gnang ba dem 'phongs pa'i tsho ma spyod cig dpyad
na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// de bzhin du sman dag kyang dge tshul pa 'am/ lha khang na gnas pas dkrug par gyis shig/ de'ang phyi rol tu songan de'i thabs sngamakhazhinano/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshong ba mang po dag cig gis sangs rgyas dang// dge slong gi dge 'dun la sogs pa bshos la spyan drungs so// de dag gis bshos sbyar te 'khod sar bskyal
nas ma dras kyi bar du tshong khang du ma shor te/ de dag ma gsod du song bdang/ gdugs tshod yol la thu gnas / dge slong dag gis ji ltar gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i sems kyis yongs su btang bas na/ dge slong dag de la the tsam ma byed par bza' bar bya'o// zos nas byang gasgra mi snyan gyi dus su byin gyis rlobasangashagi
dge 'dun gyis khedasar bya go mchus zas la reg pa dang/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas gzan ma thos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mchu'i thon skor bar la de la the tshom ma byed par tho shogi/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha zas kyin ng du bya rog gage le gnas / de nas kha zas ma zos pa dang/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i mchu'athin skor bo'i la tsom ma byed par baza bar gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan banam gru ni'i la 'ang the tsom bra sta/ nam gru the tshom can nam gru the tshom can
zhes ming du gyur to// de bshang sar 'ongs ba dang sbrang ma zhig mthong ngo// phyis yang de dang 'dra ba zhig bsgosan zas kyi steng na 'dug pa mthong ba dang/ des tshe dang ldan pa dag pa shangasan
mthong ba'i sbrang ma des 'dir 'ongs te/ kha zas la 'dags te ma rung bar byas so zhes smras pa dang/ de sa pa dang dge slong mang zhig gis zas ma zos par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dgaslong rnams sbyang ba na mthodaman kun tu rgyu ste/ des gang du reg pa de bod la de la btsem
ma byed par za zhagi/ dge slong dag tshon rtsi la las byed pan/ de dag la sems 'khrul pas tshon rtsi'i bum pa yin no snyam nas/ des dge 'dun gyi 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang/ mar gyi bum pa dag steng
du bteg steg khyer ba dang/ denanam gyi tshe ngo shes pa de'i tshon 'greng bzhin du bor nas chag pa dang/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ thangam skas la 'dzegs pa las cung zad tsam zhigegan 'dzogs mang du lus na/ slar bebs la gnas gar bde bar 'gyel bar shog cig/
thang ma skas la mang du 'dzegs la byung du bzig dgosan steng du 'dzegs la gnas bde bar ma 'gyel bar shog cig/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma zos pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de la thetsom du ma byed par bzhagi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhusar/ btsun
ba bzhag pa rnam pa du 'tshal du rung/ u pa la rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ ngo tsha medatsang bslab pa la ma mos pa dang/ gang la ngo tsha yod kyang dran pa nyams pa ste/ de gnyis kyis bzhag pa rung gis
gnyis ka zi zhagi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalar/ byol song gi skyi gnas su song ba'i sems can la sbyin pa byin nanA rnam bar smin pa brgyar re bar bya'o// tshul khrims ngan pas zanapa'i

ny+tsA kil sbyin pa byin zhani rnam par sman pa stong du re bar bya'o// tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag la sbyin ba byin nan ma bar smin pa brgya phrag stong du re bar bya'o// phyi lo gyi drang srong 'dod ba'i do

chags dang bral ba dag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par sman ba sa ya phrag brgya stong dur bar bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma no du byed par zhugs pa lan tshad med do// rgyun du zhugs pa ni de bas kyang

tshad med dgo/ lan ci'i phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed bar zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// lan cig phyir ldog par rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu mngonod byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// gra bcom pa'i 'abras bu mngon du byed bar zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad
mod de// dgra bcom pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// rang sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bram ze dang khyim
bdag dad pa dag gis/ dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du dong ba la gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lo dan dag bskur ba dang/ dge slong dag rnam bde lta bu'i rkyen byung nas de dag
gis gang du bskur bar bskur ma nus so// de dag ga nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa na gzhan du bsdos la gzhan du dbul bar mo
byed cig ces 'byung/ kha cig gis yang smos pa// de la gzhan byar yod/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong dag rnam pa bzhi la nadis bar dbul dgos te/ byang chub ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ tshe'aphrul chen po dang/ lha'i

de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong rnams das 'phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de bzhin du ma 'phongs pa'i tsho ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

la stsal pa/ gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// gnyis ka tshul khrims dang ldan n gang mang du shes pa'o// gnyis ka mang du shes na gang chog shes pa'o// gnyis ka chog shes na gang
tsheratshogongashes ba'o// gnyis ka cheratshog ngashes na/ u pa la gnyis ka chen tsheg shes pa las cher chog pa ni med de mi srid do// gnas med de de gnyis lta bu la ni 'khrug pa 'am

drubs shagi/ de'i nang na banAris pa dag na khol phyung lasar pas glon cig/ de brnyings pa las rung ba yodan me mar gyi snying por gyis shig/ der yang mi rung na ba glang gi lca ba 'am sa dngabasus

zhagi 'dug ste/ sa yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 'khor mang po 'dage slong dag cig la phul lo// der 'khor drug cu dang der dbyar tshul du zhugs so// tshul

nga nas byung nas lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas dag/ lcengos dang phyogs gang dang gang na 'khod 'khod pa de dang de dag nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bya bar lhags nas/ de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag
byas te deng ba dang/ des tshodang ldan pa rnams da khyim bdag 'dazhis bya bas mgron du byes kyis/ khyed 'di nyid du 'khod cag ces smras pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa// mkhan po mchi'o//
des smas pa// 'on 'khod de zas zesal dengasashig/ de dag gis smras pa/ zas dang yo byang khyer te mchis la de nyid bdag cag 'tsha' la// des 'olegs kyis/ de bzhin du gyis
shig ces smras pa dang/ bas dang yo byad dag khyer te deng ngo// de bzhin du kha tsag gis ma mar gyi mar/ kha cig gis ning ba byug pa/ kha cig gis na lham dag/ kha cig gis na gis
dag/ kha cig gis gdugs dag/ kha cagi gsarisha de dag// kha cig gsan rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lomadang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman rnams khyer te dong ba dang/ ring po ma
len bar gtsug lag khang de yo byad kyis brel bar gyur nas/ dge slong de mo bdag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag khyod kyi yo byad dag ni zad dozhes smras pa dang/ 'phags pa de ni
dge slong nyung la yo byad mang du phul na/ ci'i phyir gyur du bas zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis rgyas par smras pa nas/ des 'phags pa bdag gis ni din bzhugs pa rnams kyi phyir phul na/
de dag khagazhan na gnas la ci'i phyire ba gzhan du spyod ces nyes pa ngor brjod do// de ltar gyur pa de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
ba/ dge slong dag yon bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/ de bas na dge slong dgagasagazhan du gnas shing gzhan gyi khyer ba ma spyod cig/ dge slong dag gzhan du gnas pa gzhan gyi sbyang na de dag jitsam
spyad pa thams cad dang thang ga nan du bobacig/ rkyang ba'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshogs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// mdor na mtshan ma dang yang mngon mtshan dang/ par tang dag
dang 'a mo can// khri su rkang ba'i ri mo can// ralatshems bya ba dbyar mo khang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dzeta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
na bzhugs so// mnyan du yod pa na ma spun gnyis shig rab tu byung ste/ de las gcig ni zhal tapa'i gnas khang na 'dug go/ gcig ni ta'i tshalana'o// ji tsam

na zhal ta pa de don zhig ga phyir ri brags kyi grong du song ngo// dge slong doru nu bo blta ba'i phyir bgo ba de bgos nas de'i thad du song ngo// ngas dge 'dun gyi bag pa'i nang du gang zag ga khago ba de bzhag
nas gtam 'dzer cang 'khod do// de nas nor tapage 'dun gyi pago ba zhig gyon te song ngo// de nas zhal ta pa de slar 'ongs nas/ de na bdo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/ des tshe dang ldan pa ci dge
'dun gyis rnyed pa grub bam zhes smras pa dang/ des smras pa// dge 'dun gyis red pa cang med do// bgo ba 'di su'i/ 'dingag ni dge 'dun gyi'o// des smras pa// nged cag gin che
'dani chungan/ 'dari su'ang bge ba gyon te ma 'o dras sam/ 'di'i bdag bag phu na be zhage 'ongs so// song la drisashige/ de song nas dris te/ des bltasan dge 'dun gyi yin nas/nges

'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ dge 'dun gyi ni mtshan ma thob cig/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar mtshan ma gdab pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan
00'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong 'di zhes bya bas phul ba'o zhes ma gir khras shig/ dge slong dag gse dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag la gnyis de bzhin du bris so// de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das 'a gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zag gi ni mngon mtshan thob cig gleng gzhi namanyan du yod pa
na ste bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi 'am ga nga cag gi yang rung ste/ ri mo can ni gding ba med kyi bar du ma spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag gang zag gi par tang snyan med
pa la zhugs pa dang/ de'i nang nas kha cig gis smras pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni monan redapa ga nang gi/ bdag nyid kyis bya bar nam yin no zhes gsungasaso// gzhan zhig gis
yang byas pa'i dngos bo spongs shig ces smras pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bas na

'das kyis dge 'dun gyis na par tang rimo can rnyed dam byas kyang rung gnang ngo// gang zag gson gzhan gyis brten de nyid la bsngos pa 'chang du gnang gi/ rang byed du na ma gnang ngo// bcom

lagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ dge slong dag gangasari mo nan dgongs te gsungs kyi/ khro'i rkang pa ri mo can la ma yin gyi/ debasan dge 'dun gyis khri'u rkang

tshul du zhugs pa dang/ khang ba'aral tshoms dag ma byas bar dengo nas// dadag gis ral tshems ma byas pas ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ btsem ldan

'das te/ mchod nga phyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gas drangs nas/ dur khrod du bskyalate/ de skar khyer te 'ongs nas dge 'dun la phul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis ma blangs so/ de ltar
gyur bdage slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// song nas slar 'os pa zhes byos long zhig/ kha cig ni dbul te yul bde

slar yang phul ba dang/ dge slong dag gis ma blangs te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal ba/ de nas

btsa'a'o// las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong gsar skyes pa dag/ nan zhing rgan pa dag la dris lalong zhig/ las gsaradu byed pa rnams kyisamatshungasar ra spyad pa'i tshes
a1 bcas pa bzhin du ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhapa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/// mdor na bu ram shing dang dge slong rnams//
khra zhing mgo la phan gdags pa// mi bgo ba dang bzhi pa dang// skar ma bstan par mkhya'o// sangs rgyas btsam ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dag 'a ban bzhugs so// dge slongadag gis bca' ba bu ram shirnyed de/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis dgetshul bdagalan sum cha byin cig ces bka' stsal nas/ de dag la bu ram shing
gi sum chare re byin no// dge slong dag rgan rims su 'khodonas/ gral1sa ram dugyur pas/ slar yang rgan rims kyi thog tu 'ongs so// tshodang ldan ba sgra gcan 'adzin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
sbyan sngar 'dug ste/ de bu ram shing gi dum bu phra zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mag ltazhing 'dug ge/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsalal/ tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bu ram shing
'ded dam des smras r/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// de nas btsem ldan 'das kyi sku skal las bcad de/ dum bu gcig de la byin nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bu ram shing gi
bya ba byas te/ gtsug lag khang du 'os pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bu ram shing gi bza'o bas tshim par gyur tam/ des gsolapa/ btsam ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi redapa ni sum cha gcig stsol
cig ces bka' stsal pas gang la tshim mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ desan gdod tshim par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas/ dge
slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas gsakyi thob pan dege tshul pa dag la sum tshagatsag byin cig ces byas kyi/ kha zas kyithob pa dag ni mtshungs par bgosashig/ chung du na shing lul L]
sa'i mo tsam yang mnyam por bgos shig/ de las che chung du bgos na 'das pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ro/// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ ma1na/
du yod pan khyim bdag gnas pa de dus dus su r-ita'i tshal du 'gro ba las/ dge slong zhig gis de lanor 'as khyung ba'i bsod nams kyi das po bdun du rgya cher snyan par bshad pa dang/ deng
blob skyes nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsagis/ der dge slong gang dag gnas pa de dag kha zas 'phral 'phral du 'byorar 'byed pa las/ des de dag gis kha bas rgyur kar sha pa Na dag cig byin
pa las/ de dag gis smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa bdag cag bsod snyoms la 'gre bas/ chos gos kyis brel gyi/ zas kyis ni ma yin gyis/ kasha pa Nan chos gos kyi phyir bge'o//
dge slong bdag cag las su lang khyim bdag de 'khyil du ma 'dong zhige tshes de dag gis dam bcas so// de nas dus phyi 'gan bsod snyoms pa zhig ldengos rgyu ba spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin te/
ny+nyed khyim bdag de'i gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/ dge slong dag ga gis de la sor bcug ste/ gnas dang mal stan dag byin nas des bsams pa// de ring la ngal bso zhing gzan yang gral du bros/
la/ sa nasabasod snyoms blang de snyam du sems shing 'dug pa las/ dge slong gzhin 'khong ba dag lhung bzed dang ches gas khyer te bsod snyoms la dang ba dang/ bsod snyoms pa des bsams/
ba gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong dag ni de ltar 'phongs ba lha na/ bdag kyang de 'dra bar 'gyur gyi bsod snyoms slong du'agrosnyam nas/ de lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ lde mig dang/
sgo lcags kyang khyer nas/ mnyan du yod par rims kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs b.las/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'ongasanas/ des de la bde bar byin nam zhes tshig tu smras/ stan bting/
rkang pa la phyag byas nas de'i dun du 'dug go/ de de'i mdun du 'dug nas/ des de la na las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dus lo bdun du yon tan bshad pa dang/ khyim bdag des smras pa//
'phags pa bdagags de thams cad bsgrubs lags so// bsod snyoms pas smras pa// khyim bdag khyod kyis cung zad kyang sbyar ba med de/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khangan thog mar kha zas med do//
des smras pa/ 'phags bci gsung bdag gis de la mang du phul na/ 'phags pa gzhan zhig tubyen te nar ba snyam/ bsod snyoms pa des smras pa// khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang
gi lde mig dang lde mig kyog po dag shes sam/ 'phags pa 'tshal te// des lde mig dang lde mig kyog po dag bstan pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i don blo ba chud do zhes smras pa dang/

bsod snyoms pas de khyer nas slar song ngo// khyim bdag kyang de ni phyi bzhan du song ste khagatsug lag khang du 'dug nas/ ji tsam dge slong de dag bsod snyoms khyer te 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas des
[ri]@#// 'phags pa khyed cag gang nas byon zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag spyod yul la dad babaskyed pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa kar sha pa Na ga mchis
a khyim bdaga gnas khang na yod do// snoms te spyon/ de dag gas phyung ste byin no// des smras pa/ dasbyong yul gyi dad pa skyong du bzhud cig/ de dag gis ma spobs nas cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ba na yus te/ de bas na rnam pa bzhi/
rim pa go zhagi/ dan mchod rten thams cad kyi dang/ phyogs bzhi dge 'dun thams cad kyadang/ nad gsos kyini thams cad dang/ zasanar ma thams cad do// gleng
ga 'a ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ drug sde dag ljongs rgyu ba spyodatsadi/ skar ma shar tsam zhigin/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis gang mdza' ba'i gnas su ngal gso
[ ]nang 'dug tu bcug pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag ci zhig bsdad du yod/ ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa zhige par bya 'am/ rgan rims bzhin du ci'i phyir ma bgo/ de dag
ji ltar rgana'ams bzhin du 'gyed pa la zhugs pa dang/ gsar bu dag ma khags par namanangs so// de dag nam nangs pa dang langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag 'dong gis mal stan lang
zhig/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyedatsag skad cag 'khod pa'i phyir/ khyed kyis dge 'dun thams cad la gnod pa byas so// de dgas sbrus pa/ den ston pa'i bka'/
lung bzhin no// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ dge slongadag skur ma shar phan chad mal stan ma bgo/
zhig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// mal stan 'gyed pas kyang ma bge zhagi/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad
pa bdun pa'o// mdor na rgun 'brum dang yang 'bras bu gzhan// mosarung ba yang de bzhin te// zhugs thab mche sdong po dang// drang srong chen pos gnang
bko/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kun nas ldes rgyu ba spyod cing ro hita karagshegs te/ rohiti ka'i gnod sbyin ba glang ldan zhes bya ba'a gnas ni bzhugs so//
denas gnod sbyin ba slong ldan bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunang do nub bdag gi gnas/
su dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tubazhugs par tsa gnang/ de nas gnod sbyin ba glang ldan l/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas gnod sbyin ba glang ldan/
bcom ldan 'das cang gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes par ra gnas / des gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul/ stan par tshangs can dang/ la ba dang/ sngas grubazhi
a bdag kyang lnga brgya lnga brgya skul/ momadag dud pa med pakhakang ba lnga brgya yang sbrul// de nas bcom ldan 'das lan/ gtsug lag khang chen po bskos/ de'i lhag ma dag ni dge slong
dag la bskos te/ gtsug lag khang gi lhag ma dge slong dag la bskos nas/ btsacho ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste na ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag ga khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bshos gsol bar tshuganang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kha/nang
bsan/ gnod sbyin ba glang ldan la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes pa dang/ gnod sbyin ba gla ldan gyi grogs po kha che'i yul na gnod sbyin u ni ko zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des de las
bdag gas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dunadang bcas par bshos la spyan drangs kyis/ stod phyogs kyi nags shing thog las skuratsag ces spring ba dang/ des rkun 'brum/
dang/ bal bo sa 'dang/ 'bra ge la sogs pas snod bkang ste gnod sbyin gyi lag tu bkur ro// des gtsug lag khang gi dag rar sdungs te bzhag go/ dge slong dgags/ bcomaM/
ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhige lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams 'dan stod phyogs kyi nags kyi ngeshing tog go/ dge slong dag gis ji
ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mos rung bar bgyis la'o zhag dge slong dag gis ni len rung bar byas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsalal/ phung por lhungs la kha gsum mam bzhi'i sa reg par byas pas rung bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis rung bar byas nas/ dge 'dun dag la khrims pa dang lhag
sa dge slong rnams kyis dziltar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de dag kun nyes lanang du chu blugs te dar tshog sakyis tshogs la phyi dro'i skom du 'thung zhig/
dedagags phyi dro'i skom du khrims na/ 'on kyang lhagag nas// btsam ldan 'as kyis bka' stsalar/ bskol ti zhig la/ de phyidi nying skom du brimasashig/ gleng gzhi
ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dgunagyi dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ste/ gzhi gtar ba'i steng du ma lus pa dang/ gzhi gtar bdag ma rung par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsalal/ gzhi gtar ba'i stong du me ma bud bar zhugs lang gi steng du ma dus med// zhugs 'jig stong du bus pa dang dud bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
phyi rol tu zhugs lang gi nang du bus la dud pa med pa dang/ mdag malawa ri der spyod cig/ gleng gzhani mnyan du yod panaste/ bze bzhagi gas/
dge slong rnams la me mar gyi sdod bu mal ga gcig pa zhig byin pa dang/ de dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la mar me'i sdong po yal gtsage pa gruban bganang ngo// gang zag la yang gnang ngo// ya lag gnyis pa 'am/ yal ga mang po dag ni/ dge
sku 1'dun la gnangag/ gang zag lan ma gnang ngo// rkyang pa' sgo bzhi bo' mdo' tshegs su bcad b brgyad pa'o// mdoran glo bur gnyis po bya ba dang// chu klung pha rol/
gnyis po dang// mdu ma rung byas pa dang// lus tshad kyi ni chos gos sogo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dzata'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun ngaga'
ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dgatsase khagatsug lag khang du phyin pa dang/ gzhani gnas pa'i dge slong gis dag sor bcug go/ de dag nga la sos zin pa dang/ de dag gis
yod pa dag brkus te dengang// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ btsomaM ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ gang ngoma'i shes pa'i rnams ngal sor
tsal ba ma gzhug cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi shes par/ dal sor ma zhugagatsagi ces bka' stsal nas/ doshes ba zhig la sor bcug pa dang/ de'i phyi bzhi n du ngom shis pa'i dge slong zhig/
'ongs te/ dge slong de phyi la tu song ba dang/ des de'i lhung bzed dang tshos gos dag len pa la zhugs pa dang/ ga na gnas pa'i dge slong gis bsams pa/ 'din gdon mi za bar grogs po
zhig go snyam nas/ des de ma ba ga gnas des de khyer te bros so// phyis dge slong de san 'os nas lhung bzed dang chos gos mi snang nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag la lhung
bzed dang chos gos dag gsus khyer/ gzhi ni gnas pa'i dge slong gis sgras ba/ khyod kyi grogs pos khyeno// des smras l/ ngoshes pa ni med kyis/ nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyod kyis
bar gyis/ khyod kyis skyin pa byin cig/ de dang dge slong gzhan gnas pa dang lhan cig tuganageg la ga'i rtsod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkad nastsalapa/ blo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong la 'dasu zhabe ces dris shig/ de ste dge slong de nga ngo shes so zhes zer na/ dge slong de 'de ste khyod kyi lhung
bzedadang chos gos sam/ yang 'di ban zhes then sbyin nam ma sbyin zhes dris shig/ de ste ma sbyan cig cesaleganan thang bzhin du chodal 'obacag/ den+ta byin cig ces zer ba lasaM

khyeran len du 'dare/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'os pa gzhan zhig/ gzhan 'dug pa'i dge slong zhig gis ngal sor/ gdugazhan mnyan du yod pa na/ ]dgisogi ba[c]'os gar ge ga' re

ba bcug nas/ de'i phyi bzhin du ngo shes pa'i dge slong zhab/ 'os te/ ritsam na gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong de so shing de'i du phyi rol tu song ngo// de nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos shes dag des khyer ba
dang blo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag gis bsamasapa/ 'ad yang sngon khyim 'di na gnas pa zhig yin no snyam nas/ des kyang cung zad kyang ma smras nas/ de khyer te bros so// gzhin
gnas pa'i dge slong de sar 'os pa dang/ lhung bzed dang chos gos ma sna nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa pa'i lhung bzed dang chos shes sus khyer/ des smras pa// gnas khang na
'dug pas khyer ro// pa'i gnas khang na gnas pa gang yani/ khyed kyis lhungabazed dang chos gos khyeragyis skyin pa byin cig/ de dang de gnyis lhan 'go rtsod par gyuranas/ de ltar gyur pa dag
song dag gas/ btsam ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur du 'ongs pa 'dage slong gis/ gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong la dge slong 'di khyod
kyi cung zad tsa'ang rung slongan sbyani nam ma sbyin zhes drisashig/ de sta ma sbyanicig ces zeran ni thang bzhin du thob cig/ de sta byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad de/
gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge song zhig gis gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chos gos bzhag nas chems bzhag pa// de steng song 'og tu nga'i slob ma dag 'ongs te/ 'dod ces/
ther na byin cig ces smras nas song ngo// de'i slob ma zhig gis tshes gas khyer te bres so// de la dge slong des glangs pa dang/ phan tshun rtsod bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ste slob ma la byin cig ces zer na/ des khyer ba ni khyer rgyal du zad modakyi/ gtan tshigs yod na/
byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gtan tshigs yod na byin cage/ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gtan tshigs kun gyis shes shing grags par spying ste/ gzhan gyis thos nas brkus pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ste gtan tshigs smos shig/ de'ang gtan tshigs 'di 'dra par shes pa zhig 'ongs na de la byin cig ces sgo 'ge/ dge slong dag cig lam du
zhugs nas klung ga 'gram du phyin te/ dgru'i nang du zhugs pa dang/ de na dge slong gzhan zhig 'dug pa la/ gru'i nang du zhugs pas smras pa/ bdag ga tshang thur 'on tshur stsol cig ces
smras pa dang/ des tshang thur byon pa la zhugs pa las lhung ste chus khyer ba dang/ des smras pa/ kho bo'i tshang thur khyod kyis bar kyis/ khyod kyis skyon pa byin cig/ de gnyis rtsed par
bya// gyur pa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs sam zhes skyes la//
'angs so zhes be ran/ gdod byin cig/ de las gzhan du nan thang bzhin du tshod la bab tsami// yokhyad gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du sbyor cig// ji ltar klung bzhin du ri la 'dzeg ba dang/ 'obs
la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te lag tu sbyin/ lag tu 'ongos kyis tho zhes zer te btang ba las stor na ni stod du zad de// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod ba na ste/ gtsug
lag khang zhig na gtsug lag khang skyogs sgo rab tu ma bsdams nas/ rab tu ma brtags pas/ rkun po dag gis glags rnyed de brkus so// dge slong dag cig de'i sbyin pa na gtsug lag
gang skyong la dbab bo zhes 'phya'o// de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag bsdam pa ni rnam pa lnga
sta lnga gang zhe na/ rgya gtan dang/ sgo gtan dang/ 'khor lo dang/ sgo lcags dang/ lde mig kyog po dag go/ gal te de thams cad gatsug lag khang na yod la// gtsug lag khang
skyong gas bzhi na bcug la gcig ma bcugan cha ga tsag de la phob cig/ gsum bcug la gnyis ma bcug na sum gnyis de la phob cig/ gnyis banug la gsum ma bcug nasum cha de la phob

[d/]cig/ gcig banug la bzhi ma bcugan bzha che de laphob cig/ de ste thams cad ma bcug na ji tsam stor ba de thams cad de la lob cig/ de ste bsdam pa rnam pa lngas bsdams na stor ba na skyon du zad do/
gtsug lag khang na gtsug lag khang skyong la skyin pa ma dbab tsag/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgag gi tshes ges khru tshad du gyis shig ces bka' stsal na/ btsun pa khru thung la lus ring na de'ang tshos gos khru tshad du bgyi'am/ u pa ladi ni lus kyi tshad

du gyis shig/ gang lus lhung la khru ring na tsa de'ang lus kyi tshad du bgyi 'a ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ apa lalus thung la khru ring na de yang lus kyi tshad du gyis shig/ lus kyang che

la khru yaring na khru tshad du gyisang shig/ gzhan dun 'das pa dang bcas pa ste/ ji ltar bcas pa las lhag pa zhig rnyedan yang de la byin gyis ma brlab mod kyi/ 'on kyang rung ba la byin gyis brlabs/
terung ba byas na/ slob dpon nam/ mkhan po 'am/ mdza' bo'i yon par bsngos la spyod cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshogs su bcad pa dgu pa'o/ mdor na
sham thabs rjes su gnang ba dang// sham thabs 'theb kyang de bzhin te// stod chags mchod par bya ba dang// byin len ma byas de bzhin te// rdul dang rkyang pa bstan pa brjod//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dzitA ki tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag dpyid kyi dus la bab pas/ sham
thabs rnams rdzul gyis dris zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sham thabs kyi 'theb tshangs shig/ sbyar ma yang rul te dri ma zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dra/
kyis bka' stsal pa stod chags tshongs shig/ de'ang de bzhin du dri ma zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stod chags kyi 'theb bcang bar bya ste/ de'ang dus
dus su khrus shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyanadu yod pan ste/ dge slong rnams chos gos gyon te/ mchod pa'i las dag byed pas na/ de dag dridang/ phye ma dang/ 'bru mar dag
gis ma rung bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dri dag gis ma rung bar gyur pan khrus la gyon cig/ gang phye mas ma rung bar gyur pa ni sprugs la gyon cagi/ gang 'bru
[ ]mar gyis ma rung bar gyur pa lan snum 'dag pa gang yin pas khrus 'gyon cig/ gleng bzhin mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slong rnams gzan za ba las byin len ma byas par lhung bzed
du lhung nas/ the tsom skyes te ma bri ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// byin 'an byas la long zhig/ byin len byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// de'i
pa03/ than kar tsher lang ste boral/ the tsom dum byed par bo zhagi/ khu ba'i nang du lhung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ de yang than kor cher bod lazo'oge/ gang dge slong dag 'phos/
ba'atshongs gnang ba de ma 'phongs patshodi ltar m spyodatsag/ sbyang n 'das bdang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ rlung dang char ba dag bapanas/ lhung
bzed kyi nang du rdul song ste/ thatsom skyes nas ma zes/ gral na kha ba 'tsho yang de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong rnams rdul ni rnam pa 'di lnga ste/ rung ba'i rdul/
dang = ma rung ba'i rdul dang/ bzhag pa'i rdul dang/ ma bzhag pa'i rdul dang/ rdul gyi rdul dang lnga'o// gzhan yang rdul rnam pa lnga ste/ bza' ba'i rdul dang/ btung ba'i rdul dang/
gos kyi rdul dang/ me tog kha rduladang/ 'bras bu'adrel te/ mngon bar gsal ba med pas na de thams cad kyang rungab yin gyis/ the tsom dum byed par tho zhig/ rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i
mdo'atshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'o// skyong pa'i sgo rnams tshogs go/ dbam bo zhe bzhi pa// nangos padamigs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ midamigs pa/
zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes ba dmagi sa pa zhes bya'o// nos pa gzugs mchis pa zhes pa zhes bgyi 'am/ gzugs ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa ga/zugs yod/
pa zhes bya'o// nas pa bstan du mchis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa bstan du med pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa
bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ bar du thogs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa zag pa dang bcas
pa zhes bgyi 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'dus byas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ 'dus ma byas pa zhes bgyi/
gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'dus byas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'jig rten pa zhes bgyi 'am// 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// nongs
pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'an/ ma gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa bams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi nam/ khams
su ma gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa khams su gtogs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa bzung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ ma bzung ba zhes bgyi/ gsuTas pa// nyes pa ma gzung
kha zhes bya'o// nangs pa lung bstan pa zhes bgyi'am/ lung ma bstan pa zhes bgyi/ gsus pa/ nyes pa lung bstan pa zhes kyang bya/ lung ma bstan pa zhes kyang bya'o// lung bstan
[j]ba gang zhe na/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'da' bar byed pa/ni lung bstan pa'o// lung ma bstan pa gang de na/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas/
pa la ma bsams par 'das pa ni lung ma bstan pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'byung ba chen por lung bstan pa zhes bgyi 'am/ 'byung ba chen por lung ma bstan pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes nga
'byung ba chen por lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa kun tu sbyor ba zhes bgyi 'am/ mi sbyor ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// nongs pa bsgribs pa zhes bgyi
'am ma bsgribs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ nyon ma mongs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs// nyes pa nyon mongs pa
zhes kyang bya/ nyon ma mongs pa zhes kyang bya'o// nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa la/ bsams bzhin du 'dar 'di nyon mongs pa'o// nyonam mongs
pa gang zhe na/ gangs sa rgyus kyis bslab pa bcas pa ma bsams par 'da' ba 'di ni nyon ma mongs pa'o// nengs pa la zang zing dang bcas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ nongs pa zang zing ma mchis pa zhes
bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa la zang zing du bcas pa zhes bya'o// nangs pa chagasapa la gnas pa zhes bgyi 'am// 'byung ba la gnas pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa chags pa la gnas
ba zhes bya'o// nongs pa dgrar bcas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ dgraram bcas pa zhes bgyi/ gsus pa/ dgran bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa dmigs pa zhes bgyi
'am/ ma dmigs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ ma dmigs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa sems zhes bgyi 'am/ sems ma lags zhes bgyi/ gsus pa/ nyes pa sems ma yin pa zhes
bya'o/ nos pa rnam par smin pa zhes bgyi 'am/ rnam par ma sman pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya// ma smin pa zhes kyang bya'o// smin pa gang zhen/ gang sangs/
rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa las bsams bzhin du 'das pa 'dan sman ba zhes bya'o// ma smin pa gang zhin/ gangasangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcasapa las/ ma bsams par 'das pa ni ma/
smin pa'o// nongs pa las zhes bgyi 'am/ las ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs// nyes pa las zhes bya'o// nongs pa nang gi skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ phyi'
wI ached du gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// phyi'i skye mched du gtogs pa zhes khya'o// nongs pa sngar 'das pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ da ltar byung pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs
pa nyes pa sngar 'das pa zhes kyang bya/ ma 'ongs ba zhes kyang bya/ da ltar byung ba zhes kyang bya'o// sngar 'dasapa gang zhen/ nyes pa byung nas bshags shing sar byas pan nyis pa de las lang
pa ste/ de ni sngar 'das pa'o// ma 'ongs pa gang zhen/ nyes pa ma byung mod kyi/ sa par 'byung ba de ni/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya'o// da ltar byung ba gang zhin/ nyes pa byung ba de na de ltar gyi'o//
nangos pa dge ba zhes bgyi 'am/ ma dge ba zhes bgyi 'am/ lung du ma ston pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa// nyes pa ma dge bzhes kyang bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ ma dge ba gang
zhen gangasangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'das ba 'dan mo dgekha'o// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa la// ma bsams bzhin
'das pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// nongs pa 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs
pa zhes bgyi/ gsungasapa/ nyes pa 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa slob pa zhes bgyi 'am/ mi slob pa zhes bgyi 'am/ slob pa'i ng ma lags/ mi slob pa'i ng
ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ gsus pa/ nyes pa slob pa yang ma yin/ mi slob pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa mthong bas spang ba zhes bgyi 'am/ bsgomapas sbrang bu zhes bgyi/
gsus pa/ bsgom pas spang ba zhes bya'o// nongs pa lus las byung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ ngag las byung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ sems las byung ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa lus
las byung ba yang yod/ ngag las byung ba yang yod/ sems las byung ba yang yod de/ lus las byung ba gang zhen/ mi tshangs par spyod pa byed pa dang/ mkhyen par
tshe len pa dang/ mi'i 'tsho ba dang 'bral bar byed pa dang/ bsams bzhin khu ba 'byin pa dang/ lus kyis reg par byed pa dang/ rtswa sngon pogatsad pa dang/ phyi dro kha ba dang/ btung ba chang

'thung ba ni lus las byung ba'o// ngag las byung ba gang zhe na/ gang med la med bzhin du dkyil 'khor bla mar gyur pa 'chos su bdag nyid smra ba dang/ bud med de la nyes pa sbom po 'i tshig smra ba dang/
bud med kyi mdun du bdag gi las kyis kun spyad pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang/ bud med latshig lnga 'am drug las lhag par chos ston pa ste/ 'di ni ngag lasaphyung ba'o// sems las byung ba gang
zhen 'di lta ste/ dge slong gcig pu dgon pa na gnas ni/ de den gso sbyin la soms ma skyid/ tshig tu 'ang mas+sa/ de soms las byung ba'inyis pa mdagapa ste/ 'on kyang 'di
skad du smra'o// soms las byung ba'anyis ba dag med kyi/ 'on kyang 'din dge ba'i rtse bar sbyor ba'o// gang gi das po lasanongs par 'gyur ba de la brten te bgyisin/ dngos po de nyid la
! zhun ha bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ dngos po de nyid la brten te byas na/ nyes bar 'gyur ba yang yod/ dngos po de nyid la brten te byas na/ nyes par//
ma 'gyur ba yod do// das bod la bstun te byas na/ nyes par 'gyur ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong brtan pa ma btabang tshos shes ci 'dod pa 'chang ste/ sbyar ma med par grong du 'jug
pa dang/ mgron du ma bos par grodadu 'jug pa dang/ 'dusangashing la ba dang/ yang yang za ban nyis pa'o// gang das po de nyid la brten te byas kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ 'di
sta dge slong brtan pabating la/ chos gos cha 'dedab 'chang ste/ sbyar ma med par grod du 'jug pa dang/ mgron dum bos par grong du 'jug pa dang/ yang yang za bdang/ 'dusangashade za ba
la nyes pa med do// de ltar na dngos po ba gang la brten te byas nas nyes par 'gyur pa'i de ngos po de nyid la brten te byas kyang/ nyes par ma 'gyur ro// las bgyis na nongs par 'gyur ba'i las de
nyid bgyis kyang nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs la/ las byas na nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas pa las nyes par mi 'gyur ba'ang yod do// las gang byas pa las nyes par 'gyur
ba'i las de nyid byas kyang nyos por 'gyur ba gang zhen/ dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang/ sur las mi byed pa dang/ sdigang la lta ba ma gtong sta spangs pa las/
dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol/ spu snyol bar byed pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'byin na nyes par 'gyur ro// las de nyid byas la nyes par ma 'gyur ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong
rnams kyis dge slongam mthong ngozhes spangs pa dang/ sa las ma byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta bamagatongab sbas pa las/ de nyid kyis dge slong rnams 'byung bar/

gsol spu snyol bar byed ba thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston pa de mtshams kyi nang du byung na nyes pa med do// de ltar n gang las byas pa las nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas kyang nyes ba med
sbyo dong las de 'di 'tshal kyang nongs par yang 'gyur la// las de nyid 'tshal lanongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs// las de shes 'anyes par 'gyur ba dang/ las de nyid
shes la nyes par ma 'gyur ba mod de// ji lta na las gang 'tshal lanongs par 'gyur la/ las de nyid 'tshal lanongs par ma 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge
song ma mthong ngo zhes spangs pa dang/ slar las ma byidapa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba ma gtong ra sa spang ba de dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol/ spu snyol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag
'tshal bar ston/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu phyung nas/ dge slong rnams de la 'dus bar byed/ lhan cig gnas/ gnas khang gcig na lhan cig nyal bar byed pa dang/ dge slong gzhan
bags smras pa/ kyetshodang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di dge 'dun 'dus pas/ chos bzhanim mthong pozhes sbangasan/ dge slong de la dge slong rnams rjes su 'jug gam zhes smras pa dang
de dag 'di skud ces de ni bden te/ dge slong 'di'i 'byung bar gsol/ spu snyol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston nas phyung ngo// gang du mtshams kyi phyi ril bu 'o zhis sbya ngan nyis
ba byung ba'o// 'di ltar yang dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes sbyangs pa dang/ slar las mi byed pa dang/ sdug po la lta ba slar mi gtong nas sbyangs te/ dge slong rnams
la 'byung ba la gsol/ spu snyol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston nas mtshams kyi nang du phyungato/ de la dge slong rnams de dang 'dus par byed/ lhan cagi gnas
gnas khong gcig na nyal bar byed d/ dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa// kyitshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di na dge 'dun 'dus pas chos bzhin ma mthong ngo zhes nas sbyangs nas/ dge
slong rnams dge slong de 'a rjes 'jug la ma zhes smras pa dang/ dadag 'di skad du smra'o// den bden ti dge slong 'di la 'byung bur gsol/ spu snyol bar byed/ thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal
bar ston nas phyung ngo// gang du mtshams kyi nang du'o zhes zer na nyes pa med pa'o// de ltar na las shes 'anyes par 'gyur ba dang/ las de nyid shes la nyes par mi 'gyur ba'o// bdag
ga yi dam las nongs pa dang/ gzhan gyi yi dam las nangs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa// bdag ke ya dam las nyes pa dang/ gzhan gyi yi dam las nyes par 'gyur ba yod/
gdongo ji ltar na bdag ga yi dam lasanongs pa gang lags/ de'adi ltar dgi slogs nyis pa'i bung bo lnga ni nas gang yang rung ba'inyisapa byung nas rang nyid kyis zhes pa
ni nyes pa'o// gzhan gyi 'dam las nongs pa gang lags/ ji ltar lang dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung bo lnga zhing nas/ gang yang ruba'i nyes pa byung ba las/ dad pa'i dge bsnyen gyi tshig
bzhin nyis ba de chos bzhin du byed pa'o// de ltar rang gi yi dam las nyes pa dang/ gzhan gyi la des las nyes kha'o// dran las nongs par 'gyur ba dang/ mi dranapalasanangs par
'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ yod// de ltar n dran pa las nongs pa gang lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong nyes ba'i bung po lnga'i nang nas/ gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung badran
ba de ni dran pa'i nyis pa'o// ji ltagan madrinapa la nongs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong nyis pa'i phung po lnga ba nang nas/ gang yang rung nyes pa byung ba de mi dran te/ des cung zad mi dran
[ ]du ban kyang de nyis par 'gyur ro/ de ltar dranan yang nyes pa/ madrinakyang nyes pa'o// mngon sum du gyur b.lasanongs pa dang/ mngon sumadu mgyur pa las nongs pa mchis sam/
[P ]gsungs pa/ yodado// Na ltar na mngon sum du gyur pa las nongs pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong gse nyes pa'i phung bo lnga'ani nas gang yang rung ba nyes pa byung ba de ni mngon sum du gyur
[ba'i nyis pa'o// ji ltar na mngon sum dus gyur pa'i sa ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slongags nyes pa'i bang po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung/ nyes pa ma byung yang byung bar gdon mi za ba'o//
de lta bu n mngon sum du ma gyur kyang nyes pa dang mngon sum du gyur kyang nyes pa'o// dngos po gang gis ma gnas pa dang/ dngos po de nyid kyis so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsus
pa yod do// de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo shes nas smras pa dang/ slar las byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba sar ma gtong ste/ sbyangs pa de ni dngos po gang gis
sa gnas pa dang/ das po de nyid so sor gnas ba'o// las gang bgyis pas ma bo gnas pa dang/ las de nyid bgyis pas so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa//
las gang byas pas ma gnas pa dang/ las de nyid byas pas so sor gnas pa yod do// ji ltan las khad byas pas mi gnas shing/ las de nyid byas pas so sor gnas pa'i/gas
de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong de ma mthong ngo zhes sbas pa dang/ slar las mi byed pa dang/ sngagi ga bal lta ba slar mi gtong nas/ sbas pa de lta bu ni las gang byas pas/ mi
gnas ba las de nyid byas kyang so sor gnas pa'o// las gang 'tshal na/ mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ las de nyid 'tshalan so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa//
las gang shesanas gnas pa dang/ las de nyid nas kyang so sor b gnas par 'gyur ba yod do// ji lta las gang 'tshal kyang mi gnas pa dang/ las de nyid
'tshal ba so sor la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de'adi ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong la ma mthong zhisanas spangs pa dang/ skaralas med pa dang/ sdig pa la lhab ma sbyangs
bde lta bu ni las bag dngashes kyang ma gnas pa dang/ las de nyid shes kyang so sor gnas pa'o// rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang/ rang gi yi dam gyis so sor kha nas par 'gyur ba mchis
nga tsha sam/ gsus pa/ rang yi dam gyis sa gnas ba dang/ rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod do// jaltar na rang g.yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang/ rang gi yid magyis
so so'i gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de 'ad ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong ma mthong zhes pa'i pa'i sbyangs pa dang/ slar las ma khyed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong
bas smras ba de lta bu na rag yi dam gyisam gnas pa dang/ rang gi yadim gyis so sor gnas pago/ gzhan gyi yi dam las ma gnas pa dang/ gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas
! bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhan kyi yi dam las mi gnas pa dang/ gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas pa yod de// jiltar na gzhan gyi yi dam las mi gnas pa/
07 dang/ gzhan gyi yi dam pas so sor gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge bsnyen dad pa 'tshog bzhin dge slong de ma ma shong ngo zhes nas sbyangs pa dang/ slar las mi
byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta bskur mi gtong ba 'a'i phyir smras pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi yi dam las la gnas pa dang/ gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas pa'o// dran kyang mi gnas pa dang/
dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal ba/ dran kyang gnas pa dang/ dran kyang so sor gnas pa yod do// ji ltar na dran kyang mi gnas pa dang/ dran kyang
so so la gnas par 'gyug pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngozhis nas yas pa dang/ slar bsam byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir
spangs pa de lta bu ni dran kyang sa gnas pa dang/ dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba'o// mi dran kyang ma gnas pa dang/ mi dranakyang so sor gnas par gyur pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal
ba mi dran kyang mi gnas pa dang rnam dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong zhinas spangasapa dang/ slar las ma byed pa dang
sdig pa la lta bsar mi gtong pa'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni mi dran kyang mi gnas pa dang/ ma dran kyang so sor gnas pa'o// mngon sum du gyur pa la ma gnas pa dang/ mngon sum du gyur pa/
[s]@#/ la so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ mno sumadu gyur pa la mi ga gnas pa dang/ mngon sum du gyur pa la so sor gnas pa yang yod do//
ji ltar na mngon sum du gyur ba las mi gnas pa la sogs pa lags/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slongs sam mthong zhes nas/ slar las mi byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba mi gtong
ba'i phyir ngas pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du gyur pa las mi gnas pa dang/ mngon sum du gyur ba las so sor gnas ba'o// mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mi gnas/ mngon sum du ma gyur kyang
sa so sor gnas pa mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ yodad// ji ltar na mngon sum du ma gyur kyang gnas pa dang/ mngon sum du ma gyur kyang so sor gnas pa lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong
'tsho rnams kyis dge slong gis ma mthong zhes nas sbyangs pa dang/ slar 'asam byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba sar ma gtong ba'i phyi'i sbas pa de lta bu n mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mi gnas pa dang/
ny+tsA mngon sum du ma gyur kyang so sor gnas pa'o// dngos po gang gi phyi'i dge 'dun gyis las bgyi ba dngos po mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis bgyi ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/
dngos po gang gi phyir dge 'dun gyis las bgyi ba'i dngos po desang bo 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis bya ba yang yodado// ji ltar na dngos po gcig gis dge 'dun gyis las bgyi ba'i dngos
tsha0/ bod nang bo'am/ gnyis sam/ gtsagi gas bgyi bar 'gyur ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong la phyag 'tshal bcas pa dang/ gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang/ longs
spyod mig gi bar bcasanas bskos te/ de lta bu'i dngos bo gang gi phyir dge 'dun gyis las byas ba'i dngos po de mang po ma/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang bya ba'o// las gang dge
'dun gyi 'dus su bgyi ba 'di las de mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig ba mes kyang de bzhinamachas sam/ gsus pa/ yod de// ji ltar snga ma bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis dge slong la phyag
'tshal bar bcas pa dang/ gtam ma smra par bcas pa dang/ longs spyod mi gnas par bcas nas bskos te/ de ltar na las gang dge 'dun gyis las gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bya
ba'i las su bya ba de mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gtsagags kyang de bzhinan// lasa'atshalabazhin du dge 'dun gyis bgyid pa'i las de nyida'atshalan/ gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin
mchis sam/ gsus pa/ las gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i las de nyid shes kyang mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis bya ba yang yodado// ji ltar na las 'tshal
bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bgyid pa'i las de nyid 'tshalan mang bo'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gsabagyi ba lags/ de 'diltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag ma'atshalabar bcasapa
[7 ]@#// dang gtam mi smra bar bcas ba dang/ longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas/ bskos pa de lta bu ni gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis khyaba'i las de nyid shes kyang mang
bo a/ gnyis sam gcig gas kyang de bzhin no rag yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las mdzad nA/ rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gas de bzhin du 'gyur
ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa// rang gi yi dam bzhin dam 'dun las byed n 'ang/ rang yi dam bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcagi gas bya ba yang yod do// ji ltar n rang gi
yidam bzhin dge 'dun las ma mdzad na/ rangag yid m bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis bgyi ba lags/ de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang/
gtam ma smra par bcas pa dang/ longs spyod ga gtsag par bcas nas/ bskos pade lta bu ni rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las khyed na'ang/ rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po 'am/ gnyis
sam/ gcig gis kyang de bzhin no// gzhan gyi yi dam gyis kyang dge 'dun gyis las mdzad na/ gzhan gyi yi dam gyis mang po 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig bas kyang de bzhin du bgyi
bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ yod do// de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang/ gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang/ longs spyod mi
00 gtsag par bcasanas/ bskos pa de lta bu ni ba/zhan gyi yi dam gyis kyang dge 'dun gyis las khyed na/ gzhan gyi yi dam gyis mang bo 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang snga mabazhin no// dran
bzhin du'ang dge 'dun gyis las mdzad na/ dranabazhin du'i nga mang bo 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur bamachis sam/ bka' stsal pa// dran bzhin du'ang dge 'dun
gyis las byed na'ang/ dran bzhin du'ang mang bo'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag ma bya bar bcas/
pa dang/ gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang/ longs spyod ma le gcig par bcasanas/ paskos pa de lta bu nudran bzhin du yang dge 'dun gyis las byed nA/ dran bzhin du'ang mang po 'am//

no mngon sum du gyur kyang dge 'dun gyis las mdzad na/ mngon sum du gyur kyang mang bo 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ gsungs//

gyi dge 'dun ni bya bar ma gyur te/ de ltar dge 'dun 'khrugs la phye bar ma gyur pa'o// dge 'dun phyi la 'khrugs par gyur pa gzhen/ 'di ltar dge 'dun bye bar yang gyur te/ bye bar
ba byed pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi po yang shin tu rung bar byas shing bzung pa na/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun 'khrugs pa yin no// dge 'dun 'khrugs pa'i ng ma yal/ dge dun bye ba'ang
ma yin pa gang zhen/ rnam pa 'di rnams ma gtogs pa'o// gang dge 'dun bya ba de thams cad dge 'dun thadad pa zhes bgyi 'am/ gang dge 'dun thadad pa de thams cad bye ba zhes bgyi 'am/
dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad pa'i ng ma yin pa'i ng yod/ dge 'dun tha dad la dge 'dun ma bye ba yang yod/ dge 'dun bye ba'ang yin la dge 'dun tha dad par gyur pa'i ng yod/ dge 'dun
bye ba ya a yan la dge 'dun thadadapar ma gyur pa yang yod de// dge 'dun phye la dge 'dun tha dadapar mgyur pa gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar dge 'dun bye bar ni gyur la/ dge 'dun gnyis
tha dad du ma gnas// don gyis mkhye/ mtshams kyis ma bye/ rnyed pa la mkhye/ bsal ma bye bani/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad du gyur pa ma yin no// dge 'dun tha dad la dge
'dun bye ba ma yin pa gang zhen/ de'adi ltar dge 'dun gnyis tha dad du gnas// don gyisabye/ mtshams kyis khye/ rnyed pa la bye/ zas la bye ba de ni dge 'dun gnyis tha dad du gyur la/
dge 'dun ma phye ba de ni dge 'dun thadadal dge 'dun bye ba ma yin pa'o// dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun thadadapa gang zhen/ de 'di ltar dge 'dun yang bye bar gyur la/ dge 'dun gnyis tha
dad du gnas/ don gyis bya/ mtshams kyis bye/ rnyedapa la bye/ zas la byibaden/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun gnyis tha dad du gnas par gyur pa 'di ni/
la dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad du gyur pa yin no// dge 'dun bye ba yang ma yin/ dge 'dun tha dad pa yang ma yin pa gang zhen/ rnam pa 'di dag la ma gtogs pa'o// gang dge 'dun bye
ba de thams cad dge 'dun tha dad du gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/ gang dge 'dunatha dad par gnas pa de thams cad dge 'dun bye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad du mi gnas pa/
yang yod/ dge 'dun tha dad du gnas la dge 'dun ma bye ba yang yod/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par gnas pa yang yod/ dge 'dun mkhye la dge 'dun tha dad du ma gnas pa yang
'a yod do// dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun thadad par mi gnas pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun de dag bya bar gyurakyang/ dge 'dun gnyis tha dad du mi gnas pa yin te/ don gyis tha dad//
mtshams kyis tha dad/ rnyed pas tha dad/ zas kyis tha dad pa ma yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun byil dge 'dun tha dad du ma gnas pa'o// dge 'dun thadad par gnas la dge 'dun ma bye ba gang
! zhen de'adi ltar dge 'dun gnyis thadad du gyur te/ don gyis thadad/ mtshamasakyis thadad/ rnyed pas thadad/ zas la thadad pa de ni dge 'dun gnyis tha dad par gnas kyang ma/
khyi ba ste/ den dge 'dun tha dad par gnas la dge 'dun ma bye ba'o// dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par gnas pa gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar dge 'dun bye bar gyur/ dge 'dun gnyis tha
dad du gnas par gyur to/ don la tha dad/ mtshamasu 'a tha dad/ rnyed pa la thadang/ bras la tha dad pa de ni dge 'dun bye la tha dad par gnas pa'o// dge 'dun ma bye la dge 'dun thadad
du gnas pa'i ng ma yin pa gang zhe na/ de'adi ltar rnam pa 'di dag ma gtogs pa'o// dge 'dun gyi 'byed pa de dag thams cad bskal par mchis pa lags sam/ gang bskal par mchis pa/
thams cad dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa lags sam zhes gsol pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la bskul par ma gnas pa'i ng yod/ bskal par gnas la dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas
pa'od yod/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la bskal par gnas pa'i ng yod do// dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang mi byed l bskal par mi gnas pa yang yodado// dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas
la bskal par ma gnas pa dang shin/ gang gis ches bzhin du 'du shes pas dge 'dun phye bar gyur pa den dge 'dun phyi la bskal par ma gnas pa'o// bskal par gnas la dge 'dun
ma bya ba gang zhen/ klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po shin tu gnas pa dang/ klu'i rgyal bo yid du 'ong ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo dang/ la ba
can dang/ rta babs dang/ gshin rje'i rgyal po dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang/ 'di dag ni bskal par gnas pa ste/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas so//
dge 'dun 'byed pa'i ng yin la bskal par gnas pa gang zhe na/ lha sbyin yin// 'di ni dge 'dun 'byed pa'i ng yin bskal par gnas pa'i ng yin no// dge 'dun 'byed pa
yangs yan la bskal bar gnas pa yang ma yin pa gang zhen/ rnam pa 'di dug ma gtogs pa'o// gang cung zad dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa de thams cad bskal par gnas pa kho na ma
thobar 'gyur ma/ gang bskal par gnas pa'i khan ma thobar 'gyur pa de thams cad dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la bskal par gnas pa'i kha na
mtho bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod de// bskal par gnas pa'i kha nam thobar 'gyuraladage 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas pa yang yod/ dge 'dun yang 'byed 'bashalapar gnas pa'i kha na ma tho
Sh+Tha bar 'gyur ba yang yod/ dge 'dun yang ma bye labaskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma the bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod do// dge 'dun phye la bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho bor ma 'gyur ba gang
zhen gang gis chos bzhin du 'du shes pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur pa 'di na dge 'dun phye ba yin la/ bskal par gnas pa'i lan ma thebar mi 'gyur ba'o// bskal par gnas pa'i kha
tsa na ma thobar 'gyur la dge 'dun ma phyi ba gang zhen/ klu'i rgyal bo shugs ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po shin tu gnas pa dang/ klu 'a rgyal po yid du 'ong ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo
dang klu'i rgyal po bsnyen dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po la ba tsan dang/ klu'i rgyal po rta bzangs dang/ 'di dag ni bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho bar 'gyur la dge 'dun ma phye
ba'o dgo 'dun yang 'byed la bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho bar 'gyur ba ni lha sbyin te/ 'dis dge 'dun yang phyi la bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho bar yang 'gyur ro// dge 'dun
'byed pa yang ma yin la bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho bar yang ma 'gyur bgang zhan/ rnam pa 'di dag ma gtogs pa'o// gags dge 'dun bye ba de thams cad log par nges pa lags
sam/ lag par nges pa de thams cad dge 'dun 'byed pa lags/ gsungs pa// dge 'dun 'byed par byed log par ma nges pa lta ngayod/ leg par nges la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa
yod dge 'dun 'byed leg par nges pa yang yod/ dge 'dun yang ma 'byed la log par ma nges pa yang yod de// dge 'dun 'byed la log par ma nges pa gang zhe na/ gang gis chos
bzhin du 'du shes bzhin dge 'dun phye bar gyur pa de ni/ dge 'dun 'byed par bgyid la log par ma nges pa'o// log par nges la dge 'dun ma 'byed pa gang zhe na/ pha gsod pa dang//
[rs ]@#// ma gsod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba de dag na log par nges la dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byed pa'o/
dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la 'og par yang nges pa gang zhi na/ lha sbyin yin te/ dge 'dun yang phyo la log par yang nges pago/ dge 'dun phye ba yang ma yin la log par ma nges pakhang
zhen de rnams ma gtogs pa'o// gang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa de thams cad ma mkhas ba ma lags la/ ma mkhas pas smras pa ma lags sam/ gang mi mkhas la mi mkhas par
zla bde thams cad dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa lags sam/ gsungs pa// dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed la ma mkhas ba ma yin la/ mi mkhas pas smra ba ma yin pa yang yod/ mi mkhas
mi mkhas pa sna zhing/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen du ma 'gyur ba yang yod/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas shing mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smra ba yang yod/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang m byas la
ma mkhas pa yang ma yin la/ mi mkhas par smra ba ma yin pa yang yod/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la mi mkhas pa yang ma yin mamakhas par smra ba yang ma yin pa gang zhen/ gang gis chos
bzhin du 'du shes bzhin dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas par gyur na/ de lta bu n dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas// mi mkhas pa yang ma yin/ mi mkhas par smra ba yang ma yin pa'o// mi mkhas
la mi mkhas par stsa yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ ston pa drug por yi dam bcas pa ste/ denagi mkhas la mi mkhas par smras kyang dge 'dun gyi dpenadu mi 'gyur ba'o// dge 'dun
gyid byin yang byas la ma mkhas la mi mkhas par sgrub gang zhe na/ lha sbyin yin// de ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la mimakhas la mi mkhas par smra ba'o// dge 'dun gyi dbyenayang mkhyas la
sa mkhas pa yang ma yin ma mkhas par smra ba yang ma yin pa gang zhe na/ de rnams ma gtogs pa'o// btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong gi dge 'dun dbyen du 'gyur ram/ 'on tedage slong ma 'am/
dge slob ma'am/ dge tshul pha 'am/ dge tshul mas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ dge slong gsi dge 'dun gyi dbyen du'agyur gyi/ dge slongs/
'am dge slob ma 'am/ dge tshul pha nas/ dge tshul mas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong ma dge 'dunama'i dbyenadu 'gyuram/ na te dge slong ma/ dge
slob ma 'am/ dge tshul ba'am/ dge tshulams/ dge slong ma' dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'alcapa/ dad sogs dge 'dun gyi dbyenadu 'gyuragyi/
dge slong ngam/ dge slob ma'am/ dge tshulapa'i m/ dge tshul mas/ dge slongasa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyenadu mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge 'dun phye ba dang ldan nam/ 'on te khan ma
wa @#// tho po dang ldan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge 'dun lan gyi bdang ldan/ 'byed pa'i gang zag lan kha na ma tho ba dang ldan/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen
bgyisan nongs pa ci 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsalar// nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge 'dun phyonanongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal
ba nyis pa sbom po 'o// gang nye bar phyogs pa de thams cad mi gnas pa 'am/ de ste gang mi gnas pa de thams cad nye bar phyogasar lags/ nye bar phyogs pal m gnas pa ma yin pa
yang yod/ ma gnas la nye bar ma phyogs ba'ang yod/ nye bar phyogs la mkho/nas par 'gyur ba'ang yod/ nyalar yang ma phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yod do// nye bar phyogs la mgas
pa ma yin pa gang zhen/ gang gis dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur cing/ nyes pa rnam pa bzhi bo las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar ma gyur pa de ni nye bar phyogs pa ste/ mi gnas par
Sh+Tha 'gyur ba ma yin no// ma gnas par 'gyur lanye bar phyogs pa ma yin pa gang zhen/ gang gis nyes pa bzhi las gang yang ru nyos pa ni byung bar gyur gyi/ dngos po lnga la khas blangs par
mgyur pa de ni mi gnas pa ste/ nye bar phyogs pa ma yin no// nye bar phyogs la mi gnas par 'gyur bgang zhen/ dngos po lnga khas blangs par gyur cing/ nyes pa bzhi las gang yang
pha rung nyes pa byung ba ni nye bar phyogs la mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba'o// nye bar ma phyogs la mi gnas par yang mi 'gyur ba gang zhin/ rnam pa de rnams ma gtogs pa'o// gang gnas pa de thamA/
cad so sor gnas pa lags sam/ gang so sor gnas pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/ mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ so sora gnas la ma gnas pa ma yin
ba yang yod/ sa gnas pa yin la so sor gnas pa yang yod/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa 'ad yod de// mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa gang zhen/ de 'di
ltar nyes pa rnam pa bzhi las gang yang rung byung bar n gyi/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong ba'i phyir sbyangs pa dang/ slar las ma byed pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba slar m btang bas spangs par ma gyur
bde ni mi gnas pa ste/ so sor gnas pa ni ma yin no// so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa gang zhen/ de 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis ma mthong ba'i phyir sbas pa dang/ sa las mi byed
pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba sur ma btang nas sbyangs pa ni gyur gyi/ nyis ba 'an las gang yang rung ba nyes laram gyur bden so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa'o// mi gnas pa yod
yin la so sor gnas pa gang zhe na/ nyes ba bzhi las gang yang rung nyes pa yang byung ba'agyur ma mthong ba'iphyir spangs pa dang/ saralasam khyedapa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba sar ma btang
wa @#// nam sngangs par yang gyur la/ nyes pa bzhi las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar gyur na de na gnas la so sor gnas pa'o// mi gnas pa yang ma yin la so sor gnas
par ya ngam 'a gyur ba gang zhin/ de rnams ma gtogs pa ste/ de rnams ma gtogs pa ni gnas pa dang so sor gnas pa ma yin no// gang gis spung bar bgyi bde bskur ba zhes kyang bgyi 'am/
gsungasapa/ gang gis spangs pa de bskur ba yang de nyid de/las gang ga/dado bo gang lags/nyes pa 'byin par khyed lasas// bshags bani dngos po'o/ bstan pan gang lags/ brtan pa
'a gding ba ni sog logs/ brtan pa dbyung ba na gang lags/ ul la gos de'i ming ni brtan pa zhes bya'o// de sems bskyed pa ni brtan pa bting ba'o// rnam pa brgyad du bsams pa ni brtan
ba phyung ba'o// dge slong ma lags par nos pa byung la/ dge slong du gyuran tshangs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod de/ ji ltar dge slong ma
byung la/ dge slong du gyuran tshangs par 'gyur yin/ 'di ltar dge slong ma'i tshithun mong ma yin pa 'dage 'dun lhag ma'i nyes pa byung pa las de mtsha'aphos te/ mtshan 'bogs

nas dge slong pa'i nang du 'ongs na nyes pa tshangs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar na dge slong gi nongs pa khyung la/ dge slong ma lags pa'i tshitshangs pa zhes bgyi/ de' ltar dge song gi tshe ma 'dra ba dge//

[4/ ]'dun gyi lhag ma nyis ba khyung ba las de mtshan 'bos te/ mtshan 'thos nas dge slong mar gyur na de nyes pa tshangs pa zhes bya'o// ma 'tshal bzhin du nangs pa byung la 'tshal bzhin du tshangs par 'gyur
ba mchis sam/ 'tshal bzhin dunongs pa byung la ma 'tshal bzhin du tshud par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yod de/ ji ltar me shes bzhin du nyes pa byung la
shes bzhin tshangs bar 'gyur zhe na/ de 'di ltar dge slong gnyid kyis lag pa las bteg ste mal stan chen po mthon po'i steng du bzhag pa'o// yang na gnyid kyis log pa las bud med kyi mal du
bzhag pa'o// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa phyir byung stanyal pa dang/ de 'og tu bsen par ma rdzogs pa de slar 'ongs te 'dug nas/ bdag sang nas nyes pa de nyid ji ltar chos bzhin par slar byed

ba de ni/ slar mi shes bzhin du nyes pa byung steshis nas tshangs par gyur pa'o// shes bzhin du nyes pa byung la ma shes ba zhani du tshangs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar dge slong dge 'dun gyi
lhag ma'anyis pa byung ste/ de dbyung bar las kyi tshig rnams byed de gsol pakhas pa dang/ de dag gnyid kyis log nas las kyi tshig gsum mjug tu phyin pa dang/ langs pa de lta bu ni/
shes bzhin du nyes pa byung la mingashes bzhin tshangs par gyur pa'o// gnyid log patsho nongs pa byung lasadapa'i tshitshangs par 'gyur pa mchis sam/ sadapa'i tshonongs pa byung la gnying
bla// log pa'i tshotshangs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yod de/ gnyid log pa'i tshinyes pa byupal sad pa'i tshotshangs par gyur
ba gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar dge slong gnyid kyis phog pa las mal stan mthon po mal stan chen po'i stang du bteg ste bzhag pa dang/ yang ganyid kyis log pa las bud med kyi mal du bzhag pa dang

t+tA bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa phyir phyung ste nyal ba'i 'og tu bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa de slar 'ongs te ' gnas / bdag sang nas nyes pa 'di nyid ji ltar mos bzhin slar khyedapa de ni/ gnyid leg bzhiganyis/
ba byung la sad nas tshangs par gyur pa'o// sad bzhin du nyes pa byung la gnyid log bani tshangs bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dge slong dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nyis pa byung ste/ de 'byung bar
ts+tshA las kyi tshig rnams byed de gsol ba byas pa dang/ de gnyid kyis log gnas las kyi tshig gsum majug tu phyin pa dang/ langs pade lta bu ni sad bzhin zhes pa byung la gnyid log bzhin tshangs
par gyur ba'o// dge slong gis gtsamig smras pa mjug tu phyin na/ des pas pham pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyisakhaka'i stsal// yod de/ de 'di

kyi ltar dge slong gis dge slong ma dang lhan cig tu 'di skad du/ gangagi tsho mthong ban khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba rdzas rin thang che ba zhige ma byin par blangs pa dang/ mi 'tshob dang bralab dang/ ngas dag
bcom pa yang thob par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig/ de thams cad dge slong mas tshig gcig rdzogs par smras na/ pas pham pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldand/
kyis bka' stsal pa/ yod de/ de ltar dge slong ma zhig dge slong mdang lhan cig 'di skadadu/ gang gi tsho khyod kho mo mthong ban khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba las rdzas shig ma byin par blangs/
ma 'tsho ba dang bral ba dang/ 'di zhes pa'i rjes phyogs pa dang kho bos dgra bcom pa thob pa de ltar shes par byos shig/ dge slong gnas pa/cig na mchis bzhin du nongs pa'i dang po lnga
'byungab mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod/ ston pa'i chos gos kyi tshad tsam spyad na nyes byas su 'gyur/ bslab pa'i sdom pa bcas pa grong nas rang gi lag
gisaM bza' ba dang bca' ba rlus n so sor bshags par 'gyur ro// bud med la tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par chos bstanan ltung ba'o// bud med la gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras na dge
'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// med la kun tu med bzhinadu ma las bla mar gyur pa'i chos pa dag nyid kyis snusan phas pham par 'gyur ro// dge slong sbyor ba gcig gis nongs pa brgya 'am/ stong
a de bas kyang mang du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong zhig 'tshig/ khros/ tshig pa zos te yid 'khrugs nas/
skye ba mang bo 'dus shing 'khod pa la sran ma spar ba gang dag phyi sar ba gang yang rung des gton/ des ji snyad phog pa de snyed kyi nyes par 'gyur ro// dge slong
zhig gis rdzas rin thang che ba zhabag gnas nas gnas su bskyod kyang phas pham par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ yod de/ mi ma yin pa'i rdzas na
ts+tshA thang che ba 'am/ de lta ma na ltar mi chog pago/ dge slong gis mngasha gsum brkusan pas pham par 'gyur ba mchisasam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yod de/ ma kan
thang che bar gyur pa'o// dge slong gsamang sha lnga brkus kyang phas pham par ma 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ yod de/ kasha pa Na rin thang chung brnagyur
pa'o chung du zhug ma byin par blangs pas nongs par 'gyur bdang/ chung du de nyid ma byin par blangs pas nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
ts+tsA yod de/ shog bal las chung du blangs na nyes par 'gyur ro// khal nag po las chung du blangasan nyes par ma 'gyur ro// mnyam par 'gyur ba las lhag par bgyis kyang nos par 'gyur ba
dang/ mnyam par bgyi ba las lhag par bgyis te nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yod de/ nag po mnyam par bya ba las lhag par byas na/
tsa nyes par 'gyur/ shog bal mnyam par bya ba las lhag pa'i a pa la nyes par ma 'gyur ro// bgyi ba las ma bgyis te'os par 'gyur ba dang/ bgyis te nongs par ma 'gyur ba mchis sam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod de/ gos sar pa rnyed pa'i dge slong gis kha dog bsgyur ba gsum las gang yang rung/ kha dog bsgyur ba ma byas nanyes pa'o// de ltar byas n nyes
pa med de// tshad bgyis na nongs par 'gyur ba dang/ tshad bzhin bgyis na nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
tshes gos kyi tshad du bgyisan nyes par 'gyur te// dkyil 'a khor gyi tshad du bgyis na nyes par 'gyuro// dngos po gang gis bsam gtanadang po la snyoms par zhugs na/ dge 'dunagyi lhag
bar 'gyur ba'i das po de nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs n ]dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalar// yod de/ 'di ltar dage slong desabasam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ban/ bdag gi khang pa rtsi sogs shig cesabasgo nas/ de skabasgom thag tu bsam gtan
dang po la snyoms par zhugs// debasam gtanadang la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tsho khang pa yang banapar gyuran/ de la dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro// de'i dngos po de nyid kyi phyir bsam
gtan gnyis ba dang/ gsum ba dang/ bzhi la snyoms par 'jug ban/ desanga'i khang pa rtsigasashig ces bsgo ste/ bsgyu ma thag tu bsam gtan gnyis
bdang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa lasnyoms par zhugs te/ de bsam gtan bzhi pa lasnyoms par zhugs pa dang/ khong pa yang brin par gyuran/ dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro//
dge slong gas gang na yang nongs pa ma bgyis la/ chung dun nyes byas tsam yang ma bgyisan/ dge slong du mi rung ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod de/ mtshan 'apos
par gyur pago/ dge slong mas gang na yang nongs pa ma bgyis la/ chung du ni smad g.yogs ted pa las brlabs te bgo kha tsam yang ma bgyis par dge slong mar mi rung ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ yod de/ mtshan 'a sa pa'o// dge slong gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs la/ de nyid kyin ng na chos gos 'dug bzhin dbur zhig pa zhes kyang bgyi/ chos gos
dang bral ba zhes kyang bgyi/ yi dam las 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod de/ de'ang ltar dge slong dbyar tshu'adu zhugs r
pas/ tha ma'i bdun po la babaste/ byin gyis ma brlabs par chos gos kyang khri'am/ khri'u'am/ gdang lakhazhag nas/ stong gnam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du skya rengs shanaded bya
0 zhig pa zhes kyang bya/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes kyang bya/ yi dam las 'gal bas 'das pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya'o// dge slong gcig bu gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs na/ sa pham
par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsalal/ yod de/ mi tshangs par spyod ba ste/ gangazhin/ mtshan 'angs dang rgyab mnyen no// ma byin par len pa dang srog gcod
pa gang zhin/ dge slong des thabs sbyar tenang du zhugs pa dang/ sa brkus par yang gyur/ srog bcad par yang gyur pa'o// brdzun du smra ba'i rgyu gang zhen/ de 'di ltar ngani dgra bcom pa'o//
pan sangs rgyas so zhes zer ba'o// dge slong gis dge slong 'tsho dang bralan/ pha yang ma lags/ ma yang ma 'gas/ de bzhin dus pham par yang 'gyur la/ de mtshams med/
pa'i s su yang 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yod de/ de'adi ltar dge slong de 'i me rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur pa las mtshan
'apos te/ mtshan 'thos par gyur pa las srog bcadon phas pham pa yin la/ de mtshams med pa'i las kyis kyang reg par 'gyur ro// dge slong mas dge slong ma'i 'tsho ba dang phra'an/
ma yang ma lags/ dgra bcom pa yang m lags n pas pham par 'gyur zhing/ de mtshams med pa'ilas su yang 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa//
kubya// yod de dge songam de la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par gyur pa de'i mtshan 'thos te/ mtshan 'apos nas de'i 'tsho ba dang phral na phas pham pa yang yin la/
de mtshams med pa ni las su yang 'gyurare// gzhan gyis smas la des smras pa'i rkyen gyis gzhan la pas pham par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong mas dge 'dun 'dus bdage 'dun gyis ma mchis pa'i phyir de'i rjes su phyogs te/ de yang dge 'dun gyi dbus su lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo yang mi gtong ba des
tham par 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis smras na des smras pa'i skyon gyis gzhan la dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// yod de/ de'adi
ltar gang gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang/ de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang/ bka' blo mi bde ba'i tshig dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo yang slar mi gtong ba ni/ dge 'dun gyi
lhag mar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis smras na de'arkyen gyis gzhan pa nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sum/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong gang gis
sdig pa 'a lta bgazung/ rab tu bzung nas slar mi gtong ba de/ dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo yang sar ma gtong ba ni ltung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis smras pa'i rkyen gyis
ka/gzhan la slar bshags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod de/ de 'daltar dge slong gang gis gleng du mgron du byes te zas za ba'i tshi/ de na yang dge
slong sa zhig bsgo zhing 'dug ste/ 'di la 'bras byin/ 'di la sran tshod byin/ 'di la yang byin zhes zer ba de la ma bsgo bar zos na slar bshags pa ra 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis
smras pa de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong gang gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i tshe/
dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum gyi bar du bsgrags kyang/ nyes pa dran bzhin du slar mu 'chags pa na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa btsem ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas bslab pa phul na
slar dge slong ma'i dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs su mi rung ste/ dge slong ma gang dag gis slar rab tu byung ngam bsnyan par rdzogapa byas na/de dag nyes pa dang bcas so zhes gsungan/ dge slong mas/
bslab pa phul te babs pa las/ de de dag gis rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang lags la/ de dag la yang nongs par mu 'gyur ba mchis
sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa// yod de/ de 'di ltar dge slong ma de bslab pa phul te babs pa las de mtshan 'apos te/ mtshan 'phos par gyur pa derab tu byung zhing
